src_text: Lulawulo lwenhlekelele ngemuva kwetikhukhula.
tgt_text: Ditiro tsa Tsamaiso ya Matlhotlhapelo tse go Samaganweng le Tsona go Latela gore go nne le Merwalela.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalisa kudzabuka kwayo kubo bonkhe bantfu labalahlekelwe tihlobo tabo labatitsandzako kuletikhukhula letidale umonakalo letisandza kwenteka letikhahlamete tincenye letinyeti telive letfu, ikakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Kumenyetelwa kwetingenelelo tekuhhamula Simo Savelonkhe Senhlekelele netingenelelo tetenhlalomnotfo letisandza kumenyetelwa nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, kuhloswe ngato kucinisekisa kuphendvula lokuhlanganisiwe nalokunemphumelelo kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende, ngekusebentisa Sikhungo Savelonkhe Sekulawula Tenhlekelele.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso go batho botlhe ba ba latlhegetsweng ke ba ba ba ratang mo merwaleleng ya fa gautshwane e tlisitseng ditshenyegelo tse di masisi e amileng dikarolo di le mmalwa tsa naga ya rona, bogolo segolo KwaZulu-Natala..     Dikgato tsa go Baya Dikarolo tseno mo Maemong Matlhotlhapelo Bosetšhaba mmogo le dikgato tsa go thusa baagi ka matlole a tlhokegang tse di itsisetsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa fa gautshwane, maitlhomo tsona ke go netefatsa gore maphata otlhe puso tsaya dikgato tse di rulagantsweng sentle le tse di tla nnang mosola mo go samaganeng le maemo ano, mme seno se tla diriwa ka go dirisa Tikwatikwe ya Naga e Samaganang le Matlhotlhapelo..     Bilione ya diranta puso e abileng dirisediwa go tshegetsa dikgato tsa go ritibatsa maemo le tsa go busetsa maemo ditirelo tse di botlhokwa sekeng mmogo le go abelana ka ditirelo tsa botho tse di jaaka go ba rekela dijo, go ba tlela metsi le go ba batlela bodulo, dintlwanaboithusetso le diaparo..     Tirego ya go aga sešwa mafelo a amegileng setse simolotswe jaaka batho ba naga ya gaetsho ba kopane mo maikemisetsong bona go thusa ba ba latlhegetsweng ke magae le dithoto tsa bona.

src_text: Sigidzigidzi sinye semarandi hulumende lasente kutsi sitfolakale sisetjentiselwa kwesekela kuhhamula nemitamo yekuvusetela kabusha, kubuyisela esimeni tinsita letisisekelo kanye nekuniketa lusito lwebuntfu ngendlela yekudla, emanti, kuhanjiswa kwekungcola kanye netimphahla tekugcoka.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso ka Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: Lenchubo yekwakha kabusha tindzawo letitsintsekile seyivele icalile njengaloku bantfu belive lakitsi babumbana ekuncumeni kutsi basite labo labalahlekelwe ngemakhaya abo naloko labanako.
tgt_text: Kabinete tshwentswe ke go tlhatlhoga ga fa gautshwane ga ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 mo dikarolong dingwe tsa naga mme ikuetse go batho botlhe go tsaya dikgato tsa go itshireletsa kgatlhanong le mogare o kotsi ono, bogolo segolo mo marigeng.

src_text: Lokusha mayelana neSifo seLigciwane leKhorona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Mogare ono sa ntse re tsenya tsebetsebe mme go tlhabela moento sale ntse le yona tsela e botoka go gaisa re ka itshireletsang ka yona.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele ngekukhatsateka kwenyuka lokusandza kwenteka kwelufu lwe-COVID-19 kuletinye tincenye futsi icela bonkhe bantfu kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekutivikela kuleligciwane lelibulalako, ikakhulu ngalesikhatsi sasebusika.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumelela gore batho ba le bantsi ba tswelela go tsaya tshweetso ya go tlhabela moento go nna ona ba itshireletsang ka ona kgatlhanong le COVID-19 mme seno se latela gore dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane di bontshe gore mo bathong botlhe ka fa nageng re setse re fitlheletse palo e fetang halofo ya bona ya batho ba ba tlhabetseng meento mo diporofenseng tse tlhano.

src_text: Leligciwane solomane lisasenebungoti lobungapheli kantsi kugoma kusikhali lesiyimphumelelo lenkhulu sekutsi sitivikele.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela go ba ba iseng ba entiwe go ya go tlhabela moento gore ba tle ba itshireletse bona le ba ba tshelang mmogo le bona.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ijabulile kubona bantfu labanyenti bachubeka nekukhetsa kugoma njengendlela yekucala yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngemuva kwelubalobalo lolusandza kwentiwa lolukhomba kutsi sesifinyelele ngetulu kwe-50 yemaphesenti ebantfu labadzala lasebagomile etifundzeni letisihlanu..     Ikhabhinethi icela labo labasengakagomi kutsi bagome kute bativikele kanye nalabatsandzekako babo.
tgt_text: Gape rotlhe re tshwanetse go tswelela go obamela dikgato tsotlhe tsa thibelo ya COVID-19, go akarediwa go rwala mmaseke o tswalang nko le molomo, go tlhapa diatla ka metsi le sesepa, go tsikitletsa diatla ka sebolayamegare se 70% ya sona leng alekhoholo, le go katogana le batho ba bangwe..     Mogolo wa go Inola Batho mo Tshotlegong (SRD).

src_text: Kufanele kutsi sonkhe sichubeke nekugcina tonkhe tinchubo tekutivikela ku-COVID-19, lokufaka ekhatsi kufaka sifonyo lesivala imphumulo nemlomo, sigeze tandla ngemanti nangensipho, nome sisebentise sibulalimagciwane sekugeza tandla lesine-70% ye-alkhoholi, kanye nekugcina libanga lekuchelelana leliphephile lokungenani libe imitha yinye..     Sibonelelo Sahulumende Sekuhhamula Inhlupheko (i-SRD).
tgt_text: Kabinete rotloetsa baagi ba ba amogelang R350 ya madi thuso SRD go dira dikopo sešwa, go latela kitsiso ya melawana mentšhwa e laolang makwalokopo le go nna le tshiamelo ya madi thuso..     Dikopo di ka dirwa mo webosaeteng ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tshireletso ya Loago (SASSA): https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutele takhamuti letitfola sibonelelo sahulumende sekuhhamula inhlupheko kutsi tiphindze futsi tifake ticelo, ngemuva kwekungeniswa kwemitsetfosimiso lemisha lelawula ticelo kanye nekufaneleka kutfola lesibonelelo sahulumende.
tgt_text: Tsamaiso ya go dira dikopo butswe ka la bo 23 Moranang 2022 mme dirisa fela mafaratlhatlha thekenoloji go kgontsha gore go direlwe ka bonako..     Mogolo ono botlhokwa thata mo go thuseng malapa a tlhokang lehuma le botlhokatiro di ka bong di sa bolo go itelekela mo go ona.

src_text: Ticelo tingafakwa kuwebhusayithi ye-Ejensi Yesibonelelomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASSA ku: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Puso tota ikemiseditse go thusa batho ba ba humanegileng ka megolo ya yona gore le bona ba kgone go nna le tse ba di tlhokang.

src_text: Luhlelo lwekufaka ticelo luvulwe mhla tinge-23 Mabasa 2022 kantsi lusebentisa ngalokuphelele inchubo yedijithali kute kutsi kutsatse sikhatsi sekukuphendvula lesiphangisako..     Lesibonelelomali sekuhhamula siyinetha yekuphephela lemcoka yemindeni leswelako lengabe ikhahlabetwe buphuya nekuswela umsebenti.
tgt_text: Pabalesego le Tshireletsego.

src_text: Hulumende utimisele kuniketa lusito lwetenhlalo kulabo abahlaseleka lula kakhulu kute kutsi bakhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tabo letisisekelo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tswelela go kgala ka mafoko a bogale dipolao tse di setlhogo tsa basadi mme lebogile dikgato tsa ka bonako tse mapodisi ba di tsereng mo go tshwareng babelaelwa mo kgetseng ya polao ya Mme Hillary Gardee (28), wa kwa Kamagugu kwa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Tekuphepha Nekuvikeleka.
tgt_text: Gape Kabinete kgadile ka mafoko a bogale polao ya batho ba le barataro kwa Khayelitsha, kwa Motsekapa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekuhlaba kubulawa kwabomake lokute ingcondvo futsi iyakwemukela kuphendvula ngekushesha lokwentiwe tiphatsimandla tekucinisekisa kugcinwa kwemtsetfo ngekubamba basolwa labayamaniswa nekufa kwaMk.
tgt_text: Dipolao tse di setlhogo di re gakolola gore re tshwanetse go dira go feta ga jaana jaaka setšhaba go fedisa tirisodikgoka le tirisodikgoka mo bathong ba bong jo bo rileng mmogo le polao ya basadi le bana (GBVF).

src_text: Hillary Gardee (28), waKamagugu eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe mo nageng go dira le puso mo ntweng kgatlhanong le bosenyi le GBVF.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ichubeka futsi ngekuhlaba sento sekubulawa kwebantfu labasitfupha eKhayelitsha, eKapa.
tgt_text: Mmogo re ka dira bonnete jwa gore batho botlhe, go akarediwa bagodi, basadi le bana ba bona mafelo re nnang mo go ona le mebila ya ona babalesegile..     Ikonomi.

src_text: Lokubulala lokute ingcondvo kuyinkhumbuto yekutsi kufanele sente kakhulu njengemmango kute sicedze budlova kanye nebudlova lobucondziswe ebulilini lobutsite kanye nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pulosemmuso ya feme ya tlhagiso ya ditena ya Corobrik kwa Kwastina kwa Driefontein kwa Gauteng mo tirelo eno neng tsenetswe ke Moporesidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro, 4 Motsheganong.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi igcugcutela bonkhe bantfu lapha eveni kutsi basebentisane nahulumende ekulweni nebugebengu kanye ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Feme eno ya maemo a kwa godimo ke karolo ya peeletso ya R800 milione e tsamaelanang le R200 milione nngwe e beetsweng go atolosa ditiro tsa konkereite tsa Corobrik kwa KwaZulu-Natala.

src_text: Ngekubambisana singasenta siciniseko sekutsi imimango yetfu kanye netitaladi tetfu tiphephile kubo bonkhe bantfu, lokufaka ekhatsi bantfu lasebakhulile, bomake nebantfwana.
tgt_text: Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo di le mmalwa tsa ka fa nageng tse di tsibogetseng boikuelo jwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa jwa gore dikgwebo tsa Aforika Borwa le tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba di beeletse mo ikonoming.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Kabinete nopotse gore ditšhono tse dinnye tsa ikonomi mo mererong ya haeterojene di oketsegile ka ntlha ya go agiwa ga lori ya setlamo sa meepo sa Anglo American e tsamayang ka mafura haeterojene.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikwemukele kuvulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kwefekthri yekubhaka titini yakwa-Corobriks i-Kwastina lapha eDriefontein eGauteng nguMengameli Ramaphosa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla ti-4 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Lori eno – e fetotsweng gore se tlhole dirisa mafura disele mme dirise haeterojene, mmogo le go neelwa maatla ke dibeterii tsa lithium-ion – ke ya ntlha ya mofuta oo mo lefatsheng.

src_text: Lefekthri lesezingeni lemhlaba yakha incenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R800, loluhamba kanye naletinye tigidzi letinge-R200 letibekelwe kusebenta ngakhonkolo kwe-Corobrik lelapha KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Ditšhono tsa ikonomi mo mererong ya haeterojene di nopotswe jaaka tse di botlhokwa mo maanong a botlhokwa ikonomi e sa diriseng dilo tse di bolayang tlhago mo nageng ya rona, le mo go godiseng ikonomi le mo go tlhameng ditiro..     Gape kabinete amogetse peeletso nngwe mo ikonoming e tlang ka setlamo sa dijo sa Ireland, se se bidiwang Kerry Group, se se butseng polante ntšhwa e jeleng R650 milione kwa Hammarsdale, kwa KwaZulu-Natala se maikaelelo sona leng go tlhagisetsa kontinente dijo tse di tse di sa feleng.

src_text: I-Corobrik ingulenye yemabhizinisi lamanyenti endzawo laphendvulile kulesimemo lesentiwe nguMengameli Ramaphosa kumabhizinisi aseNingizimu Afrika kanye nakumabhizinisi emave emhlaba kutsi atjale timali kulelive..     Ikhabhinethi ikucaphele kutsi lomnotfo lomusha longakhiphi ikhabhoni lenyenti ugcugcutelekile ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa iloli lehamba ngemandla ehayidrojini baka-Anglo American.
tgt_text: Polante eno ga tshwane le tse dingwe gonne na le didirisiwa di le mmalwa tse di sa senyeng tikologo mmogo le tse di sa diriseng motlakase montsi, tse di dirisang motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi o tla dirang gore seelo sa go itshepele ka bontsi mo motlakaseng wa ka fa nageng se fokotsege, motlakase o tsewang mo mogoteng o tswang mo metšhining megolo mmogo le metsi a lekaneng, go selwa le go solwamosola gape le phokotso.

src_text: Leloli − lebeyihamba ngedizili yantjintjelwa kutsi ihambe ngehayidrojini, futsi ihamba ngencenye yemandla emabhethri e-lithium-ion – isezingeni lekucala lemhlaba.
tgt_text: Setlamo sa Kerry Group sa le se le gona mo Aforika Borwa go tloga ka 2011 mme peeletso nngwe ya bona ke sesupo sa gore Aforika Borwa sa ntse le lefelo le le ratiwang la dipeeletso.

src_text: Umnotfo wehayidrojini ubonakale njengelisubuciko lelibekwe embili kutsi kucalwe ngalo kumnotfo lonekhabhoni lephasi walelive, kanye nekuchubela embili kukhula kutemnotfo nekucashwa..     Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela lolunye lutjalomali kumnotfo wetfu lolwentiwe yinkampani yekudla yase-Ireland, i-The Kerry Group, lesungule sikhungomkhicito lesisha setigidzi letinge-R650 lapha eHammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal lokuhloswe ngaso kutsi kukhicitwe kudla lokusimeme kwalelivekati.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso tseno di latela go thankgololwa ga bene e tlhagisitsweng mo lapeng ya Isuzu D-Max kwa Gqeberha kwa Kapa Botlhaba kgwedi e fetileng.

src_text: Lesikhungomkhicito sehlukile ngobe sikhombisa timphawu letinyenti tekusimama lokufaka ekhatsi tisetjentiswa letisebentisa emandla agezi lamancane, kuphehlwa kwemandla elilanga kute kuncishiswe kusetjentiswa kwemandla agezi kugridi yendzawo, konga kulahleka kwekushisa, kanye nekubamba emanti ngemphumelelo, kuwasebentisa futsi nekunciphisa kungcola.
tgt_text: D-MAX ya mofuta montšhwa bontsha maikemisetso Isuzu mo Aforika Borwa mme ke nngwe ya dilo tse di fitlheletsweng ka Letsholo la Tlhabololo ya Tlhagiso ya Dijanaga (APDP).

src_text: I-Kerry Group yafika lapha eNingizimu Afrika kusukela nga-2011, kantsi kuchubeka kwayo nelutjalomali kuluphawu lwekutsi iNingizimu Afrika iyindzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.
tgt_text: APDP ke sekema se se tlhotlheletsang tlhagiso ya dijanaga mo indaseteri ya dijanaga mme maikaelelo sona ke go dira gore indaseteri e tlhalositsweng ya dijanaga oketse tlhagiso ya yona ya dijanaga, go oketsa mosola wa indaseteri ya dikarolo tsa dijanaga mme seno se tla dira gore indaseteri ya dijana tlhole ditiro.
Go fopholediwa gore go tla tsenngwa R2,8 bilione ka ditlhagiswa tsa ka fa nageng fa APDP tswelela go dirisiwa.

src_text: Lolutjalomali lulandzela etinyatselweni tekwetfulwa kweveni i-Isuzu D-Max leyakhiwe kulelive eGqeberha eMphumalanga Kapa kulenyanga lephelile.
tgt_text: Peeletso eno tla tlhola ditiro go tswa mo lephateng leno di feta di le 1 000 kwa polanteng eo mme tlhole gape le ditiro tse dingwe gape di le 24 000 mo ditlamong tse dingwe tse di dirisanang le lephata leno, mme seno se tla nna le mosola o bonalang mo go thuseng baagi ba kgaolo eo..     Pitsokgothakgothe ya Batlhankedi ba Meepo.

src_text: Lesitukulwane lesisha sema-D-Max siluphawu lwekutinikela kwe-Isuzu lapha eNingizimu Afrika futsi ingulenye  yetimphumelelo letifezekisiwe ngaphasi kweLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Kukhicitwa Kwetimoto (i-APDP).
tgt_text: Pitsokgothakgothe ya Peeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Motsekapa go tloga ka la bo 9 go fitlha ka la bo 12 Motsheganong ke nngwe ya dirala tse dikgolokgolo tsa dipuisano le ditirisanommogo magareng ga bannaleseabe botlhe mo indasetering ya meepo.

src_text: Le-APDP iluhlelo lekukhutsata kukhicita lokucondziswe embonini yetimoto lokuhloswe ngalo kugcugcutela umkhicito ngebunyenti kule mboni yetimotoe, ngekugcugcutela  lizingagugu lelengetiwe emkhakheni wemboni yetetimoto ngaleyo ndlela-ke kudaleke ematfuba emsebenti kutinchubo tekukhicita timoto.
tgt_text: Moono wa tiragalo ne le: “Diphetogo mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go beeletsa mo Tsamaisong ya Motlakase, ESG le Diikonomi”.

src_text: Tilinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi leti-R. 8 letitawukwentiwa emkhicitweni welizingagugu walelive ngekusebentisa umjikeleto we-APDP.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumela gore Pitsokgothakgothe ya Meepo tla thusa go bontsha le go tsweletsa Aforika Borwa jaaka lefelo le le ratiwang la dipeeletso.

src_text: Lolutjalomali lutawudala imisebenti ngco lengetulu kwe-1000 kulesosikhungomkhicito bese kutsi bantfu labange-24 000 bacashwe hhayi ngco, lokuyintfo letawufaka ligalelo lelimcoka ekutfutfukiseni lesifundza..     Ingcugcutsela Yetetimayini.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa leboga dipeeletso mo nageng ya rona mme ikemiseditse go dira gore go nne le maemo a tla dirang gore re nne le kgolo botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go yona ya ikonomi le go tlisa diphetogo mo ikonoming.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela yeLutjalomali Etimayini Tase-Afrika yanga-2022 lebeyibanjelwe eCape Town International Convention Centre kusukela ngamhla ti-9 kuya mhla ti-12 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ingulenye yetinkhundla letinkhulu kakhulu tekuchumana nekuhlanganyela emkhatsini walabatsintsekako embonini yetimayini.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa Boditšhabatšhaba le tsa Kgaolo.

src_text: Ingcikitsi yalomcimbi beyitsi: “Kugucugucuka Kwetimayini e-Afrika: Kutjala Timali eKuntjintjeni Kutemandla, i-ESG neMinotfo.”.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape ditherisano tsa fa gautshwane tsa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa le Moporesidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Moporesidente Emmanuel Macron wa Fora le Moporesidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mo diraleng tse di farologaneng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi leNgcungcutsela Yetetimayini itawusita ekukhombiseni nasekugcugcuteleni iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yelutjalomali longatikhetsela yona.
tgt_text: Ditherisano tseno di kgontshitse Moporesidente go maatlafatsa dikamano tsa sebedi le tirisanommogo magareng ga Aforika Borwa le mebuso ya balekane malebana le dintlha tsa botlhokwa tsa kgaolo le tsa boditšhabatšhaba, go akarediwa go bona tharabololo ya kagiso ya kgotlhang e kwa Ukraine     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika liyalwemukela lutjalomali lapha kulelive letfu futsi itimisele kudala timo letikuvunako loko kute kutsi kube nekukhula lokufaka wonkhe wonkhe kanye nekugcuculwa kwemnotfo.
tgt_text: Ditekanyetsokabo.

src_text: Budlelwane bemave emhlaba nebesigodzi.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe go latela ditlhagiso tsa Ditekanyetsokabo tse di farologaneng tsa mafapha bosetšhaba puso le la Kantoro ya Moporesidente gore ba kgone go rwesa puso maikarabelo..     Ka nako ya ditlhagiso tsa Ditekanyetsokabo, mafapha otlhe thadisa ka botlalo dithulaganyo le ditlapele tsa ngwaga.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yemukela kucocisana lokusandza kwenteka kwaMengameli Ramaphosa naMengameli Joe Biden waseMelika, Mengameli Emmanuel Macron waseFrance naMengameli Hakainde Hichilema waseZambiya ngetinkhundla tekuchumana letahlukene.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo tlhagiso ya Ditekanyetsokabo ke go netefatsa gore matlole setšhaba dirisiwa ka nonofo go fitlhelela ditlhokego tsa baagi..     Gape di neela Ditona serala se se maleba go tsharolola tiro ya puso, go akarediwa dikatlego le dikgwetlho..     Leano la go Anamisa Gase ya Peteroliamo e Fetoletsweng go nna Seedi (LPG).

src_text: Lokucocisana kwente kutsi Mengameli acinise budlelwane bemacembu lamabili kanye nekusebentisana emkhatsini weNingizimu Afrika nemibuso lebalingani mayelana netindzaba letimcoka tesifundza netemave emhlaba, lokufaka ekhatsi kutfola likhambi lekuthula kuloludvweshu lwase-Ukraine     Tincumo teKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tsenngwa tirisong ga Leano la go Anamisa LPG, le le phasaladitsweng go batla maikutlo baagi ka Mopitlwe.

src_text: Emavoti eSabelomali.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo leano leno ke go atolosa indaseteri ya LPG mo nageng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tilandzelele laMavoti lahlukahlukene eSabelomali lentiwa ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe kanye neLihhovisi laMengameli kutsi tente hulumende kutsi atilandze.
tgt_text: LPG tla nna mosola mo go bonalang mo go direng gore re nne le metswedi e farologaneng ya motlakase..     Gareng ga ditsereganyo tse dingwe, leano leno le tla laola ditlhwatlhwa mo lephateng leno le go tshegetsa tlhagiso ya disilindara tsa LPG mo nageng.

src_text: Ngesikhatsi seMavoti eSabelomali, onkhe ematiko anika inchazelo lenemininingwane yemasu awo kanye naloko lakubeke embili latawucala ngako akwente ngemnyaka.
tgt_text: Gape le tla ruta baagi ka mesola ya go dirisa LPG jaaka mofuta mongwe wa motlakase..     Leano leno go tla iponelwa lona fa le sena go phasaladiwa ke Lefapha la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Diminerale le Motlakase mo www.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: EMavoti eSabelomali ahlose kucinisekisa kutsi timali tahulumende tisetjentiswa ngelikhono yini kuhlangabetana netidzingo temmango.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso la Naga le le Buang ka Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo a Tsweletsang Temoso ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.
Kabinee amogetse Letlhomeso la Naga le le Buang ka Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo a Tsweletsang Temoso ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogolofadi.

src_text: LaMavoti aphindze futsi ente kutsi kube nenkhundla lefanele kutsi Tindvuna tichaze kabanti umsebenti wahulumende, lokufaka ekhatsi timphumelelo netinsayeya.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo letlhomeso ke go kaela maphata poraefete le setšhaba go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba nang le bogole di sirelediwa jaaka go beilwe mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko lekwenta Igesi Leluketjeti (i-LPG).
Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile Kukhishwa kweLisubuciko le-LPG kutsi lifezekiswe, lelashicilelwa ngeNdlovulenkhulu 2022 kutsi kubonisanwe ngalo nemmango.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso leno le tla ka dithulaganyo tse di tla thusang go fedis dikgoreletsi tse go itemogelwang tsona fa go tsewa ditshwetso, bogolo segolo tse di amanang le batho ba ba nang le bogole.

src_text: Lelisubuciko kuhloselwe ngalo kutsi kwengetwe imboni ye-LPG kulelive.
tgt_text: Gape le lemosa batho ba ba nang le bogole gore ba itse ditshwanelo tsa bona jaaka di sirelediwa ke Molaotheo.

src_text: I-LPG itawufaka ligalelo lelibonakalako ekwehlukaniseni imitfombolusito yetemandla..     Lelisubuciko emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, litawulawula intsengo yetinchubo temkhicito kanye nekwesekela kwakhiwa emabhodlela e-LPG kulelive.
tgt_text: Gape letlhomeso leno le tlamela ka katiso, pegelo ya bobegakang le tsweletso ya temoso mo setšhabeng malebana le ditshwanelo tsa batho ba ba nang le bogole.

src_text: Litawuphindza futsi lifundzise ummango mayelana netinzuzo tekusebentisa i-LPG njengalenye indlela yetemandla.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso leno le diragatsa Lekwalo la Matlhagolatsela la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.

src_text: Lelisubiciko litawutfolakala ngemuva kwekutsi selishicilelwe Litiko Letetimbiwa Nemandla ku: www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ke mosaeni wa Tumelano ya Ditšhabakopano (UN) ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole le Porothokholo ya UN ya Tšhata ya Aforika ya Ditshwanelo tsa Botho le Batho mo Ditshwanelong tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (Porothokholo ya Aforika ya Ditshwanelo tsa Bogole).

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo Ekukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Go batlilwe maikutlo bannaleseabe ba ba maleba malebana le letlhomeso, go akarediwa Lekgotla la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le Badiri.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iluvumile Luhlakamsebenti Lwavelonkhe Lwelisubuciko lolumayelana neMkhankhaso Wekuvusa Kucashelwa kweMalungelo eKukhubateka eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kuhloselwe ngalo kukhomba indlela imikhakha yomibili yahulumende naletimele ekucinisekiseni emalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi ayavikeleka, njengaloku abhalwe kuMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhliki yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwariwa ga Samiti ya Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe ka Labotlhano, 27 le Lamatlhatso, 28 Motsheganong 2022 kwa Gauteng.

Kabinete amogetse Lekwalo la Ditshwetso tse go Enngweng ka Tsona la Tsamaiso ya Mafatshe le Tsamaiso ya go nna le Lefatshe mo Mafelong Merafe le go dumelanweng ka lona mo kgweding ya Mopitlwe kaetse gore go dirwe patlomaikutlo nngwe mo baameging ba ba maleba.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lingumgodla lotawusita ekususeni tihibe letibandlululako ekutsatseni tincumo, ikakhulu leto letiphatselene nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Samiti eno tla tsenyeletsa gape le tiro e dirilweng mo ngwageng o fetileng mo go yona go batlilweng ditshwaelo go tswa kwa bannaleseabeng ba ba farologaneng     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Luphindze futsi lukhumbute bantfu labaphila nekukhubateka kutsi bati kutsi emalungelo abo avikelwe nguMtsetfosisekelo.
tgt_text: Khonferense ya Botlhano ya Lefatshe ya Phediso ya go Ja Bana Ntshu.

src_text: Loluhlelomsebenti luphindze futsi lwente kutsi kube nekuceceshwa, betindzaba lababikako kanye nekuvusa kucaphelisa ummango mayelana nemalungelo ebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka..     Lunika emandla kutsi Umtsetfo Lokusakhulunyisanwa Ngawo lomayelana neBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla amogela Khonferense ya Botlhano ya Lefatshe ya Phediso ya go Ja Bana Ntshu kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Durban ya go Tshwarela Dikhonferense kwa KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka Latshipi, 15 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 20 Motsheganong.

src_text: Live laseNingizimu Afrika lisisayinile Sivumelwano saMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) lesimayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka kanye neNchubo yaMhlabuhlangene kuMculu wase-Afrika lomayelana neLuntfu neMalungelo eBantfu mayelana neMalungelo eBantfu Labaphila Ngekukhubateka (Inchubo yase-Afrika yeBantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka).
tgt_text: Ke la ntlha Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Badiri (ILO) tshwarela khonferense eno mo Aforika..     Go solofetswe gore khonferense tla tsenelwa ke ditlhogo tsa dipuso, ditona tse 120, dikgaolotlhopho tsa boraro tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo tsa ILO di le187, ditheo tsa UN, ditheo tsa thuto, mekgatlho ya baagi, mekgatlho e seng ya puso, bobegakgang le baagi.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti kwabonisanwa ngalo nabo bonkhe labafanele labatsintsekako, lokufaka ekhatsi Tekutfutfukiswa Kwetemnotfo Nemkhandlu Webasebenti.
tgt_text: Gape tiragalo tla kgontsha Aforika Borwa go tlhagisa Molaotheo wa naga jaaka sireletsa ditshwanelo tsa bana.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba Nemalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango.
tgt_text: Naga tla golagana le dinaga tse di farologaneng tse di re eteletseng pele ka go fedisa go ja bana ntshu le go ithuta mo go tsona..     Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo  le le Ikaegileng ka Ditikologo (DDM).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kusingatfwa kweNgcungcutsela yeKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikati Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlaba eTindzaweni teMmango ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-27 nangeMgcibelo, mhla tinge-28 Inkhwekhweti 2022 eGauteng.
tgt_text: Moresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Imbizo ya Moporesidente e buang ka DDM kwa Mpumalanga ka Labotlhano, 20 Motsheganong 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile Sitatimende Sesinyatselo Leme Kuso lesimayelana neKuphatfwa Kwemhlaba neMalungelo eBunikat Nekusetjentiswa Kwemhlabai eTindzaweni teMmango  ngeNdlovulenkhulu nga-.
tgt_text: Jaaka serala sa botlhokwa se baagi ba nang le seabe mo go sona, Imbizo tla letla Moporesidente go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba farologaneng – bogolo segolo baagi ba metsemagae – le go reetsa matshwenyego le dikgwetlho tsa bona ka maikaelelo go samagana natso.

src_text: Ifake sicondziso lesitsi kube nekubonisana lokuchubekako nalabanye labafanele labatsintsekako.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Moporesidente e buang ka DDM ikaelela go sutisa dikgoreletsi tsa tlamelo ya ditirelo e tsamaisanang mmogo le go tsweletsa seabe sa baagi go lepalepana le DDM.

src_text: Lengcungcutsela itawuba ngumphumela wemsebenti lowentiwe kulomnyaka lophelile, leyacela imibono kulabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene     Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: MaAforika Borwa ka latela dipuisano mo mafaratlhatlheng loago ditlhaeletsano mmogo le go nna le seabe mo go tsona ka go tsena mo #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusebentisa Bantfwana.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawube isingatse Inkhomfa Yemhlaba Wonkhe Yesihlanu lemayelana neKucedza Kusetjentiswa Kwebantfwana letawube ise-Durban International Convention Centre KwaZulu-Natal kusukela ngeLisontfo, ti-15 kuya ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Mokete wa segopotso sa Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika o tshwarwang mmogo le wa go keteka Letsatsi la go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ka Laboraro, 25 Motsheganong ketekiwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ngwaga wa Kgora: Go maatlafatsa kgora le go nna teng ga dijo mo Kontinenteng ya Aforika”..     Jaaka karolo ya ponelopele ya pakatelele e tlhagisitsweng mo Lenaneo 2063 (le leng kaedi ya tlhabololo ya Aforika go fitlhelela tlhabololo ya ikonomiloago e akaretsang le e tsweletsegang mo dingwageng tse 50), moono totile bokgoni jwa batho ba Aforika, go lebeletswe thata basadi, makgarebe le bana.

src_text: Kwekucala kutsi Inhlangano Yemave Emhlaba Yebasebenti (i-ILO) kutsi isingatse lenkhomfa lapha e-Afrika..     Tinhloko temibuso, tindvuna leti-120, imikhandlu lemitsatfu yemave la-187 e-ILO, ema-ejensi e-UN, tikhungo temfundvo, tinhlangano temmango, tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, betindzaba nemmango ulindzeleke kutsi uyihambele lenkhomfa.
tgt_text: Seno se botlhokwa mo tlhabololong ka ntlha ya fa se lebisa kwa matshelong a tokafetseng batho ka nosi, go nna le dipoelo tse di kwa godimo le letseno le le tokafetseng mo dinageng.

src_text: Lomcimbi utawuphindze wente kutsi iNingizimu Afrika igcamise Umtsetfosisekelo walelive njengaloku uvikela emalungelo ebantfwana.
tgt_text: Ntlhakgolo e ka elwang tlhoko mo meletlong ya Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ke Beke ya Dipuisano tsa Aforika e tla tshwarelwang kwa Constitutional Hill kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka la bo 23 go fitlha ka la bo 27 Motsheganong.

src_text: Lelive litawuchumana nemave lahlukene lasembili kunatsi ekucedzeni kusetjentiswa kwebantfwana futsi sitawufundza kuwo.
Imbizo yaMengameli YeLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetigodzi (i-DDM).
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya go Keteka go Nna MoAforika ke tšhono ya go godisa tshwaragano ya Aforika le go dira gore dikgaolo tsa yona di nne le tshwaragano e tseneletseng, le go dira gore Aforika nne le maikemisetso a tshwanang.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawube asingatse Imbizo yaMengameli Yekutfutfukiswa Kwetigodzi ngaLesihlanu, mhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti 2022 ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Ungashiyi namunye ngemuva”.
tgt_text: Kabinete gakolola mongwe le mongwe gore dikgatlhegelo tsa rona tsa bosetšhaba di golagane le tsepamo, kopano le katlego ya Aforika     Melaetsa.

src_text: Njengendlela yenkhundla lemcoka yekutimbandzakanya kwemmango, leMbizo ivumela Mengameli kutsi achumane ngco nalabatsintsekako labahlukahlukene – ikakhulu imimango yasetindzaweni tasemaphandleni – kanye nekulalela tingcinamba tawo kanye netinsayeya ngenhloso yekutilungisa.
tgt_text: Matshediso     Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng le balesika ba: Mme Phindile Xaba (53), yo dirileng sebaka le ka maikemisetso mo indasetering ya bobegakgang, mo Aforika Borwa le kwa moseja dirile ka botswapele go tokafatsa naga ya rona.

src_text: LeMbizo yaMengameli Yekutfutfukiswa Kwesigodzi  ihlose kuvula lapho kuvaleke khona ekwetfuleni tinsita letihlanganisiwe kanye nekugcugcutela kutimbandzakanya kwemmango lokuhambisana ne-DDM.
tgt_text: Moambasadara Silumko Sokupa (74), yo diretseng Setheo sa Tshireletso ya Puso mo maemong a farolgoaneng mo pakeng telele dira ka maikemisetso mo Tirelongsetšhaba.Moporofesara Francis Wilson (83), motlhankedi wa merero ya ikonomi yo tumileng le mosimolodi wa Yuniti ya Badiri le Dipatlisiso tsa Tlhabololo mo Borwa jwa Aforika     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika bangalandzela lokwentekako futsi batimbandzakanye kuloko lokucocwako etinkhundleni tekuchumana ngaphasi kwe-hashtag letsi: #PresidentialImbizo.
tgt_text: Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Tlhabololo ya Setheo kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo (DCoG).

src_text: Inyanga yase-Afrika.
tgt_text: Rre Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomuka jaaka DDG: Tshegetso ya Pusoselegae le Tsamaiso ya Ditsereganyo kwa DCoG..     Rre Risimati Patrick Mathye jaaka DDG: Tsamaiso ya Ditirelo tsa Metsi le Kgeleloleswe kwa Lefapheng la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe (DWS)..     Rre Collin Xolani Zwane jaaka DDG: Taolo, Kobamelo le Tiragatso kwa DWS.

src_text: Kugujwa njalo ngemnyaka kweNyanga yase-Afrika neLusuku Lwase-Afrika ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-25 Inkhwekhweti lubungatwa ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Umnyaka Wekudla Lokunemsoco: Kucinisa likhono lekucina ekudleni lokunemsoco kanye nekubakhona kwekudla kulelivekati lase-Afrika”.
tgt_text: Rre Melanchton Makobe jaaka DDG: Netefaletso ya Bolaodi ya SOC le Tiragatso kwa Lefapheng la Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba     Kabinete dumelane le Ditona mo go thapiweng ga ba ba latelang:.

src_text: Njengencenye yembononchanti wesikhatsi lesidze lobhalwe ku-Ajenda 2063 (lokulisu lase-Afrika lekufezekisa intfutfuko yetemnotfo lefaka wonkhe wonkhe nalesimeme kwengca iminyaka lenge-50), lengcikitsi igcile emandleni lakhona ebantfu base-Afrika ekugcizeleleni kakhulu kubomake, kubantfu labasha nakubantfwana.
tgt_text: Rre Bhekuyise Mathews Khenisa jaaka Motlhakedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) wa Setheo sa Tlhabololo ya Matlo (HDA).

src_text: Loku kumcoka kutentfutfuko ngobe kuholela etimphilweni letentiwe ncono yalowo nalowo, inzuzo lenkhulu, kanye nemalingena lencono yemave..     Lokugcame kakhulu lokubonakalako kulemigubho yeNyanga yase-Afrika, Liviki lase-Afrika Letekuchumana, lelitawubanjelwa lapha e-Constitution Hill eJozi kusukela mhla tinge-23 kuya mhla tinge-27 Inkhwekhweti..     Inyanga yase-Afrika ilitfuba lekugcugcutela bunye base-Afrika kanye nekuhlanganiswa ngalokujulile kwesifundza, kanye nekutinikela futsi kwe-Afrika kuloko lephokopholele kufika kuko lokusifaka sonkhe.
tgt_text: Mme Joy Keledi Masemola jaaka Motlhankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete kwa HDA..     Ngaka Cornelius Ruiters jaaka CEO wa Lepelle Northern Water.

src_text: Imitamo yekuvuselela nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula.
tgt_text: Go Itharabologelwa le go Itlhotlhora mo Ditshenyegelong tsa Merwalela.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga lokukhulu kubo bonkhe bantfu netinhlangano letidlale indzima emitameni yekuvuselela kanye nekwakha kabusha ngemuva kwetikhukhula letisandza kwenteka kuletinye tincenye talelive, ikakhulukati KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse le go leboga batho botlhe le mekgatlho yotlhe e thusang mo dikgatong tsa go itharabologelwa le go itlhotlhora mo ditshenyegelong tsa merwalela go latela gore mafelo mangwe ka fa nageng gogolwe ke merwalela megolo, segolobogolo mafelo KwaZulu-Natal.

src_text: Ibonge tonkhe tinhlangano letingekho ngaphasi kwahulumende, tinhlangano tetenkholo, imimango, bosomabhizinisi netinhlangano letisita imimango ngekudla, tingubo tekugcoka, tingubo tekulala, tinsita tekubuyisa sitfunti nekuhlonipheka kanye netinyifomu tesikolwa emindenini lekhahlabetekile kute kutsi ikhone kuhlangabetana netidzingo tayo letibalulekile..     Sikhungo Savelonkhe Setekulawula Kwetinhlekelele siyachubeka nekuchumanisa tonkhe tigaba tahulumende emitameni yaso yekusita ngelusito lwekuhhamula bantfu kuwo onkhe emakhaya latsintsekile.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile mekgatlho yotlhe e seng ya puso, ya dikereke, ya baagi, ya dikgwebo le eo thusang baagi ka go neela malapa a tlhokang ka ditlhokwa tse di botlhokwa ka go neela dijo, diaparo, dikobo, didirisiwa tsa sesadi tsa fa bomme ba le mo 'kgweding mmogo le diaparo tsa sekolo..     Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo tswelela go laola ditiro tsotlhe tsa maphata puso tse di ka ga go tswa baagi botlhe ba ba amegileng thuso.

src_text: Tinsita tekukhosela tinikwa bantfu labangetulu kwe-7 000 etigodzini letine letikhahlabeteke kakhulu KwaZulu-Natal..     Sewucalile umsebenti wekwakhiwa kwetindlu tesikhashana temindeni lekhahlabetekile etindzaweni letingaphasi kwahulumende letikhonjiwe  KwaZulu-Natal kute kutsi tihlaliswe.
tgt_text: Batho ba feta ba le 7 000 ba neelwa gape le ditirelo tsa marobalo mo mafelong a itemogetseng ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo mo dikgaolong di le nne tsa KwaZulu-Natal..     Tiro ya go agela malapa a amegileng dintlo mo dinageng tsa puso tse di nopotsweng tsa KwaZulu-Natal tse go nang le kgonagalo ya go fudusetsa baagi bano mo go tsona setse simolotse.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutibophelela kwahulumende ekuphatseni timali telusito lwetikhukhula ngebuhlakani nangekungafihli lutfo.
tgt_text: Kabinete buseleditse boitlamo jwa puso jwa go tlhokomela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho le ka go tlhoka lehunelo madi go thusa ba ba amilweng ke merwalela.

src_text: Umcwaningimabhuku Jikelele waseNingizimu Afrika usita ngemsebenti wekulandzelela lowengetiwe kanye nekuhlela kabusha kusetjentiswa kwetimali lokufanele kutsi kubekwe embili ngekuhambisana neluhlelo lwahulumende lwesabelomali..     Takamuva mayelana neLigciwane leSifo seKhorona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Morunimogolo se tlamela ka ditirelo tse dingwe gape tsa go disa maemo ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho le go netefatsa gore madi ano logelwa maano go ya ka thulaganyo ya puso ya go rulaganyetsa tiriso ya matlole..     Tshedimosetso ya Sešweng ya Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bonkhe bantfu labaseNingizimu Afrika kutsi batsatse tinyatselo tekuphepha kute kutsi bagweme kubhebhetseka kwe-COVID-19 ngemuva kwekutsi tibalo takamuva tibonise kwandza lokuphawulekako kwelizinga lalesifo kanye netifo letihlobene nesikhatsi sasebusika eveni..     Ikhabhinethi ikhumbute wonkhe umuntfu kutsi achubeke nekuzivikela tsine kanye nalabanye bantfu ngekugeza tandla tetfu njalo noma kusebentisa sibulali-magciwane, kufaka tifonyo uma singekhatsi kwetakhiwo, sikhweshelane nebantfu, kuvula amafasitelo kute kutsi kungene umoya lohlobile kanye nekugoma.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging botlhe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa go itlhokomela gore ba se fetelwe ke COVID-19 mme seno se latela gore dipalopalo tse di rebotsweng di bontshe gore palo ya batho ba ba fetelwang ke mogare ono mmogo le ba ba fetelwang ke malwetse a tlang le mariga ka fa nageng tsweletse go tlhatloga..     Kabinete gakolotse batho botlhe go tswelela go itlhokomela le go tlhokomela batho ba bangwe ka go dira bonnete jwa gore ba tlhapa diatla kgotsa ba di tsikitletsa ka sebolayamegare gangwe le gape, ka go apara dimaseke fa ba le fa teng ga meago, go katogana le batho ba bangwe, go bula matlhabaphefo gore go tsene mowa o phepa mmogo le go tlhabela moento.

src_text: Kugoma nguyona ndlela lencono kakhulu yekutivikela ku-COVID-19 ngoba kuvimbela kugula lokumatima, kulaliswa esibhedlela ngisho nekufa.
tgt_text: Go tlhabela moento santse le yona tsela e di gaisang ya go itlhokomela gore se gatelelwe ke bolwetse jwa COVID-19, go robala kwa bookelong ka ntlha ya yona kgotsa go ya maotwana hunyela.

src_text: Awudzingi likheli lasekhaya kute kutsi ugome.
tgt_text: Ga tlhoke le go nna le aterese ya gore nna kae gore kgone go tlhabela moento.

src_text: Nanoma ngubani, angaba namatisi noma abete, ugoma mahhala kuto tonkhe tindzawo tekugoma kulo lonkhe lelive.
tgt_text: Motho mongwe le mongwe yo nang kgotsa yo senang lekwaloitshupo le ene ka kgona go tlhabela moento mo mafelong otlhe a direlang setšhaba ka fa nageng go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela.

src_text: Vimba lubandlululo lwebuhlanga!.
tgt_text: Re Utlwile go Lekane ka Ditiragalo tsa go Nyatsa Batho ba Merafe Mengwe!.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itigcekile kakhulu tonkhe tento tekubandlululana ngekwelibala eveni, lokufaka ekhatsi netehlakalo letibikiwe eSikolweni Semabanga Laphakeme sase-Good Hope Seminary kanye naseNyuvesi yaseStellenbosch eNshonalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale ditiragalo tsa mefuta yotlhe tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe, re bua fano le ka ditiragalo tse di begilweng sešweng jaana kwa Good Hope Seminary High School le tsa kwa Yunibesiti ya Stellenbosch kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima.

src_text: Letento letidzabukisako tingcubutana nemagugu eMtsetfosisekelo lekwakhelwe kulo live letfu lentsandvo yelinyenti, lokufaka ekhatsi sitfunti semuntfu, kungabandlululani ngebuhlanga, bulungiswa betenhlalakahle, kulingana kanye nenhlonipho..     Umtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 uyinkhombandlela yetfu yekucedza luchekeko lolunyanyekako kanye nekungabi nebulungiswa kwesikhatsi lesendlulile.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go re tsenya matlho batho di nyatsa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa motheo wa temokerasi ya naga ya rona tse di buang ka seriti sa batho, go se nne le ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe, go se nne le ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba bong jo bongwe, go phimola baagi keledi ka go tsosolosa seriti sa bona, go lekalekana le go tlotlana..     Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona sedirisiwa se re se dirisang go fedisa masaledi ditiragalo tsa mo malobeng tsa go re tsenya matlho batho tsa go re kgaoganya le tsa go se re tshware ka go tshwana.

src_text: Batali bayancuswa kutsi bafundzise bantfwana kwala kubandlululwa ngekwebuhlanga futsi bamukele kwehlukahlukana, njengencenye yemkhankhaso wetfu wekukhutsata kwakhiwa kwesive nekubumbana kwemmango.
tgt_text: Go ikuelwa mo batsading go ruta bana ba bona go gana nang ya banyana ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe mme ba tlotlomatse pharologano ya rona, seno ke karolo ya letsholo la rona le re le tshwaraganetseng la go tsholetsa go aga setšhaba le go nna ngatana le nngwe.

src_text: Asisebente ngekubambisana kute sibeke ebaleni lubandlululo nanoma ngukuphi lapho lutsatfwa njengentfo lefanele siphindze futsi sitfumele umlayeto locacile wekutsi kute indzawo yalo lapha eveni letfu; lentsandvo yelinyenti..     Budlelwane beNingizimu Afrika – neJalimane.
tgt_text: Tla re dirisaneng mmogo go ntshetsa mo pepeneneng ditiragalo tsa go nyatsa batho ba merafe mengwe gongwe le gongwe mo di diriwang jaaka selo se se tlwaelegileng gore go tle go bonagale gore mo nageng ya rona ya temokerasi ditiragalo tsa mothale ono ga di batlege le seng..     Tirisanommogo ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa le ya Jeremane.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ilwemukele Luvakasho Lolusemtsetfweni lwaShansela We-Federal Republic of Germany, Umhlonishwa Olaf Scholz, eNingizimu Afrika ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-24 Inhlaba.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Semmuso le le tsamaileng ka katlego la Moeteledipele wa Puso ya Federeišene ya Rephaboliki ya Jeremane, Motlotlegi Olaf Scholz, go bo jetse nala Puso ya Aforika Borwa ka la bo 24 Motsheganong..     Leeto la Semmuso la Moeteledipele Scholz le diragaditswe ka ntlha ya taletso ya Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa, yo gogang kwa pele letsholo le legolo la go dira gore mo kgaolong le mo maemong boditšhabatšhaba go nne le tirisanommogo e edileng, mmogo le go ngokela dipeeletso tse di tlhokagalang thata.

Gareng ga tse dingwe, baeteledipele bano ka bobedi ba buisane ka ditsela tse ba ka dirisanang mmogo ka tsona mo mererong e jaaka ya motlakase le ya phetogo ya maemo loapi, kgwebisano le dipeeletso mmogo le ka ditsela tsa go samagana le COVID-19 le tlhokego ya tlamelo ka meento.

src_text: Kuvakasha Lokusemtsetfweni kwaShansela Scholz bekungesimemo saMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa, lohola umkhankhaso wahulumende wekugcugcutela budlelwano lobuhle besifundza kanye nemave emhlaba, kanye nekuheha batjalitimali labadzingeka kakhulu.
tgt_text: Ba buisane gape le ka se se diragalang mo kontinenteng ya Aforika le mo dinageng tsa boditšhabatšhaba, mmogo le ka ntwa e runtseng kwa Ukraine le ditlamorago tsa yona mo ikonoming ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba mmogo le mo go se tlhokeng dijo le motlakase..     Jeremane ga se fela naga e leng mo maemong bobedi ka bogolo kgwebisano le naga ya Aforika Borwa, gape mo maemong boraro ka bogolo fa go tla mo dinageng tse di nang le bajanala ba bantsi ba ba ratang go re jela nala na le babeeletsi ba bantsi ba ba beeletsang ka fa nageng bile gape ke modirisanimmogo wa rona mo mererong ya tlhabologo..     Khonferense ya Botlhano e Mabapi le go Fedisa Ditiragalo tsa go Dira Bana Makgoba.

src_text: Labaholi lababili bakhulume, emkhatsini walokunye, ngetindlela tekutfutfukisa kubambisana etindzaweni letifana namandla agezi nekuntjintja kwesimo selitulu, kuhwebelana nekutjalwa kwetimali, kanye nekubhekana ne-COVID-19 kanye nesidzingo sekugoma.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go wediwa ga tiro ya Khonferense ya Botlhano e Mabapi le go Fedisa Ditiragalo tsa go Dira Bana Makgoba e neng tshwaretswe kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 20 Motsheganong.

src_text: Baphindze babuka intfutfuko kulelivekati lase-Afrika nakulamanye emave, kufaka ekhatsi kungcubutana kwe-Ukraine nemtselela wako emnotfweni wemave emhlaba kanye nekutfolakala kwekudla nemandla agezi..     Ijalimane ayigcini-nje ngekuba ngumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kuteluhwebo, kodvwa futsi ingumtfombo wesitsatfu ngebukhulu wetivakashi tangesheya kwetilwandle, batjalimali labakhulu kanye nebalingani betfu ngetentfutfuko..     Inkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti.
tgt_text: Bannaleseabe go ralala le lefatshe ba ne ba tsenetse khonferense eno e neng tshwerwe mmogo le Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Merero ya Badiri (ILO)..     Morago ga gore go buisanwe ka dikgato tse di siameng tse dinaga ka go farologana di di dirisang mmogo le go nopola dikarolo tse di tlhokang go tseelwa dikgato ka bonako gore go fedisiwe ditiragalo tsa go dira bana makgoba mmogo le tsa go dira batho makgoba, go ne ga diriwa boikano jwa ‘Go Tsaya Dikgato ka se Go Dumelanweng ka Sona kwa Durban’ leng se se tla samaganang le ditiragalo tseno tsa go fetola bana makgoba.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isemukele siphetfo lesiyimphumelelo seNkhomfa Yesihlanu Yemave Emhlaba Lemayelana Nekucedza Kwenta Bantfwana Kutsi Babe Basebenti lebeyibanjelwe eThekwini kusukela mhla ti-15 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tsa go dira bana makgoba di bontsha ka fao batho mo setšhabeng ba leng setlhogo ka teng go nne seno se baya bana mo kotsing.

src_text: Badlalindzima labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba bayihambele lenkhomfa, lebeyibanjwe ngekubambisana neNhlangano Yemhlaba Yebasebenti..     Ngemuva kwekucocisana ngemikhuba lemihle leyentiwa ngemave lahlukene nekubona emagebe kanye netinyatselo letiphutfumako letidzingekako kute kutsi kusheshiswe kucedvwa kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kanye nekusetjentiswa ngekuphocelelwa, bamukele ‘I-Durban Call to Action’ kute kutsi kubukwane nesihlava sekwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno di tseewa jaaka tsa go bogisa bana jaaka di dira gore bana ba se kgone go ya sekolong le gore ba iponela ditšhono tsa go tlhatlhelelwa.

src_text: Kwenta bantfwana kutsi babe basebenti kuveta sihlava lesibi kabi semmango kuphindze futsi kubeke bantfwana engotini.
tgt_text: Ngwana mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa na le tshwanelo e totobetseng ya gore se jewe ntshu..     Tshwanelo ya thuto ya motheo tsamaisana le Molaotheo wa naga ya rona bile gape go ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa, wa 1996 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1996), “motsadi yo mongwe le yo mongwe jarile maikarabelo go netefatsa gore morutwana yo mongwe le yo mongwe yo mo godisang tsena sekolo go simolola fa le monnye na le dingwaga di le supa go fitlha ngwana yoo konosetsa dithuto tsa gagwe tsa sekolo fa na le dingwaga di le 15 kgotsa fa sena go konosetsa dithuto tsa bofelo tsa mophato wa borobongwe”..     Go ya ka Molao wa Kgodiso ya Bana wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2005), “ga go motho yo letleletsweng go ja bana ntshu, go ba reka gore ba mo direle, go ba solofetsa ditiro kgotsa go ba thapa gore nne makgoba gagwe”     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Kukuhlukubeta kanatsi futsi kuvimbela bantfwana kutsi bangakhoni kutfola imfundvo kanye nalamanye ematfuba ekutfutfuka.
tgt_text: Kopanokgothakgothe ya go Utlwanela Tumelano ya Boditšhabatšhaba e Mabapi le Tshireletso ya Batho Botlhe Gore ba se Nyelediwe ka Lenga la Seloko ke Sepodisi (ICPPED).

src_text: Wonkhe umntfwana eNingizimu Afrika unelilungelo lelingeke liphikiswe lekutsi avikeleke kumikhuba yekusetjentiswa ngekubacaphata.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tlisa kwa Palamenteng ICPPED gore tumelano eno sekasekiwe le go tseelwa tlhogong ke naga ya Aforika Borwa.

Tumelano eno ke tumelano ya Dinagakopano (UN) e bofang dinaga tsa lefatshe ka bophara mme samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlola ditshwanelo tsa batho ka go nyelediwa ka lenga la seloko ke sepodisi..     Mo kopanokgothakgotheng eno go tlhalosiwa gore go nyelediwa ke sepodisi ka lenga la seloko go raya gore seno ke tiragalo e tsenyeletsang le ya go tsaya batho ka kgang, go ba tshwara, go ba golega kgotsa tiro ya mofuta mongwe le mongwe e ka dirang gore batho ba ba dirileng tiro ya mothale oo ba ikganetse seo ba se dirileng kgotsa le gona go nna ka marago kgang ya gore ba fitlhile kae batswasetlhabelo..     Fa ntlha eno sena go amogelwa gore ka nna karolo ya melao ya rona, naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tshwanelwa ke gore gangwe le gape morago ga dingwaga di le pedi begele UN gore yona diragatsa jang tumelano eno.

src_text: Lilungelo lekutfola imfundvo lesisekelo licuketfwe kuMtsetfosisekelo wetfu futsi ngekweMtsetfo Wetikolwa waseNingizimu Afrika, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo 84 wanga-1996), “wonkhe umtali kufanele ente kutsi wonkhe umfundzi ambophelele kutsi afundze esikolweni kusukela ngelilanga lesikolwa lekucala.
tgt_text: Tumelano eno na le dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go thibela gore ditiragalo tsa go tsenngwa ka lenga la seloko ke sepodisi di se diragadiwe..     Pegelo ya Bone ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Dikgato tsa go Sireletsa le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: Lusuku lwemnyaka lapho lowo mfundzi ufinyelela iminyaka lesikhombisa kute kube lusuku lwekugcina lwesikolwa lapho lowo mfundzi afinyelela iminyaka le-15 noma ebangeni lesishiyagalolunye, kuye ngekutsi ngukuphi lokwenteka kucala”..     Ngekwemibandzela yeMtsetfo Webantfwana, wanga-2005 (Umtsetfo 38 wanga-2005), “kute umuntfu longasebentisa, atfole, noma anike noma acashe umntfwana njengemsebenti”     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Mokgatlhong wa Dinagakopano (UN) Pegelo ya Bone ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa e ka ga Dikgato tsa go Sireletsa le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: Kungena Kusivumelwane Semave Emhlaba mayelana Nekuvikela Bonkhe Bantfu Ekunyamalaleni Ngekuphocelelwa (I-ICPPED) .
tgt_text: Lephata la UN le le Sekasekang Dipegelo tsa Paka nngwe le nngwe le tla sekaseka pegelo eno kwa bokhutlhong jono jwa ngwaga.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwe-ICPPED ePhalamende mayelana nekucutjungulwa kwekungena kweNingizimu Afrika kulesivumelwane.
tgt_text: Fa sale Aforika Borwa saenela Tumelano ya Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ya UN, naga eno setse sekasekilwe makgetlo le mararo, mme labofelo fa sekasekiwa ne le ka kgwedi ya Lwetse mo ngwageng wa..     Mo pegelong eno go na le tshedimosetso e ka ga seo se dirilweng go latela ditshitshinyo di le 187 tse go dumelanweng ka tsona tse di dirilweng morago ga gore go sekasekiwe pegelo ya mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: Lesivumelwane sivamise kuba sibopho saMhlabuhlangane (se-UN) lesibonelelanako lesibukene nekunyatselwa kwemalungelo eluntfu ngekusetjentiswa kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa.
tgt_text: Go sekegetswe tsebe tshedimosetso go fitlhetsweng gore ke ya boammaruri go tswa kwa mafapheng a maleba, go tswa kwa ditheong tsa puso tse di tshegetsang temokerasi ya molaotheo, mmogo le go tswa kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi e maleba..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tiro e setseng dirilwe mo go diragatseng tseo di tshitshintsweng mmogo le mo go seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dikgaolong tse di santseng di tlhoka go enngwa nokeng.
Pegelo eno tla re morago ga gore tlhagisiwe kwa kopanong ya UN monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Phatwe nne gone ka phasaladiwang mo phatlhalatseng gore botlhe ba bone.

src_text: Lesivumelwane sichaza lokunyamalala kwebantfu ngekubaphocelela kute kutsi kufakwe ekhatsi kutfumba, kubopha, kutokisa noma-ke ngutiphi letinye tinhlobo letingabangela kutsi umbhebhetseli ale noma kwemukela noma-ke futsi afihle kutsi umhlukubetwa ukuphi..     Sitawutsi  singavunyelwa kutsi sibe ngaphansi kwemitsetfo yetfu, iNingizimu Afrika kulindzeleke kutsi ibike njalo ngeminyaka lemibili ku-UN mayelana nekutsi isicalisa kanjani sivumelwane.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 e ka ga Taolo ya Metsi a Dirisiwang mo Meepong.

src_text: Lesivumelwane siniketa tinyatselo tekuvimbela emave langemalunga lokudzingeka kutsi atibeke kute kutsi avimbele kunyamalala kwebantfu ngekuphocelelwa emaveni abo..     Umbiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 e ka ga Taolo ya Metsi a Dirisiwang mo Meepong.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwembiko Wesine Welive LaseNingizimu Afrika Wekuvikela Nekukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu kuMkhandlu Wamhlabunhlangene Wemalungelo Eluntfu.
tgt_text: Mo pholising eno go na le dikgato tse di ka tsewang go tlhokomela le go seketsa metsi dira gore ditiro tsa meepo mo ikonoming di tsamaisane le maikarabelo naga go tlamela naga ka metsi a sa kgaleng..     Gare ga ditharabololo tse dingwe tse dintsi tse pholisi eno tlang ka tsona baya mo pepeneneng ntlha e buang ka maikarabelo lephata le lengwe le le lengwe la maphata otlha puso le mararo, gore maikarabelo ona ke eng fa go tla mo metsing a dirisiwang mo meepong.

src_text: Lubuyeketo Lwe-UN Lwanjalo Ngetikhatsi Letitsite lutawubuyeketa lombiko ekuhambeni kwalomnyaka.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse go sisintsweng gore di kwalolwe sešwa di tla rarabolola dikgwetlho tse di tleng di nne teng fa go tshwanetswe go tsewa dikgato kgatlhanong le meepo eo kgotlhelang metsi mme seno se tla dira gore go nne bonolo go duedisa meepo eo kgotlhelang metsi.

src_text: Kusukela yasayina Sivumelwano Semalungelo Ebantfu se-UN, iNingizimu Afrika seyibuyeketwe emahlandla lamatsatfu, lapho khona kubuyeketwa kwekugcina kwentiwa ngeNyoni yanga-..     Lombiko uniketa takamuva mayelana netincomo letemukelwe leti-187 kusukela nga-2017 kunchubo yekubuyeketa.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tsamaisana le Molao wa Metsi wa Naga wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 36 wa 1998).

src_text: Imibono itsetfwe kumininingwane lecinisekisiwe, kulwatiso loluvela ematikweni lafanele, tikhungo teSahluko 9 kanye netinhlangano temmango letifanele..     Ikhabhinethi iyatfokota ngenchubekelembili leyentiwe ekuphumeleliseni letincomo kanye futsi naleto tindzawo letisasetjentwa.
tgt_text: Pegelo e Buang ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le ka ga Dithulaganyo tsa Matlole,Tekolo, Tshekatsheko le Boruni jwa Togamaano ya Tsibogelo ya Dikgwetlho tsa Bong.

src_text: Lombiko utawentiwa utfolwe sive ngemuva kwekwetfulwa ku-UN ngeNgci.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e buang ka seo se setseng se dirilwe fa go tla mo go tsennyeng tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le ka ga Dithulaganyo tsa Matlole, Tekolo, Tshekatsheko le Boruni jwa Togamaano ya Tsibogelo ya Dikgwetlho tsa Bong..     Kabinete lebogile dikgato tse dintsi tse di setseng di weditswe ke mafapha puso le mantsinyana tse di ka ga go dira gore leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro, le mo ngwageng wa 2019 go seleng go ikanngwe gore le tla diragadiwa, kwa bofelong le feletse le le mo molaong..     Ke mafapha le mantsinyana ga jaanong setseng tsentse tirisong dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa dipholisi tse di buang ka matsholo a botlhokwa mo makaleng puso a tobaneng le go samagana le dikgwetlho tse basadi, bašwa le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi ba tobanang natso.

src_text: Inchubomgomo Yekuphatsa Emanti Asemayini yanga-.
tgt_text: Kabinete gagamaditse gore mafapha tshwanetse go gagamatsa dikgato tsa ona tsa go ela maemo tlhoko le go tlhagisa dipegelo mabapi le seno, segolobogolo mafapha a iseng tlhagise dipegelo tsa ona.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile Inchubomgomo Yekuphatfwa Kwemanti Asemayini yanga- 2022 kutsi iphunyeleliswe.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa go Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).

src_text: Lenchubomgomo iniketa timiso tekuvikela nekonga kusetjentiswa kwemanti.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tshwara NMYD ngwaga mongwe le mongwe go simolola mo ngwageng ono.

src_text: Isimamisa imisebenti yetemnotfo yasemayini ngeligunyakwenta lekuniketa lelive kusetjentiswa kwemanti ngalokusimeme.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tseno tsa go bontsha tlotlo di tla tshwarwa go tloga ka la bo 07 go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phukwi.

src_text: Emkhatsini waletinye tingenelelo, lenchubomgomo icacisa tibopho netindzima letidlalwa emkhatsini waletinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende mayelana netindzaba temanti.
tgt_text: Leno ke Letsholo la Kantoro ya Moporesitente go naya bašwa mo Kontinenteng tšhono ya go buisana le go rutana ka seo se amang matshelo bona.

src_text: Letingucuko letihlongotwako titawusombulula tinsayeya tekufaka lunswinyo kubangcolisi futsi kwente kube lula kubita umngcolisi akhokhe.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tseno – tse di tla bong di bua ka naledi ya naga ya rona ya lefatshe bong Moporesitente wa mo malobeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – go tla simololwa dipuisano tseno ka go atlhaatlha ntlha ya go nna moeteledipele yo nang le maitshwaro mo kontinenteng ya Aforika.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo yentiwa ngekuhambisana neMtsetfo Wavelonkhe Wemanti, wanga-1998 (Umtsetfo 36 wanga-1998).
tgt_text: Bašwa ba tla neelwa tšhono ya gore mo dipuisanong tsa bona ba bontshane lobebe lwa dingwao le ditso tsa bona.

src_text: Umbiko Weluhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.
tgt_text: Letsholo leno le tla gagamatsa gape le botsalano magareng ga bašwa ka go farologana ka fa kontinenteng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wenchubekelembili mayelana neLuhlakamsebenti Lwekuhlela Tekuphendvula Kutebulili, Kulandzelela, Kulinganisa kanye Neluhlakamsebenti Lwelucwaningomabhuku.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Merero ya Bomme, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi tla re mo nakong e tlang la abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo mabapi le kopano eno.

Pegelo ya Ngwaga Mongwe le Mongwe ya Ngwaga wa 2021/22 e Buang ka Tiro ya go Ela Maemo Tlhoko mo go Diragatseng Tiro ya go Matlafatsa Basadi le ya go Tlisa Tekatekano Magareng ga Batho ba Bong jo bo Farologaneng, mo go Tlhatlheleleng Bašwa mmogo le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyitfokotele inchubekelembili leyentiwe ngematiko ahulumende lamanyenti ekufakeni loluhlakamsebenti etinhlelweni tayo lolwemukelwa nga-2019 kutsi luphunyeleliswe.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Ngwaga Mongwe le Mongwe ya Ngwaga wa 2021/22 e Buang ka Tiro ya go Ela Maemo Tlhoko mo go Diragatseng Tiro ya go Matlafatsa Basadi le ya go Tlisa Tekatekano Magareng ga Batho ba Bong jo bo Farologaneng, mo go Tlhatlheleleng Bašwa mmogo le go Tlotlomatsa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi.

Pegelo eno sala morago dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di bontshang gore go na le dikgato tse di tserweng go tlotlomatsa tekatekano mo go thapiweng le kwa tirong mmogo le mo go direng gore ditlhotshwana tseno nne tsona tse di laolang le tse di tsayang karolo mo ditirong tsa mafapha le mo ditirong tsa ditheo tsa puso.

src_text: Kusukela ngaleso sikhatsi ematiko lamanyenti asemise ngemumo tinchubomgomo letibomabekwembili tekukhombindlela tinhlelo tekuhlanganisa leticondze bomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila ngekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno kwadilwe go ya ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Loga Maano go Rulaganyetsa Tiriso ya Matlole, go Ela Maemo Tlhoko, go Sekaseka Tiro le go Dira Ditiro tsa go Runa leo le sa bolong go amogelwa ke Kabinete mo ngwageng wa     Melaotlhomo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi seyimemetele kutsi kuciniswe sandla ekulandzeleleni nasekubikeni, ikakhulukati ngalamanye alamatiko lasengakabiki.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo kwa Tirong (OHS) mo Meepong.

src_text: Inkhulumomphendvulwane Yelusha Ka-Nelson Mandela (i-NMYD).
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo kwa Tirong (OHS) mo Meepong gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise i-NMYD kutsi yentiwe njalo ngemnyaka kusukela nga-.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo molaotlhomo ono ke go tokafatsa pabalesego le boitekanelo jwa batlhankedi ba ba dirang mo meepong, mmogo le go tokafatsa mafelo meepo eno leng mo go ona.

src_text: Kwetfulwa kwale-NMYD kutawuba mhla ti-7 kuya kumhla tinge-20 Kholwane.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono kwalolola sešwa Molao wa Pabalesego le Boitekanelo mo Meepong wa ngwaga wa 1996 (Molao wa bo 29 wa 1996).

src_text: Lona ngumtamo weLihhovisi laMengameli wekunika lusha lwaleLivekati inkhundla yekukhulumisana ngenkhulumomphendvulwane mayelana netindzaba letibatsintsako.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tsa molao ono tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa, gareng ga tse dingwe, di baya mo pepeneneng tse dingwe tsa dikakanyo tsa Molao ono, di gagamatsa Melawanataolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Pabalesego le Boitekanelo mme le dira bonnete jwa gore tsamaelana le melao ya lefatshe ka bophara ya pabalesego mo meepong..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo.

Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona le gore Tona ya Ditirelo tsa Phimolakeledi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa, Rre Ronald Lamola ntshe lekwalo la go itsise setšhaba ka dikarolo tsa Molaotheo tse go tshitshinngwang gore di kwalolwe sešwa..     Molaotlhomo ono kwalola sešwa Karolo ya bo 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 e reng naga ya Aforika Borwa na le dipuo tsa semmuso di le lesomelebongwe mme tsona ke puo ya Sepedi, ya Sesotho, ya Setswana, ya siSwati, ya Tshivenḓa, ya Xitsonga, ya Afrikaans, ya English, ya isiNdebele, ya isiXhosa le ya isiZulu..     Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di nopola Puo ya Diatla (SASL) gore tshwanetse go nna puo ya ka fa nageng ya semmuso ya bo lesomelebobedi mme di ema nokeng dikgato tsa go amogela puo eno le go netefatsa gore ditshwanelo tsa maAforika Borwa otlhe di amogelwa, go sa lebelelwe gore ke batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi jo bo rileng kgotsa jang.

src_text: Letinkhulumomphendvulwane – letitawusima kulichawe letfu lemave emhlaba Mengameli  wesikhatsi lesengcile Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – titawucala tinkhulumo tekujulisa lisiko lebuholi lobunenkhambo lenhle yekutiphatsa e-Afrika.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo lona ga le bolo go tsaya Puo ya Diatla ya ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa jaaka Puo Beng ba Yona ba Buang kwa Lapeng     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Titawunika bantfu labasha ematfuba ekucobelelana ngelifa labo lelinemasiko lanotsile.
tgt_text: Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana.

src_text: Lomtamo utawuphindze futsi ucinisekise budlelwane bebantfu (kulomunye nakulomunye) emkhatsini welusha lwalelivekati.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya go Keteka Tshireletso ya Bana e tla ketekiwang go simolola ka la bo 29 Motsheganong go fitlha ka la bo 04 Seetebosigo 2022 ka moono yo reng “Tla re sireletseng bana mo pakeng eno ya COVID-19 le go ya go ile fa leroborobo leno le sa tlhole le le teng”..     Mo bekeng eo go tla tsepamisiwa megopolo mo matsapeng a leng teng ka fa nageng a tobaneng poo le naga go ithwala ga bašwa leng seo se gakaditsweng ke paka ya COVID-19 mo re boneng bašwa ka bontsi ba belega mo ngwageng wa..     Kabinete ikuetse gore kgetse ya tsie kgonwa ke go tshwaraganelwa ke batsadi, mekgatlho ya baagi, dikereke le baagi mo metseng go thusa go fokotsa palo e golelang kwa godimo ya go ithwala ga bašwa..     Foramo ya Ikonomi ya Lefatshe (WEF).

src_text: Litiko letaBomake, Lusha Nebantfu Labanekukhubateka litawuniketa imininingwane yeluhlelo lwalemikhosi esikhatsini lesitako..     Umbiko Wekulandzelela Kusebenta Wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana neKuhlonyiswa Kwabomake Nekulingana Ngebulili, Nekutfutfukiswa Kwelusha kanye neKukhutsatwa Kwemalungelo Ebantfu Labaphila Nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla nna le seabe mo go WEF e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 22 go fitlha ka la bo 26 Motsheganong 2022 kwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland, mo moono wa teng tla bong le: “Go Dirisana Mmogo, Go Busetsa Maemo go Tshepagala Sekeng”..     Aforika Borwa itse sentle botlhokwa jwa go nna nngwe ya dinaga tse di tlang ka ditharabololo le go bolelela ba bangwe ka maitemogelo rona mo foramong eno ya lefatshe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko wekulandzelela kusebenta wemnyaka 2021/22 lomayelana nekuhlonyiswa kwabomake, lusha kanye nebantfu labaphila nekukhubateka.
tgt_text: Gore naga ya rona tsenele WEF go tla re tswela mosola thata gore re godise seriti sa naga ya rona mo mererong ya dipeeletso gore ke nngwe ya dinaga mo lefatsheng tse go ka beelediwang mo go tsona, mme re tla itsise dinaga tse dingwe mo lefatsheng gore pono re nang le yona ya dilo tse re batlang go di dira mo isagong ke efe mmogo le go nopola ditlhabololo tse dintšhwa tse re setseng re di dirile ka fa nageng.

src_text: Lombiko ulandzelela tinkhomba letinkhulu tekukhutsatwa kwetekulingana, lizinga lemisebenti nebuniyo kanye nekuhlanganyela kwalamacembu kumisebenti yematiko kanye nasetikhungweni tahulumende.
tgt_text: Bašwa.

src_text: Lombiko uhlanganiswa mayelana nelwabiwomali lwekuhlela tekuphendvula kutebulili, kulandzelela, kulinganisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lweLucwaningomabhuku lolwemukelwa yiKhabhinethi nga-     Imitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Letsholo la go Keteka Kgwedi ya Bašwa la ngwaga wa 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Go netefatsa gore re nna le ditsela tsa go iphedisa tse di nnelang ruri mmogo le go nna matlhagatlhaga ga bašwa gore bokamoso nne jo bo botoka”.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Temphilo Netekuphepha Emayini.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la semmuso la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa le tla ketekiwa kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa Kwetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Monongwaga ke wa bo 46 fa sale barutwana kwa Soweto ba thankgolola mogwanto wa matlho ga dibona ka la bo 16 Seetebosigo 1976 ba gwantela go gapelediwa ke puso ya tlhaolele go ithuta dirutwa tsotlhe tsa bona ka puo ya Afrikaans.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kwenta kancono temphilo netekuphepha tebasebenti basemayini, kufaka ekhatsi simondzawo lapho kwentiwa khona imisebenti yasemayini.
tgt_text: Mo go bontsheng tlotlo mo go seo se dirilweng ka Seetebosigo 1976, Kabinete ikuela mo bašweng botlhe ka fa nageng go samagana le botlhokatiro jo bo aparetseng bašwa ka bontsi ka go nna le seabe mo matsholong go ba tlhatlhelela ka kitso le bokgoni a jaaka letsholo la go ithutela tiro le mo tirong mmogo le diphatlhatiro tsa go ithutela tiro..     Puso tlile ka matsholo a emang nokeng dikgato tsa go thapa bašwa mmogo le tsa go tlhola ditiro tsa nakwana.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uchibela Umtsetfo Wetemphilo Netekuphepha Emayini, wanga-1996 (Umtsetfo we-29 wa-1996).
tgt_text: Dikgwebo le tsona di rotloediwa gore di thape bašwa ba le bantsinyana ka go tlhola diphatlhatiro tse mo go tsona go thapiwang bašwa..     Lenaneo la kgwedi yotlhe ya Seetebosigo le tla bo le tletse ka meletlo e farologaneng mo go yona go tla bong go na le e ketekang bašwa ba ba dirang bontle thata mo go se ba se dirang, mekete ya go thankgolola Letsholo la go Goga kwa Pele Serodumo sa NYDA mmogo le meletlo mengwe le mentsinyana go ralala le naga e ka ga go thankgolola Setheo sa Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa..     Tona mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente yo rwesitsweng maikarabelo Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo re itsise ka letsholo leno ka botlalo.

src_text: Letichibiyelo letibuyeketiwe tiniketa, emkhatsini walokunye, kucaciswa kwaleminye imicondvo lekuloMtsetfo, ucinise luhlakamsebenti lwekulawula temphilo netekuphepha uphindze futsi uwente uhambisane nekusebenta ezingeni lemhlaba leliphakeme kakhulu mayelana netekuphepha etimayini.
tgt_text: Meletlo yotlhe ya bašwa go tla solofelwa gore tsamaelane le dikgato tsa go tila ditshwaetso tsa COVID-.
Samiti e Buang ka Dinaga tse di Laolwang ke Magosi.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo wanga-2022 .
tgt_text: Puso, ka go dirisana le Ntlo ya Naga ya Magosi, ba tla tsenela Samiti e Buang ka Dinaga tse di Laolwang ke Magosi ka Labotlhano wa la bo 27 le Lamatlhatso wa la bo 28 Motsheganong 2022 go buisana ka dintlha tse di mabapi le gore beng ba dinaga tseo ke bo mang..     Dintlha tseno gape di tsenyeletsa le tsa thulaganyo ya go tsaya naga e laolwang ke magosi mo pusong go neela moagi yo nang le matshwanedi go nna mong wa naga eo, go nne seno se botlhokwa thata mo go matlafatseng baagi ba kwa metseselegae.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchitjelwa  KweMtsetfosisekelo Kwelishumi nasiphohlongo Kwanga-2022 kute kutsi sive siphawule ngawo nekutsi Indvuna Yetebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo, Mnu.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go dira gore baagi ba kwa metseselegae nne fela beng ba naga ka lefoko ga di kgapele fela kwa thoko ditshwanelo tsa batho tsa go nna beng ba lefatshe le ba nnang mo go lona mme gape di ba thibela gore le se ba tswele mosola mo go tokafatsheng matshelo bona ka go iponela madinyana     Melaetsa.

src_text: Ronald Lamola, anikete tatiso nemininingwane mayelana naletichibiyelo teMtsetfosisekelo letiphakanyisiwe..     LoMtsetfosisekelo uchibiyela Sigaba 6(1) seMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996, lomemetela kutsi tilwimi taseNingizimu Afrika leti-11 letisetsetfweni Sepedi, Sesothoisutfu, Setswana, Siswati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Sibhunu, Singisi, Sindebele, siXhosa kanye nesiZulu..     Letichibiyelo temukela Lulwimi Lwetimphawu LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SASL) kutsi lulwimi lwe-12 lolusemtsetfweni lwalelive futsi lutawutfutfukisa kwemukelwa kwalo kutemasiko luphindze futsi lucinisekise kuba nemalungelo lalinganako kubo bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika, ngekunganaki kubanekukhubateka kwabo.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Mme Leanne Manas, motlhankedi yo gasang dikgang tsa lenaneo la thelebišene la dikgang tsa mo mesong la Morning Live mo go SABC, yo apesitsweng tlotla ya Batlhabani ba Naga ya Fora ya go Tlotla Tiro e Tswileng Diatla mo Nageng ke naga ya Fora ka Labobedi, 17 Motsheganong 2022, maitlhomo le go tlotlomatsa matsapa a dirileng mo lephateng la go sala dikgang morago, la bobegakgang le mo maphateng mangwe mantsi a farologaneng go thusa baagi.

src_text: Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo selivele lemukela i-SASL njengelulwimi lwasekhaya     Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Rre Mpho Moerane, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 52, yo mo malobeng neng le Meyara yo Mogolo wa Teropokgolo ya Johannesburg bile gape le mafolofolo mo mererong ya dipolotiki bile direla baagi ba Johannesburg ka botswapelo.

src_text: Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana.
tgt_text: Pele ka thapiwa go nna Meyara yo Mogolo ne dira jaaka Leloko la Komiti ya Meyara e samaganang le Merero ya Ditirelo tsa Tikologo le Mafaratlhatlha.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lekuvikelwa Kwebantfwana kusukela mhla tinge-29 Inkhwekhweti kuya kumhla ti-4 Inhlaba 2022 ngaphasi kwalengcikitsi: “Asivikele Bantfwana ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 neKwendlula lapho”..     Kuleliviki, kutawunakwa kakhulu ngalokukhetsekile ludzaba lwavelonkhe lwekukhulelwa kwelusha, lokwakhuphuka ngemandla lokwandlondlobala kakhulu ngesikhatsi se-COVID-19 lapho khona batala kakhulu nga-..     Ikhabhinethi icele kutsi kube khona kubambisana kubatali, kummango, emacembu ebetenkholo kanye nemmango ngebubanti bawo kutsi basite kube netingucuko ekukhulelweni kwelusha.
tgt_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56, yo neng le seopedi se se fentseng dikabo di sena palo tsa diopedi tsa mmino wa go rorisa modimo yo mo malobanyaneng Setheo sa Dithuto tsa Boeteledipele jwa Sekeresete se mo tlotlileng ka go mo abela tlotla ya Bongaka mo Mminong wa Dithuto tsa Sedumedi.Ngaka Namane Magau, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 70, yo neng le serutegi se se tlhatlheletsweng bile gape le tokololo e tlotlegang ya Batlhokomedi ba Matlole Boto ya Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Aids.Rre Mike Schüssler, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 60, yo neng le motlhankedi wa merero ya ikonomi yo tlotlegang mo intasetering eno ya naga ya Aforika Borwa bile neelane ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng e ka ga maemo ikonomi ya naga ya Aforika Borwa.Rre Jamie Bartlett, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56, yo fentseng dikabo di sena palo tsa go diragatsa mo seraleng le mo thelebišeneng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, yo neng tumile ka leina la gagwe la go diragatsa la Motshameko wa theleibšene wa Isidingo mo neng bediwa Mike O'Reilly le la David Genaro la mo Rhythm City.Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa fa romela matshediso kwa pusong le kwa baaging ba naga ya United Arab Emirates (UAE) go latela gore Motlotlegi wa Ntlobogosi Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 73, yo gape neng le Moporesitente wa naga ya UAE thule botala ka tlhogo      Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Iforamu Yetemnotfo Yemhlaba (i-WEF).
tgt_text: Rre Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo mo Botong ya Tlhabololo ya Intaseteri ya go Aga.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawuhlanganyela ku-WEF eDavos-Klosters, eSwitzerland kusukela mhla tinge-22 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Inkhwekhweti 2022, ngaphasi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Sisebenta Ngekubambisana, Sibuyisa Litsemba”..     INingizimu Afrika itfokotela litfuba lekuba yincenye yalesisombululo nekuphindze futsi yabelane kuleforamu yemave emhlaba ngaloko lesihlangabetene nako.
tgt_text: Rre Shabeer Hamid Khan thapilwe go nna Molaodimogolo wa Diakhaonto mo Setheong sa Naga sa Matlole.

src_text: Bukhona betfu ku-WEF kukhulisa lidvumela letfu njengendzawo yekwenta lutjalomali, sabelana nemhlaba ngembononchanti wetfu welikusasa kanye nekuphakamisa tintfutfuko letinsha ngekhatsi kulelive.
tgt_text: Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana thapilwe go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Dithendara mo Setheong sa Naga sa Matlole.

src_text: Inyanga Yelusha.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane ka botlalo le tshweetso ya go thapa batho ba ba latelang ba ba batlang tiro go tswalela ka bona diphatlhatiro mo Botong ya Batlhankedibagolo ba Letlole la Setheo se se Botlhokwa sa Motlakase     Rre Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokuhle lokusandza kwenteka lokuhlose kuvuselela kukhula kwemnotfo.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tse di itumedisang tsa sešweng tse di dirilweng ka fa nageng tse di samaganeng le go tsosolosa ikonomi.

src_text: Ngekwetinombolo letisandza kukhishwa letikhishwe beteLubalobalo TaseNingizimu Afrika, kuswelakala kwematfuba emsebenti kunciphe kusuka kumaphesenti la-.
tgt_text: Go ya ka Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) dipalopalo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro di fokotsegile go tloga mo go.

src_text: 3 kulekota yesine yemnyaka we-2021 kwaya kumaphesenti la-.
tgt_text: 3% mo dikgweding di le tharo tsa bofelo tsa ngwaga wa 2021 go fitlha mo go.

src_text: 5 kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: 5% mo dikgweding di le tharo tsa ntlha tsa ngwaga wa setse le dikgweditharo di le pedi di tlhomagane jaanong palo ya batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro wela kwa tlase.

src_text: Lokukhula kwemazinga ematfuba ekungacashwa kunciphe kwalandzelana emakota lamabili.
tgt_text: Maphata a nnileng le mosola mogolo mo go seno ke ditiro tsa mo metseng le tsa ditirelo tsa baagi ditiro tsa tlhagiso ya dikuno le kgwebisano..     Mo dikgweding tsa ntlha di le tharo tsa ngwaga wa 2022 Seelosotlhe sa Ditlhagisiwa tsa Naga mo Ngwageng (GDP) se oketsegile ka.

src_text: Umkhakha wetematfuba emsebenti lozuze kakhulu ngilowetinsita temmango netenhlalakahle, tekukhucita netekuhwebelana.
tgt_text: 9% mme seno se busetsa bogolo ba ikonomi ya naga ya rona mo maemong e neng le mo go yona pele re ka welwa ke leru la leroborobo leno.

src_text: Linani lemikhicito yasekhaya likhule nge-.
tgt_text: Mo dikgweding di le tharo tseno, lephata le le neng le tsentse seatla go gaisa mangwe mo ikonoming ke la tlhagiso ya dikuno mo re boneng go nna le koketsego mo lekaleng la tlhagiso ya dipeterole le dikhemikhale, la dijo le dino mmogo le mo go la tshipi le la metšhini.

src_text: 9% kukota yekucala yemnyaka we-2022 lokutsatsa bukhulu bemnotfo wakitsi kuwuyise esikhatsini sangembi kwekucala kwalobhubhane.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go itharabologelwa tse dinnye tseno di re bontsha gore ikonomi ya naga ya rona santse le ya bogatlhamelamasisi bile di re bolelela gape gore dikgato tsa go rarabolola maemo yona tse di jaaka lebelo la Leano la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi le setse le simolotse go kokotlela.

src_text: Ngalesikhatsi salekota, umkhakha wetekukhicita ngiwo lowasebenta kahle lowaba nekukhula kumikhicito yetephethilomu neyemakhemikhali, yetekudla neyetinatfo, neyemamethali neyetemishini.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go ema nokeng dikgwebo le diintaseteri tsa ka fa nageng ka go di rekela fa ba reka ditlhagisiwa le ditirelo..     Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke tshwetso e tserweng ke setheo sa tekolo ya dikoloto sa S&P Global ya go fetola ponelopele ya yona ka dikoloto tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa - e neng re maemo yona ke a siameng mme jaanong a re ke a itumedisang.

src_text: Lokuzuza loku lokungakendluleli kukhomba kutsi umnotfo wakitsi usatawuhlala usebenta ngemandla nekutsi kungenelela lokufana neLuhlelo Lekwakha Kabusha Nelekuvuselela Umnotfo lutfola emandla.
tgt_text: Setheo seno gape se totobaditse gape gore mo pakeng telele e tlang tekanyetso ya dikoloto tsa madi ka fa nageng le dinaga tsa boditšhaba di tla nna mo maemong dikoloto a tlhobaetsang a bidiwang BB minus mme fetoge nne mo maemong a itumedisang a bediwang BB ka go latelega.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yenta lubito kuwonkhewonkhe kutsi kusekelwe emabhizinisi asekhaya netimboni ngekutsenga imikhicito netinsita talapha ekhaya.
tgt_text: Madi go iphedisa.
Leroborobo la Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19) mmogo le dintwa tse di tsweletseng mo lefatsheng ka bophara di amile ka tsela e sa itumediseng madi go iphedisa mo lefatsheng lotlhe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela futsi lesincumo se-ejensi yekulinganisa emazinga i-S&P Global sekubuyeketa simo seNingizimu Afrika sekukweleta – kusuka kulesinekusimama kuya kulesihle kakhulu.
tgt_text: MaAforika Borwa le ona rwele boima ka ntlha ya ditlhwatlhwa tse di tsweletseng go ya kwa godimo tsa leokwane, dijo le dilo tse dingwe tse di botlhokwa..     Fa seemo se rototse matlho jaaka sele jaana, rotlhe re tlhoka go tshwara ka natla, re thusane le go boloka didirisiwa tsa rona.

src_text: Le-ejensi yekulinganisa emazinga futsi icinisekisile kutsi lesimo semazinga ekukweleta esikhatsi lesidze semali yasekhaya neyemave angaphandle sihlala siku-BB minus naku-BB ngekulandzelana kwawo.
tgt_text: Puso tshwere ka natla go thusa batho botlhe, segolo bao ba sokolang.

Bankakgolo ya Aforika Borwa e dirang ka tshwanelo e nang le maatla bile ikemetse samagane le go thibela gore setšhaba se se welwe ke matsadi phetogo ya ditlhwatlhwa tse di yang kwa godimo ka go dira gore di se fete seelo se se beilweng; se se leng kwa tlase thata go gaisa sa tsa dinaga tse dingwe.

src_text: Tindleko tekuphila.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tshwetso e tserweng ke Setheo sa Naga sa Matlole go letlelela gore paka e tlhomilweng ya go fokotsa Dituelelo Tsotlhe tsa Leokwane okelediwe nako.
