src_text: Bhubhane Weligciwane Lekhorona (i-COVID-19) kanye nalokungcubutana lokuchubekako kwemave emhlaba kube nemtselela lomubi kutindleko tekuphila emhlabeni wonkhe.
tgt_text: Go tloga ka kgwedi ya Moranang go fitlha ka ya Motsheganong litara nngwe le nngwe mo dituelelong tsa GFL fokoditswe ka  50, mme seno se dumeletswe gore se ka se kgaotswe mme se tla tswelela go tloga ka la bo 01 Seetebosigo go fitlha ka la bo 06 Phukwi.

src_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika nabo bakhatsatekile ngalokwenyuka kwetindleko temafutsa etigitjelwa, tekudla netetintfo letimcoka..     Kufuneka sonkhe sibambisane, sisitane futsi sivikele tinsita takitsi kulesikhatsi lesimatima.
Hulumende wenta konkhe lokusemandleni kunika lusito kuwo wonkhe umuntfu, kakhulu kulabo labaphuyile.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke tshwetso e tserweng ke Khomišene e Okameng Merero ya Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo ya gore tla lebelela ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho ditlhwatlhwa tsa dijo, segolo go ya ka molao yo reng dikgwebo di tshwanetse tsa bo di na le mabaka a utlwagalang fa di oketsa ditlhwatlhwa tsa dituelelo tsa dilo tse di rekisiwang..     Foramo ya Dikgwebo tsa Japan le Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Libhangengodla lakitsi LaseNingizimu Afrika lelisebenta kahle, lelinemandla nalelitimele liyancedza kuvikela ummango kulokucekelwa phansi kwekwehla kwemandla emali ngekuwagcina angekhatsi kwebubanti lobuncane lobuhlosiwe; lobungaphasi kakhulu kulabo lobentekako ngalesikhatsi kulamanye emave..     Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela sincumo Semgcinimfa Wavelonkhe sekungeta sikhatsi lesibekiwe sekunciphisa Intsela Yephethilomu Jikelele (i-GFL).
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke seo mo malobanyaneng se dirilweng mo Foramong ya Dikgwebo tsa Japan le Aforika Borwa, mo go dumelanweng gore go diriwe letsholo le legolo la tiro le mo go lona go tla dirisanwang mmogo mo diintaseteri tse di dirisang motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo, mo thekenolojing ya dijanaga tse di tsamayang ka motlakase mmogo le leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo..     Mo foramong eno go dumelanwe gape le gore go tsewe letsholo le le tla nopolang ditšhono tse di leng teng mo Aforika Borwa tse di tla bontshiwang dikgwebo tsa Japan, tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni e tlhokegang mo diintasetering tsa go aga dijanaga ka fa nageng, ditšhono tsa ditiro mo maphateng tlhagiso ya dikuno mmogo le go abelana ka maitemogelo a tseneletseng setegeniki.

src_text: Le-GFL yancishiswa nge-R. 50 ilitha enyangeni yaMabasa neyeNkhwekhweti, futsi itawuchubeka yelulwe kusuka mhla lu-1 Inhlaba kuya kumhla ti-6 Kholwane.
tgt_text: Japan ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di botlhokwa tse di gogang kwa pele dipeeletso mo makaleng le mantsinyana ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, mme ona ke dijanaga le megala le a gatetseng kwa pele metšhini ya kwa meepong, mmogo le dikgwebo mo temothuong le mo ditirelong tsa matlole.

Kabinete gape itumedisitswe le ke dikgato tsa Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Intaseteri le Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo (dtic) ka go tlhomiwa ga Setheo sa Merero ya Ditlamo tsa Bathobantsho tsa Ditlhagisiwa tse di Rekisediwang Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, jaaka di dira gore dikgwebo tsa bathobantsho tse di rekisang ditlhagisiwa tsa tsona tse di tswang ka fa nageng di kgone go di rekisetsa dinaga tse dingwe mo lefatsheng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi isamukele sincumo Sekhomishini Yetekucudzelana sekuhlala icaphele kakhulu tindleko tetintfo letitsatfwa njengekudla lokumcoka, kakhulu sibonelelo sekutsi emabhizinisi kufuneka anikete bufakazi lobuvakalako bekwenyusa tindleko..     Umhlangano Wetemabhizinisi emkhatsini kweJapan neNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla dira gore go abelanwa ga tshedimosetso, maitemogelo le kitso nne selo se se kgonagalang bile seno se tla dira gore re kgone go godisa tseo re atlegileng mo go tsona mo Letsholong la Beng ba Diintaseteri ba Bathobantsho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyamukele lemiphumela yakamuva Yemhlangano Wetemabhizinisi emkhatsini kweJapan neNingizimu Afrika, lovumelene ngeluhlelo lwemsebenti lolunemandla lolufaka kusebentisana ekukhuliseni umnotfo ngekusebentisa emandla lahlantekile, buchwepheshe betimoto tagezi kanye neyehayidrojini lehlantekile..     Lomhlangano futsi uvumelene kutsi kube “nembukiso” we-inthanethi lotawuveta ematfuba eNingizmu Afrika kumabhizinisi lamanyenti aseJapan, kutfutfukiswa kwemakhono kulemboni yetetigitjelwa yalapha ekhaya, kumikhakha leyehlukene yetematfuba ekukhicita kanye nekutsi kube nekuniketana ngemakhono..     I-Japan ingulabanye bebalingani betfu labamcoka kakhulu kutekutsengiselana futsi ihamba embili ekutjaleni timali kumikhakha leminengi yaseNingizimu Afrika, lehlukahlukene lesukela kuyetetigitjelwa iye kutemishini yasetimayini lehamba embili, nalesuka kumabhizinisi etekulima kuya kuwetetinsita tetimali.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yamukela lokusungulwa kweNethiwekhi Yalabamnyama Yekutsengisela Emave Angaphandle lokucalwe Litiko Letekutsengiselana, Letimboni Nelekucudzelana (i-DTIC), kute kuhlanganiswe timboni tebantfu labamnyama lekungunyalo titsengisela emave emhlaba imphahla leyentiwe lapha ekhaya.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa rona tsa go nna le motlakase o sa tshabeng mo pakeng telele e tlang di tshegeditswe go utlwagala go latela gore Seteišene sa Motlakase sa Kusile kwa porofenseng ya Mpumalanga se neelwe tetla ya go ka dirisa Yuniti ya bo 04 ya go tlamela ka motlakase..     Kabinete nopotse gore go setse go konoseditswe tiro ya go aga diyuniti tsa go fetlha motlakase di le nne mo go di le thataro tse di agiwang mo porojekeng ya Seteišene sa Motlakase sa Kusile..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tseno tsa go oketsa diyuniti tsa tlamelo ya motlakase ka yuniti eno ntšhwa, mme seno se diragetse go nne go tserwe tshwetso ya go letlelela ditlamo tse di ikemetseng tsa tlamelo ya motlakase gore le tsona di tlamele baagi ka motlakase.

src_text: Lenethiwekhi itawenta kutsi kube nekwabelana ngelwatiso, ngesipiliyoni kanye nengendlela yekwati kwenta tintfo, futsi yenta loku ikususela kulemphumelelo yaLoluhlelo Lwetimboni Tebantfu Labamnyama.
tgt_text: Sešweng jaana puso saenile tumelano ya go reka motlakase wa dimekawate di le 150 mo setlamong sa tlhagiso ya motlakase wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dinšhwa tse di sa kgotlheleng tikologo leng setlamo sa Scatec ASA.

src_text: Temandla.
tgt_text: Lekgotla la Dikeletso la Matlafatso ya Bathobantsho ka Bophara mo Mererong ya Ikonomi (B-BBEE).

src_text: Indlela yetfu yesikhatsi lesidze yekuvikela neyekutfola emandla itfole kusekelwa lokukhulu kulandzela lokuniketwa kwe-Unit 4 Esiteshini Setemandla Ikusile Empumalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tsa go thapa Lekgotla le lentšhwa la Dikeletso la B-BBEE.

src_text: Lokuniketwa kwaleyunithi kungulenye inchophamlandvo yemitamo ye-Eskom yekusimamisa luhlelo lwetemandla futsi kutawengeta emamegawatsi (MW) la-8000 kulegridi yagezi wavelonkhe..     Ikhabhinethi iyabonga kutsi kwakhiwa kwemayunithi ekukhicita gezi lamane kulasitfupha sekuphotfuliwe kulomklamo waleSiteshi Semandla iKusile..     Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungetwa kwalamanye emandla ekukhicita lamasha kulegridi, lokubangwe ngilesincumo sekuvumela bakhiciti labatimele kutsi bakhicite gezi.
tgt_text: Lekgotla leno le diriwa ke batho ba ba farologaneng go tswa mo dikgwebong, mo mekgatlhong ya badiri, mo mekgatlho ya baagi le mo diruteging leng bona ba ba tla supetsang puso gore ka godisa ikonomi jang.

src_text: Hulumende usandza kusayina sivumelwano sekutsenga emandla la-150MW kumkhiciti losebentisa tindlela letehlukahlukene tekukhicita gezi, i-Scatec ASA..     Umkhandlu Wekululeka Ngekunika Emandla Langetiwe Etemnotfo Ebantfwini Labamnyama.
tgt_text: Le fa re kgonne go fetola maaka a tlhagisitsweng ke seemo sa puso ya tlhaolele mo ikonoming, tsela yona santse le motsopodia mo go ka oketseng batlhankedi ba bathobantsho mo maemong bolaodi, mo go oketseng tlhatlhelelo ya bokgoni le mo go oketseng dithendara gore di neelwe le basadi ba bašwa ba bathobantsho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokukhetfwa KweMkhandlu Lomusha Wekululeka We-B-BBEE nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa..     Lomkhandlu wakhiwe licembu lebantfu labavela kumabhizinisi lahlukahlukene, kutinyonyana, kutinhlangano temmango letitimele nakumkhakha wetifundziswa, lotawusebenta kweluleka hulumende mayelana nekugucula simo semnotfo.
tgt_text: Merwalela.
Dikgato tse di tsweletseng tsa go thusa diporofense tse mo malobeng di wetsweng ke leru la merwalela di na le mosola o seng kana ka sepe.

src_text: Nanoma kube nemsebenti lomkhulu lowentiwe ekubuyiseleni emuva kudvukiswa kutemnotfo kwelubandlululo, mkhulu umsebenti lekusafuneka wentiwe kute kukhuliswe kuphatsa kwebantfu labamnyama, kwengeta kutfutfukiswa kwemakhono nekukhulisa litfuba lenchubo yekutsenga nekutsengiselana kute kunikwe bomake labamnyama nelusha ematfuba.
tgt_text: Puso beile kwa setlhoeng dikgato tsa go tlamela ba ba amegileng ka dijo, metsi le madulo mo go bao ba sa tlholeng ba na le magae le go baakanya mafaratlhatlha ao senyegileng.

src_text: Tikhukhula.
tgt_text: Go samaganwe le namane tona ya tiro ya go busetsa sekeng ditirelo tse di botlhokwa di tshwana le tsa metsi, motlakase, kgeleloleswe le tsa kolelo ya ditlakala.

src_text: Imitamo lechubekako yahulumende yekunika lusito etifundzeni letitsintsekile mayelana neletikhukhula yenta mtselela lomcoka.
tgt_text: Go setse go simolotswe go ka dirisa dimilione tsa diranta di le 189 217 go tlhabolola mafelo batho ba itlhomileng mo go ona gore botshelo jwa baagi mo mafelong ano bo tokafale..     Mo godimo ga seno, mo Sekgwameng sa Setheo sa go Agela Baagi Madulo go loketswe dimilione tsa diranta di le 733 086 tseo di tla dirisediwang tiro ya go aga madulo a tla nnelang ruri a golaganeng le ditirelo tsa botlhokwa..     Kabinete itumeletse dikgato tsa go tswa baagi thuso go tswa kwa pusong ya Qatar moo kolekileng ka dijo, diaparo, dijenereitara, metšhini ya go phepafatsa metsi, didirisiwa tsa go thusa go hema, ditente le ditlhare.

src_text: Hulumende ucalise embili kuniketa kudla, emanti nendzawo yekuhlala ebantfwini labasusiwe etindzaweni tabo kanye nekulungiswa kwesakhiwonchanti lesimoshakele.
tgt_text: Koleke eno tla thusa batho ba feta ba le 4 000 ba ga jaana ba beilweng nakwana mo dintlolehalahaleng tsa ditirelo tsa setšhaba.

src_text: Umsebenti lomkhulu wekubuyisela tinsita letisisekelo letifana nemanti, nagezi, netekutfutfwa kwendle netibi uyachubeka..     Kusetjentiswe tigidzi letilinganiselwa ku-R. 217 kuLuhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Tindzawo Temikhukhu loluhlose kutfutfukisa lizinga lemphilo yebantfu labahlala etindzaweni temikhukhu..     Kunetigidzi leti-R. 086 letingetiwe letiniketwe ngekusebentisa Sibonelelo Sekutfutfukisa SeLitiko Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu kute tisite ekwakheni tindzawo tekuhlala letisimeme naletihlanganisa wonkhe umuntfu..     Ikhabhinethi iyalwamukela lolusito loluvela kuHulumende waseQatar lolufana nekudla, timphahla, emajeneretha, kokuhlanta emanti, emaventhiletha, emathende kanye nemitsi.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile gape le dikgato tse dingwe gape tsa go tswa baagi thuso tse di tswang kwa nageng ya United Arab Emirates (UAE) moo yona kolekileng ka dijo le metsi go thusa bao ba senyegetsweng ka ntlha ya merwalela ya mo malobeng.

src_text: Lomnikelo utawusita kwesikhashana bantfu labangetulu kwe-4 000 labahlaliswe etikhungweni tekunakekela ummango.
tgt_text: Go Thankgololwa ga Sekgwama sa go Tswa Baagi Thuso.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi futsi iyalamukela lusito lwebuntfu loluvela ku-United Arab Emirates (i-UAE) lolufana nekudla nemanti kute kusitakale bantfu labantsintsekile kuletikhukhula letisandza kwenteka..     Kusungulwa Kwesikhwama Sekutfutfukisa Temisebenti.
tgt_text: 1    Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa go thankgololwa ga Sekgwama sa go Tswa Baagi Thuso se se thankgolotsweng ke Koporasi ya Tlhabololo ya Diintaseteri (IDC) mmogo le Kantoro ya Moporesitente le Lefapha la Kgwebisano le Kgaisano ya Diintaseteri (dtic).

src_text: 1    Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela kusungulwa Kwesikhwama Sekutfutfukisa Temisebenti lesicalwe Yinhlangano Yekutfutfukisa Timboni (i-IDC) ngekubambisana nelihhovisi laMengameli ne-DTIC.
tgt_text: Thuso eno tla dira gore bašwa ba direlwe ditšhono di fitlha go di le 50 000 tse di tswelang baagi mosola mo metseng.. 2    Thuso eno tla akaretsa ya kalafi le ya tlhokomelo ya setšhaba, go ema nokeng mekgatlho e fepang baagi ka dijo le ka dikotla, go ruta baagi go buisa, go ema nokeng matsholo go tlhokomela tlhago le go tlhokomela phetogo ya maemo loapi mmogo le matsholo a emang bašwa nokeng.

src_text: Lokwesekelwa kutawuvula ematfuba emisebenti ebantfwini labasha labangafika ku-50 000 kumisebenti lebalulekile leyenteka kumimango yendzawo.
tgt_text: Sekgwama seno se tla thusa ditšhaba di le 26 seng dikgwebo tse di dirang letseno.
Bosenyi le Bonweenwee.

src_text: 2    Lokwesekelwa kutawufaka temphilo netekunakekelwa kwemmango, kudla kanye nekusekelwa ngetindlela tekuniketa kudla lokunemphilo letifana nemakhishi emasobho, ngekugcugcutela kufundza nekubhala, ngekulandzela tinhlelo tekungenelela letimayelana nekugucugucuka kwesimo selitulu netekuphila ngendlela lengabulali indalo kanye nangekuta netindlela tekusekelwa kwelusha.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke dikgato tsa go tshwariwa ga batho ba le bantsinyana ba ba amegang mo ditiragalong tsa bokhukhuntshwane, tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu le tsa bonweenwee.

src_text: Lesikhwama sitawusekela imimango le-26 kanye netinhlangano letitimele letingenti inzuzo.
tgt_text: Mo go bano go akarediwa gape le bao mo malobeng ba neng ba okame maemo a kwa godimo mo pusong le mo dikgwebong tsa puso, mme mo go bona ba bangwe ba bona ba latofadiwa ka go tlola Molao wa Botsamaisi jwa Madi Puso (PFMA) wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 01 wa 1999).

src_text: Bugebengu nenkhohlakalo.
tgt_text: Dikgetse tsa go tshwana le tsa go tshwariwa ga batlhankedi ba Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae ba kwa Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre kwa Pretoria ba ba tsereng pipamolomo ba neng ba neelwa ke moagi wa naga ya kwa ntle ke bopaki jwa gore ga go ope yo tshabiwang ke molao le gore batlhankedi ba ba senang nnete ga ba batlege mo pusong..     Kabinete gape itumedisiwa le ke dikgato tsa go busetsa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa basimane ba ga Gupta bong Rajesh le Atul.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokuboshwa kwebantfu labahlukahlukene mayelana nekukhohlisa nekukhwabanisa imali kanye nangekwenta inkhohlakalo.
tgt_text: Seno se latela gore ba tshwariwe kwa teropong ya Dubai kwa nageng ya UAE morago ga gore Mokgatlho wa Sepodisi sa Lefatshe ka Bophara (Interpol) rebole taelo ya gore ba batliwa.

src_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi basebenti baphambilini labebasetikhundleni letisetulu nalabo bebasebentela tinkhapani tahulumende, labanye babo babukene nemacala ekuphula Umtsetfo Wekuphatfwa Kwetimali Tahulumende, wemnyaka we-1999 (Umtsetfo we-1 wemnyaka we-1999).
tgt_text: Bana bano ba motho ba batliwa ka makatlanamane ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa gore ba tle go ikarabela mo ditatofatsong tse ba rwesitsweng tsona mo mererong ya go goga puso ka nko, go akaretsa le tsa bokhukhuntshwane le tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu.

src_text: Lokuboshwa loku – lokufaka ekhatsi sisebenti SeLitiko Letasekhaya kuSikhungo Sekwamukela Tifikanemtfwalo   i-Desmond Tutu ePretoria lesisolwa ngekugwazelwa ngumuntfu lomchamuki – kuletsa bufakazi bekutsi akekho umuntfu longetulu kwemtsetfo nekutsi kute indzawo yebasebenti labangakatsembeki kumkhakha wahulumende.
tgt_text: Ditheo tsa molao tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa le tsa naga ya UAE di tsweletse ka dipuisano tse di ka ga go ba busetsa ka fa nageng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyawamukela futsi umsebenti lochubekako wekuletfwa eNingizimu Afrika letelamani temajaha takaGupta, Rajesh na-Atul.
tgt_text: Go tshwariwa ga bona ke se supo sa gore puso ikemiseditse go lwantshana le bosenyi le bonweenwee ntle le go tshaba ope kgotsa go sekamela ka fa letlhakoreng la ope..     Ditiragalo tseno tsa go tshwara batho bano di bontsha sentle gore dithulaganyo tse di leng teng di kgona go dira fa go tla mo go rweseng batho melato ya ditiro tse di setlhogo tse ba di dirileng le go netefatsa gore molao se nne le bao ba tshabang kgotsa ba ratang go gaisa ba bangwe.

src_text: Loku kulandzela kuboshwa kwabo lokusandza kwenteka eDubai endzaweni yase-UAE emva kwekutsi Inhlangano Yemhlaba Yemaphoyisa Etebugebengu (i-Interpol) ikhiphe sicwayiso.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale maiteko go nyatsa ikonomi ya rona le naga ya rona go latela gore go senngwe mogala wa motlakase wa Yuniti ya 1 ya Eskom ko Seteišeneng sa Motlakase sa Matla kwa porofenseng ya Mpumalanga setse jaanong le lekgetlo la bone ditiragalo tseno tse go belaelwang le tsa go senyetsa seteišene sa motlakase di diriwa ka bomo mo diteišeneng tse dingwe di le tharo tsa motlakase mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng.

src_text: Letelamani leti tiyafunwa eNingizimu Afrika mayelana netinsolo tekubandzakanyeka kulokubamba umbuso ngabhongwane, lokufaka ekhatsi kukhohlisa nekushushumbisa imali.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa mo malobeng tsa dikgetse tsa bosenyi ke bopaki jwa gore re le baagi re tshweanetse go dira go tlala seatla go dira gore metse ya rona nne e babalesegileng.

src_text: Kuyachubeka kucocisana emkhatsini kwema-ejensi etemtsetfo ase-UAE newaseNingizimu Afrika kute baletfwe kulelive.
tgt_text: Seno se re gakolola gore rotlhe re le baagi re tshwanetse go nna le seabe mo go fokotseng ditiragalo tsa bosenyi mme re le sepodisi, baeteledipele ba dipolotiki, baagi, balelapa, beng ba dikgwebo, mekgatlho ya badiri le ya baagi re tshwanetse go dira se re tshwanetseng go se dira go lwantshana le bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya gore madi a okeditsweng a ntshitsweng ke Kantoro ya Tona ya Sepodisi a tshwanetseng go dirisiwa mo diteišeneng tsa sepodisi tse go begiwang dikgetse tse dintsi mo go tsona tsa polao, petelelo le dikgetse tse dingwe tse di setlhogo tla thusa go fetola maemo ano le go dira gore re nne le metse botlhe ba babalesegileng mo go yona.

src_text: Kuboshwa kwabo kukhomba kutibophelela kwahulumende ekulweni nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo ngaphandle kwekutsatsa luhlangotsi nangekungesabi.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso ya Sešweng e ka ga COVID-.

src_text: Lokuboshwa kwabo kukhombisa kutsi tinhlelo netinchubo tisebenta kahle kakhulu ekwenteni labo labagangako baphendvule kuletigameko tabo tebugebengu lobesabekako nekucinisekisa kutsi kute umuntfu longetulu kwemtsetfo.
tgt_text: Kabinete gakolotse batho botlhe gore COVID-19 santse le teng le gore mo marigeng ano ditshwaetso tse dintšhwa di tla oketsega.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyayigceka lemitamo lesebaleni yekucekela phasi umnotfo nelive lakitsi kulandzela lokulinyatwa kwekhebuli kuYunithi 1 ye-Eskom Esiteshini iMatla eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Re tshwanetse go tswelela go latela dikgato tsotlhe tsa go itlhokomela le tsa go tlhokomela batho ba bangwe.

src_text: Lesi bekusigameko sesine setinsolo tekucekela phasi titeshi takitsi tagezi emva kwekutsi kube naletinye tigameko letifana naleti etiteshini letintsatfu kulamaviki lamatsatfu lengcile.
tgt_text: Tsona ke tsa go tlhapa diatla kgotsa go di tsikitletsa ka sebolayamegare gangwe le gape, go apara dimaseke fa go lwe fa gare ga batho ka fa teng ga meago, go katogana, go atlhamisa matlhabaphefo gore go tsene mowa o phepa mmogo le go tlhabela moento.

src_text: Letibalobalo takamuva tebugebengu tikhomba kutsi kufuneka sente kancono njengemmango kute sicinisekise kutsi imimmango yetfu iphephile.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).

src_text: Loku kusikhumbuta kutsi kunciphisa bugebengu kungumsebenti wemmango wonkhe nekutsi sonkhe – lokufaka ekhatsi emaphoyisa, baholi betepolitiki, imimmango, imindeni, bosomabhizinisi, basebenti kanye netinhlangano temmango – kufuneka sidlale indzima yetfu.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke maikano a tserweng kwa Samiting ya Tshoganyetso ya Mokgatlotshwaraganelo wa Aforika e ka ga Ditiragalo tsa Menolopuso le tsa go Thopa Puso ka Dikgoka Ntle le go Latela Molaotheo mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika e neng tshwarwetswe kwa teropong ya Malabo, kwa nageng ya Rephaboliki ya Equatorial Guinea, ka Lamatlhatso wa la bo 28 Motsheganong..     Baeteledipele ba dinaga tsa Aforika ba ne ba sekaseka matshosetsi ano a santseng ba lebane nao, ba sekaseka ditsela tsa ga jaana tsa go samagana le ntlha eno mme ba dira maikano gore ba tla dirisana mmogo jaaka dinaga mo mererong ya pabalesego go thusa bao ba tobaneng le ditiragalo tsa menolopuso le tsa go thopa naga ka dikgoka.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi inekutetsemba lokukhulu kutsi imali leyengetwe Yindvuna Yetemaphoyisa yacondziswa kutiteshi temaphoyisa letinemazinga lasetulu ekubulala, ekudlengula kanye nalamanye emacala lanebudlova itawusita kugucula simo bese kuba nemimmango lephephile..     Takamuva nge-COVID-.
tgt_text: Bolwetse jwa Monkeypox.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikhumbuta wonkhe umuntfu kutsi i-COVID-19 iyakapheli futsi bungoti bekutseleleka kabusha butawenyuka ngesikhatsi sasebusika.
tgt_text: Kabinete netefaleditse maAforika Borwa gore ditheo tsa rona tsa maokelo di ntshitse matlho dinameng mo go thibeleng bolwetse jwa Monkeypox, seno se latela gore bo tlhasele dinaga di le mmalwa tse bolwetse jono bo sa tlwaelegang mo go tsona.

src_text: Kufuneka sichubeke kulandzela tonkhe tindlela tekutivikela netekuvikela labanye bantfu.
tgt_text: Le fa ka fa nageng go ise go nne le molwetse yo go begilweng gore na le bolwetse jono ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, maokelo ka fa nageng tsweletse go tlhokomela maemo ka fa nageng ka leitlho le le ntšhotšho     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi kuhlala sigeza tandla noma sisebentisa sibulalimagciwane, kufaka sifonyo uma sisendzaweni levalekile, sihlale ngekuchelelana, sivule emafasitelo kute kungene umoya nekutsi sigome.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go Batla Maikutlo Baagi Mabapi le Ditsela tse di ka Tsewang go Samagala le Dikgwebo tse di seng mo Molaong tsa go Reka Dikgerekgere tsa Ditshipi.

Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go batla maikutlo baagi mabapi le ditsela tse di ka tsewang go samagala le dikgwebo tse di seng mo molaong tsa go reka dikgerekgere tse di utswitsweng tsa ditshipi tse di tlhatlhamolotsweng kgotsa tse di gakolositsweng.

src_text: Umhlangano weLubumbano Lwemave Ase-Afrika.
tgt_text: Go utswiwa ga ditshipi le megala ya koporo mo mafaratlhatlheng setšhaba go kgoreletsa ikonomi go re tswela mosola go nne go dira gore ditlhwatlhwa tsa dilo di ye kwa godimo thata.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela lesimemetelo, titsembiso nekutibophelela letitsetfwe Emhlanganweni We-AU Longakavami Wetekuvukela Umbuso Newetingucuko Letingekho KuMtsetfosisekelo e-Afrika lobewubanjelwe eMalabo, eRiphabhlikhi Yase-Equitorial Guinea, NgeMgcibelo, ti-28 Inkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Tse dingwe tsa dikgoreletsi tseno ke tsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase le tsa go dira gore re tlhoke diterene ka ntlha ya ditshipi tse di utswiwang mo diporong.
Seno se dira gore banamedi ba diterene ba dirise madi mangwe gape go duelela dipalangwa tse dingwe fa diterene di sa dire.

src_text: Baholi bemave ase-Afrika benta luhlolo kulobungoti lobuhlala bukhona, babuke tindlela tekuphendvula takamuva netekutibophelela kute kukhuliswe kuvikeleka lokuhlangene kwetive letimalunga nebuphekula kanye nekuvukela umbuso.
tgt_text: Go kgakgamololwa ga megala e tshwereng motlakase le go tlogela ponaka le go leketla go baya matshelo batho mo kotsing, segolobogolo mo baneng..     Kabinete laetse gore dtic nne yona e gogang kwa pele dikgato tseno le go dira jalo ntle le go tsaya nako telele, le go bokeletsa ditshwaelo go tswa mo baaging le mo makaleng a matshwanedi mmogo le go tla ka maano a tla re tswelang mosola puso ka dirang le go tsenya tirisong go fedisa ditiragalo tseno tsa go senyetsa setšhaba mafaratlhatlha sona a botlhokwa mo ikonoming tla re morago ga fao, puso ya itsese setšhaba ka dikgato tse dumelaneng le tsona gore di ka tsenngwa tirisong     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Sifo se-Monkeypox.
tgt_text: Kopanokgothakgothe ya Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba e ka ga go Tlhabana Botlhale mo Mererong ya Tirisanommogo ka Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji tse di Dirang gore go Rene Kagiso (PTPS) mo Dinagakopanong (UN).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi baphatsi bakitsi betemphilo bahlala bacaphele kute babukisise futsi bavikele lesifo se-Monkeypox, kulandzela lokucubuka kwaso emaveni lengakavami kuba nalesifo.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla tshwara PTPS ya borataro kwa Lekgotleng la Dipatlisiso tsa Saense le Intaseteri (CSIR) kwa Pretoria go tloga ka Labobedi, 21 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 24 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Nanoma kusete timphawu talesifo kute kube kunyalo noma letibikiwe eNingizimu Afrika, baphatsi betemphilo bayachubeka kugadza lesimo      Sincumo Sekhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore go tla tla baeng ba le 300 go tswa kwa dinageng di le 50 tse leng karolo ya dinagakopano.

src_text: Kutfola imiva yemmango mayelana netindlela tekubukana nekutsengiselana ngalokungekho emtsetfweni ngemfucuta leyinsimbi .
tgt_text: Kopanokgothakgothe eno ya go tlhabana botlhale tla kopanya batlhankedi botlhe ba ba nang le kgatlhegelo mo sesoleng, sepodising le mo baaging mo dinageng tseo leng karolo ya dinagakopano go dirisana mmogo mo tirisong ya thekenoloji ya segompieno e tlhabologileng thata le mo go logeng maano segompieno a tlhabologileng thata go dirisiwa mo matsholong dintwa a gogwang kwa pele ke UN.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kube nekucocisana nemmango mayelana netiphakamiso letitsetfwe tekucedza kutsengiselana ngemfucuta ngalokungekho emtsetfweni nangeletinye tintfo letentiwe ngensimbi.
tgt_text: Kopanokgothakgothe eno ya go tlhabana botlhale tla dirisiwa jaaka lefelo le mo go lona dinaga tse leng karolo ya sesole sa go tlisa kagiso sa dinagakopano di tla tlhabanang botlhale mo go lona mmogo le mo go tlhameng dikakanyo tse dintšhwa tse di ka ga gore thekenoloji ntšhwa ya segompieno ka solwa jang mosola go thibela dintwa le mo go direng gore go rene kagiso..     Dikgaisano tse di Tshwarwang Lekgetlo la Bone tsa Bokgoni jo bo Tswileng Diatla mo Nageng ya Aforika Borwa (WSZA) tse di Tshwarwang Gangwe le Gape Morago ga Dingwaga di le Pedi ka fa Nageng.

src_text: Kwebiwa kwemfucuta yensimbi nekwekhebuli yekhopha lokwenteka kusakhiwonchanti sahulumende kuvimbela kusebenta kahle kwemnotfo ngoba kuphoca kutsi kwenyuke tindleko.
tgt_text: Dikgaisano tsa Naga tse di Tshwarwang Lekgetlo la Bone tsa WSZA tse di Tshwarwang Gangwe le Gape Morago ga Dingwaga di le Pedi ka fa Nageng di tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Kopanelo ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Inkosi Albert Luthuli kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal go tloga ka la bo 07 go fitlha ka la bo 10 Seetebosigo 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono yo reng: “Go Tlhatlosa Dikuno tsa mo Ngwagaketeng wa bo 21 Badiri ba Ditiro tsa Diatla”..     Dikgaisano tseno di tshwarwa ka maitlhomo go tlhatlosa serodumo sa batho ba ba nang le bokgoni jwa tiro ya diatla gore batho ba bangwe ba nne le lerato la tsona le go itlhophela tsona jaaka ditiro tse ba tla di latelang mmogo le go bulela tirisanommogo e solofetsang go nna teng le diintaseteri tse di matshwanedi.

src_text: Letinye tintfo letiphatamisako tifaka kuphakelwa kwemandla kanye nekwetinsita tetitimela ngenca yekucekela phasi kwemizila yetitimela.
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga go dirisiwa jaaka dikgato tsa go tlhatlosa serodumo sa tiro ya diatla gore ratege mo baithuti go itlhophela tsona jaaka ditiro tse ba batlang go di dira, di dirisiwa gape le ka maitlhomo go tlhatlhoba maemo le bokgoni jo re nang le jona jwa tiro ya diatla mmogo le go tlhatlhoba tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni     Melaetsa.

src_text: Kubanga kutsi kuphoceleke kwenyusa tindleko tetigitjelwa ngenca yekuphatimeseka kwetigitjelwa temmango.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa fa romela matshediso kwa balelapa le morafe wa Bogosi jwa amaMpondo go latela gore Kgosi ya bona Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau thule botala ka tlhogo     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Kucekela phasi imphahla kanye nemakhebuli agezi langakavikeleki kubanga nebungoti emmangweni, kakhulu ebantfwaneni.
tgt_text: Rre Jacob Ganny Mbele thapilwe go nna Mokaedikakaretso (DG) mo Lefapheng la Metswedi ya Dimenerale le Eneji (DMRE)..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lefapheng la Merero ya Dikgwa, ya Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapile le ya Tikologo (DFFE).

Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu thapilwe go nna Mmueledimogolo wa Lefapha la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo (DoJCD)..     Mme Doris Tshepe thapilwe go nna Mokhomišenare mo Khomišeneng e Okameng Merero ya Dikgaisano tsa Dikgwebo..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa thapilwe go nna Motlhankedi yo Itlhophileng wa go Eletsa Tona ya Lefapha la Tirelo ya Puso le Tsamaiso wa ditiro tsa letsatsi le letsatsi..     Moatefokate Rams Ramashia thapilwe go nna Motlhankedi yo Itlhophileng wa go Eletsa Tona ya Lefapha la Tirelo ya Puso le Tsamaiso wa ditiro tsa nakwana.

src_text: Kuntjintja Kwesimo Selitulu.
tgt_text: Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwemukele kuvakasha eNingizimu Afrika kweMnu.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga leeto la Rre Alok Sharma yo leng Moporesitente wa bo 26 wa Samiti ya Dinagakopano (UN) e ka ga Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi go bo etetse ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa, go tloga ka la bo 19 go fitlha ka la bo 21 Seetebosigo 2022, mmogo le go leboga mogopolo wa gagwe fa re go totobetse gore Aforika Borwa ikemiseditse go diragatsa tlhagiso ya motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo..   Ka ngwaga wa 2021, Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ne na le baeteledipele ba bangwe ba naga ya France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika mmogo le Mokgatlho wa Dinaga tsa Yuropa fa go nwe go diriwa kitsiso e iseng tle diriwe ya go dirisanammogo mo go tshegetseng dikgato tsa boammaruri tsa tiriso ya motlakase le digase tse kgotlhelo ya tsona mo loaping leng kwa tlase thata mo go tlhagiseng didirisiwa tsa ikonomi..   Naga ya Aforika Borwa, gare ga metlakase mengwe mentsi e sa kgotlheleng tikologo, ga a bolo go samagana le namane tona ya tiro ya go dira gore re tswe mo tirisong ya motlakase o kgotlhelang tikologo mme re tsene mo tirisong ya motlakase o sa kgotlheleng go tshwana le leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, dikgong tsa go dira leokwane kgotsa motlakase, motlakase o fetlhiwang ka phefo, motlakase o fetlhiwang ka letsatsi le motlakase o fetlhiwang ka metsi.

src_text: Alok Sharma, Mengameli weNgcungcutsela yema-26 yekuGucugucuka kwesimo selitulu yeNhlangano YaMhlabuhlangene (i-UN), kusukela mhla ti-19 kuya kumhla ti-21 iNhlaba 2022, kanye nekuhlola kwakhe kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ikhombise kutibophelela ngalokucacile  ekugucukeleni emandleni lahlobile.
tgt_text: Tiriso ya metlakase eno ka go farologana ga yona tla re thusa gore re kgone go nna le metswedi e lekaneng ya motlakase gore re kgone go nna le motlakase o tla kgonang go emelana le ditlhokwa tsa motlakase ka fa nageng.

src_text: Nga-2021, Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela nalabanye baholi ekumemeteleni budlelwane lobuyinchophamlandvo nahulumende waseFrance, iJalimane, i-United Kingdom ne-United States, kanye ne-European Union, kusekela ingucuko lenebulungiswa emnotfweni wekhabhoni lephansi kanye nemphakatsi lokwati kumelana nesimo selitulu.
tgt_text: Go Tlhabelwa ga Moento wa Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: INingizimu Afrika beyisebenta kamatima ekulungiseni sisekelo setfu sengucuko yemandla lahlobile futsi siye emitfonjeni yemandla lahlobile lefana ne-hydrogen leluhlata, i-biomass, emandla emoya, emandla elilanga nemandla laphehlwa ngemanti, kulokunye lokuvuselekako.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke phokotsego kgolo ya dipalo tsa batho ba ba tshwerweng ke COVID-19 e rekotilweng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di fetileng bile rotloetsa botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi gore ba ye go tlhabela moento, jaaka thibela gore ba se gatelelwe ke bolwetse jono, ba se robale kwa sepetlele kgotsa go thula botala ka tlhogo..   Halofo ya palo yotlhe ya batho ba bagolo ba re nang le bona ka fa nageng setse tlhabetse bonnye jwa moento le mongwe wa COVID-.

src_text: Loku lokubitwa ngekutsi kubhicwa kwemandla kuvumela kulingana phakatsi kwemitfombo yemandla kuze kucinisekiswe emandla latsembekile kuze kuhlangabetwane netidzingo temandla letikhulako telive.
tgt_text: Madi dinamane tsa ona di leng kwa tlase thata puso a adimileng mo malobeng kwa Bankeng e Thusang Dipuso tsa Dinaga mo Lefatsheng go ya ka puso tla dirisediwa go reka meento mengwe ya COVID-19 le go dirisediwa go netefatsa gore setšhaba se babalesegile mo matshosetsing kgonagalo ya go ka tshwaetsega.

src_text: Kugomela Sifo seLigciwane leKhorona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Kabinete gape tšhotlhile le ntlha e ka ga merero e ka ga dikarolo tse di ka baakangwang mo go samaganeng le leroborobo la COVID-19, segolobogolo mabapi le kgatelopele e dirilweng mabapi le go busetsa sekeng maemo ditiro tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kwehla lokukhulu kwetifo letiphatselene ne-COVID-19 letirekhodwe eNingizimu Afrika kulamaviki lambalwa lakengcile yaphindze yakhutsata bonkhe bantfu labafanelekile kutsi bachubeke nekugoma, lokusita kuvimbela kugula lokumatima, kulaliswa esibhedlela nekufa.
tgt_text: Tona ya Boitekanelo, ngaka Joe Phaahla tla neelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo mo ntlheng eno..  Letsatsi la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa ka fa Nageng.

src_text: Ihhafu yabo bonkhe bantfu labadzala baseNingizimu Afrika kuze kube manje basitfolile silinganisomutsi sinye semjovo wekugomela i-COVID-.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile maAforika Borwa otlhe go bo ba ketekeli le rona mekete ya Letsatsi la go Keteka Mosola wa Bašwa ka fa Nageng ka Labone, 16 Seetebosigo 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Go netefatsa gore re nna le ditsela tsa go iphedisa tse di nnelang ruri mmogo le go nna matlhagatlhaga ga bašwa gore bokamoso nne jo bo botoka.” Matlhagatlhaga bašwa ba nang le ona mmogo le boitshoko jwa bona ke dilo tse naga ya rona tshwanetseng go ipela ka tsona le go solofela gore kamoso tsotlhe di tla apara tshiamo.

src_text: Hulumende uhlose kusebentisa imali lenentalo lencane lesandza kugunyatwa liBhange leMhlaba kutsenga nekwengeta imitsamo yemjovo ye-COVID-19 aphindze acinisekise kutsi sive sivikeleke ngalokwenele etifweni letingaba khona.
tgt_text: Jaaka Kgwedi go Ketekiwang Mosola wa Bašwa ka fa Nageng lebile go garela, tla re gagamatseng maiteko rona go netefatsa gore bašwa ba fitlhelela matsholo ka bontsi go ba ema nokeng puso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo go direng gore ba kgone go nna le seabe mo ikonoming..   Lephata la Ditirelo tsa Puso, le leng lona le thapang batho ka bontsi, le tsibogetse kgwetlho eno ka go dira gore bašwa ba bantsi ba ba alogileng ba thapiwe mo matsholong go ithutela tiro mo Lephateng la Ditirelo tsa Puso go tla go ithutela tiro teng.

Puso samagane gape le go tsenya tirisong Sekgwama sa Matlole go Thapa Baagi (SEF) mmogo le go tsosolosa Setheo sa Naga sa Ditirelo tsa Bašwa (NYS) moo matsholo ano ka bobedi tla tlholang ditiro mo le lengwe le le lengwe la ona le tla tlholelang bašwa ba le 50 000 ditiro mo ikonoming.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yacubungula tindzaba letiphatselene nentfutfuko ekulawulweni kwabhubhane we-COVID-19, ikakhulukati ngenchubekelembili leseyentiwe kuze kubuyelwe ngalokugcwele emisebentini yetenhlalomnotfo letayelekile.
tgt_text: Matsholo ano ka se tlhole fela ditiro tse di tlhokagalang ka bontsi mme gape tla tsosolosa gape le ditiro tsa go nna le baagi ba ba matlhagatlhaga.

src_text: Ngcongcoshe Wetempilo, Dkt.
tgt_text: SEF tla dirisana le mekgatlo e seng ya puso (di-NGO) fa NYS yona tla samagana le go kwadisa bašwa go tsenngwa mo matsholong ditirelo tse di tla unngwelang baagi naga ka bophara..  Lefapha la Dipalangwa.

src_text: Joe Phaahla, utawuniketa imininingwane leyengetiwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke Leanotiro la Puso la Dikgato di le 11 tsa go samagana le botlhokotsebe jwa bakganni ba diteroko jwa go paraka mebila ya ka fa nageng mmogo le ditiragalo tsa beng ba ditlamo tsa diteroko tsa go thapa bakganni ba diteroko go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle.

src_text: Lusuku LweLusha LwaVelonkhe .
tgt_text: Leano leno, le le kwadilweng ke Komiti ya Ditona tsa ka fa Nageng (IMC) e Samaganang le Merero ya Dipalangwa tse di Rwalang Dithoto mmogo le bannaleseabe mo intasetering ya dipalangwa tse di rwalang dithoto, gare ga tse dingwe tsa dilo tse di tlotlomatsang ke tiragatso ya molao wa visa mmogo le kobamelo ya melao ya badiri.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekuhlanganyela emigubhweni yeLilanga Lwelusha Lwavelonkhe ngaLwesine, mhla ti-16 kuNhlaba 2022 ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Kutfutfukisa kuphila lokusimeme nekusimama kwebantfu labasha kuze kube nelikusasa lelincono.”  Umoya wemdlandla newekucina lokhonjiswe lusha esiveni sakitsi imphela usizatfu sekubungata kanye nelitsemba lelikusasa lelincono.
tgt_text: Gore go tlhomiwe IMC eno ke ka ntlha ya ditiragalo tse di neng di setse di simolotse go gakala tsa go paraka ditsela tse di neng di diriwa ke bakganni ba diteroko ba maAforika Borwa ba ba neng ba na le dingongora.

src_text: Njengoba iNyanga Yavelonkhe Yelusha seyiya ngasekupheleni, asicinise imitamo yetfu yekucinisekisa kutsi bantfu labasha bayafinyelela etinhlelweni letinyenti tekwesekwa letiniketwa nguhulumende futsi sente kube lula kutibandzakanya kwabo emnotfweni..  Luphiko Lwetemisebenti Yahulumende, njengemcashi lomkhulu kunawo onkhe, liphendvule lensayeya ngekwenta labaceceshwe ngeticu labangasebenti kutsi batfole lwati lwekusebenta nangeluHlelo Lwekusebenta Ufundza ngaloluphiko lwetemisebenti Yahulumende.
tgt_text: Ka gale fa go na le ditiragalo tsa megwanto mmogo le tsa go paraka mebila seno se kgoreletsa tota metsamao, se tshosa babeeletsi ba ba tswang kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle mme se se golo le go feta ke gore, seno se ama ikonomi ka tsela e sa itumediseng mmogo le go ama ditirelo tsa dikgwebo tse di itshepetseng mo mebileng eo parakilweng.

src_text: Hulumende uphindze futsi waphumelelisa Sikhwama Sekucashwa Kwetenhlalo (i-SEF) kanye netindlela letivuselelwe temisebenti yeLuhlelo Lwelusha Lwavelonkhe (i-NYS) letitawutsatsa bantfu labasha labange-50 000 ngalinye emnotfweni.
tgt_text: Tlhaelo ya Metsi kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo ya Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).

src_text: Lemitamo ngeke inikete kuphela sipiliyoni sekusebenta lesidzingeka kakhulu   kodvwa itawuphindza futsi icinisekise ligugu lekuba sakhamuti lesisebentako.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ka fao Lefapha la Metsi le Kgeleloleswe le samaganeng le ntlha eno kwa Masepaleng wa Teropokgolo wa NMB kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Botlhaba gore porofense eo se iphitlhele sena metsi gonne fa sale ka ngwaga wa 2015 porofense eno ntse tlhaela metsi.

src_text: I-SEF ibambisana netinhlangano letitimele (ema-NGO) bese kutsi i-NYS ibhalisa bantfu labasha kutinsita letenta imiphakatsi izuze eveni lonkhe..  Tekutfutsa   .
tgt_text: DWS ntse thusana le porofense go tsenya tirosong dikgato tse di tlhokagalang jaanong, tse di tla dirisiwang sebakanyana le tse di tla dirisiwang mo pakeng e tlang le go ya go ile go rarabolola le go samagana le seo mo isagong se nang le kgonagalo ya go ka feletsa se tlisitse komelelo.

src_text: IKhabinethi ilwamukele luHlelo lwekuSebenta lolunemaphuzu la-11 lekubukana nekuvinjwa kwemigwaco kanye nekucashwa kwebantfu bangaphandle njengabashayeli bemaloli.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse gape le mo baaging ba NMB gore ba obamele dikgato tsa go laola metsi tse dimasepala tsa dikgaolo tseo di tsentseng mo tirisong gore di kgone go tlhokomela metsi.

src_text: Loluhlelo, lolwasungulwa liKomidi Labongcongcoshe Betemigwaco Nemitfwalo (i-IMC) ngekubambisana nalabatsintsekako embonini yetemgwaco nemitfwalo, likhutsata kulokunye kuphocelelwa kwetidzingo tema-visa kanye nekutfotjelwa kwemitsetfo yetebasebenti.
tgt_text: Dimasepala tsotlhe fa di kopane ka gotlhegotlhe di tshwanetse go fokotsa tiriso ya metsi ka dilitara di le dimilione di le 50 mo letsatsing, go tswa mo a dirisiwang ga jaana leng dilitara di le dimilione di le 280 ka letsatsi gore jaanong go dirisiwa dilitara di le dimilione di le 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le Bonweenwee.

src_text: I-IMC yasungulwa kuze kutsi ibukane nekwandza kwekuvinjwa kwemigwaco kanye nemibhikisho yebashayeli bemaloli baseNingizimu Afrika labangakajabuli.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke dikgato tsa sešweng tsa go tshwariwa ga motlhankedi yo direlang Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae (DHA) kwa dikantorong tse di leng kwa Benoni jaaka diretse ka bokhukhuntshwane moagi wa naga ya Bangladeshi lekwalo la mosepele la naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Imibhikisho nekuvinjwa kwemigwaco kuba nemtselela lomubi ekuhambeni, kwetfuse nebatjalitimali balamanye emave futsi lokubaluleke kakhulu, kuba nemtselela lomubi emnotfweni kanye nekuphakelwa kwemikhicito lebalulekile lesebentisa tindlela letitsintsekile.
tgt_text: Motlhankedi yono, yo leina la gagwe leng Mme Sibongile Simelane lokolotswe ke Kgotlatshekelo ya Magiseterata ya Kgaolo ya Benoni kwa kgolegelong ka beile ya diranta di le dikete di le tlhano ka Labobedi, 21 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Kuswelakala Kwemanti kuleliDolobhakati le-Nelson Mandela Bay (i-NMB).
tgt_text: Moagi yono wa naga ya Bangladeshi bong Rre Fahim Kazi tshwerwe ka la bo 12 Motsheganong 2022 fa ne leka go tswa ka fa nageng mo lekwalo la gagwe la mosepele le neng le re leina la gagwe ke, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kungenelela kweLitiko Letemanti Nekutfutfwa Kwekungcola (i-DWS) kuMasipala weliDolobhakati lase-NMB eMphumalanga Kapa kuze kugwenywe Kwehla Kwemanti Emadamini njengoba sifundza sibukene nengwadla yekuswelakala kwemanti lokucale nga-.
tgt_text: Sešweng jaana DHA ne ya thotathota modiragatsi wa naga ya Lithuania le dipurugwana tsa gagwe bong mme Ieva Andrejevaite, yo maitlhomo gagwe bong le go gatakaka thulaganyo ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ya go thusa bafaladi go latela gore fitlhele mo nageng fete ka go tlhama maaka re kopa go dira kopo ya go tshabela ka fa nageng ka ntlha ya "ntwa e runtseng kwa nageng ya Ukraine”.

src_text: I-DWS isebentisana nesifundza kwenta tinyatselo tesikhatsi lesifishane, lesiphakatsi nalesidze kubukana nekunciphisa umtselela longaba khona wesomiso.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse tiro e dirilweng ke Yuniti ya go Lwantshana le Bonweenwee ya DHA akgotse le baagi mmogo le go ba rotloetsa gore ba se kgaotse go buletsa ditiragalo tsa mothale ono.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze futsi incusa base-NMB kutsi babambelele emigomeni yemanti lebekwe bomasipala bendzawo kuze kutsi kucinisekiswe kuvikeleka kwemanti.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tse di seng mo molaong tse di diriwang ke maAforika Borwa tsa go rekisa dintlha tsa bona tsa boitshupo di na le ditlamorago tse dikgolo tse di sa jeseng diwelang mo pabalesegong ya naga mmogo le mo maemong ikonomi le baagi.

src_text: Sekukonkhe, kusetjentiswa kwemanti kufanele kwehliswe ngemalitha latizigidzi leti-50 ngelilanga, kusukela ezingeni lamanje lemalitha latigidzi leti-280 ngelilanga kwehle kuye emalitheni latizigidzi leti-230 ngelilanga.
tgt_text: Puso ga kitla tlhaetsa matlho kana go tsaya letlhakore mme tla tswelela go tiisa seatla mo go samaganeng le mongwe le mongwe yo amegang mo ditiragalong tsa go tlola molao tse di nyatsang melao ya ka fa nageng ya bofaladi.

src_text: Bugebengu Nenkhohlakalo.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe gape le ke dikgato tsa go golega le go otla morutabana wa kwa Durban, Mme Precious Gabuza, yo nang le dingwaga di le 37, yo otlilweng ka go atlholwa ke Kgotlatshekelo ya Kgaolo ya Umlazi kwa porofenseng ya KwaZulu-Natal gore duelele molato wa gagwe ka go direla setšhaba sebaka sa dingwaga di le tharo mmogo le ka go tswalelwa kwa kgolegelong sebaka sa dingwaga di le nne, mme dikotlo tseno ka bobedi di tla ngotliwa ka dingwaga di le tharo mme kotlo eno ke ka ntlha ya gore tlotse Molao wa Ditlhopo tsa Baeteledipele mo Mebasepaleng ya Mebuso ya Selegae, wa ngwaga wa 2000 (Molao wa bo 27 wa 2000).

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kuboshwa kwakamuva kwesikhulu seLitiko Letasekhaya lesisebenta ehhovisi lase-Benoni ngekuniketa sakhamuti sase-Bangladeshi ipasipoti yemgugu.
tgt_text: Jaaka ditlhopho di ne di tshwaretswe mo sekolong seo neng dira mo go sona jaaka morutabana ka Diphalane 2021, Mme Gabuza ne amogela gore molato mo ditatofatsong tsa go dira ditlhopho makgetlo le 24 ka tsela e seng mo molaong, mme dirile ditlhopho makgetlo le 12 mo Ditlhophong tsa Masepala le makgetlo mangwe gape le 12 mo Ditlhophong tsa Diwate.

src_text: Sikhulu, Mk Sibongile Simelane, uniketwe ibheyili ye-R5 000 eNkantolo yaMantji yaseBenoni ngaLwesibili, mhla ti-21 iNhlaba.
tgt_text: Go golega le go otla mme yono ke bopaki jwa go bontsha gore Khomišene ya Ditlhopho ya Aforika Borwa tota ikemiseditse go samagana le ditiragalo tse di tswileng mo tseleng le go rwesa bao ba amegang maikarabelo ntle le go senya nako.

src_text: LowaseBangladeshi, uMnu Fahim Kazi, waboshwa ngesikhatsi atama kubaleka kuleli mhla ti-12 iNkhwekhweti 2022 ngaphansi kweligama lelitsi, 'Lebogang Ndlovu'.
tgt_text: Seno se bontsha gape le botlhokwa jwa tiriso ya thekenoloji ya go dira tlhopho, eo jaanong enngweng nokeng ke Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji tsa go Laola Ditlhopho tse di thibelang gore motho le mongwe kgone go ka dira ditlhopho makgetlo le mantsi go feta ka fao tshwanetseng.

src_text: Litiko Letasekhaya (i-DHA) lisandza kucosha umlingisi waseLithuania, Mk.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobadi ntlha ya gore ditlhopho di botlhokwa thata mo temokerasing ya naga ya rona mme go tshwanetswe go diriwe sengwe le sengwe go ka di sireletsa..  Khonferense ya bo 12 ya Ditona (MC12) ya Mokgatlo wa Dikgwebo tsa Lefatshe (WTO).

src_text: Ieva Andrejevaite, lobekafuna kuhlukumeta umbuso wekuphatsa babaleki eNingizimu Afrika lapho acambe indzaba yekufuna kufaka sicelo sekukhoseliswa ngenca “yemphi lese-Ukraine”.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tseo di tlhageletseng kwa MC12 ya WTO e neng tshwaretswe kwa Geneva, Switzerland go tloga ka la bo 12 go fitlha ka la bo 17 Seetebosigo 2022, segolobogolo tshwetso e tserweng ya gore dinaga tse di nang le matshwanedi di ka ikgatosa dithata tsa dikgwebo mme tsa itirela meento ya COVID-19 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyawuncoma umsebenti lowenziwa yi-DHA's Counter Corruption Unit.
tgt_text: Tshwetso ya gore ntlha eno tsenyeletse gape le melemo ya COVID-19 mmogo le didirisiwa tsa go tlhatlhoba fa molwetse na le yona ne ya busediwa morago ka sebaka sa dikgwedi di le thataro.

src_text: Ishayela lihlombe futsi ikhutsata bantfu nje baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bachubeke nekubika tento tebugebengu letinjengaleti.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go goga kwa pele dikgato tsa gore WTO beele kwa thoko dithata tsa dikgwebo fa go tla mo mererong ya meento ya COVID-19 e tla dirang bonnete jwa gore botlhe re nna le meento ka go lekana mmogo le go letla dinaga tse di nang le bokgoni jwa go itirela meento gore di tswelele go itirela ona.

src_text: Tento letingekho emtsetfweni tebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika labatsengisa bunjalo babo tinemiphumela lemibi kakhulu ekuvikeleni live kanye nesimo senhlalomnotfo yelive.
tgt_text: Mo kgonferenseng eno go dirilwe maikano gore go tla diragadiwa mo phasalatseng le ka go dira gore batho ba nne le seabe mo dithulaganyong tsotlhe tsa go fetola tiro ya yona mme go dumelanwe gore go tla samaganwa le ditumelano tsa go gwebisana tse di samaganang le dikarolo tse di jaaka ya boitekanelo, ya go tsenya tirisong dipeelo mo lephateng la go thusa ka matlole ba lephata la ditlhapi, ya go ntsha taolelo e tla laolelang lephata la dikgwebo tsa go rekisa ditirelo ka inthanete mmogo le la go netefatsa gore dijo ga di tlhokagale  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Hulumende utawuchubeka utawucinisa sandla kunome ngubani lobandzakanyeka etentweni letingekho emtsetfweni letibukela phansi imitsetfo yetfu yekufika kwebantu lababuya kulamanye mave, ngaphandle kokwesaba kumbe kukhetsa.
tgt_text: Kgatelopele e leng Teng mo Letsholong la Phetolelokgaso go ya go ya Dijithale (BDM).

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakwemukela kuboshwa nekugwetjwa kwakamuva kwathishela waseThekwini, Mk Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) - logwetjwe minyaka lemitsatfu yekucondzisa tigwegwe kanye neminyaka lemine abhadla ejele, lokulengiswe yonkhe iminyaka lemitsatfu, eNkantolo yesiFundza yaseMlazi KwaZulu- Natal – ngekwephula uMtsetfo Welukhetfo Lwabomasipala Bahulumende Wasekhaya uMtsetfo, wa-2000 (uMtsetfo Nombolo-27 wa-2000).
tgt_text: Kabinete beilwe mo dinakong ka letsholo la BDM mmogo le go nopola seo se setseng se dirilwe mo go tsenyetseng baagi mabokoswana marang kgaso jaaka tlhokega mo kgatong ya go tswa mo kgasong ya analoko fa re tsena mo kgasong ya dijithale.

src_text: Njengathishela kulesikolwa lebesisetjentiswa njengesikhungo sekuvota ngesikhatsi seLukhetfo laboMasipala ngeMphala 2021, Mk.
tgt_text: Kabinete gateletse botlhokwa jwa go garela ka bonako BDM jaaka seno se tla thusa gore tiriso ya marang kgaso kgone go abelana ka ditirelo tse di tlhokagalang mo megaleng ya seatla mmogo le mo didirisiweng tse dingwe gape tsa thekenoloji ya ditlhaeletsano le tshedimosetso..   Tona ya Didirisiwa tsa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano le ya Dijithale Khumbudzo Ntshavheni kamoso ka Labotlhano wa la bo 24 Seetebosigo 2022 tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang go neela setšhaba tshedimosetso nngwe ka botlalo.

src_text: Gabuza walivuma licala lekukhwabanisa emavoti lange-24, lahlanganisa la-12 eLukhetfo lwaboMasipala lokufaka nala-12 eLukhetfo lwemaWadi.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Naga e Gololwang Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya Maemo Semmuso Ditshwanelo tsa Bana.
Kabinete letleletse gore Pegelo ya bobedi ya Naga e Gololwang Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya Maemo Semmuso Ditshwanelo tsa Bana ka phasaladiwa.

src_text: Kuboshwa nekugwetjwa kugcizelela kutibophelela kweKhomishini yeluKhetfo yaseNingizimu Afrika, kungenelela kusenesikhatsi nekusebentisa kuphatfwa kwemiphumela.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno re baya mo dinakong ka seo se dirilweng mo Leanotirong la Naga mabapi le Bana (NPAC) mo pakeng ya go tloga mo ngwageng wa 2019 go fitlha mo go wa.

src_text: Loku kubufakazi lobucinile betinhlelo telukhetfo, leseticinisiwe kusukela kwetfulwa lithulusi Lekuphatsa Bavoti i-Voter Management Device lelivimbela kuvota kabili.
IKhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutsi lukhetfo lusisekelo sentsandvo yelinyenti yetfu futsi kufanele luvikelwe ngato tonkhe tindlela.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno nopola dilo tseo go atlegilweng mo go tsona go tloga mo ngwageng wa 2020 go fitlha mo go wa nopola gape le dikarolo tse di santseng di tlhoka go atlhaatlhwa, mmogo le pabalesego ya bana mmogo le tshokolo e tsweletseng go nna teng magareng ga bahumi le batho ba ba humanegileng bogolosegolo mo baneng.

src_text: Inkhomfa Yetindvuna (i-MC12) ye-12 yeNhlangano Yemhlaba Yekuhweba (i-WTO).
tgt_text: Pegelo eno gape bua le ka seabe se leroborobo la COVID-19 se nnileng le sona mo baneng mo pakeng eo..   Maitlhomo dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tsenngwang tirisong ke puso ke go dira gore bana ba fitlhelele ditshwanelo tsa bona, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyamukele imiphumela ye-WTO MC12 lebeyibanjelwe e-Geneva, e-Switzerland kusukela mhla ti-12 kuya mhla ti-17 kuNhlaba 2022, ikakhulukati sincumo sekutsi emave lafanelekile angaweca emalungelo ebunikati bemjovo we-COVID-19 kuze kube ngu-.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno gape di ema nokeng maikano naga ya rona a dirilweng mo Ditumelanong tsa Dinagakopano (UN) mabapi le Ditshwanelo tsa Bana (UNCRC) mmogo le mo Tumelanong ya Dinaga tsa Aforika mabapi le Ditshwanelo le Tlhokomelo ya Bana (ACRWC).

src_text: Sincumo sekutsi kululwe lokulashwa nekuhlolelwa i-COVID-19 kwabambeteleka tinyanga letisitfupha.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ke nngwe ya dinaga tse di saenileng UNCRC le ACRWC..   Pegelo eno kwadilwe go latela gore go batlisisiwe tshedimosetso e maleba mo mafapheng puso mmogo le mo maphateng mangwe mantsi a matshwanedi mo pusong ya naga le mo go dipusong tsa diporofense.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika beyisolo ihola lubito lwekutsi i-WTO ihocise emalungelo ekuvikelwa kwemphahla lecanjiwe lephatselene nemitsi yekugomela i-COVID-19 letawucinisekisa kufinyelela lokulinganako emitsini yekugoma futsi ivumele emave lanemakhono ekwenta imitsi yekugoma kutsi ayente.
tgt_text: Pegelo e feletseng tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Loago: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela iphindze yatibophelela eluhlelweni loluvulelekile nalolubandzakanya konkhe lokugucula yonkhe imisebenti yayo futsi yavumelana ngenhlanganisela yetivumelwano tekuhwebelana letibukene netindzawo letifana netemphilo, kubeka mincele ekusiteni ngekudoba lusito lwetimali, kumisa kuhweba nge-inthanethi kanye nekutfolakala kwekudla  Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Aforika Borwa e Isiwang kwa go UNCRC e ka ga Dipaka tse di Kopanngweng go Tloga mo go ya Boraro go Fitlha mo go ya Borataro.

src_text: Inchubekelembili lemayelana neLuhlelo Lwekutfutsela eKusakateni Ngedijithali (i-BDM).
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tlhagisa Pegelo ya Aforika Borwa e Isiwang kwa go UNCRC e ka ga Dipaka tse di Kopanngweng go Tloga mo go ya Boraro go Fitlha mo go ya Borataro.

src_text: IKhabhinethi itfole lwati lolusha ngeluHlelo lwe-BDM futsi yaphawula ngenchubekelembili leseyentiwe ngekufakwa kwemabhokisi elizinga lelisetulu njengencenye yekusuka ekusakateni nge-analogu kuya ekusakateni ngedijithali.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno latela e tlhagisitsweng kwa go UNCRC mo ngwageng wa..   Pegelo eno kwadilwe go ya ka molao wa athikele ya bo 44 ya UNCRC, mme samagana gape le ditshitshinyo tse di neng di dirilwe mo pegelong ya bofelo e rometsweng pele ga eno.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakugcizelela kuphutfuma kwekuphotfula i-BDM kukhulula emagagasi emoya ladzingekako ekusakata kabanti abomakhalekhikhini, kanye naletinye tinjongo letiphatselene nebuchwepheshe belwatiso netekuchumana.
tgt_text: UNCRC ne mo ngwageng wa 2016 ya romela ditshitshinyo tse naga tshwanetseng go di diragatsa.

src_text: Ngcongcoshe weTekuchumana Nebuchwepheshe Bedijithali Khumbudzo Ntshavheni utobamba umhlangano nebetindzaba kusasa (ngaLwesihlanu, mhla ti-24 kuNhlaba) kuze anikete imininingwane leyengetiwe.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno kwadilwe ka go sekegela tsebe tlhware logong nngwe le nngwe go tswa kwa mafapheng a maleba le kwa bannaleseabeng ba ba maleba mo nageng ka bophara.

src_text: Umbiko Wemnyaka Wavelonkhe Wesimo Semalungelo Ebantfwana.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno yotlhe tla re fa sena go isiwa kwa go UNCRC ya nna gona ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba iponele yona.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate uMbiko Wesibili Wemnyaka Wesimo Savelonkhe Semalungelo Ebantfwana latoshicilelwa.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Naga e Mabapi le go Tsenya Tirisong Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo.

src_text: Umbiko uniketa ngelwati lolusha mayelana nekucaliswa kwekusebenta kweluHlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwekusebenta Lwebantfwana esikhatsini sa-2019-.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula go isiwa ga pegelo ya ntlha ya naga ya Aforika Borwa ya Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo kwa Setheong sa go Agela Baagi Madulo sa Letsholo la UN (UN-Habitat).
UN-Habitat tsentse tirisong Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo mo nakong ya fa go ne go tshwerwe Khonferense ya go Aga Madulo a tla Nnelang Ruri mo Metseseteropong ka Diphalane.

src_text: Umbiko ugcamisa timphumelelo letirekhodiwe tesikhatsi sa-2020-.
tgt_text: Dinaga tseo leng leloko go solofetswe gore di ithaope ka go neelana ka dipegelo tse di bontshang kgatelopele.

src_text: Iphindze ivete tindzawo letisasele letiyinsayeya, lokuhlanganisa kuphepha kwebantfwana kanye nekungalingani lokuchubekako phakatsi kwalabaphuyile nalabanotsile macondzana nebantfwana.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ne ya ema nokeng Mogopolo Monšhwa wa Metseseteropo mme morago ga foo ya tsenya tirisong ka Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Golagantsweng le Tlhabololo ya Metseseteropong (IUDF).

src_text: Lombiko uphindze uvete kutsi bhubhane we-COVID-19 ube nemtselela kangakanani ebantfwaneni ngalesikhatsi.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo IUDF ke go aga mafelo bodulo mo metseseteropong batho botlhe ba ka nnnang mo go ona a tla nnelang ruri bile go le monate go nna mo go ona..   Pegelo e ka ga kgatelopele e dirilweng kwadilwe ka go sekegela tlhare legong go tswa mo pusong ya naga, mebusong ya diporofense le mo mebusong ya selegae mmogo le go tswa mo mekgatlhong e maleba e seng ya puso (di-NGO).

src_text: Tinyatselo tekungenelela leticaliswa nguhulumende kuhloswe ngato kuphumelelisa emalungelo ebantfwana, njengoba kuvetwe kuMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wa-.
tgt_text: Leano le le Kopanetsweng la Tlhabololo ya Bašwa.

src_text: Tiphindze tisekele tibopho telive eTingcungcutseleni te-UN Letihlangene ngeMalungelo Ebantfwana (i-UNCRC) kanye neMculu Wase-Afrika weMalungelo Nenhlalakahle Yebantfwana (i-ACRWC).
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula IYDS gore ka tsenngwa tirisong.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika isayine i-UNCRC kanye ne-ACRWC..  Umbiko uhlanganiswe ngekubonisana nematiko ahulumende kanye nembijana letsintsekako labafanelekile ezingeni lavelonkhe nelesifundza.
tgt_text: Leano leno le dira gore Pholisi ya Naga ya Merero ya Bašwa ya ngwaga wa 2020 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa 2030 nne le mosola tlhagisa dikgato, diporojeke mmogo le matsholotse ao tshwanetsweng go diragadiwa ke bannaleseabe ba ba farologaneng mo mekgatlhong ya bašwa thusa gape gore maphata puso a farologaneng se diragatse matsholo a tshwanang mmogo le go eletsa gore mekgatlho ya baagi le makala poraefete ke eng se ka se dirang go ema nokeng bašwa gore ba kgone go fitlhelela ditšhono.

src_text: Umbiko logcwele utofakwa kuwebhusayithi weLitiko Letekutfutfukiswa Kwemphakatsi: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Leano leno le kwadilwe ka go latela tshedimosetso ntsi e farologaneng go tswa mo makaleng a farologaneng mo setšhabeng.

src_text: Umbiko Wesikhatsi waseNingizimu Afrika Lohlanganisiwe wesitsatfu kuya kuwesitfupha ku-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe sa Masupatsela mo Mererong ya Tshomarelo le Tlhokomelo ya Lephata la Aforika Borwa la Tshomarelo le Tiriso ya Dimela le Ditshedi tse di Farologaneng go Tlhagisa Melemo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa kweMbiko weSikhatsi wesitsatfu kuya kuwesitfupha ku-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Sekwalwa sa Ntlha se se Santseng se Tlhoka gore se Sekasekwe sa Masupatsela mo Mererong ya Tshomarelo le Tlhokomelo ya Lephata la Aforika Borwa la Tshomarelo le Tiriso ya Dimela le Ditshedi tse di Farologaneng go Tlhagisa Melemo gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga sona.

src_text: Lombiko ulandzela Umbiko weSikhatsi wesibili lowetfulwa ku-UNCRC nga-..  Lombiko uhlanganiswe ngekulandzela Sihloko se-44 se-UNCRC, uphindze futsi ufake ekhatsi lokucasheliwe kanye netincomo talelive tanga-..  Lombiko wahlanganiswa ngekubonisana nawo onkhe ematiko lafanele kanye nalabatsintsekako eveni lonkhe.
tgt_text: Lephata la la Aforika Borwa la Tshomarelo le Tiriso ya Dimela le Ditshedi tse di Farologaneng go Tlhagisa Melemo le tlhagisa ditšhono tse di botlhokwa mo kgolong le tlhabololong ya ikonomi bile gape le botlhokwa thata mo ditsong tsa batho ka fao ba iphedisang ka gone..   Sekwalwa seno sa Masupatsela se dira gore ditshitshinyo tse di dirilweng ke Phanele ya Baitseanape ba ba Nang le Kitso e Tseneletseng mo ngwageng wa 2019 di tsenngwe tirisong ka go sekaseka dipholisi tsa rona tsa ga jaanong, melao ya rona mmogo le ditiro tse di tsamaisanang le ditshedi tse di botlhokwa..   Pegelo eno tshitshintse gore go kwadiwe pholisi e tlhokagalang e ka ga tshomarelo le tlhokomelo ya tiriso ya lephata la naga la tshomarelo le tiriso ya dimela le ditshedi tse di farologaneng go tlhagisa melemo.

src_text: Umbiko lophelele utawukwatiswa ummango nasewetfulwe ku-UNCRC.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tla tsenngwa tirisong mo maphateng otlhe puso.

src_text: Umbiko wavelonkhe lomayelana nekufezekisa Luhlelo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetindzawo Tasemadolobheni.
tgt_text: Tshomarelo ya tlhago botlhokwa mo go maswe mo matsholong naga ya rona go potlakisa kgolo ya ikonom le tlholo ya ditiro.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungeniswa kwembiko wavelonkhe wekucala waseNingizimu Afrika lomayelana nekufezekiswa kweLuhlelo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwetindzawo Tasemadolobheni kuLuhlelo Lwekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu laMhlabuhlangene (i-UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Leano la Lekala la Nama ya Diphologolo tsa Naga.

src_text: I-UN-Habitat yavuma leluHlelo layo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwemadolobha kuNkhomfa yayo lemayelana neteTindlu neNtfutfuko Lesimeme yaseMadolobheni ngeMphala.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasaladiwa ga sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa Leano la Lekala la Nama ya Diphologolo tsa Naga gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.

src_text: Emalunga emibuso bekalindzeleke kutsi angenise umbiko wenchubekelembili ngekungacindzetelwa.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo leano leno ke go dira gore intaseteri ya nama ya diphologolo tsa naga amogelwe semmuso mmogo le go godisiwa.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika yalusekela loLuhlelo Lolusha Lwekutfutfukiswa Kwemadolobha yaphindze futsi yalufezekisa ngekusebentisa Luhlakamsebenti Loluhlangene Lwekutfutfukisa Tindzawo Tasemadolobheni (i-IUDF).
tgt_text: Maitlhomo mangwe lona ke go dira gore re se tlhaele dijo.

src_text: I-IUDF ihlose kuhola embili ekutfutfukiseni kwawonkhe wonkhe, kuhlaliswa kwebantfu edolobheni lokucinile nalokuphilekako.
tgt_text: Bogolo jwa intaseteri ya nama ya diphologolo tsa naga ke kgwebo e sa kwadisiwang semmuso mme dira ka tsela e sa tlhamalalang.

src_text: Lombiko wenchubekelembili wahlanganiswa ngekubonisana nemikhakha yahulumende yavelonkhe yetifundza kanye neyendzawo, kanye nema-NGO lafanele..  Lisubuciko Lelihlanganisiwe Lekutfutfukiswa KweLusha (i-IYDS).
tgt_text: Leano le le tshitshintsweng leno le neelana ka leano le le ka dirisiwang go tsenya tirisong dikgato tsa go dira gore nne kgwebo ya semmuso le go matlafatsa lekala leno gore le nne le lengwe la a samaganang le merero ya go dira gore re nne le dijo tse di sa tlhaeleng mmogo le mo go godiseng ikonomi gore le kgone go tlhola ditiro   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kutsi kusetjentiswe i-IYDS.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero Yotlhe ya Magosi Setso wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Lendlelalisu ibangela kubakhona kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yelusha ya-2020-.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero Yotlhe ya Magosi Setso wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa.

src_text: Ichaza tento, imiklamo kanye netinhlelo lokumele tentiwe ngulabatsintsekako labehlukahlukene labavela etinhlanganisweni telusha.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go kwalola sešwa dikarolo tsa Molao wa Magosi Merafe ya go tloga ka ya maKhoi go fitlha ka ya maSan wa ngwaga wa, 2019 (Molao wa bo 03 wa 2019), yo tsentsweng tirisong ka la bo 01 Moranang.

src_text: Iphindze ibukane nekunciphisa kuphindzaphindza kwekungenelela kwahulumende futsi icondzise kutsi tinhlangano temmango kanye nemikhakha letimele tingabeseka njani bantfu labasha ekufinyeleleni ematfubeni.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Temokerasi e Nang le Molaotheo mo Diatleng tsa Digongwana tsa Menolopuso le Ditiragalo tsa Mothale o Ntseng Jalo wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Kugcogcwa kwalendlelalisu kubandzakanya imibono leyehlukene levela emikhakheni leyehlukahlukene yemmango.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Temokerasi e Nang le Molaotheo mo Diatleng tsa Digongwana tsa Menolopuso le Ditiragalo tsa Mothale o Ntseng Jalo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa gape ka matsetseleko.

src_text: Luhlaka LweMtsetfo Lohlongotwako lomayelana Nekongiwa Nekusetjentiswa Lokusimeme Kwetinhlobonhlobo Talokuphilako taseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Ka gang fa sena go letlelelwa gore nne molao, Molaotlhomo ono tla kwalola sešwa Molao yo dirisiwang ga jaanong wa Tshireletso ya Naga ya Temokerasi e Nang le Molaotheo mo Diatleng tsa Digongwana tsa Menolopuso le Ditiragalo tsa Mothale o Ntseng Jalo wa Ngwaga wa 2004, (Molao wa bo 33 wa 2004).

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate luhlaka lweMtsetfo Lohlongotwako lomayelana Nekongiwa Nekusetjentiswa Lokusimeme Kwetinhlobonhlobo Talokuphilako taseNingizimu Afrika kuze ummango uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono setse fetile mo dikgatong tse di matsetseleko tsa go batla maikutlo baagi go latela gore Kabinete ka Motsheganong 2021 letlelele go diragadiwa ga thulagnyo eno.

src_text: Tinhlobonhlobo talokuphilako taseNingizimu Afrika tiniketa sisekelo lesibalulekile sekukhula nekutfutfukiswa kwemnotfo, futsi tibalulekile etimphilweni tebantfu.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno tsa go kwalololwa sešwa maitlhomo tsona ke go lepalepanya melao ya ka fa nageng le ya lefatshe ka bophara ya go lwantshana le maiteko menolopuso jaaka go tsenngwa mo go ona dikgato tse di diragadiwang mo dinageng tsa boditšhaba.
Mo go ona go baakantswe gape le dikarolo tsa molao tse di neng di sa kwalega sentle go tsamaisana le Molaotheo jaaka Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo ne ya laela.

src_text: Umtsetfo Lohlongotwako unika emandla tincomo letentiwe Yiphaneli Yabochwepheshe Belizinga Lelisetulu lelikhetfwe nga-2019 kuze kutsi libuyekete tinchubomgomo tetfu letikhona, imitsetfo kanye nemihambo etindzabeni letiphatselene neluhlobolunye lwalokuphilako..  Lombiko uncome kutsi kutfutfukiswe inchubomgomo lebanti ngekongiwa nekusetjentiswa ngendlela lesimeme kwetinhlobonhlobo tetintfo letiphilako telive.
tgt_text: Jaaka le nngwe ya dinaga tse di saenileng melao ya Lekgotla la Pabalesego la Dinagakopano (UN), Aforika Borwa rwele maikarabelo go dira gore ka fa nageng go ikobelwa melao ya boditšhabatšhaba maitlhomo yona leng go gagamatsa dikgato tsa go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa menolopuso   Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo itosetjentiswa kuyo yonkhe imikhakha yahulumende.
tgt_text: Samiti ya bo 14 ya Dinaga tsa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Aforika Borwa (BRICS).

src_text: Konga kubalulekile emkhankhasweni welive wekukhulisa umnotfo masinyane kanye nekwakha ematfuba emisebenti.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla etelela kwa pele mo legatong la naga ya Aforika Borwa Samiti ya bo 14 ya Baeteledipele ba Dinaga tsa BRICS e tla bong tshwerwe ka Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano tsa Dibidio e tla Tshwarwang ke Naga ya Rephaboliki ya Batho ba China e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka Labone, 23 go fitlha ka Labotlhano, 24 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Lisubuciko Lenyama Yetinyamatane.
IKhabhinethi igunyate kushicilelwa kweluhlaka Lisubuciko Lenyama Yetinyamatane kuze kutsi ummango uphawule ngalo.
tgt_text: Go nneng tokololo ga rona mo go BRICS go tswelela go tswela naga ya rona mosola.

src_text: Indlelalisu icondze kwenta imboni yenyama yetinyamatane kutsi ibe semtsetfweni kanye nekuyintjintja.
tgt_text: Mo ngwageng yo fetileng dilwana tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa kwa ntle tse leng karolo ya BRICS tse di tswang ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa di ne di le kwa godimonyana ga 17% bile dilwana tse di kwa godimonyana ga 29% tse re di rekang kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle di ne di tswa mo go tsona dinaga tseno.

src_text: Futsi icondze kufaka sandla ekutfolakaleni kwekudla ngendlela lesimeme.
tgt_text: Boleng jwa dikgato tseno tsa go gwebisana bo tsweletse go gola, mo re bonang palo yotlhe ya go gwebisana ga Aforika Borwa le dinaga tsa BRICS tlhatloga go fitlha go Diranta di le Dibilione di le 702 mo ngwageng wa 2021 leng e oketsegileng go tloga mo Diranteng di le Dibilione di le 487 mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: Imboni yenyama yetinyamatane ngalokuvamile iyimboni lengekho emtsetfweni lesebenta ngendlela letincetu letehlukene.

Lendlelalisu lehlongotwako iniketa luhlelo lwekusebenta lolutoba semtsetfweni futsi lucinise lomkhakha njengaloniketa kutfolakala kwekudla kanye nekukhulisa umkhakha wetemnotfo longasita ekudaleni ematfuba emisebenti  Imitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Go dirisana mmogo le dinaga tse dingwe tsa BRICS mo maphateng tshwana le boitekanelo le go oketsa dikgato tsa go gwebisana go dirile gore diintaseteri tsa rona ka fa nageng di gole, mmogo le go unngwela dinaga tsotlhe tse leng tokololo ya BRICS.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Jikelele  Temdzabu wa-.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo dipeeletso tsa rona mo diporojekeng tsa tlhagiso ya mafaratlhatlha mmogo le maiteko rona go fedisa melao e kgoreletsang kgwebisano mo go sa tlhokagaleng ke go oketsa dilwana tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng tse di rekisediwang dinaga tse leng tokololo ya BRICS.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Jikelele Wetindzaba Tendzabuko wa-2022 ePhalamende kuze uchubeke ucutjungulwe.
tgt_text: Sekolo sa Mariga sa Merero ya Ikonomi mo Pusong.

src_text: Letichibiyelo ticondze kubuyeketa uMtsetfo Webuholi Bendzabuko kanye neMtsetfo weBuholi be-Khoi-San, wa-2019 (Umtsetfo Nombolo-3 wa-2019), locale kusebenta mhla ti-1 kuMabasa.
tgt_text: Go tloga ka la bo 27 Seetebosigo go fitlha ka la bo 01 Phukwi 2022 Sekolokatiso sa Puso ya Naga (NSG) se tla tshwarela kwa Johannesburg Letsholo la Sekolo sa Mariga sa Merero ya Ikonomi mo Pusong se se tla tsenelwang ke Batlhankedi ba Bagolo ba Dipolotiki.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tekuvikela Tikhungo Tentsandvo Yelinyenti Kumaphekulasikhuni Nemisebenti Lephatselene Naloko wanga-.
tgt_text: Go tla bo go na le Ditona go tswa kwa nageng ya Côte d'Ivoire; ya South Sudan le ya Aforika Borwa; mmogo le Bakaedikakaretso ba mafapha dipuso go tswa kwa Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana tla tsenelwa gape le ke dimeyara tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa, mmogo le ditokololo tsa dikomiti tsa dimeyara le tsa maloko khuduthamaga..   Batlhankedi ba bagolo ba dipolotiki go tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng go solofelwa gore ba tla neelana tshedimosetso le dikakanyo tse ba itemogetseng tsona ka ntlha ya maemo a farologaneng ba itemogelang ona letsatsi le lengwe le le lengwe mo tirong ya bona.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ivume kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tekuvikela Tikhungo Tentsandvo Yelinyenti Kumaphekulasikhuni Nemisebenti Lephatselene Naloko wanga-2022 kutsi uchubeke nekucutjungulwa.
tgt_text: NSG tlhomile letsholo leno la ngwaga le ngwaga ka ngwaga wa 2020 gore le tsenelwe ke batlhankedi ba khuduthamaga, mme dirile seno jaaka karolo ya maikano go ema nokeng puso gore kgone go tlhoma puso e dirang ka botswapelo.

src_text: Ungaze wemukelwe, loMtsetfosivivinyo utochibiyela uMtsetfosisekelo wanyalo WekuVikelwa kweNtsandvo Yelinyenti Lomelene Nebuphekulasikhuni Netento Letihlobene Naloko, wa-2004 (uMtsetfo Nombolo-33 wa-2004).
tgt_text: Gare ga dilo tse dingwe tse dintsi, maitlhomo letsholo leno ke tlhatlhelela batlhankedi ba bagolo mo maphateng otlhe mararo puso ka bokgoni jwa boeteledipele le jwa go ikemela mo maikarabelong bona gore ba kgone go mekamekana le dikgwetlho tsa puso tse di thibelang gore re nne le kgolo ya ikonomi e tla nnelang ruri batho botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go yona.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo ungene enchubeni lebanti yekubonisana nemmango ngemuva kwekutsi sewugunyatwe yiKhabhinethi ngeNkhwekhweti.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela.

src_text: Letichibelo tihlose kucondzanisa emathulusi elive lasekhaya ekulwa nebuphekulasikhuni netinyatselo temhlaba wonkhe lesetibekiwe.
tgt_text: Monongwaga Letsatsi la Boditšhabatšhaba la Nelson Mandela le tla ketekiwa ka Mosupologo, 18 Phukwi 2022 ka moono yo reng: “Gongwe le gongwe koo leng gone, dira sengwe le sengwe se ka se kgonang ka bonnye jo nang le bona”.

src_text: Baphindze bakhuluma ngetigatjana letitsatfwe njengaletingahambisani neMtsetfosisekelo yiNkantolo yeMtsetfosisekelo.
tgt_text: Jono ke boikuelo jo bo reng batho ba tshwanetse go ema nokeng le go nna le seabe mo letsholong leno ka go nna le seabe se se sa kgaotseng se se tla nnang le mosola wa go ya go ile nngwe ya dikao tseno tsa go nna le seabe se se sa kgaotseng ke Letsholo la ngwaga le ngwaga la Nelson Mandela le le ka ga Dipuisano tsa go Tlhabana Botlhale tsa Bašwa mo Mererong ya Boeteledipele jo bo Senang Dilabe le le samaganang le ditlhogo tse di botlhokwa thata mo bašweng ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mmogo le mo lefatsheng ka bophara.

src_text: Njengelive lelisayine neMkhandlu WeTekuphepha we-UN, iNingizimu Afrika ibophekile kutsi yente imitsetfo yemave ngemave njengenchubosintfu yayo lefuna kucinisa tinyatselo tekulwa nebuphekulasikhuni bemhlaba  Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: Paka ya Lekgetho.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela ye-14 yeBrazil, Russia, India, China neNingizimu Afrika (i-BRICS).
tgt_text: Paka ya Lekgetho ya mo ngwageng wa 2022 tla bula ka la bo 01 Phukwi mme ya tswalela ka la bo 24 Diphalane.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawuhola litsimba lekutimbandzakanya kweNingizimu Afrika eNgcungcutseleni lebanjwe ngemhlangano wevidiyo we-inthanethi Ye-14 Yebaholi be-BRICS lesingatfwe yiRiphabhliki yeBantfu baseShayina kusukela ngaLesine, mhla ti-23 kuya kuLesihlanu, mhla tinge-24 Inhlaba.
tgt_text: Baduelalekgetho ba rotloediwa go tsenya ditlankana tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka inthanete mo go www.sarsefiling.co.za kgotsa ba di tsenye ka mogala wa seatla mo epeng ya Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS)..   Monongwaga SARS tla tswelela go dirisa lenaneo le le tlhatlhobang baduelalekgetho ka go ba tlaletsa dintlha tsa bone tsotlhe tsa lekgetho gore thulaganyo ya lekgetho se ba tlhakatlhakanye tlhogo.
Mo ngwageng yo fetileng wa 2021 thulaganyo eno dirisitswe go tlhatlhoba baduelalekgetho ba feta dimilione di le tharo.

src_text: Kuba lilunga kwetfu ku-BRICS kuyachubeka nekwenta live libe nenzuzo.
tgt_text: Go tsenngwa ka nako ditokomane tsa lekgetho ga go thuse fela baduelalekgetho gore ba kgone go obamela molao wa tuelo ya lekgetho, gape go thusa puso gore kgone go diragatsa ditirelo tse maAforika Borwa di tlhokang tota   Melaetsa.

src_text: Kulomnyaka lophelile ingetulu kwa-17% imikhicito letfunyelwe kulamanye emave laku-BRICS, futsi ngetulu kwe-29% kwalokungenako kuvela kulawo mave.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Moatlhodi Owen Lloyd Rogers go latela gore thapiwe go nna Moatlhodi mo Kgotlatshekelong ya Molaotheo ya Aforika Borwa.Kabinete le yona eme ka lefoko la ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa mo go eletseng Moporesitente wa mo malobeng Thabo Mbeki Letsatsi la Matsalo le le tletseng ka Boitumelo fa tshwara dingwaga di le 80, le le ketikileng ka la bo 18 Seetebosigo.

src_text: Lelinani lalokuhweba liyachubeka nekukhula, nekuhwebelana nalamanye emave e-BRICS kufika kutigidzigidzi leti-R702 nga-2021, likhuphuke lasuka kutigidzigidzi leti-R487 nga-..     Kusebentisana phakatsi kwemalungu e-BRICS emikhakheni leyehlukene njengetemphilo neluhwebo lolutfutfukisiwe kuyikhulisile imboni yetfu yasekhaya, futsi kwazuzisa onkhe emalunga e-BRICS.
tgt_text: Rre Mbeki ne na le ponelopele ntle e itumedisang fa go tla mo maAforika Borweng otlhe   Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.Bakaedi bao Seng ba Khuduthamaga mo Botong ya Merero ya Difofane tsa Aforika Borwa:Rre Ernest Khosa;Mme Bulelwa Koyana;Rre Surendra Sooklal; leMme Rejoice Edith Phewa..     Ditokololo tsa Kantoro ya Setheo sa Merero ya go Abelana ka Tshedimosetso ya Dikoloto tsa Madi go Reka Dintlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Monnasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Rre Errol Vincent Magerman  Moatefokate Mandla Dludlu  Rre Matsobane Gabriel Mello   Mme Palesa Mawasha   Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton   Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga   Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.

src_text: Takamuva mayelana neLigciwane leSifo seKhorona (i-COVID-19).
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso ka Bolwetsi jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi income bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika labakhetsa kugoma kanye nekutfobela tonkhe tindlelanchubo te-COVID-19 lokwente kutsi lelive likhone kuvikela kukhula kwemanani lamasha ekwesuleleka ngesikhatsi sekucubuka kwesihlanu kwalolubhubhane..     Nanoma kunjalo, asikafaneli kukhibika ngoba phela i-COVID-19 isesekhona emkhatsini wetfu.
tgt_text: Kabinete akgotse batho botlhe ba Aforika Borwa ba ba tlhophileng go enta le go obamela diporotokholo tsotlhe tsa COVID-19 leng se se bakileng gore naga efoge dipalo tse di tlhatlhogang tsa dikgetse tse dintšhwa ka nako ya lekhubu la botlhano la leroborobo..     Fela, ga re tshwanela go itebala gonne COVID-19 sa ntse le teng.

src_text: Nanoma-nje lelive lisandza kuvala kugcokwa kwetifonyo ngalokuphocelelekile etindzaweni temmango, bantfu labanetifo letibomahlalakhona kanye nalabo labagulako bakhutsatwa kutsi bachubeke nekugcoka tifonyo.
tgt_text: Le fa naga sa tswa go phimola melawana e neng saletse ya go apara dimaseke fa re le fa gare ga batho, batho ba ba nang le malwetse mangwe a sa alafegeng le ba ba lwalang ba rotloediwa go tswelela go apara dimaseke.

src_text: Sifanele futsi sichubeke nekugeza noma-ke sigeze tandla tetfu ngesibulalamagciwane, siphindze futsi sitfobele umtsetfo wekukhweshelana nekungenisa umoya.
tgt_text: Re tshwanetse gape go tswelela go tlhapa diatla gongwe go dirisa sebolayaditwatsi, le go katogana le go dira gore mafelo re leng mo go ona tlhabiwe ke phefo..     Moento go ya ka bopaki jwa saense santse le ona o gaisang mo go re sireletseng mo bolwetseng jwa COVID-19 mme Kabinete rotloetsa batho botlhe ba ba sa entiwang gore ba se senye nako mme ba ye go enta mme ba ba entilweng bone ba ye go tlhabela moento wa go tsosolosa ba tlhabileng kwa lefelong le le gaufi nabo la go tlhabela moento ntle le go duelela tirelo eo..     Monkeypox.

Kabinete reboletswe tshedimosetso e mabapi le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox ya gore ka fa nageng go setse go fitlhetswe batho ba le babedi ba ba nang le bolwetsi jwa Monkeypox mo nageng go latela gore fa gautshwane go fitlhelwe motho wa bobedi.

src_text: Kugoma kuyachubeka nekuba yindlela yekutivikela  ku-COVID-19 lecinisekiswe ngekwesayensi futsi Ikhabhinethi ikhutsata bonkhe bantfu labangakagonywa kutsi bangacitsi sikhatsi bagome bese kutsi bantfu labagonyiwe bahambe bayotfola ticinisamgomo tabo etindzaweni tekugoma letidvute nabo..     Incubulunjwane yetingobiyane.
tgt_text: Batho bano ba itlhaotse mo setšhabeng mme ba kwa magaeng bona mme go samaganwe le dithulaganyo tsa go gata motlhala batho bao ba ka tswang ba kopane le batho bano go lekola gore ga ba tshwaetsega..     Lefapha la Boitekanelo le Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Malwetse a Tshelanwang ba dirisana le Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Boitekanelo go sekaseka matshosetsi go tshelana ka bolwetse jono ka fa nageng gore tsamaisane le Melawana ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Boitekanelo..     Mogare wa monkeypox ga tshelane bonolo mme gantsi tshelana fa batho ba ka tshwarana go tshwana le go sunana, go tlampurelana gongwe go kgoma dikarolo tsa mmele tse di nang le dintho tsa monkeypox.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yatisiwe ngetakamuva mayelana nekubhebhetseka kwesifo  Incubulunjwane yetingobiyane kulelive ngemuva kwekucinisekiswa kwesehlakalo sesibili kulelive.
tgt_text: Batho ba ba se nang matshwao monkeypox ba ka se ke ba tshela batho ba bangwe ka mogare ono..     Kabinete eletsa batho ba ba itemogelang matshwao letshoroma, matshwao a tshwanang le mokgotlhwane a latelwang ke boswata jo bo nang le metsi go ya kwa maokelong a gaufi gore ba bone thuso le kalafi ka bonako.

src_text: Labantfu labatsintsekako basemakhaya abo bakhweshisiwe kulabanye futsi kwamanje kulandzelelwa labo lekungenteka kutsi besulelekile..     Litiko Letemphilo kanye neSikhungo Savelonkhe Setifo Letitsatselwanako basebentisana neNhlangano Yetemphilo Yemhlaba wonkhe kuhlola bungoti bekwesuleleka endzaweni ngekuhambisana neMitsetfomgomo Yetemphilo Yemave Emhlaba.
