tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo thabene ya East London.

src_text: Ligciwane lencubulunjwane yetingobiyane alibhebhetseki kalula futsi ngalokuvamile livela kuphela ngemuva kwekusondzelana lokufana nekucabuzana, kugonana noma kutsintsa tincenye temtimba letinaleligciwane lencubulunjwane yetingobiyane.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo kwa Thabeneng ya Enyobeni kwa East London kwa Kapa Botlhaba ka Latshipi, 26 Seetebosigo 2022 a tsereng matshelo bašwa ba le 21 hutsafaditse naga yotlhe.

src_text: Bantfu labete timphawu tencubulunjwane yetingobiyane abakwati kusabalalisa leligciwane kulabanye..     Ikhabhinethi yeluleke bantfu labanetimphawu temfiva (umkhuhlane), timphawu temkhuhlane lowetayelekile, lolandzela libhamuta sengatsi ucubukile kutsi babikele tikhungo tetemphilo letidvutane kute kutsi lesifo sitfolakale kusenesikhatsi nekutsi sisheshe selashwe..     Inhlekelele yaseMonti.
tgt_text: Ga go bonolo go akanya ka manyaapelo malapa a latlhegetsweng ke bana ka tsela e botlhoko jalo..     Kabinete rometse matshediso go malapa a latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa mme ya leboga botlhe ka tshegetso ya setho e neilweng malapa a mo khutsafalong ka nako eno e boima..     Ke selo se se re tshwenyang gore bana ba bonnye jwa dingwaga tse 13 ba ne ba letleletswe go tsena mo lefelong leo gore ba tle go nwa notagi.

src_text: Inhlekelele leyenteke eThaveni Enyobeni eMonti eMpumalanga Kapa ngeLisontfo, mhla tinge-26 ngeNhlaba 2022 leyendlule nemiphefumulo yelusha lenge-21, iphazamise live lakitsi lonkhe.
tgt_text: Re ikuela mo baaging botlhe go nna le seabe ka go dira gore bana ba rona ba babalesege ka dinako tsotlhe..     Bana ba ba nang le dingwaga tse di ka fa tlase ga di le 18 ga ba letlelelwa go tsena mo dithabeneng, dišabining, dibareng le kwa marekisetsong bojalwa.

src_text: Kumatima kucabanga lusizi lwemindeni leshonelwe bantfwana ngendlela lebuhlungu kangaka.
tgt_text: Barekisi ba nnotagi ba ba fitlhelwang ba tlola melao eno ba tla latofadiwa ka bosenyi mme ba tseelwa dilaesense tsa bona tsa go rekisa notagi..

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kudzabuka kwayo emindenini lelahlekelwe tihlobo tayo futsi ibonge wonkhe umuntfu ngekusekela kwabo imindeni leshonelwe ngalesikhatsi lesintima.
tgt_text: Se se Tswileng mo Samiting ya Setlhopha sa Baeteledipele ba Dinaga tse Supa (G7).

src_text: Kuyintfo lekhatsatana kakhulu kutsi bantfwana labancane labaneminyaka le-13 budzala bavunyelwe kungena endzaweni baphindze futsi banatse tjwala.
tgt_text: Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa nnile le seabe kwa Samiting ya Baeteledipele ba G7 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Bavaria, Jeremane ka Mosupologo, 27 Sedimonthole.

src_text: Sicela imimango kutsi idlale indzima yayo ekugcineni bantfwabetfu baphephile ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi..     Bantfwana labaneminyaka lengaphasi kwe-18 abakavunyelwa kungena emathaveni, emashibhini, emaphabhu nasetitolo tetjwala.
tgt_text: Moporesidente – yo nnileng le seabe mo dikopanong tse mo go tsona go buisanweng ka merero ya tlelaemete, motlakase, boitekanelo, go nna teng ga dijo mo lefatsheng le merero ya tekatekano ya bong – ne laleditswe ke moamogelabaeng, Motšhanselara Olaf Scholz..     G7 ke foramo ya sepolotiki ya dipuso e gogwang kwa pele ke naga ya Canada, Fora, Jeremane, Itali, Japane, Borithane le Amerika     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Batsengisi betjwala labatfolakala bephula noma yimiphi yalemitsetfo kumele babekwe emacala baphindze futsi bemukwe netincwadzi tabo tekusebenta.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Melao ya Lephata la Molao (LSC).
Kabinete letleletse gore LSC ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona.

src_text: Imiphumela Yengcungcutsela yeLicembu Lemave Lasikhombisa (i-G7).
tgt_text: Maikemisetso melawana eno ke go bebofatsa diphetogo mo lephateng la molao go dira gore ditheo tsa molao di nne le kemedi go ya ka sebopego sa baagi ka fa nageng.

src_text: Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa wahlanganyela kuNgcungcutsela yeBaholi be-G7 lebeyibanjelwe eBavaria, eJalimane ngeMsombuluko, mhla tinge-27 ngeNhlaba.
tgt_text: Molao ono tla netefatsa gape le gore go dirwa setheo se se tla tlhagisang batlamedi ba ditirelo tsa molao ba ba katisitsweng go utlwagala le ba ba itseng tiro ya bona ka botlalo.

src_text: Mengameli – lowahlanganyela etingcocweni tekusebenta lapho khona  bekudzingidvwa tesimo selitulu, emandla agezi, temphilo, kutfolakala kwekudla emhlabeni wonkhe kanye netindzaba tekulingana ngekwebulili – bekamenye ngumngenisi (sokhaya), Shansela Olaf Scholz..     I-G7 iyinkhundla yetepolitiki lefaka ekhatsi iCanada, iFrance, iGermany, i-Italy, iJapan, ne-United Kingdom kanye ne-United States     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Letsholo la go kwadiwa ga LSC le ne le okametswe ke Lekgotla la Tiro ya Molao, setheo sa semolao se se tlhamilweng go ya ka Karolo ya bo 4 ya Molao wa Tiro ya Molao, wa ngwaga wa 2014 (Molao wa bo 28 wa 2014) mmogo le go kaelwa ke Molao wa Matlafatso ya Maemo Ikonomi Bathobatsho (B-BBEE), wa ngwaga wa 2013 (Molao wa bo 46 wa 2013).

src_text: Luhlaka Lwemitsetfotimiso Yemkhakha Wetemtsetfo (Luhlaka Lwe-LSC).
tgt_text: Molao wa B-BBEE wa 2013 rwesa Tona ya Kgwebisano, Indaseteri le Kgaisano maikarabelo go kwala melao ya tiro e tswileng diatla mo go diragatseng matlafatso ya maemo ikonomi mo bathobantshong mo maphateng a rileng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kweLuhlaka Lwe-LSC kute kutsi sive siphawule ngalo.
tgt_text: Ga jaana ditokololo tsa porofešene ya molao ga di na molao o di kaelang mo go samaganeng le go tlhoka tekatekano mo porofešeneng ya molao.

src_text: Tinjongo talemitsetfotimiso kuchuba tingucuko temkhakha wetemtsetfo kute kutsi kube nekumelelwa ngekuya kwetinhlobonhlobo tebantfu balelive.
tgt_text: LSC tla phatlaladiwa mo Kaseteng ya Puso matsatsi le 60 go letla gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka go sona..     Dipegelo tse di Rebolwang Gabedi mo Ngwageng tsa Kgatelopele ya Tiro e Dirilweng.

src_text: Lemitsetfotimiso itawuphindze futsi icinisekise kwakhiwa kwemtimba lotawukhicita batfulitinsita betemtsetfo labaceceshwe ngalokufanele nalabawatiko umsebenti wabo.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dipegelo tse di rebolwang gabedi mo ngwageng tsa kgatelopele ya tiro e dirilweng tsa paka e akaretsang Diphalane 2021 go fitlha Mopitlwe.

src_text: Kwakhiwa kwaloLuhlaka Lwe-LSC bekwenganyelwe nguMkhandlu Webasebenti Betemtsetfo, umtimba wetemtsetfo lowasungulwa ngekwemibandzela yeSigaba se-4 seMtsetfo Wekusebenta Kwetemtsetfo, 2014 (Umtsetfo we-28 wanga-2014) futsi bowukhonjwindlela nguMtsetfo Wekuhlomisa Ngemandla Emnotfo Umkhakha Lobanti Webantfu Labamnyama (i-B-BBEE), 2013 (Umtsetfo 46 wanga-2013).
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno ke karolo ya Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya Pakagare (MSTF) 2019-.

src_text: Umtsetfo we-B-BBEE wanga-2013 unika Indvuna yeTekuhwebelana, Timboni Nemncintiswano kutsi ikhiphe imitsetfotimiso yekusebenta ngalokufanele  kutekuhlonyiswa kwalabamnyama ngemnotfo emikhakheni-ngco letsite.
tgt_text: MTSF 2019-2024 ke leano la go diragatsa tiro bile gape le disa leano la go tsamaisa tiro ya go dira gore re diragatse Leano la Tlhabololo ya Naga leng Ponelopele ya 2030 e ka ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di tshwanetseng go fitlhelelwa mo pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro.

src_text: Emalunga etebungcweti betemtsetfo kwamanje ete umtsetfosimiso wemkhakha lobakhombindlela ekulungiseni kungalingani nekungasimami lokukhona kutebungcweti betemtsetfo.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno di bua ka dikarolo tse di botlhokwa di le supa tsa puso leng (1) Phetogo ya ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro; (2) Thuto, bokgoni le boitekanelo; (3) Go tiisa megolo ya go thusa baagi ka ditirelo tsa motheo tse di ikanyegang le tsa boleng; (4) Kgolaganyo ya dibaka, bonno le pusoselegae; (5) Go nna seoposengwe le go babalela baagi; (6) Mmuso o nang le bokgoni o nang le maitsholo a siameng le o tlisang tlhabologo; le (7) Aforika o botoka le lefatshe le le botoka, gammogo le dikgato tsa go tlisa tharabololo tse di tshwanang le tse di tlhalositsweng tsa pusong e busang ga jaanong ya borataro..     Kabinete itumedisitswe ke kgatelopele e dirilweng mo dintlheng tse di neng di beilweng tsa paka e sekasekwang.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwe-LSC lutawushicilelwa kuGazethi yahulumende emalanga lange-60 kute kutsi sive sitfole sikhatsi sekuphawula..     Imibiko yenchubekelembili yekusebenta leyetfulwa kabili ngemnyaka.
tgt_text: Kabinete gape nopotse le dintlha tse go santseng go saletswe morago mo go tsona ka ntlha ya leroborobo la COVID-19 tse go tlhokwang gore go samaganwe le tsona..     Ditona di tla tshwara dikopano le bobegakgang mo dibekeng tse di tlang go tlhalosa ka botlalo se dipegelo tseno di buang ka sona mmogo le go neelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga dintlha tse di santseng di tlhoka go gagamadiwa     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyivumile imibiko yenchubekelembili yekusebenta leyetfulwa kabili yangeMphala 2021 kuya kuNdlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Khonferense ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle (BIEC).

src_text: Lemibiko yenta incenye yeLuhlakamsebenti Lwelisubuciko Lwethemu Lesemkhatsini (lwe-MTSF) 2019-.
tgt_text: BIEC ya ntlha tla tshwarelwa kwa Tikwatikweng ya Boditšhabatšhaba ya Dikhonferense ya Sandton kwa Johannesburg ka Laboraro, 20 Phukwi.

src_text: Le-MTSF 2019-2024 luhlelo lwekuphumelelisa kanye neluhlakamsebenti lwekulandzelela lwekuzuza Luhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Lwavelonkhe: Bomabekwembili beMbononchanti 2030 belulawulo lwahulumende lwesitfupha.

Lemibiko igcile kubomabekwembili bahulumende labasikhombisa, lekungulaba (1) Kugucula temnotfo nekwakha imisebenti; (2) Temfundvo, emakhono netemphilo; (3) Kuhlanganiswa kwemholombasha wetenhlalo ngekusebentisa tinsita letetsembekile naletisezingeni lelingulonalona; (4) Kuhlanganiswa kwendzawo, kuhlaliswa kwebantfu nahulumende wasekhaya; (5) Lubumbano lwetenhlalo nemimango lephephile; (6) umbuso lokhonako, lonesimilo nalotfutfukisako; kanye (7) ne-Afrika lencono kanye nemhlaba, kanye netingenelelo letiphatselene naloko telulawulo lwesitfupha..     Ikhabhinethi itemukele tindzawo letisadzinga inchubekelembili kulemigomo lencunyiwe yesikhatsi lesibuyeketwako.
tgt_text: Khonferense eno tshwarwa morago ga gore puso ngwaga ono sa le gale thankgolole Lephata la Kemonokeng ya Bathobantsho ba Leng Beng ba Diintaseteri le Beng ba Dikgwebo tse di Gwebang le Dinaga tsa kwa Ntle, le maitlhomo lona leng go tshegetsa beng ba diintaseteri ba bathobantsho gore ba kgone go rekisetsa mebaraka mentšhwa, le go thusiwa ka ditšhelete tsa dikgwebo tse di gwebang le dinaga tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go thusiwa le ka dirala tsa go bapatsa dikgwebo tsa bona     Molaetsa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yabona tindzawo letidzinga lungenelelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kubambeleleka, leto letatfola umtselela lomubi impela wekubakhona kwelubhubhane i-COVID-.
tgt_text: DikakgoloKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: Springboks, ka phenyo e gapileng maikutlo ya motsotso wa bofelo kgatlhanong le Wales ka nako ya motshameko wa ntlha wa meraro ya teko kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Loftus Versveld kwa Tshwane ka Lamatlhatso, 2 Phukwi.

Banyana Banyana, ka phenyo ya bona ya dino di le pedi go le nngwe mo motshamekong wa bona wa pulo ya metshameko ya Sejana sa Metshameko ya Kgwele ya Dinao ya Basadi sa Dinaga tsa Aforika kgatlhanong le Nigeria e tshwaretsweng kwa nageng ya Morocco, ka Mosupologo, 4 Phukwi     Go Thapiwa    Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang..     Ngaka Nyameko Barney Pityana jaaka Modulasetilo wa Khomišene ya Bosetšhaba ya Dilothari..     Moatefokate Rory Voller jaaka Mokhomišinara wa khomišene ya Dithoto le Dithata tsa Ditlamo (CIPC).

src_text: Temandla.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokungenelela lokwentiwe nguhulumende lokutawubukana nalenhlekelele yagezi walelive.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke puso go samagana le mathata motlakase naga.

src_text: Letinyatselo letibanti titawuvula indlela letawucedza loluhlelo lwekucishwa kwagezi ngenhloso yekuwonga, titawugucula lomkhakha wetegezi futsi titawenta kutsi kuphumelele loluhlelo lwesikhatsi lesidze lwekutfolakala kwagezi.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno tsa botlhokwa di tlhagola tsela ya go fokotsa go kgaolwa ga motlakase, go fetola lephata la motlakase le go dira gore setlwaedi sa go tlhaela motlakase nne selo sa mo malobeng.

src_text: Kute sisekele legridi yagezi nekusita live lakitsi kulokucindzeteleka kwekuphakela kwagezi, kufuneka sinciphise kusebentisa gezi wesive sakitsi ngema-megawatts la-600 kuletinyanga letitako letintsatfu.
tgt_text: Go tshegetsa mafaratlhatlha motlakase le go thusa naga ya rona gore se imelwe ke tlamelo ya motlakase, re tlhoka go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase ya setšhaba ka dimekawate di le 600 mo dikgweding di le tharo tse di tlang..   Malapa ka nna le seabe mo go somareleng motlakase ka go tima mabone a sa dirisiweng le didiriswa tsa motlakase tse di jang motlakase montsi ka dinako tse motlakase dirisiwang ka bontsi.

src_text: Imindeni nayo ingadlala yayo indzima yekonga gezi ngekucisha onkhe emalambu langakabaluleki kanye netintfo tagezi letisebentisa gezi lomnengi ngetikhatsi gezi lasetjentiswa kakhulu ngato.
tgt_text: Dikgwebo di rotloediwa go dirisa thekenoloji e sa diriseng motlakase montsi mo ditirong tsa tsona tsa tlhagiso mmogo le go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tsa go fokotsa tiriso ya motlakase..   Operation Vulindlela.

src_text: Emabhizinisi ayagcugcutelwa kutsi alandzelele bucwepheshe lobunendlela lekahle kakhulu yekukhicita gezi nekutsi afake sandla kumitamo yekunciphisa kusetjentiswa kakhulu kwagezi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse kgatelopele e dirilweng ka fa tlase ga Operation Vulindlela ya go tlosa dikgoreletsi mo maphateng motlakase mafaratlhatlha ditlhaeletsano, le metsi le bojanala mo go tsosolosenga ikonomi.
Go fitlheletswe diphetogo tsa ikonomi di le robongwe go tswa mo go di le 26, mme mo diphetogong di le 11 go na le kgatelopele e namatshang.

src_text: I-Operation Vulindlela.
tgt_text: Dikatlego di akaretsa go oketsa palo ya dilaesense tsa tlhagiso e golaganeng le phatlalatso, go fetolelwa ga Bothati jwa Maemelakepe Bosetšhaba Transnet go nna setlamo se se ikemetseng, go gololwa ga lenane le le sekasekilweng la dikgono tsa botlhokwa le tsenyotirisong ya tsamaiso ya e-Visa mo dinageng di le 14, go akarediwa mebaraka megolo mentšhwa ya bajanala tshwana le China, India, Kenya le Nigeria..   Go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Batho ba Bomme (GBVF).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela loko losekwentiwe ngaphasi kwaloluhlelo lwe-Operation Vulindlela lekucedza kusalela emuva kwemsebenti kulemikhakha yetegezi, yetekuchumana, neyetemanti netekuvakasha kute kuvuselelwe umnotfo..   Tiyimfica kuleti-26 tindlela tekuvuselela umnotfo lekuphunyelelwe kuto, leti-11 tikhomba inchubekela embili lenhle.
tgt_text: Kabinete gagamaditswe tota ke ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tsa mo malobeng tsa go betelelwa ga basadi ba le robedi kwa Krugersdorp, kwa Gauteng.

src_text: Leti lekuphunyelelwe kuto tifaka ekhatsi kukhulisa umkhawulo lobekiwe wekukhishwa kwemalayisensi ekukhicita gezi, kugucula nekuhlela kabusha Luphiko Lwavelonkhe Lwemacweba aka-Transnet, kukhishwa kweluhlu lolusha lwemakhono labucayi  nekusebentisa luhlelo lwe-e-Visa emaveni la-14, lafaka ekhatsi timakethe letinsha tetekuvakasha letifana neChina, i-India, iKenya neNigeria.
tgt_text: Ditiragatso tseno tse di bosula le tsa go bogisa batho ba bomme di nyatsa botho ba rona.

Kabinete akgotse gape le Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa ka go tshwara ka bonako babelaelwa ba le mmalwa malebana le tiragalo eno e setlhogo..     Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dirisana le sepodisi ka go ba loma tsebe gongwe go ba begela ka ditiragalo tse di belaetsang.

src_text: Budlova lobubhekiswe Kubulili lobutsite Nekubulawa kwalabasikati (i-GBVF).
tgt_text: Fa re dira mmogo, re ka dira gore mo metseng re tswang kwa go yona basadi le bana ba rona ba nne ba babalesegile..     MoAforika Borwa mongwe le mongwe na le maikarabelo go tsaya dikgato tsa molao kgatlhanong le ditlhokotsebe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka kakhulu ngalokudlengulwa lokusandza kwenteka kulabasikati eKrugersdorp, eGauteng.
tgt_text: Bega ditiragalo tsotlhe tse di amanang le GBVF kwa seteišeneng sa mapodisi sa kgaolo o nnang kwa go yona gongwe letsetse nomoro ya mahala ya Crime Stop: mo go 08600 10111, gongwe letsetse Tikwatikwe ya Bosetšhaba ya go Lwantshana le GBVF: mog go 0800 428 428 gongwe letsetse Mogala wa Thuso ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa ga Batho ba Bomme: mo go 0800 150. .

src_text: Letento letimbi nekuhlukunyetwa kwalabasikati tibukela phasi indlela lesiphilisana ngayo.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yancoma kakhulu Tembutfo Wetemisebenti Yetemaphoyisa AseNingizimu Afrika ngalokushesha abophe linani lelitsite lebasolwa labatsintsekako kulelicala lelisabekako.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Basadi ya ngwaga le ngwaga ka Phatwe tlotla basadi ba ba nnileng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya kgololesego le basadi botlhe mo setšhabeng sa rona..   Kgwedi ya Basadi monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Ditshwanelo le Maatlafatso ya Basadi mo Ikonoming le mo Setšhabeng: Re aga Botoka go Tokafatsa go Tsosologa ga Basadi”..   Basadi ba feta 20 000 ba ba gwantetseng kwa Union Buildings kwa Pretoria ka la bo 9 Phatwe 1956 ba akgetse mo go netefatseng gore tekatekano ya bong le maatlafatso di tswelela go nna ditlapele tse botlhokwa mo Aforika Borweng wa temokerasi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela imimango kutsi isebentisane nema-ejensi etemtsetfo ngekutsi yabelane nganoma ngiluphi lwatiso noma ngekubika imikhuba lesolekekayo.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa bona tsa bopelokgale di rotloeditse basadi ka kakaretso go tsaya manno a ba siametseng mo Palamenteng, mo pusong le mo setšhabeng, mme re tswelela go agelela mo ditswelelopeleng tseno fa sale re bona kgololesego ka.

src_text: Ngekusebentisana, singenta kutsi imimango yakitsi ibe ngulephephile ebantfwaneni nakulabasikati..   Wonkhe umuntfu waseNingizimu Afrika unemsebenti wekulwa nalabo lababhebhetselisa budlova ngendlela lelandzela umtsetfo.
tgt_text: Segopotso sa Marikana.

src_text: Bika ngato tonkhe tigameko letimayelana ne-GBVF esiteshini semaphoyisa sangakini noma ushayele lenombolo yamahhala Yekulwa Nebugebengu letsi: 0860 01 0111, kuSikhungo Savelonkhe Semiyalo nge-GBVF letsi: 0800 428 428 noma Inombolo Yekulwa Nebudlova Betebulili letsi: 0800 150. .
tgt_text: Ka Labobedi, 16 Phatwe 2022, puso tshwaragane le naga yotlhe go ikgopotsa matlhotlhapelo a diragetseng kwa Marikana kwa Bokone Bophirima ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Inyanga Yabomake.
tgt_text: Kutlobotlhoko e utlwilweng ke badiri, bamalapa bona le setšhaba ka kakaretso tla nna le mo hisetoring ya rona..   Lenaneo la Ntšhwafatso ya Marikana le tsentswe tirisong go aga sešwa le go dira gore go nne le seemo se se kgontshang go tokafatsa matshelo baagi ba Marikana.

src_text: Ingci yinyanga yemnyaka yabomake lapho khona kubungatwa bomake labadlala indzima kulomzabalazo wenkhululeko kanye nabo bonkhe bomake emangweni.
tgt_text: Ngogola puso duetse R176 milione le tlhatswadiatla ya malapa batswasetlhabelo mme go solofetswe gore dikgetse tse di setseng ga jaana tse di mo dikgatong tsa semolao di konosediwe kwa bokhutlong jwa Phatwe.

src_text: Inyanga Yabomake yalomnyaka itawubungatwa ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Emalungelo Abomake Kutenhlalo Netemnotfo Nekutfutfukiswa Kwabo: Kuphindza Sakhe Kancono Kute Sitfutfukise Bomake Bakhone Kumelane Nebumatima”.

tgt_text: Go neetswe batlholagadi ba Marikana matlo le mmalwa a ntšhwafaditsweng le a rekilweng mme mangwe tla konosediwa monongwaga.

src_text: Labomake labangetulu kwe-20 000 labamashela e-Union Buildings ePitori mhla ti-9 ngemnyaka we-1956 bafaka sandla ekucinisekiseni kutsi kulingana ngekwebulili nekutfutfukiswa kwabo kutawuhlala kuyintfo lemcoka lecaliswa embili kuNingizimu Afrika Yentsandvoyelinyenti.
tgt_text: Porojeke ya matlo ya R700 milione tla dira gore badiri ba meepo ba tlamelwe ka matlo a nang le seriti.

src_text: Letento tabo tekungasabi tagcugcutela bomake jikelele kutsi batsatse indzawo yabo lefanelekile ePhalamende, kuhulumende kanye nakutinhlangano temmango, futsi sisachubeka njalo nekwakha kuloku losekwentiwe kusukela kwatfolakala inkhululeko ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Go tlamelwa ka mafaratlhatlha botlhokwa loago go tokafatsa seemo sa botshelo sa baagi ba kwa meepong.
Imbizo ya Moporesidente e Tshwaretsweng kwa Gauteng e Buang ka Leano la Tiragatso ya Kabo ya Ditirelo mo Dikgaolong (DDM).

src_text: Sikhumbuto SaseMarikana.
tgt_text: Go latela katlego ya di-Imbizo tsa Moporesidente di le tharo tse di neng di tshwaretswe kwa Bokone Bophirima, Foreisetata le Mpumalanga, ka tatelano ya tsona, Lekgotlatoropo la Kgaolo la Sedibeng kwa Gauteng le ne la amogela legato la bone ka Labotlhano, 12 Phatwe..   Ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Se tlogele ope kwa morago”, Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne eteletse pele baemedi ba batlhankedibagolwane go tswa kwa pusong ya bosetšhaba, ya porofense le ya selegae.

src_text: NgaLesibili, mhla ti-16 Ingci 2022, hulumende uhlanganyele naso sonkhe sive sakitsi kukhumbula ingoti leyenteka eMarikana eNyakatfo Nshonalanga ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: MaAforika Borwa go tswa kwa maphateng a farologaneng ne rotloediwa go dira mmogo kgatlhanong le seelo se se golang sa lehuma le khumanego tse di bakwang ke maemo a gwetlhang ikonomi..   Kgaolo ya Sedibeng nnile le tswelelopele ka go dirisa Kgaolo ya Ikonomi e Kgethegileng ya Vaal River (SEZ) e nang le bokgoni jwa go fetolela kgaolo eo, porofense le naga go nna ya madirelo gape.

src_text: Buhlungu lebaviwa basebenti, imindeni yabo kanye naso sonkhe sive sakitsi butawuhlala bugcilile emlandvweni wetfu.
tgt_text: Maikaelelo Vaal River SEZ ke go amogela maphata a latelang botlhokwa: Vaal River Smart City ntšhwa, Kutla ya Green Hydrogen Innovation; kutla ya motekwane/khanabisi; tsamaiso ya dithoto tsa temothuo (agro-logistics); eroteropolisi; boemelafofanepotlana; thomelothoto ka difofane le lephata le le tsosolositsweng la tlhagiso ya tshipi.

src_text: Loluhlelo Lwekuvuselela iMarikana lusetjentisiwe ekwakheni kabusha nasekusunguleni simondzawo lesivumako kutsi kutfutfukiswe timphilo temmango waseMarikana.

Lomnyaka lowengcile hulumende ubhadale imali lesincepheteliso letigidzi leti-R176 kuncephetelisa imindeni yalabo labatsintseka kantsi emacala lasilele lasenkantolo kulindzeleke kutsi aphotfulwe ngasekupheleni kwenyanga yeNgci.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso.

Samiti ya Moporesidente e ka ga Lephata la go tswa Baagi Thuso e neng tshwaretswe kwa Ekurhuleni, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 4 go fitlha ka la bo 5 Phatwe 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono wa: “Go Diragatsa Dikgato tsa go Tshwaraganya Setšhaba go Dira gore Baagi ba nne le Seabe mo Ditiragalong tsa go tswa Baagi Thuso tse di Nang le Seabe mo Ikonoming” kopantse batho botlhe ba ba amegang go tswa kwa dikhutlong tsotlhe tsa naga tse di nang le seabe mo mererong ya mothale ono, gore ba tle go dirisana mmogo le puso go samagana le dikgwetlho tsa ikonomi le tsa baagi mme gareng ga maikemisetso mangwe mantsi, le go batlela mekgatlho ya go ema baagi nokeng didirisiwa tsotlhe tse di tlhokang go thusa baagi..     Samiti sekasekane le dipegelo tsa dipuisano go tswa kwa diporofenseng di le robongwe malebana le dikgwetlho tsa tsona, tse di akareditseng tlamelo ya matlole, matsapa melawanataolo, go fetola lekala la go tswa baagi thuso ka maikaelelo go dira gore go nne le tirisanommogo magareng ga puso le mekgatlo ya baagi go samagana le dikgwetlho tse di amanang le lehuma, go tlhoka tekatekano le botlhokatiro..   Kabinete ikuetse kwa mekgatlhong ya baagi le mo baaging go nna le seabe se se tlhaga go netefatsa gore re aga isago e botoka, jaaka go elediwa mo Leanong la Tlhabololo ya Naga: Mo ponelopeleng ya   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Kunetindlu letinengi letivuselelwe naletisha letakhiwe taniketwa kubafelokati baseMarikana kantsi letinye titawuphotfulwa kulomnyaka.
tgt_text: Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi.

src_text: Kunemklamo wetindlu wetigidzi leti-R700 lotawenta kutsi basebenti basetimayini babonelelwe ngetindlu letisezingeni.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Leano le Legolo la Intaseteri ya Merero ya Setso le ya Boitlhamedi gore tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: Sakhiwonchanti lesimcoka setenhlalo siyaphakelwa kute kutfutfukiswe simo imimango yasetimayini lephila kuso..   Imbizo YaMengameli YaseGauteng Lemayelana Neluhlelo Lwekutfutfukisa Tigodzi (i-DDM).
tgt_text: Leano leno le tsepamisitse mogopolo mo tirong ntle ya ditshwantsho le dibidio; ya go bopa le go betla; ya dikgaso tse di reediwang le tse di bogelwang mmogo le ya metlotlo; ya ditirelo tsa mebetlo le tsa boitlhamedi; ya go diragatsa le ya go keteka, go akarediwa le ya mmino, ya go phasalatsa le ya dikgatiso..   Leano leno le tla tswela maphata ano mosola mo go direng gore re nne le lekala le le fetogileng le le kgonang go itlhamela le go itshimololela dilo le le tla tlhomphiwang mo lefatsheng le go gaisana le mangwe mo lekaleng leno.

src_text: Kulandzela lemphumelelo lebe khona yaletiMbizo TaMengameli letintsatfu te-DDM letenteke eNyakatfo Nshonalanga, eFree State naseMpumalanga ngekwehlukahlukana, Masipala Wesigodzi SaseSedibeng eGauteng ubambe imbizo yesine ngaLesihlanu, mhla ti-12 Ingci.
tgt_text: Le tla tswela mosola intaseteri ya boitlhamedi ya Aforika Borwa gore kgone go fitlhelela mebaraka ya ka fa nageng le ya dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: Ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Ungashiyi muntfu emuva”, Mengameli Cyril Ramaphosa bekahola licembu lakhe letikhulu tahulumende letisetulu letibuya kuhulumende wavelonkhe, wesifundza newendzawo.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.

src_text: Bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekwehlukahlukana kwabo nangekwemikhakha yabo bahlanganiswa kute basebentisane balwe nekukhula kwemazinga ebuphuya nekuswela kakhulu lokubangwa ngulenseyeya yesimo setemnotfo.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro le le Ntšhwafaditsweng la Pholisi ya Madi Dikadimo tsa Dimasepala le go Samagana le Merero ya Tshoganyetso.
Dikarolo tseno tota di mo karolong ya madi dikadimo mo leanong leno.

src_text: Sigodzi sase-Sedibeng sichubekile ekwenteni kutsi isebente i-Vaal River Special Economic Zone (i-SEZ), lenemandla ekwenta kutsi kwakhiwe kabusha timboni kulendzawo, kulesifundza nakulelive.
tgt_text: Mo dikarolong tseno, go tshitshintswe gore go atisewe paka ya go duelela madi a adimilweng gore tsamaelana le paka ya tse dingwe tsa dithoto tse di rekilweng ka tšhelete eo.

src_text: Le-Vaal River SEZ ihlele kutsi kube nalemikhakha lemcoka lelandzelako: Indzawo yesimanje lelidolobhakati lenato tonkhe tinsita tekuhlalisa bantfu (i-Smart City) lebitwa ngekutsi yi-Vaal River Smart City; ihabhu yekusungula ihayidrojini lehlantekile, ihabhu yemikhicito yensango; luhlelo lwekuhanjiswa kwemikhicito yetekulima; lidolobhakati lelitawuba nesikhumulo setindiza; sikhumulo setindiza lesincane; tekutfutswa kwemphahla ngetindiza kanye nekuvuselela umkhakha wekuchicita insimbi.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno gape di tlhalosa seabe sa ditheo tsa ditšhelete tsa tlhabololo mo go adimeng dimasepala matlole.
Karolo ya bo 230 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 naya dimasepala dithata tsa go adima tšhelete ya ditshenyegelo tsa tsona.

src_text: Umhlangano waMengameli Wemkhakha Wetenhlalo.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la ntlhantlha le amogetswe ke Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2000 go kaela Kgaolo ya bo 6 le ya bo 13 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Umhlangano waMengameli wemkhakha wetenhlalo bewubanjwe Ekurhuleni, eGauteng kusuka mhla ti-4 kuya kumhla ti-5 Ingci 2022 ngaphasi kwesihloko lesitsi: “Kukhutsata Kubumbana Esiveni Kute Imimango Ihlanganyele Kutemnotfo Nakutenhlalo”, wahlanganisa balingani labavela emimangweni lehlukahlukene kute basebente nahulumende kubukana netinseyeya tetemnotfo netenhlalo nekuta netindlela tekutfola tinsita letitawusetjentiswa tinhlangano temmango, kulokunye kwaletinhloso.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa ke go dira gore baadimi ba bangwe ba bantsinyana mo mebasepaleng ba bone merokotso fa ka fa letlhakoreng le lengwe di tswelela go se setise dintlha tse di botlhokwa tsa dikadimo tsa dimasepala..   Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: Lomhlangano ubuke imibiko yekucocisana levela kuletifundza letiyimfica lemayelana netinseyeya tato, lebetifaka ekhatsi indlela yekutfola imali, tindzaba tekulawula, kugucula umkhakha wetetimali kute ukhutsate budlelwane emkhatsini kwetinhlangano temmango nahulumende kute ukhone kubukana netinseyeya letimayelana nebuphuya, kungalingani nekuswelakala kwemisebenti.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Khalentara ya go Phasalatsa Pele ga Nako Dipalopalo tsa Bosenyi tse di Rekotilweng tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe mo Ngwageng wa Ditšhelete wa 2022/.

src_text: IKhabhinethi icele tinhlangano temmango netakhamuti kutsi tidlale indzima yato kucinisekisa kutsi sakha likusasa lelincono, njengoba kucatjangwa kuLuhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwentfutfuko: Umbono Wemnyaka We-    Tincumo teKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara nngwe le nngwe di ka phasaladiwa.

src_text: Luhlelo Lolukhulu Lwetemasiko Nelwebuciko.
tgt_text: Seno ke go fetola nako gore se tshwane le ya mo ngwageng o fetileng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa naga.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi Loluhlelo Lolukhulu Lwetemasiko Nelwebuciko lusetjentiswe.
tgt_text: Nako e tshitshintsweng ya go phasalatsa dipalopalo tsa bosenyi pele ga nako ke Phatwe 2022 malebana le kotara ya ntlha le Ngwanaitseele 2022 malebana le kotara ya bobedi.

src_text: Loluhlelo Lolukhulu lugcile kakhulu kutebuciko lobubonakalako, kumisebenti yetetandla neyekudizayina, yekubona nekulalela, neyekucocisana; yetemisebenti yekudizayina nekuticambela; yekulingisa nekubungata, lefaka ekhatsi umculo, kushicilela netemaphephandzaba.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa bosenyi tsa kotara ya boraro le ya bone di tla phasaladiwa ka Tlhakole le Motsheganong 2023, ka tatelano ya tsona..   Go Khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD).

Kabinete amogetse kgato ya go khutlisa Seemo sa Bosetšhaba sa Matlhotlhapelo (NSoD) jaaka ne ya tsenngwa tirisong morago ga merwalela e sentseng thata kwa Kapa Botlhaba le KwaZulu-Natal..   NSoD khutlile ka la bo 18 Phatwe 2022 go latela gore atolosediwe nako ka la bo 18 Phukwi.

src_text: Loluhlelo Lolukhulu lutawungenelela kulemikhakha kute kwakhiwe umkhakha lomusha webuciko lotawatiwa emhlabeni wonkhe futsi ube sezingeni laloko.
tgt_text: Go atolosediwa nako gono ne le ka ntlha ya fa go ne go santse go na le tlhokagalo ya gore go tswelele go tshegetsa dikgato tse di leng teng tsa go samagana le ditiragalo tse di diragaditsweng ke dikarolo tsa puso go fokotsa le go samagana le ditlamorago tsa ditiragalo tsa ditshenyegelo tse dikgolo ka ntlha ya maemo bosa kwa diporofenseng tse di amegileng..   Kabinete dumelane gore maemo ga jaana ga sa tlhole tlhoka gore go nne le dikgato tse di kgethegileng ka ntlha ya fa dikarolo tsa puso, lephata la poraefete le baagi ba tla kgona go netefatsa gore ba tsweletsa dikgato tsa go thusa, go busetsa sekeng le go aga sešwa   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: Lutawusebenta kwenta kutsi imboni yebuciko yaseNingizimu Afrika ikhone kufinyelela kutimakethe tendzawo netemave emhlaba.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa Ngwaga wa.
Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa go Kwadisa Makwalo Bodulo wa ngwaga wa 2020 ka romelwa kwa Palamenteng gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lwemtsetfomgomo Lobuyeketiwe Wekuboleka Timali Kwabomasipala Newetimo Letiphutfumako Tetemali.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka Seetebosigo 2020 ne ya letlelela gore molaotlhomo ono ka romelwa lekgetlo le lengwe gape kwa baaging gore ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itivumile letichibiyelo letikuLuhlakamsebenti Lwemtsetfomgomo Wekuboleka Timali Kwabomasipala Newetimo Letiphutfumako Tetimali lokhona nyalo.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di tla dira gore ditshwanelo tsa go nna le lefatshe nne selo sa boammaruri se se sireleditsweng semolao ke Karolo ya bo 25(6) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa.

src_text: Letichibiyelo tenteke kakhulu kulesigaba sekubolekwa saloluhlakamsebenti.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono dira gore jaanong go kokoanngwa ga dipalopalo malebana le lotso, bosetšhaba le boagi jwa batshodi ba ditshwanelo tsa lefatshe mo Aforika Borwa nne selo se se kgonagalang.

src_text: Kulokunye kwaletichibiyelo letihlongotwako ngilokufaka kutsi kube nesikhatsi lesengetiwe sekuboleka kute sihambisane nesikhatsi sekusebenta kwalenye imphahla letsengwe ngalemali.
tgt_text: Kgaolo eno tla dira gore mo isagong go nne bonolo go kwala dipegelo tse di nepagetseng tsa boruni jwa lefatshe le tsa tshekatsheko ya lefatshe fa re lekola diphetogo mo go nneng beng ba lefatshe..   Molaotlhomo wa Setheo sa Bosetšhaba sa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlamelo tsa Metsi (NWRIA) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Letichibiyelo tibuye futsi tichaze umsebenti wetikhungo tetimali tentfutfuko yalendzawo bomasipala lababolekela yona.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo wa NWRIA wa 2022 ka phasaladiwa sebaka sa malatsi le 90 gore setšhaba se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga ona.
Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe setheo sa NWRIA se se tla rwalang maikarabelo go rulaganya, go tlamela ka ditšhelete le go tlhabolola mafaratlhatlha metsi mo nageng.

src_text: Sigaba 230 Semtsetfosisekelo WaseNingizimu Afrika Semnyaka we-1996 sinika bomasipala emandla ekutsi baboleke imali yekwenta imiklamo yabo lemikhulu noma yekubukana netindleko tabo.
tgt_text: Gape se tla bo se na le maikarabelo go tlhokomela mafaratlhatlha a leng teng metsi.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lwekucala lavunywa yiKhabhinethi ngemnyaka we-2000 kute lukhombe indlela Sahluko se-6 nese-13 Semtsetfo Wetimali Tabomasipala, we-2003 (Umtsetfo wema-56 we-2003).
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla tshwanela ke go netefatsa gore go nna le tlamelo e sa kgaotseng ya metsi e rebolang metsi ka go lekalekana le e go tsamaisana le maitlamo molaotheo gore batho ba tshwanetswe go tlamelwa ka metsi le tikologo e babalesegileng mme itekanetse.

src_text: Letichibiyelo letivunyiwe tihlose kukhutsata kutsi kwandze babolekisi betimali kuletimakethe tabomasipala kodvwa babe bachubeka kulandzela letimiso letingumgogodla letichaza ngekuboleka kwabomasipala.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla tlhomiwa go nna Setheo sa Puso ka fa tlase ga Šejule 2 ya Molao wa Ditšhelete tsa Puso, wa ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 1 wa 1999).
Setheo seno se tla rwala ditiro tse ga jaana di rwelweng ke Bothati jwa Trans-Caledon Tunnel..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Kukhishwa ngembi kwesikhatsi kwekhalenda yekushicilela lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yemnyakatimali we-2022/.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala wa Ngwaga wa 2022 isiwe kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isivumile lesiphakamiso sekutsi kukhishwe ngembi kwesikhatsi ikhalenda yekushicilela lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yemnyakatimali we-2022/.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono baakanya Molao wa Dithata le Ditiro tsa Ditšhelete tsa Dimasepala, wa ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 12 wa 2007)..     Dikarolo tseno tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di laola maatla dimasepala go lefisa ditefiso tsa tlhabololo malebana le dikopo tsa tlhabololo ya lefatshe tse di neelwang dimasepala.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kukhishwe lolubalobalo lwemacala ekota.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tseno di tla netefatsa gore dimasepala di dirisa ditefiso tseno kwa ntle ga go tsaya letlhakore, kwa ntle ga bofitlha le ka tshwanelo.

src_text: Loku kwentelwe kutsi kuguculwe kukhishwa kwelubalobalo lwemacala emnyaka aphambilini kulelive.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka ngwaga wa 2020 neile tetla ya gore Molaotlhomo ono ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..     Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa.
Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditšhelete wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: Kuhlongotwa kutsi kukhishwa ngembi kwesikhatsi kwalekhalenda yelubalobalo lwemacala ekota yekucala kwenteke ngenyanga yeNgci 2022 bese lwemacala ekota yesibili lube ngenyanga yaLweti.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono tshitshinya gore Melao le supa kwalolwe sešwa leng (1) Molao wa Letlole la Diphenšene la Ditheo tse di Dirang Tiro ya Mothale oo, wa ngwaga wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41, wa 1963); (2) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole, wa ngwaga wa 1976 (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Badiri ba Puso wa ngwaga wa 1996; (4) Molao wa Khomišene ya Ditšhelete le Taolo ya Matlole, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1996); (5) Molao wa Banka ya Lefatshe le Tlhabololo ya Temothuo, wa ngwaga wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005) le (7) Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Porofešene ya Boruni wa ngwaga wa 2021, (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).

src_text: Lubalobalo lwemacala ekota yesitsatfu neyesine lutawukhishwa ngekwehlukana ngenyanga Yendlovana neyeNkwekhweti ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di akaretsa tse di leng ka fa tlase ga Molao wa Diphenšene tsa Masole wa 1996, tse di ka ga go akarediwa mo diphenšeneng tsa masole balekane ba masole gore le bona ba natholelwe ditshiamelo tsa bona mme go tla tsewa gore seno se tla diragadiwa go tloga ka letlha la bo 27 Moranang.
Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tsa melao ya diphenšene di tla dira gore ka gangwe balekane ba masole ba natholelwe merokotso ya diphenšene fa ba tswa mo kgolaganong ya lenyalo.

src_text: Kuphela kwesikhatsi Sesimo Senhlekelele Yavelonkhe (i-NSoD).
tgt_text: Mo godimo ga go sedifatsa seabe sa Tona ya Ditšhelete mo boruning, ntlha nngwe e kwalolotsweng sešwa ke e mabapi le go oketsa dithata tsa komiti ya kgalemo ya baruni fa moruni amogetse molato.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi siphele lesikhatsi Sesimo Senhlekelele Yavelonkhe (i-NSoD) lesamemetelwa ngenca yaletikhukhula letinemandla letenteka eNyakatfo Kapa naKwaZulu-Natali..   Le-NSoD saphela mhla ti-18 Ingci 2022 emva kwekutsi kumenyetelwe mhla ti-18 Kholwane 2022 kutsi sikhatsi saso seluliwe.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono phasaladitswe ka Ferikgong 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona..   Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Lokwelulwa kwalesikhatsi kwentiwe ngenca yekubona kutsi kunesidzingo sekutsi kuchubeke kungetwe letindlela tesikhashana letitsetfwe tinhlaka tahulumende kute tingenelele futsi tibukane nalomtselela walesimo selitulu lesibi kakhulu kuletifundza letatsintseka.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Melao Yotlhe e Lwantshanang le goTlhatswiwa ga Tšhelete le go Lwantsha Tlamelo ya Ditšhelete tsa Menolopuso) wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

Molaotlhomo ono ke Molaotlhomo o kwalolang sešwa letlotlo la Melao e farologaneng leng  Molao wa Setheo sa go Lwantsha Bogodu jwa Ditšhelete, wa ngwaga wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao wa Ditheo tse di sa Direng Letseno, wa ngwaga wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao wa Taolo ya Dithoto tsa Terasete, wa ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1998); (iv) Molao wa Ditlamo, wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao wa Lephata la Melawana ya Ditšhelete wa ngwaga wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi lesimo lesikhona nyalo asisadzingi kutsi tindlela letingakatayeleki tichubeke njengoba tiphakelwa tinhlaka tahulumende, umkhakha lotimele kanye natinhlangano temmango kucinisekisa kutsi tiyachubeka kunika lusito, kululama nekwakha kabusha   Imitsetfosivivinywa.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsibogela makoa a nopotsweng ke dinaga tsa balekane mo Letsholong la Setlhopha sa Ditiro tsa go Tsaya Dikgato mo Mererong ya Ditšhelete (FATF).

src_text: Umtsetfosivivnywa Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemnyaka we-2022 Wekubhaliswa Kwebunikati Bemhlaba.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno dirile ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tla thusang go dira gore Aforika Borwa tsamaisane le dikgato tsa boditšhabatšhaba tsa go lwantshana le go tlhatswiwa ga tšhelete le go tlamela ka ditšhelete mekgatlo ya menolopuso..   Go fitlhetswe gore Aforika Borwa na le makoa mo dikarolong di le.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile lokwetfula    ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemnyaka we-2022 Wekubhaliswa Kwebunikati Bemhlaba kute ichubeke iwucubungule.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana le dikarolo di ka nna 14 tsa tse di nopotsweng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma ngenyanga yeNhlaba 2020 kutsi Lomtsetfosivivinywa uyotfola luvo lwemimango..   Lokuchibiyela lokuhlongotwako kutawenta kutsi kuphumelele lokubhalisa kwebunikati bemhlaba lobutfolakala ngalokusemtsetfweni kuSigaba 25(6) Semtsetfosisekelo waseNingizimu Afrika wemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa sa le ntse le tokololo ya FATF fa sale ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ubonelela kutsi kube nekugcogca lubalobalo ngekuya kwebuhlanga, kwebulili, kwebuve nangebusakhamuti balobo bunikati bemhlaba eNingizimu Afrika.
Lesibonelelo sitawenta kutsi kwandze kuba nemibiko lenembako yeluhlolomabhuku kanye nelucwaningo lwesikhatsi lesitako lolumayelana netingucuko tebunikati bemhlaba.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa.

Kabinete amogetse gore Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 ka isiwa kwa Palamente go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.. Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi, wa ngwaga wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) dira gore go tlhagisa le go tlamela ka sere sepe se se akareditsweng ka fa tlase ga Šejule 1 le Šejule 2 ya Molao ono go tsewe le tlolo ya molao..   Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa di samagana le Karolo ya bo 63 go fitlhetsweng gore ga tsamaisane le molaotheo malebana le gore Tona neelwa dithata tsa go baakanya dišejule kwa ntle le go di fetisa mo matlhong batlhankedi ba setheo sa peomolao.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa We-Ejensi Yavelonkhe Yesakhiwonchanti Setinsita Tetemanti (i-NWRIA) Yemnyaka We-.
tgt_text: Ka ngwaga wa 2020, Kgotlatshekelo ya Molaotheo rebotse katlholo ya gore Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao wa Diritibatsi le go Gweba ka Diritibatsi wa 1992 ga tsamaisane le molaotheo mme ne ya beela thoko go tsenngwa tirisong ga katlholo eno go fitlha ka la bo 17 Sedimonthole 2022 go naya Palamente nako gore baakanye phoso eno   Tiragalo e Tlang.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kushicilelwe Umtsetfosivivinywa we-NWRIA Wemnyaka we-2022 kute utfole luvo lwemmango sikhatsi lesitinsuku letimashumi layimfica (90).
tgt_text: Kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uhlongota kutsi kusungulwe i-NWRIA kute isebente kuhlela, kunika imali, nekutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti semanti kulelive.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla amogela kgaisano ya Rugby World Cup Sevens 2022 kwa Motse Kapa magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse.

src_text: Itawuphindze futsi isebente kunakekela lesakhiwonchanti semanti lesikhona nyalo..   Le-ejensi utawucinisekisa kutsi kutawuphakelwa emanti ngendlela lesimeme, lelinganako naletsembekile ngekuhambisana netidzingo temtsetfosisekelo tekutfola emanti nekuba nesimondzawo lesihlantekile.
tgt_text: Ke la ntlha metshameko eno tshwarelwa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go tla bo go na le ditlhopha di le 24 tsa banna le di le 16 tsa basadi go tswa lefatsheng ka bophara tse di tla bong di gaisana     Melaetsa.

src_text: Le-ejensi itawakhiwa ibe Sikhungo Sahulumende lesingaphasi kweShejuli ye-2 Yemtsetfo Wekulawulwa Kwetimali Tahulumende, 1999 (Umtsetfo 1 we-1999).
tgt_text: Go Akgola          Kabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ntlha ya go dira hisetori mo Aforika Borwa le go gapa sekgele sa ntlha sa kgaisano ya Women's Africa Cup of Nations (WAFCON), kwa makgaolakgannyeng WAFCON ngwaga wa 2022 a neng tshwaretswe kwa Rabat, kwa Morocco ka Lamatlhatso, la bo 23 Phukwi.

src_text: Le-ejensi itawutsatsa lemisebenti lenyalo yentiwa yi-Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..   Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Emandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo Wemnyaka We-.
tgt_text: Go ntse go le jalo, ba nnile le tshiamelo ya Sejana sa Lefatshe sa basadi sa FIFA se se yang go amogelwa ke Australia le New Zealand go tloga ka la bo 20 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 20 Phatwe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Emandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo Wemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: ●  Setlhopha sa Aforika Borwa (Team South Africa), ka ntlha ya go gapa dimedale di le 27 mo maphateng a farologaneng kwa Metshamekong ya Commonwealth ya 2022 e neng tshwaretswe kwa Birmingham, Engelane go tloga ka la bo 28 Phukwi go fitlha ka la bo 8 Phatwe.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uchibiyela Umtsetfo Wemandla Emali Yamasipala Nekusebenta Kwayo, Wemnyaka we-2007 (Umtsetfo 12 we-2007).
tgt_text: Se feletse kwa maemong borobongwe ka dimedale tsa gauta di le supa, tsa selefera di le robongwe le tsa boronse di le.

●  Basadi ba Springbok, ka phenyo ya bona kgatlhanong le Spain mo metshamekong mebedi ya ntlha ya Motseletsele wa Mariga wa Basadi kwa lebaleng la metshameko la Emirates Airline Park kwa Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), go rwesiwa korone ya Mmabontle wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa yo montšhwa wa ngwaga wa.

src_text: tichibiyelo tilawula emandla abomasipala ekutsi bakhokhise tindleko tekutfutfukisa indzawo etintfweni letimayela neticelo tekutfutfukisa umhlaba letitfunyelwe kubo labomasipala.
tgt_text: ●  Mme Ashleigh Buhai, ka go gapa 2022 AIG Women’s Open mme nna mosadi wa boraro wa Aforika Borwa go gapa bosimega jwa gauta.

src_text: Letichibiyelo titawucinisekisa kutsi bomasipala basebentisa letindleko kahle nangendlela lecotfo, levulekele wonkhe wonkhe nalesebenta kahle.
tgt_text: Matshediso Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng le balesika ba: ●  Tokollo “Magesh” Tshabalala (46), rammino, moopedi le mokwadi wa mmino yo neng tuma fa ene mmogo le ditsala tsa gagwe di le pedi ba ne ba simolola setlhopha sa mmino wa kwaito ka ka ngwaga wa 1996, se se neng se bidiwa TKZee..  Go Thapiwa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma kutsi Lomtsetfosivivinywa uyotfola luvo lwemmango ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

Mme Zenkosi Dumile Mhlongo jaaka Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): Dipatlisiso le Taolo ya Dipholisi kwa Lefapheng la Ditiro tsa Puso le Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba (DPWI)..   Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jaaka DDG: Tikwatikwe ya Tsamaiso ya Matlhothapelo Setšhaba kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..   Rre Adam Mthombeni jaaka DDG: Tirisanommogo mo Ditheong tsa Puso  kwa DPWI.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Tintfo Letimayelana Netetimali Wemnyaka we-2022 .
Ikhabhinethi ivumelene kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende Umtsetfosivivnywa Wekuchibiyela Tintfo Letimayelana Netetimali, Wemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le go thapiwa ga ba ba latelang:.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa uhlongota kutsi kuchitjiyelwe Imitsetfo lesikhombisa, lebitwa ngekutsi (1) Umtsetfo Wetikhungo Tetinhlangano Tetimali Temphesheni, 1963 (Umtsetfo 41 we-1963; (2) Umtsetfo Wesikhwama  Setimphesheni Tetemasotja, 1976 (Umtsetfo 84 we-1976); (3) Umtsetfo Wetimphesheni Tebasebenti Bahulumende Wemnyaka we-1996; (4) Umtsetfo Wekhomishini Yetemalingena Netetimali, 1997 (Umtsetfo 99 we-1997); (5) Umtsetfo Wekutfutfukisa Libhange Letemhlaba Netekulima, 2002 (Umtsetfo 15 we-2002); (6)   Umtsetfo Wetemisebenti Yekucwaninga Emabhuku 2005 (Umtsetfo 26 we-2005) kanye (7) Nemtsetfo Wekuchibiyela Umsebenti Wetekucwaninga Emabhuku 2021 (Umtsetfo 5 we-2021)..   Letichibiyelo letihlongotwako ngaphasi Kwemtsetfo Wetimphesheni Temasotja wemnyaka we-1996 tifaka kutsi kufakwe balingani babo nabo bazuze kusukela mhla ti-27 Mabasa.
tgt_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jaaka Motlhankedikhuduthamaga wa Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Tlhabololo ya Motlakase.

src_text: Lokuchitjiyelwa kwemitsetfo yetimphesheni kutawenta kutsi balingani babo batfole timali temphesheni leso sikhatsi uma kuhlukanwa umshado uphela..   Kungeta ekucaciseni umsebenti Wendvuna Yetetimali nasekucwaningeni emabhuku, letichibiyelo tiphindze futsi ticondzise emandla ekomiti yekuphocelela kutsi kulandzelwe umtsetfo lapho khona umcwaningi mabhuku avumile kutsi kunelicala.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tse di dirang nako e sa tlalang tsa Bothati jwa Motlakase wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa   Rre Thembani Bukula (Modulasetilo)   Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsamodulasetilo)   Mme Precious Sibiya   Mme Thembeka Semane; lee.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa washicilelwa ngenyanga yeNdlovana 2022 kute ukhone kutfola luvo lwemmango..   Umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Imitsetfo Jikelele Wemnyaka we-2022 (Kulwa Nekushushumbisa Imali Nekucedza Kusekela Buphekula Ngetimali).
tgt_text: Rre Fungai Sibanda thapilwe sešwa).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kwetfulwe ePhalamende umtsetfosivivinywa Wekuchibiyela Imitsetfo Jikelele Wemnyaka we-2022 (Kulwa Nekushushumbisa Imali Nekucedza Kusekela Buphekula Ngetimali) kute ichubeke iwucubungule.
tgt_text: Modulasetilo le tokololo ya Boto ya Lekgotla la Thekenoloji ya Diminerale   Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetilo); leb.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinywa ulibhuku lelinemitsetfosivivinywa leminengi lechibiyela Imitsetfo lekhona lebitwa ngekutsi  Umtsetfo Wesikhungo Sebunhloli Betetimali, 2001 (Umtsetfo 38 we-2001); (ii) Umtsetfo Wetinhlangano Letingenti Inzuzo, 1997 (Umtsetfo 71 we-1997); (iii) Umtsetfo Wekulawula Imphahla LekuTrasti, 1998 (Umtsetfo 57 we-1988); (iv) Umtsetfo Wetinkapani, 2008 (Umtsetfo 71 we-2008)  Nemtsetfo Wekulawula Umkhakha Wetetimali, 2017 (Umtsetfo 9 we-2017)..   Letichibiyelo tiphendvula kuletici letibonakele ngesikhatsi salelive sekubukisisa bontsanga lokwentiwe litsimba le-Financial Action Task Force (i-FATF).

src_text: Letinombolo tishicilelwe kuLuklayo Ngelinani Lalabasebentako Nalabangasebenti Ngekota lolwentiwe Lubalobalo lwaseNingizimu Afrika lukhomba kutsi imisebenti leminyenti ivele kuMisebenti Yemmango Netenhlalakahle (276 000), Tekuhweba (169 000), Tetimali (128 000) kanye nakuTekwakha (104 000)..     Linani lonkhe selilonkhe lebantfu labacashiwe libe tigidzi leti-.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tse di phasaladitsweng mo Dipatlisisong tsa Kgweditharo tsa Dipalopalo tsa Badiri (QLFS) tse di phasaladitsweng ke ba Setheo sa Dipatlisiso tsa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) di bontsha gore ditiro tse dintsi di nnile teng mo Matsholong Ditirelo tsa Baagi (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 276 000), mo Lephateng la Matlole (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 169 000), le mo Dikonterakeng (mo go thapilweng batho ba le 104 000).

src_text: 6 kukota yesibili yanga-2022, kantsi linani lebantfu labangasebenti lenyuka nge-132 000 laya kutigidzi le-.
tgt_text: Palo ya batho botlhe ba ba nang le ditiro ne tsamaya mo go dimilione di le 15, 6 mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022, mme fa palo eno bapisiwa le mo kotareng e fetileng go bonagala gore palo ya batho ba ba senang ditiro mo kotareng ya bobedi ya ngwaga wa 2022 oketsegile ka 132 000 mme batho ba ba senang ditiro ke ba le kanaka dimilione di le robedi.

src_text: 0 ngekota yesibili yanga-2022 nakucatsaniswa nekota yaphambilini.
tgt_text: Phokotsego e potlana eno ya botlhokatiro ke selo se segolo se se bontshang gore maiteko puso le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago go godisa ikonomi le go tlhola ditiro tse di tlhokegang simolotse go re tswela mosola.

src_text: Letinzuzo lesingeke sitikhukhumete ngato kodvwa letijabulisako tikhombisa kutsi imitamo leyentiwe nguhulumende nekuhlanganyela kanye nebalingani betenhlalakahle ekukhuliseni umnotfo  kanye nekudala imisebenti ledzingeka kakhulu seyicala kutsela titselo nyalo..     Lesi sitatimende lesikhombisa liciniso lelitsi nangabe sonkhe singasebenta ngekuhlanganyela ngekwemandla etfu, singatincoba letinsayeya letibukene nemnotfo wetfu.
tgt_text: Seno ke bopaki jwa gore fa re dika tiro mmogo ka go dirisa bokgoni jwa yo mongwe le yo mongwe, re ka kgona go fedisa dikgwetlho tse ikonomi ya rona tobaneng le tsona.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iyakucondza kukhungatseka kwebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika njengoba bashikashikeka ngekuphila kwabo kwemalanga onkhe ngenca yetindleko tekuphila kanye nelizinga lelisetulu lekuswelakala kwemisebenti.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya maAforika Borwa jaaka go le boima mo matshelong bona ka ntlha ya dilo tse di bitsang ditlhwatlhwa tse di kwa godimo mmogo le dipalo tse di kwa godimo tsa batho ba ba tlhokang ditiro.

src_text: Njengahulumende lonakekelako, sihlala sitimisele futsi sitibophelele ekusebenteni ngekubambisana nebalingani betfu betenhlalakahle kuze kutsi sakhe likusasa lelincono lawo wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt_text: Re le mmuso o tlhokomelang baagi ba yona, re santse re eme ka le le reng re tla tshwarisana tiro le badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya go tlhokomela baagi gore motho yo mongwe le yo mongwe isago ya gagwe nne botoka.

src_text: Uhulumende usatibophelele ekwesekeni emabhizinisi endzawo ngekutsenga timphahla netinsita tendzawo.
tgt_text: Puso santse eme ka la gore tla rekela dikgwebo tsa ka fa nageng ka go reka didirisiwa le ditirelo mo dikgwebong tsa ka fa nageng ya rona.

src_text: Takhiwonchanti Semphakatsi.
tgt_text: Mafaratlhatlha Setšhaba.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikugcekile kulinyatwa kwesakhiwonchanti lokwentiwa takhamiti taseThongathi KwaZulu-Natal ngalesikhatsi kunembhikisho wekutfola emanti.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgalema ka mafoko a bogale baagi ba kwa Tongaat kwa KwaZulu-Natal ka go senya mafaratlhatlha tikologo eo fa ba ne ba rebotse megwanto ya go lwela metsi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi icele kutsi kube nekwehlisa umoya nekubeketela njengoba kuchubeka umsebenti wekubuyisela iMisebenzi Yekuhlanta Emanti eThongathi..     IKhabhinethi iyakucondza kukhungatseka kwetakhamiti lokuze kwadzingeka kutsi tisebentise emathangi emanti sikhatsi lesidze kusukela kwaba netikhukhula ekucaleni kwalomnyaka.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse gore baagi ba theose matshwafo le go nna le pelotelele jaaka ba Setheo sa Ditiro tsa go Tlhatswa Metsi sa Tongaat ba samagane le ditiro tsa go busetsa baagi metsi.

src_text: Kodvwa-ke, ludlame nekutitsetsela umtsetfo akusiso sisombululo, futsi kulinyatwa kwesakhiwonchanti semphakatsi kulimata kuphela imiphakatsi yaleyondzawo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhaloganya sentle tšhakgalo ya baagi ba ba ntseng ba gelela metsi mo diterokong tse di ba tlisetsang metsi mo metseng fa sale merwalela e gogotseng lefelo leno kwa tshimologong ya monongwaga.

src_text: UMtsetfo Lochibiyelwe Wetinhlelo Tabomasipala Bahulumende Wasekhaya wa-.
tgt_text: Le fa go le jalo, tirisodikgoka le go melelana meno ga di kitla di tlisa tharabololo bile gape go senya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba ke go itshenyetsa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi yemukele kusayinwa kweMtsetfo wekuChibiyela Tinhlelo taboMasipala beNdzawo wa-2022 (uMtsetfo Nombolo 3 wa-2022) nguMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Lomtsetfo uhlose kwenta ncono emandla kanye nemazinga ekutiphatsa lokwamukelekako kwabohulumende basekhaya.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go saeniwa ke Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ga Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditheo tsa Dimasepala mo Dipusoselegaeng wa Ngwaga wa 2022 (Molao wa bo 3 wa 2022) gore nne molao.

src_text: Lomtsetfo uyincenye yemitamo yahulumende yekwenta uMkhakha Wetemisebenti Yahulumende ube nebuchwepheshe kanye nekucinisekisa kuphakelwa kwetinsita kubantfu, njengelilungelo lelisisekelo lelicuketfwe nguMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wa-..     LoMtsetfo ucacisa tinchubo lekufanele tilandzelwe uma kucashwa etikhundleni letisetulu.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo molao ono ke go tlhabolola dithata le maemo maitshwaro dipusoselegae.

src_text: Manje uvimbela tikhulu tahulumende letisetulu kutsi tibe netikhundla tembangave emacenjini etembangave.
tgt_text: Molao ono ke karolo ya dikgato tse di tsewang ke puso tsa go dira gore ditirelo tsa puso nne tse di manontlhotlho le go dira bonnete jwa gore batho ba tlamelwa ka ditirelo tse di sa kgaotseng, fela jaaka go tlhalositswe mo ditshwanelong tse di botlhokwa tse di umakilweng mo Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa..  Molao ono totobatsa dikgato tse di tshwanetsweng go latelwa go thapa batlhankedi ba bagolwane mo pusong.

src_text: Futsi njengoba sewukhona loMtsetfo, tikhala tebumenenja tabomasipala letingakagcwaliswa kulindzeleke kutsi tikhangiswe kuvelonkhe kuze kuhehe incumbi yebantfu labafanelekile.
tgt_text: Jaanong molao ono ganetsa batlhankedi ba ba golwane mo pusong go ka tshwara ditiro tse dingwe tsa sepolotiki mo mekgatlhong ya dipolotiki.

src_text: IKhabhinethi inelitsemba lekutsi letingucuko titocinisekisa kutsi labo labacashiwe kumbe labakhetselwe kuletikhundla batokwati kufeza titsembiso tabo kuze kufinyeleleke emphilweni lencono yawo wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape ka molao ono ke gore re diphatlhatiro tsa batsamaisi ba dimasepala tse di iseng di thapelwe batlhankedi mo go tsona di tshwanetse go phasaladiwa naga ka bophara gore botlhe ba ba nang le matshwanedi ba tsenye dikopo tsa go neelwa ditiro tseo.

src_text: Bugebengu.
tgt_text: Kabinete na le tshepo e tletseng ya gore dikarolo tseno tse di fetotsweng di tla dira bonnete jwa gore batho bao ba thapilweng kgotsa bao ba tlhophilweng mo maemong bona ba tla kgona go dira seo ba se thapetsweng go ya ka seo ba se solofeditseng gore re kgone go dira gore botshelo bo nne botoka mo bathong botlhe.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ituse tikhulu teLuphiko Lolugcogca Umtselo eNingizimu Afrika ngekushaca emakhilogremu lange-785 e-crystal meth lenelinani lasemgwacweni letigidzi leti-R236 esikhumulweni i-OR Tambo International Airport ngeliSontfo, mhla tinge-28 iNgci.
tgt_text: Bosenyi.

src_text: Lokubanjwa kwetidzakamiva kutotfumela umlayeto locacile kutigilamkhuba tebugebengu kutsi tikhungo tetfu tekungena nekuphuma tivikelwe kahle futsi tikhulu tetfu tisebenta kamatima kucedza noma ngubuphi bugebengu     Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete rolela hutshe batlhankedi ba tlhatlhobo ya dithoto kwa melelwaneng ba Setheo sa Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS) jaaka kwa Boemelafofaneng ba OR Tambo ka Latshipi wa la bo 28 Phatwe 2022 ba tshwere dithoto tse di neng di tlisiwa kwano tsa boima jwa dikilokerema di le 785 tsa diokobatsi tsa crystal meth tse boleng jwa tsona bo ka dirang R236 milione fa di rekisiwa mo mebileng.

src_text: Umbiko weMkhandlu WeTemfundvo Lephakeme (i-CHE) Uphenya Ngekukhokhelwa Kwemasekela aboShansela Bemanyuvesi kanye Nebaphatsi Labasetulu eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Go tshwariwa ga diokobatsi tseno go tla romela ditlhokotsebe tsa digongwana tsa diokobatsi molaetsa o totobetseng wa gore melelwane ya rona tlhokometswe ka botlalo bile batlhankedi ba naga ya rona ba dira ka natla go fedisa botlhokotsebe  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ibikelwe ngemiphumela yeluphenyo lwe-CHE lolwagunyatwa nga-2020 nguNgcongcoshe Wetemfundo Lephakeme, Isayensi Nekusungula, Dkt.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Lekgotla le le Samaganang le Merero ya Setheo sa Thuto Kgolwane ka ga Dipatlisiso tsa Megolo ya Batlatsabakhanselara le ya Batlhankedi ba Bagolo mo Ditheong tsa Aforika Borwa tsa Thuto Kgolwane.

src_text: Blade Nzimande, kuhlola emazinga emaholo kanye netinkhambiso tebaphatsi bemanyuvesi esikhatsini lesiminyaka lengu-15 kusukela nga-2005 kuze kube ngu-..     Loluphenyo belilekukutfola kusimama, kusebenta kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwemanyuvesi noma umkhakha wetemfundvo lephakeme eveni.
tgt_text: Kabinete tsopoletswe ka seo se setseng se dirilwe mo dipatlisisong tsa CHE tse mo ngwageng wa 2020 Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi, Ngaka Blade Nzimande laetseng gore di diriwe, gore go sekasekiwe megolo le go thapiwa ga khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti mo sebakeng se se fetileng sa dingwaga di le 15, go simolola ka ngwaga wa 2005 go fitlha ka ngwaga wa..  Maitlhomo dipatlisiso tseno ke go tlhatlhoba gore diyunibesiti kgotsa ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane tsa ka fa nageng ya rona ke eng se se di dirang gore di kgone go itshomarela, di kgone go dira tiro ya tsona le gore di kgone go itlhabolola.

src_text: Lombiko uveta lokutfolakele lokubalulekile kanye netincomo tekulungisa letihlongotwako..     Letincomo tiphakamisa, phakatsi kwalokunye, inchubo yemaholo lecinisiwe nalesebaleni.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno nopotse dintlha tse di botlhokwa tse di utulotseng mmogo le go dira ditshwaelo tsa gore ke eng se se ka diriwang go okobatsa maemo.

src_text: Kusungulwa kwemtimba wekubukisisa lotimele lotokwengamela inchubo yekutsatsa tincumo ngemaholo.
tgt_text: Gare ga tse dingwe tse dintsi, ditshwaelo tse di tshwaetsweng di tshitshinya gore megolo ya batlhankedi tshwanetse go tlhoka lehunelo.

src_text: Iphindze iphakamise kuciniswa kwetinhlelo tekuhlola kusebenta etikhungweni.
tgt_text: Go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe setheo se se ikemetseng se se sa direleng lephata leno gore nne sona se se rwalang maikarabelo go tsaya ditshweetso tse di tsamaisanang le megolo tshitshinya gape le gore dithulaganyo tsa go tlhatlhoba fa batlhankedi ba dira tiro ka botswapelo di tshwanetse go gagamadiwa mo ditheong tseno.

src_text: Lolu cwaningo luphindze lwabuka bukhulu lobuhlukahlukene baletikhungo lwaphinde lwenta nekulinganiswa ngekwemave ngemave.
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tseno tse di dirilweng di lebeletse gape le bogolo jo bo farologaneng jwa ditheo tseno mmogo le go tlhoma boleng jwa maemo a tsamaisanang le ditheo tsa dinaga tsa boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: Indvuna Yetemfundvo Lephakeme, Isayensi Nekusungula  Lokusha ilindzeleke kutsi icocisane nebuholi benyuvesi ngalombiko njengesinyatselo sekucinisa letikhungo temfundvo lephakeme.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore Tona ya Thuto Kgolwane, Saense le Boitshimololedi tla atlhaatlha pegelo eno le khuduthamaga ya diyunibesiti maitlhomo le go gagamatsa ditheo tseno tsa thuto tla re morago ga foo, pegelo eno ya phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso: mo go www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: Ngemuva kwaloko umbiko utoshicilelwa kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letemfundvo Lephakeme Nekucecesha: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Go Fetola Batsholateu mo Batlhankeding ba Lephata la Thuto le Dipatlisiso mo Lekaleng la Thuto Kgolwane.

Kabinete eme nokeng ditshitshinyo tsa dipatlisiso ka bobedi tse di dirilweng ka maitlhomo go re tlhaba botlhale ka dikgato tse re tshwanetseng go di tsaya go oketsa lebelo la go fetola batsholateu mo batlhankeding ba lephata la thuto le dipatlisiso mo lekaleng la thuto kgolwane.

src_text: Ingucuko lephutfumako yeLucwaningo neLikhono Lekufundzisa eMkhakheni weTemfundvo Lephakeme.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya ntlha ke e dirilweng ke Setlhophatiro sa Ditona seo se dirileng dipatlisiso mabapi le gore go gana kae gore go thapiwe, go somarelwe le gore go godisiwe batlhankedi ba thuto kgolwane ba bathobantsho ba leng maAforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi isekele tincomo tetifundvo letimbili letajutjwa ngekweluleka ngetinyatselo lekufanele tibe khona kuze kusheshiswe kuguculwa kwemandla ekucwaninga newekufundzisa etikhungweni temfundvo lephakeme.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya bobedi ke e dirilweng ke Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi mmogo le Setheo sa Dipatlisiso sa Naga – mo ba dirileng dipatlisiso tseno le Diyunibesiti tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa leng lekoko la diyunibesiti tsa puso di le 26 tsa naga.

src_text: Umbiko wekucala wentiwe liTsimba Langcongcoshe Lelijutjwe kutsi liphenye ngezitsiyo letivimbela kucashwa, kugcinwa kanye nekuchubekela phambili kwetifundziswa letimnyama taseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tseno ka bobedi di tshitshinya gore go nne le maano go samagana le morero wa go fetola batsholateu mo dikarolong di le tlhano tse dikgolo leng karolo e mabapi le go tlhagisa batlhankedi ba maemo thuto ya morago ga go konosetsa dithuto tsa ntlha tse dikgolwane; karolo ya bobedi ke ya go nna le seabe ga badiredi ba setheo; karolo ya boraro ke ya setlwaedi sa go dira dilo mo setheong sa thuto se se amegang le ka fao se dirang tiro ka gone; karolo ya bone ke ya mabapi le dipholisi le maano mmogo le karolo ya botlhano e leng ka ga go samagana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhaela ga didirisiwa.

src_text: Umbiko wesibili – lojutjwe Litiko leteSayensi nekuSungula kanye neSisekelo Selucwaningo Lwesive lolwentiwa yi-Universities South Africa, lokuyinhlangano lemele emanyuvesi emphakatsi lange-26 eveni.
tgt_text: Tumelano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba Mabapi le Didirisiwa tsa Tshimologo ya Dijalo go Thusa mo Mererong ya Dijo le ya Temo.

src_text: Yomibili lemibiko iphakamisa tindlelasu tekungenelela kuze kusheshiswe ingucuko emikhakheni lebanti lesihlanu, lowasebaneticu; kutibandzakanya kwebasebenti; lisiko nekusebenta kwesikhungo; inchubomgomo nendlelasu, kanye netinsita letinganelanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete isitse tumelano eno kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.

src_text: Sivumelwano Semave Ngemave Ngemitfombo yeLufutotitjalo Lwekudla Netekulima.
tgt_text: Seno se tla dira gore Aforika Borwa nne nngwe ya dinaga tse di dumelaneng ka tumelano eno e kaelang dinaga tse leng karolo ya tumelano eno go somarela le go tlhokomela didirisiwa tsa tshimologo ya dijalo go thusa mo mererong ya dijo le ya temothuo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kungeniswa kweSivumelwano ePhalamende.
tgt_text: Ka go ikobela tumelano eno, seo se tla thusa go gagamatsa maikemisetso naga eno ago somarela le go tlhokomela ka fao didirisiwa tsa go simolola dijalo diriwang ka teng, mmogo le go ema nokeng baagi ba kwa metseselegaeng.

src_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ibe yincenye yemacembu kuleSivumelwano, lesicondzisa emave langemalunga ekongeni nasekucinisekiseni kusetjentiswa lokusimeme kwemitfombo yelufuto lwetitjalo ekudleni nasekulimeni.
tgt_text: Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.

src_text: Kwemukela leSivumelwano kutophindze kucinise kutibophelela kwelive ekongeni nasekusetjentisweni ngendlela lesimeme kwemitfombo yelufuto lwetitjalo, futsi kunikete kwesekwa emiphakatsini yasemaphandleni.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro ya go Fetola Aforika Borwa ka Tsela e Kgotsofalelwang ke Botlhe.

src_text: Luhlakamsebenti Lweluntjintjo Lolulungile lweNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Leano leno le na le ponelopele botlhe ba nang le yona e ka ga go nna le Aforika Borwa yo botlhe ba lekalekanang mo go yona gape sa kgotlheleng tikologo tlhalosa ditheo le dipholisi tseo di tla re thusang gore re kgone go diragatsa seo.

Leano leno le tla ama motho mang le mang yo leng ka fa gare ga naga ya Aforika Borwa bile tla re naya tšhono ya gore re kgone go baakanya lefa leo puso ya tlhaolele re sietseng lona leng la go dira gore batho ba se lekalekane mme re dire gore re nna le ikonomi botlhe mo go yona ba unngwelwang.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise luHlaka Lwengucuko Lolufanele lokutsi lusetjentiswe.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Moporesitente e Samaganang le Merero ya Phetogo ya Maemo Loapi dirile dikgato di le dintsi tsa go batlana le maikutlo badirisanimmogo mo mererong ya loago mme bontsi jwa bona bo ne ba ema nokeng leano leno.

src_text: Loluhlaka lwetfula umbono wekwabelana, weNingizimu Afrika, lekwati kumelana ngalokulinganako nesimo selitulu.
tgt_text: Kabinete totobaditse gore kgato ya go fetola maemo go dira gore re ngwaga wa 2050 goroga fitlhele re se tlhole re dirisa dilwana tse di kueletsang mesi tshwanetse go tsamaelana le dilo tse re fisegelang go di bona mo tlhabololong ya naga, mme di tsenyeletsa le tsa go tlhola ditiro tse di nang le seriti mo bathong botlhe, go thusa baagi le go fedisa tshokolo.

src_text: Luchaza imigomo netindzawo tenchubomgomo kuze kuphunyelelwe kuloku.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo go badirisanimmogo botlhe mo mererong ya loago go ema nokeng leano leno la go tsamaisa tiro.

src_text: Luhlaka lwengucuko lutotsintsa wonkhe umuntfu eNingizimu Afrika, futsi luniketa litfuba lokubukana nekungalingani ngekwemlandvo futsi ludale umnotfo lozuzisa wonkhe umuntfu.
tgt_text: Leano le le tseneletseng la go tsamaisa tiro le tla tle le kwalwa, mme le tla golaganngwa le maano puso mmogo le go golaganngwa gape le thulaganyetso ya go dirisa matlole.

src_text: IKhomishana yaMengameli Yesimo Selitulu yente inchubo yekubonisana lebanti nebalingani betenhlalakahle futsi yatfola kwesekwa lokubanti kweluhlaka.
tgt_text: Karata Ntšhwa ya Laesense ya go Kganna ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikucinisekisile kutsi kuntjintjela emnotfweni wekhabhoni lekuziro lekhicitwako nga-2050 kufanele kusekele tifiso tentfutfuko yavelonkhe, lokufaka umsebenti lohloniphekile wabo bonkhe bantfu, kufakwa kwenhlalakahle nekucedvwa kwebuphuya.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa gore Karata ya Laesense ya go Kganna e ntseng dirisiwa tseelwe legato ke karata eo nang le dintlha di le dintsinyana tse di ka ga go thibela tirisobotlhaswa ya yona.

src_text: IKhabhinethi yenta lubito kubo bonkhe lababambisene kutenhlalo kutsi basekele futsi balwemukele loluhlaka.
tgt_text: Karata e dirisiwang ga jaanong simolotse go dirisiwa bogolotala go simolola ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: Kutotfutfukiswa luhlelo lolunemininingwane yekusetjentiswa kwaloluhlaka, futsi lutodidiyelwa neluhlelo lwahulumende lwekuhlela kanye nelwesabelomali.
tgt_text: Diphetogo mo thekenolojing di ntse di nna teng mme jaanong re setse re dirisa madi a boitshegang gore re kgone go tlhokomela dikarata tseno.

src_text: Likhadi Lelisha Lelayisensi Yekushayela laseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Karata ga jaana tshitshintsweng tla dira gore dilaesense tsa go kganna tsa naga eno di tsamaisane le Dilaesense tsa go Kganna tse di Dirisiwang ke Dinaga tsa Boditšhabatšhaba ka Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso ya Dintlha tsa Boitshupo (ISO18013).

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kuntjintjwa kweliKhadi Lelayisensi Yekushayela lamanje kufakwe lelinemidvwebo yetimphawu tekuphepha letengetiwe.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya Letsholo la Ditiro tsa Sešhaba mo Metseng (EPWP).

src_text: Luhlelo lolukhona kwamanje belusebenta kusukela nga-.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi ya EPWP ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Bucwepheshe sebusombulukile futsi sekuya ngekubita kugcina sakhiwonchanti lesikhona njengamanje.
tgt_text: EPWP ke le lengwe la matsholo a botlhokwa puso maitlhomo lona leng go fedisa tshokolo le go neela baagi megolo ya tiro ba dirileng mo metseng ka go ba naya ditiro tsa nakwana, segolobogolo ka go naya bašwa le basadi ditiro.

src_text: Likhadi lelisha lelihlongotwako litokwenta kutsi ilayisensi yekushayela yalelive ihambisane nobucwepheshe be-International Information Technology Personal Identification Driving Licence (i-ISO18013).
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se sentšhwa se iseng se butswe sa pholisi se tla matlafatsa letsholo leno mmogo le go abelana ka tshedimosetso e tlhamaletseng e ka ga megolo, dithulaganyo tse di tla diriwang go kopa thuso ya matlole mmogo le go thusa baagi, mmogo le go dira gore EPWP tsamaisane le dithulaganyo tse di leng teng tsa matsatsi ano tsa go tlhokomela badiri.

src_text: Inchubomgomo Yeluhlelo Lolunwetjiwe Lwetemisebenti Yahulumende (i-EPWP).
tgt_text: Se tla dira gore tirisanommogo magareng ga makala puso le makala poraefete gagamale go dira gore EPWP nne le mosola mogolo thata mo go direng gore tlhole ditiro tse di seriti le mo go fediseng tshokolo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise kushicilelwa kweluhlaka lwenchubomgomo ye-EPWP kuze kuboniswane nemphakatsi.
tgt_text: Se sengwe gape se pholisi eno tla se dirang ke go rotloetsa gore matsholo go direla setšhaba se latele thulaganyo le nngwe e tshwanang gotlhe mo nageng mme kgone go nna le boitshimololedi.

src_text: I-EPWP ingulolunye lwetinhlelo tahulumende letibalulekile letihlose kuniketa lusito lokukhululeka kubuphuya nekungena kwemali ngekudala ematfuba emisebenti esikhashana, ikakhulukati kulusha nakulabasikati..     Luhlaka lwesikhashana lwenchubomgomo lensha lutocinisa loluhlelo futsi lunikete kucaciseleka ngetinhlangotsi letifana nemiholo, imodeli yekuchasa ngetimali nekuvikelwa kutenhlalo, futsi lucondzanise i-EPWP nekutayetisa kwesimanje kutemisebenti.
tgt_text: Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Itogcugcuzela budlelwane emkhatsini wahulumende nemikhakha letimele ekucinisekiseni kutsi i-EPWP ifaka sandla kakhulu ekwakhiweni kwemisebenti lehloniphekile kanye nekucedza buphuya.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula bogolo jwa mobentlo montšhwa le dikarolo tse dintšhwa tse di tla tsenngwang mo mading tshipi ngwaga wa 2023 mabapi le Diphetogo mo Mofuteng wa Bone wa Madi Mantšhwa Tshipi Naga ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo itophindze ikhutsate kusungulwa kwekusetjentiswa kwetinhlelo temisebenti yemphakatsi eveni lonkhe..     Tichibelo Teluchungechunge Lesine Lwetinhlavumali lwaseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le gore ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe dipuo tse di dirisitsweng mo mading a tla dirisiwang tshipi di tshwanetse go fetolwa gore di neelane tšhono.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate bungako, idizayini kanye nekugcogcwa kweLuchungechunge Lesine Lwetinhlavumali lwaseNingizimu Afrika lwemnyaka wa-.
tgt_text: Lefoko "Aforika Borwa" le tla tsenngwa fela mo letlhakoreng le le lengwe la madi ano tshipi mme le tla kwadiwa ka dipuo tsotlhe tsa naga eno.

src_text: Igunyate luhlelo lwekujikeleta lwaminyaka yonkhe lekusetjentiswa kwetilimi letisemtsetfweni eluchungachungeni Lwenhlavumali Yesine.
tgt_text: Mo mading tshipi R5 go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le tharo; mo mading tshipi R2 50c 20c le 10c go tla dirisiwa dipuo di le pedi mme mo mading tshipi R1 go tla dirisiwa puo le nngwe.

src_text: Ligama “iNingizimu Afrika” litofakwa eluhlangotsini lunye lwetinhlavumali bese libhalwa ngato tonkhe tilwimi letisemtsetfweni.
tgt_text: Dipuo tsotlhe tseno di tla neelana tšhono ngwaga mongwe le mongwe sebaka sa dingwaga tse di tlang di le.

src_text: Tilwimi letintsatfu titosetjentiswa kuluhlavu lwemali lwa-R5; Tilwimi letimbili R2; Tinhlavumali letingu-50c, 20c no-10c kanye na-R1 titoba ngelulwimi lunye.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe se se ka ga Pholisi ya Ngwaga wa 2022 ya go Golaganya Ditirelo tsa Tlhokomelo ya Boleng jwa Metsi (IWQM).

src_text: Tonkhe letilwimi titosetjentiswa ngekutjintjana njalo ngemnyaka eminyakeni leli-10 letako.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa mo kuranteng ya puso Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya IWQM ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Ledidiyelwe Yekulawula Lizinga Lemanti (i-IWQM) ya-.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno e tshitshintsweng tla tsena mo legatong la Pholisi e feletsweng ke nako ya WQM ya ngwaga wa 1991 mmogo le mo legatong la maano yona a neng tsenngwa tirisong ka ngwaga wa..  Pholisi eno tlhagisa dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tse tla nnang tsona tse tlhokomelo ya boleng jwa metsi tla ikakatlelang ka tsona rulaganya ka tolamo melao yotlhe e tsamaisanang le merero ya metsi mmogo le maikano naga eno mo maitlhomong yona go obamela dithulaganyo tsa go somarela metsi jaaka le sedirisiwa se se tlhokagalang.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphasise kufakwa kugazethi kweLuhlaka lwenchubomgomo ye-IWQM kuze kuboniswane nemphakatsi.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang.

src_text: Inchubomgomo lehlongotwako itongena esikhundleni seNchubomgomo ya-1991 ye-WQM lephelelwe sikhatsi kanye nendlelasu yayo leyacalwa nga-..     Lenchubomgomo iveta isethi yemigomo letoba sisekelo sekulawulwa kwelizinga lemanti.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Makhubu Kgaso mo Nakong e Tlang ka maitlhomo go naya setšhaba tšhono ya gore se ntshe maikutlo sona ka ga sekwalwa seno.

src_text: Iniketa ngekucondzisana nayo yonkhe imitsetfo lefanele lephatselene nemanti kanye nekutibophelela kwelive emhlabeni wonkhe ekuniketweni nekongiwa kwemanti njengemtfombo loyindlala.
tgt_text: Makhubu ano ke mangwe metswedi ya tlhago mannye re nang le ona a leng botlhokwa thata mo go godiseng ikonomi ya Aforika Borwa mo mererong ya mafaratlhatlha setšhaba setegeniki le ditlhaeletsano.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo yeSitukulwane Lesitako Sekusakata Ngeligagasi Lemoya.
tgt_text: Pholisi e tshitshinngwang eno maitlhomo yona ke go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go abelana ka dilaesense tsa go disa marang kgaso mmogo le tsa megala; tsa go gasa dikanale; tsa go gasa marang ditlhaeletsano tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa go dira dipatlisiso le tlhabologo; tsa go dirisiwa ke baagi le tsa diintaseteri tsa mothale oo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kushicilelwa kweluhlaka lweNchubomgomo Yesitukulwane Lesilandzelako yeTekusakata Kwemsakato kuze kutsi umphakatsi uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo mangwe pholisi eno ke go tlhotlheletsa tekatekano le go abelana marang ano ka go lekalekana gore mo lekaleng leno go nne le  phetogo ya batsholateu le go dira gore kgokaganyo ya marang setegeniki kgonege gore tshware le ko mafelong a kgakalakgakala le mafelo a tlhabologileng ka fa nageng ya rona.

src_text: Kusakata Ngemagagasi Emoya kuyinsita yemvelo lenemkhawulo lebalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo wedijithali waseNingizimu Afrika nesakhiwoncanti yetekuchumana.
tgt_text: Bathankedi ba Aforika Borwa ba ba Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso.

src_text: Inchubomgomo lehlongozwako ihlose kwesekela kwabiwa kwemagagasi emoya kanye nekuniketwa kwelayisensi yemaselula langantjintji; kusakata; tetindiza netetilwandle; lucwaningo nentfutfuko; kufinyelela kwemphakatsi, naletinye timboni letifanele.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula leina la Rre Mandla Samuel Mchunu go nna mothankedi wa Aforika Borwa yo Nopotsweng go ka Tshwanelwa ke go Tsenngwa mo Mokgatlhong wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mafaratlhatlha Ditlhaeletsano (ITU) le mo Botong ya Melawanataolo ya Marang Kgaso (Kgaolo ya .

src_text: Inchubomgomo iphindze ifune kuchubekisa kulingana nekwabiwa lokulungile kuze kufakwe sandla ekuguculeni umkhakha kanye nekufinyelela kwekuchumana kwedijithali ngisho nasetindzaweni letisemaphetselweni elive.
tgt_text: Rre Mchunu ga jaanong dira jaaka tokololo mo botong eo.

src_text: Kukhetfwa kwalomele iNingizimu Afrika eMkhandlwini Wenyonyana Yemave Ngemave Yetekuchumana (i-ITU) kanye neBhodi Yetimiso Temsakato.
tgt_text: Go tshitshinngwa gore tlhophiwe lekgetlo le lengwe gape mo Lekgotleng leno la ITU mo pakeng ya 2023 go fitlha mo pakeng ya..  Ditlhopho tseno di tla tshwarwa ka nako go tla bong go tshwerwe Khonferense ya Togomaano ya ITU e tla tshwarelwang kwa Bucharest, Romania go tloga ka la bo 26 Lwetse go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kukhetfwa kwaMnu Mandla Samuel Mchunu lomele iNingizimu Afrika kuleliBhodi le-ITU Letimiso Temsakato (isiFundza .
