tgt_text: Aforika Borwa santse eme ka maikemisetso yona go tshegetsa maitlhomo ITU go tswalela sekgala mo didirisiweng tsa setegeniki ka go dira gore lefatshe lotlhe le gokelelwe mafaratlhatlha ano  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Mnu.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa.

src_text: Mchunu ulilunga lelisebentako lebhodi kwamanje.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga ka kgwedi ya Lwetse tla ketikiwa ka morero yo reng : "Re bontsha Lefa la Solomon Linda mmogo le Mmino wa Setso wa Naga ya Aforika Borwa Tlotlo”.

src_text: Kuhlongotwa kutsi aphindze akhetselwe esikhundleni seMkhandlu we-ITU kusukela nga-2023 kuya ku-.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go keteka Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa ka mokgwa wa go keteka ditso tsa rona tse di humileng tse di nang le maatla go dira gore re nne seoposengwe.

Rotlhe re tshwanetse go tsaya matsapa gore re dirisane mmogo mo go fediseng ditiragalo tsa go re dira gore re se nne bana ba thari le nngwe mmogo le tsa go se tshware batho ka go tshwana tse re tswang ka tsona kwa loe mme re rotloetse maitsholo go ipela ga go nna maAforika Borwa a motlotlo  Melaetsa.

src_text: Lukhetfo lutokwenteka ngesikhatsi seNgcungcutsela Yemancusa e-ITU letoba e-Bucharest, e-Romania kusukela mhla tinge-26 iNyoni kuya kumhla ti-14 iMphala.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go:Batho botlhe ba ba fentseng, ba ba ikgapetseng dimetale le bao ba neng ba gaisana le ba bangwe mo Lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades Marathon, leo le itsegeng ka la gore ke "Lebelo le le Gaisang Otlhe a Tshamekiwang ke Batho", leo le neng le tabogiwa ka Latshipi 28 Phatwe.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika isatibophelele etinjongweni nasemigomeni ye-ITU tekucedza kwehlukana ngekwedijithali nekuchumanisa bonkhe bantfu bemhlaba     Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: Mofenyi mo lebelong la banna ke Tete Dijana (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 5, metsotso le 30 le metsotswana le 38) yo nnang kwa Mahikeng kwa porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima mme mo lebelong la bomme mofenyi ke Alexandra Morozova (mo tabogileng sebaka sa diura di le 6, metsotso le 17 le metsotswana le 47).

src_text: Inyanga Yemagugu.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:Mama Rita Alice Ndzanga (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 88), yo neng le Segatlhamelamasisis mo mererong ya kgaratlhelo ya tokologo yo gape neng le mogale mo mokgatlhong wa badiri yo gape neilweng tlotla ka go abelwa Kabo ya Tlotlo ya Luthuli mo ngwageng wa 2004 “go tlotla seabe sa gagwe sa go lwela ditshwanelo tsa badiri botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe mmogo le go lwela gore re feletse re na le Aforika Borwa yo sa tlhaoleng ba bangwe go ya ka morafe wa bona, go ya ka bong jwa bona, yo nang le tokologo le temokerasi”.Mapodisi le tlhano Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) ao neng le ka fa teng ga sefofane sa SAPS fa se ne se sugagana kwa Boemelafofaneng jwa Rand, kwa Germiston ka Labobedi wa la bo 30 Phatwe.

src_text: Inyanga Yemagugu ngeNyoni kulomnyaka itokhunjulwa ngaphansi kwengcikitsi letsi: “Sibungata Umshiyandvuku Wa-Solomon Linda Nemculo Wemdzabu waseNingizimu Afrika”.
tgt_text: Mapodisi batlisisa gore ke eng se se tlhodileng kotsi eno.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikhutsata bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi basebentise Inyanga Yemagugu kugubha lisiko lemagugu etfu lanotsile kanye nekwehlukahlukana lokunemandla ekuhlanganisa sive setfu.
tgt_text: Kabinete beile mo dithapelong tsa pholo ya ka bonako motlhankedi yo leng mo dikgobalong tse di masisi yo neng fofisa sefofane seno  Go Thapiwa.

src_text: Kufanele kutsi sonkhe  sitibophelele ekusebenteni ngekubambisana kucedza kwehlukana nekungabi nebulungiswa kwesikhatsi lesedlulile futsi sikhutsate kutiva sitigcabha ngekuba waseNingizimu Afrika     Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo Lephateng la go Disa Lekala la Puso le go Tlhatlhelela Badiredi mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano,Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro  Mme Kwena Komape thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la go Godisa Ikonomi, Kgwebisano le Tlotlomatso ya Serodumo mo Lefapheng la Temothuo, Pusetso ya Dinaga le Tlhabololo ya Metsemagae  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole thapilwe go nna DDG: mo Lephateng la Tikwatikwe ya Ditirelo tsa Botsamaisi jwa Ditiragalo tsa Matlhotlhapelo mo Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo.

src_text: TemandlaIKhabhinethi yatiswe nguNgcongcoshe Wetemabhizinisi aHulumende Pravin Gordhan mayelana nemandla a-Eskom ekunciphisa lokucisha-kongiwa kwagezi ngetikhatsi letitsite yaphindze yatfola nembiko wenchubekela phambili lobuya eKomidini Lelithekhnikhali   leliKomidi Lavelonkhe Letinkhinga Temandla.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Letinye timemetelo titokwentiwa nasekucedvwe lokucocisana kabanti ngalemibiko.
tgt_text: Kabinete begetswe ke Tona ya Dikgwebo tsa Setšhaba Pravin Gordhan malebana le bokgoni jwa Eskom go fokotsa go timiwa ga motlakase kgapetsakgapetsa mme gape ya amogela pegelo ya tiro e setseng dirilwe go tswa kwa Komiting ya Setegeniki ya Komiti ya Bosetšhaba ya Mathata Motlakase.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise kudvumala ngalokutsikameteka nekungaphatseki kahle lokubangwe ngulokucisha-kongiwa kwagezi kumabhizinisi nakutakhamiti phaca, leyenteka ikakhulukati ngalesikhatsi hulumende abukene netinhlelo tekungenelela letimenyetelwe nguMengameli ngaKholwane.
tgt_text: Go tla dirwa dikitsiso tse dingwe go latela go konosediwa ga dipuisano tse di tseneletseng malebana le dipegelo tseno.

src_text: Lutjalomali.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhagisitse go swaba ga yona ka ntlha ya dikgoreletsego tse di bakwang ke go timiwa ga motlakase mo dikgwebong le mo matlong, bogolo segolo jaaka seno se diragala ka nako puso samaganeng le ditsereganyo tse di itsisitsweng ke Moporesidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phukwi.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwemukele kwetfulwa kweNdzawo Lensha Yekukhicita I-Sandvik Khomanani e-Kempton Park, lebeyiyincenye yelutjalomali lwetigidzi letinge-R350 leyatsenjiswa eNgcungcutseleni yesine Yelutjalomali yaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAIC) lebeyibanjelwe eSandton Convention Centre eJozi mhla ka-24 iNdlovulenkhulu..  Lesikhungo lesisha lesingemamitha lasikwele lange-62 000 sihlanganisa imisebenti leyayentiwe ngaphambilini etindzaweni letisihlanu letahlukene futsi sihlalisa basebenti lababalelwa ku-.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso.

src_text: Ingulesinye setikhungo teSandvik letinkhulu futsi letitfutfuke kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele, futsi sinemandla ekukhicita emaloli ekutfwala ematfunjini emhlaba.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga Setsha se sentšhwa sa Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing kwa Kempton Park, se leng karolo ya peeletso e solofeditsweng kwa Khonferenseng ya bone ya Dipeeletso ya Aforika Borwa (SAIC) e neng tshwaretswe kwa Sandton Convention Centre kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe..  Tlamelo eno ntšhwa ya disekweremetara di le 62 000 kopanya ditiro tse di neng di dirwa kwa ditsheng tse tlhano tse di farologaneng mme na le badiri ba ka nna.

src_text: Tinsimbi tekwakha lemaloli letingetulu kwema-60% titawukhicitwa yiNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Ke nngwe ya ditlamelo tsa Sandvik tse dikgolokgolo le tse di tsweletseng pele go gaisa mo lefatsheng, mme na le bokgoni jwa go tlhagisa dilaisi tsa ka fa tlase ga lefatshe ka dimatheriale tse di fetang 60% tsa Aforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yakwamukela kuvakasha kwaMengameli Ramaphosa KwaZulu-Natali ngesikhatsi kwetfulwa sikhungo sekukhicita i-Hesto Harnesses e-Stanger, KwaDukuza mhla ka-13 iNyoni.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape le leeto la Moporesidente Ramaphosa la go lekola maemo la kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka nako ya go tlhomiwa lefelo la tlhagiso ya dithoto la Hesto Harnesses kwa Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la bo 13 Lwetse.

src_text: Lesikhungo singuleminye yemiklamo lesihlanu yekutjalwa kwetimali lesiyincenye yetigidzigidzi letinge-R.  lkutibophelela kwe-Metair Investments Limited kuze kusekelwe kunwetjwa nekwentiwa kwasekhaya kweFord Ranger lensha.
tgt_text: Lefelo leno ke le lengwe la diporojeke di le tlhano tse go dirilweng dipeeletso mo go tsona tse leng karolo ya maitlamo setlamo sa Metair Investments Limited go beeletsa  4 bilione go tshegetsa go atolosiwa le go fetolelwa ga Ford Ranger ntšhwa go nna ya ka fa nageng.

src_text: Mengameli uphindze wahambela kuvulwa kwephrojekthi yekutfutfukisa nekunwetjwa kweSappi Saiccor Mill lebita emabhiliyoni langema-R7,7 eMkomaas, lokuhloswe ngayo kukhulisa emandla kanye nekuncintisana kwenkampani emhlabeni wonkhe kungulapho idala nematfuba emisebenti esikhatsi lesifishane nalesidze.
tgt_text: Gape Moporesidente tsenetse pulo ya porojeke ya ntšhwafatso le katoloso ya setlamo sa Sappi Saiccor Mill ya boleng jwa R7,7 bilione kwa Umkomaas maikaelelo yona leng go oketsa bokgoni jwa setlamo le bokgoni jwa sona jwa go gaisana lefatshe ka bophara fa se ntse se tlhama ditšhono tsa tiro tsa pakakhutshwane le tsa pakatelele.

src_text: Lokutjalwa kwetimali kuyincenye yetitsembiso letentiwa bosotimboni e-SAIC.
tgt_text: Dipeeletso tseno ke karolo ya ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng ke beng ba diintaseteri kwa SAIC.

src_text: Lonkhe lutjalomali lolusha lolungena eveni letfu lusita ekwakhiweni kabusha nasekuvuseleleni umnotfo wetfu, futsi luyachubeka nekubeka iNingizimu Afrika njengendzawo yekutjalwa kwetimali lengakhetfwa.
tgt_text: Peeletso nngwe le nngwe ntšhwa mo nageng ya rona thusa mo go ageng sešwa le go busetsa sekeng ikonomi ya rona, mme tswelela go dira gore Aforika Borwa nne lefelo leo leng mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go direng dipeeletso mo go lona.

src_text: Kutfutfukiswa kwesakhiwonchanti.
tgt_text: Tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikwamukele kuvulwa kwencenye lensha yeMusina Ring Road eLimpopo lotokwenta kube lula kutsi bantfu bazulazule eMusina, iphindze futsi ivumele nekwandza kwekuhwebelana nemnotfo phakatsi kweNingizimu Afrika kanye nemave Enhlangano Yentfutfuko YaseNingizimu ne-Afrika (i-SADC).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go bulwa ga karolo ntšhwa ya Tsela ya Musina Ring kwa Limpopo e tla dirang gore go nne bonolo gore batho ba tsamae kwa Musina, mme gape letla gore go nne le tiragatso ya kgwebisano le ikonomi magareng ga Aforika Borwa le Dinaga tsa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika.

src_text: Lomklamo lobita tigidzi letingema-R640 udale ematfuba emisebenti esikhatsi lesigcwele langetulu kwema-275 kubantfu bendzawo futsi waniketa ematfuba emiphakatsini yendzawo kanye nakumabhizinisi lamancane, laphakatsi nendzawo nalamancane kakhulu (ema-SMME).
tgt_text: Porojeke e jeleng R640 milione tlhametse batho ba kgaolo eo ditiro tsa nako e tletseng di feta 275 mme ya tlamela baagi ba kgaolo eo le dikgwebopotlana (di-SMME) ka ditšhono.

src_text: Kwakhiwa kwemgwaco i-Musina Ring Road kuyincenye yeluhlelo lwahulumende lwesakhiwonchanti, ngekusebentisa i-ERRP, lekuhloswe ngayo kudala kukhula lokubandzakanya wonkhe umuntfu nematfuba emisebenti emikhakheni nasemiphakatsini leyehlukene.
tgt_text: Kago ya Tsela ya Musina Ring ke karolo ya lenaneo la puso la dikago, leo le tseelang tlhogong maitlhomo ERRP, le maikaelelo lona leng go tlhama ditšhono tse botlhe ba nang le seabe mo go tsona le ditiro mo maphateng a farologaneng le mo metseng.

src_text: Inhlekelele yaseJagersfontein.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo Jagersfontein.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo endvudvuto emindenini yalabo labalahlekelwe timphilo tabo ngemuva kwekuchuma kwelidami leludzaka lelingcolile lemayini yendzawo leshiywe banikati e-Jagersfontein eFreyistati futsi yachitsa ludzaka lolubi ngetitfuba tasekuseni ngeliSontfo, ti-11 INyoni.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso a tswang kwa botennye jwa dipelo kwa malapeng ba ba latlhegetsweng ke matshelo morago ga go thubega ga lebota la moepo o phuagantsweng wa kgaolo eno kwa Jagersfontein, kwa Foreisetata mme ga dutla kgosomano ya seretse se se bakileng matlhotlhapelo ka mahube naka tsa kgomo ka Sontaga, 11 Lwetse.

src_text: Lenhlekelele ishiye sakhiwonchanti salendzawo, timphahla tebantfu njengetimoti kanye nemiti leminingana yonakele kakhulu.
tgt_text: Matlhotlhapelo ano sentse gape dikago tsa motse oo, dithoto tsa tsa batho di tshwana le dikoloi le dintlo di le mmalwa.

src_text: Ngalesikhatsi avakashele lendzawo yenhlekelele ngeMsombuluko, mhla ti-12 INyoni 2022, Mengameli Ramaphosa uvakalise kubonga ngemitamo yekuhlenga nekulungisa leyenteka kulendzawo.
tgt_text: Ka nako ya fa ne etetse koo ka Mosupologo, 12 Lwetse 2022, Moporesidente Ramaphosa lebogile maiteko go busetsa maemo sekeng a dirwang mo lefelong leo ne solofetsa gape gore puso tla ema nokeng baagi ba ba amegileng ba Jagersfontein ka tshegetso e tlhokegang.

src_text: Uphindze watsembisa kutsi hulumende utoniketa ngelusito loludzingekako kubahlali labatsintsekile baseJagersfontein.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogela gore beng ba moepo ba rile ba ikemiseditse go tlamela puso ka thuso ya setegeniki le tshegetso fa ka kopiwa ke Lekgotla la Diminerale la Aforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikhutsatekile ngekutsi banikati bemayini batsi bakulungele kuniketa lusito loluthekhnikhali kanye nekweseka hulumende uma loko kucelwa nguMkhandlu Wetimbiwa eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Intaseteri ya meepo tswelela go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo ikonoming jaaka tlhagisa ditiro ka go thapa batho abo tsona le ka go thapa ditlamo tse tsona tla nnang tsona tse di thapang batho, ka go duelela letseno la go romela ditlhagisiwa tsa ka kwano kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle, mmogo le ka go dira gore go nne le dipeeletso go tswa kwa dinageng tsa kwa ntle mmogo le go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa sa go tokafatsa matshelo batho ba ba mo tikologong ya meepo.

src_text: Imboni yetimayini solo ifaka ligalelo lelikhulu emnotfweni ngekucasha ngalokuphelele nekwesikhashana, emaholo laphuma kulamanye emave, kanye nekutjalwa kwetimali lokucondzile kwakulamanye emave, futsi idlala indzima lebalulekile ekwenteni ncono timphilo tebantfu emiphakatsini yetimayini.
tgt_text: Puso le mekgatlho mengwe e seng ya puso tlile ka thuso ya ka bonako ka go tlamela baagi ba ba amegileng ka bonno jwa tshoganyetso, ka go ba thoba maikutlo go ba ntsha mo letshogong le go ba thusa ka dithuso tse di botlhokwa di tshwana le go ba neela dikobo, dimaterase le diphuthelwana tsa dijo.

src_text: Hulumende naletinye tinhlangano letingekho ngaphansi kwahulumende bangenelela ngekusheshisa ngekuniketa indzawo yekuhlala ngekuphutfuma, kwelulekwa kwalabahlukumetekile kanye netidzingo letisisekelo njengetingubo tekulala, bomatilasi nemaphasela ekudla.
tgt_text: Ga jaana metsi le motlakase di buseditswe sekeng mo lefelong leo.

src_text: Kuniketwa kwemanti nagezi kulendzawo sekubuyiselwe.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore fela fa lefelo leno le sena go phepafadiwa, basetegeniki ba tla sekaseka seemo sa dikago tsa matlo.

src_text: Nasekususwe lokungcola kulendzawo yenhlekelele bosochwepheshe kulindzeleke kutsi bahlole kwakheka kwetindlu.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebogile ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso, mekgatlho ya baagi le setšhaba ka ntlha ya seabe se ba nnileng le sona mo go abelaneng ka thuso.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ibonge betimo letiphutfumako, tinhlangano temphakatsi kanye nemalunga emphakatsi ngekufaka sandla nelusito lwabo lolukhulu.
tgt_text: Ikonomi.

src_text: Temnotfo.
tgt_text: Kabinete buisane ka seemo sa ikonomi morago ga dipalopalo tsa fa gautshwane tsa Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa (Stats SA) di sena go bontsha gore Letseno la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la kotara ya bobedi ya 2022 wetse tlase ka 0,7%.

src_text: IKhabhinethi idzingidze ngesimo semnotfo welive ngemuva kwekuba tibalo takamuva teLihhovisi Lelubalobalo laseNingizimu Afrika (i-Stats SA) tivete kutsi samba semkhicito wasekhaya (i-GDP) wekota yesibili ya-2022 yehle nga-0,7%.
tgt_text: Dintlha tse di tlhotlheleditseng kwelotlase eno di akaretsa go timiwa ga motlakase, ntwa ya Russia le Ukraine, le dituelelo tse di kwa godimo tsa dilo tse go iphedisiwang ka tsona mmogo le infoleišene.

src_text: Tintfo letibe nemtselela kulokwehla tihlanganisa kucisha-kongiwa kwagezi, kungcubutana kweRussia ne-Ukraine, netindleko letisetulu tekuphila nekwehla kwemandla emali.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di dirilweng ke Leano la Kagosešwa le Tsosoloso ya Ikonomi (ERRP) di thusitse gore naga se dubiwe ke ditsuatsue tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba ikonomi, mme gape di dirile gore ditiro le ditsela tsa go iphedisa di se latlhege.

src_text: Kungenelela lokwentiwa luHlelo Lwekwakha Kabusha Umnotfo kanye Nekuvuselela (i-ERRP) kuvikela kakhulu lelive etivunguvungwini temave ngemave, futsi kuvikele nemisebenti kanye netindlela tekutiphilisa.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di gagametseng tsa puso tsa ikonomi di simolola go ungwa maungo, jaaka go bonagetse mo dipholong tsa fa gautshwane tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Kotara Nngwe le Nngwe tsa Merero ya Badiri tsa Stats SA, tse di bontshitseng gore go nnile le koketsego ya ditiro di feta 648 000 magareng ga kotara ya ntlha le kotara ya bobedi mo  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Kungenelela kwahulumende lokucinile kutemnotfo sekucala kutsela titselo, njengoba kubonakaliswa miphumela yakamuva yeLuhlololuvo lweKota Lwetisebenti lwe-Stats SA, lolubonise kutsi ingetulu kwema-648 000 imisebenti letfolakele phakatsi kwekota yekucala neyesibili ya-  Tincumo teKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso la Peoleitlho le Tshekatsheko (M&E) la Pholisi ya Bosetšhaba ya Bašwa (NYP).

src_text: Luhlaka Lwekucaphela Nekuhlola (M&E) Lwenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yelusha (i-NYP).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse leano la go diragatsa tiro la M&E le le tla dirang gore tiro ya peoleitlho diragadiwe ka tshwanelo mmogo le tshekatsheko ya seabe sa dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP 2020-.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate luhlaka lwe-M&E lolutokwenta kutsi kube nekucaphela ngemphumelelo kanye nekuhlolwa kwemtselela wetinsika te-NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Leano leno le tlamela ka dintlha di le tlhano tse di botlhokwa tsa maemo a kwa godimo tse di lepalepantsweng le dikarolo tse di botlhokwa tsa NYP.

src_text: Luhlaka luniketa ngetinkhomba letisihlanu letisezingeni lelisetulu letihambisana netinsika te-NYP.
tgt_text: Dintlha tseno di dirilwe le baamegi ba ba maleba ba ba nang le kgatlhego mo tlhabololong le maatlafatso ya bašwa mo nageng.

src_text: Letinkomba tentiwa nalabatsintsekako labafanele labanenshisekelo ekutfutfukisweni nasekuniketeni kwelusha emandla eveni.
tgt_text: Tshedimosetso e tla kokoanngwang tla aroganngwa go ya ka dingwaga, bong, bosemorafe le go ya ka mafelo bodulo dintlha tseno di tswang kwa go ona.

src_text: Kugcogcwa kwemininingwane kutohlukaniswa ngekweminyaka yebudzala, bulili, kukhubateka, ngekwemacembu ebuhlanga kanye nesimo sendzawo salokungenelela.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tseno tsa go baya maemo leitlho di tla dirwa mo maphateng otlhe puso, mo ditheong le mo lephateng la poraefete.

src_text: Lokucaphela kutokwentiwa kuto tonkhe tinhlaka tahulumende, mikhakha kanye netinkampani letitimele.
tgt_text: Go tla kwala dipegelo tsa kotare nngwe le nngwe mme di phasaladiwe gabedi mo ngwageng.

src_text: Imibiko itokhicitwa njalo ngekota futsi ishicilelwe kabili ngemnyaka.
tgt_text: Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng.

src_text: Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la go Dira Tiro la Pholisi ya Thulaganyo e Golaganeng mo pusong, le le lebeletseng go samagana le mekhino e supilweng ya dithulaganyo tsa pholisi mo tsamaisong ya ga jaana ya dithulaganyo.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ilugunyatile Luhlaka Lwenchubomgomo Yekuhlela Lokudidiyelwe kuhulumende, loluhlose kubukana namagebe labonakele ekuhleleni incubomgomo eluhlelweni lolukhona manje lwekuhlela.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo tse di tshitshintsweng di tla samagana, gareng ga tse dingwe, le go tlhoka go lepalepanngwa ga dithulaganyo le didiriswa tsa peoleitlho.

src_text: Kungenelela lokuhlongotwako phakatsi kwalokunye kubukana nekubate kwekuhlelwa kwekucondziswa ngekhatsi kwetinhlaka letintsatfu tahulumende.
tgt_text: Ditsereganyo di tla itsise sediriswa sa peoleitlho e theilweng mo bosuping.

src_text: Kungenelela kutokwetfula indlela yekucaphela lesekelwe ebufakazini.
tgt_text: Gape letlhomeso la pholisi le tla itsise ponelopele e bonolo mme go na le dithulaganyo tsa pakatelele go ya go tsa pakagare le tsa pakakhutshwane go ralala puso.

src_text: Luhlaka lwenchubomgomo luphindze lwetfule kusho ngembili lokulula ngekuhlela sikhatsi lesidze kuya kulesisemkhatsini nesikhatsi lesifishane kuhulumende wonkhe.
tgt_text: Le tla direla go itsise diphetogo tsa molao go tokafatsa tsamaelano le go bonela pele mo dithulaganyong le dipeoleitlho tsa puso.

src_text: Itosebentela kwetfula tingucuko temtsetfo kuze kutsi kwentiwe ncono kuhambisana nekusho ngembili ekuhleleni nekucaphela kwahulumende.
tgt_text: Go Amogelwa ga Tumelano ya go Tlhamiwa ga Setheo sa Melemo sa Seaforika ( (AMA).

src_text: Kugunyatwa KweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa Kwenhlangano Yemitsi Yase-Afrika (i-AMA).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go saeniwa ga Tumelano ya go Tlhamiwa ga AMA le go neelwa ga yona kwa Palamenteng gore amogelwe.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusayinwa kweSivumelwane Sekusungulwa kwe-AMA kanye nekwetfulwa kwaso ePhalamende kuze sigunyatwe.
tgt_text: Seno se tla dira gore tumelano e amogetsweng ke Kokoanotheomolao ya Mokgatlho o Tshwaraganetseng Aforika ka ngwaga wa 2019 tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: Loku kutokwenta kutsi kusebente sivumelwane lesamukelwa yi-African Union Assembly nga-.
tgt_text: Tumelano tlhama AMA semmuso mo kontinenteng.

src_text: Lesivumelwane sisungula ngalokusemtsetfweni i-AMA yalelivekati.
tgt_text: Setheo seno se tla laola ditlhagisiwa tsa kalafi, le go tokafatsa pabalesego le go dira ga ditlhagisiwa tsa kalafi mo kontinenteng.

src_text: I-ejensi itolawula imikhicito yetekwelapha, futsi itfutfukise kuphepha nekusebenta ngemphumelelo kwemikhicito yetekwelapha yalelivekati.
tgt_text: Go saeniwa le go amogelwa ga tumelano eno go tla tsweletsa maitlamo Aforika Borwa mo lefatsheng le mo kontinenteng malebana le go maatlafatsa thulaganyo ya taolo ya ditlhagiswa tsa yona tsa boitekanelo.

src_text: Kusayinwa nekucinisekiswa kwalesivumelwane kukhombisa kutibophelela kweNingizimu Afrika kutivumelwane temhlaba jikelele netalelivekati letimayelana nekucinisa imitsetfo yalelivekati lelawula imikhicito yalo yetemphilo.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Tiragatso ya Lenaneo la Thotloetso ya Lekgetho la Dipatlisiso le Tlhabololo (R&D) – 2019/20 le 2020/.

src_text: Umbiko Ngekusebenta Kweluhlelo Lwekucwaninga Nekutfutfukisa (i-R&D) Luhlelo Lwekuhlomulisa Intsela - 2019/20 kanye na-2020/.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go neelwa ga Palamente ga pegelo ya Lenaneo la Thotloetso ya Lekgetho la R&D ya dingwaga tse pedi tse di fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).

src_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweluHlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela ye-R&D eminyakeni lemibili leyengcile (nga-2019/20 na-2020/21).
tgt_text: Seno ke go tsamaelana le karolo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho la Letseno wa ngwaga wa 1962 (Molao 58 wa 1962) o laelang gore go tlhagisiwe dipegelo tseno kwa Palamenteng.

src_text: Loku kuhambisana nesigaba 11D (17) seMtsetfo Wentsela Yemalingena, 1962 (uMtsetfo 58 1962), lodzinga kutsi lemibiko yetfulwe ePhalamende.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la thotloetso ya lekgetho le ikaeletse go rotloetsa ditlamo tsa poraefete go beeletsa mo R&D go susumetsa kgolo ya dipeeletso.

src_text: Loluhlelo lwekuhlomulisa intsela luhlose kugcugcutela tinkampani letitimele kutsi titjale ku-R&D kuze kugcugcuteleke kukhula kwelutjalomali.
tgt_text: Le kgontsha tsweletso ya saense le boitshimololedi gore go nne le kgolo ya ikonomi, le go tsweletsa bokgoni jwa go gaisana.

src_text: Kusita kuchubeka kwesayensi nekucamba lokutokhulisa umnotfo, kuchubekise nekuncintisana.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse gore pegelo bontsha gore ditlamo tse dintšhwa di dirile dikopo tsa thotloetso ya lekgetho rotloetsa ditlamo tse dingwe go fitlhelela sekema seno jaaka karolo ya go godisa dipeeletso tsa tsona le go tlhosetsa kgolo ya ikonomi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi inetisekile kutsi lombiko ukhombisa kutsi tinkampani letinsha tifake ticelo tekuhlomuliswa ngentsela.
tgt_text: Ditlamo tse di kwa godimo tse nne tse di fitlheletseng thotloetso ya lekgetho di mo phetolong ya tsa temothuo; phetolo ya ditlhagiswa tsa meepo; maphata dikhemikhale, ditlolo, melemo le botegeniki jwa motlakase le Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso leng maphata Kabinete beileng gore ke ditlapele mo Thulaganyong ya Dikgato ya Pholisi ya Intaseteri.

src_text: Loku kugcugcutela letinye tinkampani kufikelela kulesikimu njengencenye lekhulisa lutjalomali igcugcutele kukhula kwemnotfo.
tgt_text: Pegelo ka botlalo ka fitlhelelwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: Tinkampani letine letisetulu letifinyelele kulokuhlomula tikumkhakha wekusetjentwa kwemikhicito yetekulima; timayini, emakhemikhali, tekutimonyonga, temakhemisi nete-elekhtrothekhnikhali nemikhakha yethekhnoloji yelwatiso iKhabinethi lekubeke njengalokuphambili KuluHlelo lweNchubomgomo Yekusebenta kuTetimboni.
tgt_text: Foramo ya Molao wa Kgolo le Ditšhono wa Aforika (AGOA)–.

src_text: Umbiko lophelele uyatfolakala kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko leSayensi nekuCamba letsi: www.dst.gov.za..  Iforamu yeMtsetfo Wekukhula Nematfuba E-Afrika (i-AGOA) –.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisiwa ke ditiragalo tsa gore go tla tshwarelwa ka fa nageng Foramo ya AGOA ka ngwaga wa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kweForamu ye-AGOA nga-.
tgt_text: AGOA simolotswe ke naga ya Amerika ka ngwaga wa 2000 go dira gore kgwebisano magareng ga dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika le mmaraka wa dinaga tsa Amerika.

src_text: I-AGOA yagunyatwa yi-United States of America (USA) nga-2000 kuze kutsi inikete litfuba lekuhwebelana emaveni lamanyenti e-sub-Saharan Afrika kanye ne-USA.
tgt_text: Ditlhagisiwa tse Aforika Borwa di rekisetsang dinaga tsa kwa ntle ka fa tlase ga AGOA di akaretsa dijo tse di jewang, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolo tsa dikoloi, tshipi le dikhemikhale.

src_text: Kweluhwebo lokutfunyelwako kwaseNingizimu Afrika ngaphansi kwe-AGOA kuhlanganisa titselo letidliwako, emantongomane, timoti, tincenye talokuhanjiswako, insimbi, lokuyinsimbi kanye nemikhicito yemakhemikhali.
tgt_text: Letlha le lefelo di sa ntse di tla begwa.

src_text: Lilanga lelingulonalona nendzawo kusatomenyetelwa.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Ditona ya Setlhopha sa Tlhokomelo ya mo Lefatsheng (GEO) –.

src_text: INgcungcutsela YaboNgcongcoshe ye-Group on Earth Observations (i-GEO).
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Aforika Borwa tla tshwara Samiti ya Ditona ya GEO kwa Cape Town ka.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika isingatse Ingcungcutsela Yabongcongcoshe be-GEO eKapa nga-.
tgt_text: GEO ke setheo sa dipuso se se tlhomilweng ka 2003 morago ga Samiti ya Lefatshe ya 2002 ya Tlhabololo e Tsweletsegang dira jaaka polatefomo ya maphatamantsi moo dinaga di ithaopang go nna le seabe mo dikgatong tse di tshwaraganetsweng tsa tsamaiso ya GEO.

src_text: I-GEO iyinhlangano yabohulumende bemave leyasungulwa nga-2003 ngemuva kweNgcungcutsela Yemhlaba Yentfutfuko Lechubekako yanga-.
tgt_text: Ga jaana mo go GEO go na le dipuso tsa bosetšhaba di feta 113, mme di le 30 mo go tsona di tswa mo kontinenteng ya Aforika mme go na le ditheo di ka nna 140 tse di nang le seabe, mme di le 11 tsa tsona di tswa mo Aforika.

src_text: Isebenta njengenkhundla yetive ngetive lapho emave afaka khona sandla ngekutitsandzela emgomweni lofanako wekwakha tinchubo te-GEO.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go nna tokololo ya Komitikhuduthamaga e tsayang karolo go tloga ka ngwaga wa 2005 mme batlhankedi ba tsa saense ba naga ya rona ga jaana ba na le seabe mo ditiragalong di le mmalwa tsa boitshimololedi mo dipatlisisong tse di gogwang kwa pele ke GEO.

src_text: I-GEO kwanyalo inabohulumende bavelonkhe labangetulu kwema-113, labange-30 kubo babuya e-Afrika kanye netinhlangano letitibandzakanyako letingaba ngema-140, leti-11 tato tibuya e-Afrika.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Diphalane ya Dipalangwa (OTM) –.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga lelisebentako leliKomidi Leliphetse kusukela nga-2005 futsi bososayensi betfu njengamanje batibandzakanya etinhlelweni letinyentana telucwaningo letiholwa yi-GEO.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tlhomiwa ga letsholo la OTM ka Lamatlhatso, 1 Diphalane 2022, ka fa tlase ga moono: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmogo re aga mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa a agang le go tsweledisa boiphediso”.

src_text: Imphala Inyanga Yetekutfutsa (i-OTM) –.
tgt_text: Letsholo la OTM la ngwaga le ngwaga le dirisediwa go oketsa temoso ya dipalangwa jaaka nngwe ya dikarolo tsa botlhokwa tsa kgolo ya ikonomi le tlhabololo ya dibaka.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa kwemkhankhaso we-OTM ngeMgcibelo, mhla lu-1 Imphala 2022, ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sishov’ingolovane: ndzawonye sakha sakhiwonchanti kutekutfutsa lesakha siphindze simamise timphilo”.
tgt_text: Go tla nna le ditiragatso di le mmalwa go bontsha dintlha tse di farologaneng tsa mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa diphofo, mawatle, dipalangwa tsa botlhe le ditsela.

src_text: I-OTM yeminyaka yonkhe isetjentiselwa kucaphelisa ngetekutfutsa njengalenye yetintfo letibalulekile ekukhuleni kwemnotfo kanye nekutfutfukiswa kwendzawo.
tgt_text: Gape ditiragatso di tla oketsa temoso malebana le pabalesego le tshireletsego ya dipalangwa.

src_text: Kutokwentiwa imisebenti leminyentana kukhombisa imikhakha leyehlukene yesakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa kutekundiza, taselwandle, tekutfutsa umphakatsi kanye nemigwaco.
tgt_text: Go tla nna gape le dipuisano le baamegi go buisanela dikgwetlho tse di farologaneng mo lephateng la dipalangwa.

src_text: Lemisebenti itophindze icaphelise mayelana netekuphepha netekuvikeleka kutekutfutsa.
tgt_text: Puso sa ntse itlamile go tokafatsa mafaratlhatlha dipalangwa naga, kwa metsemagaeng le metsesetoropong, go dira gore go nne bonolo go nolofatsa motsamao wa dithoto le batho.

src_text: Kutophindze kubanjwe tinkhulumiswano nalabatsintsekako kuze kucociswane ngetinsayeya letehlukene emkhakheni wetekutfutsa.
tgt_text: Kopano ya Lenaneo la Ditšhabakopano la Manno Batho - Habitat (UN-HABITAT).

src_text: Hulumende usatibophelele ekwenteni ncono sakhiwonchanti setekutfutsa selive, etindzaweni tasemaphandleni netasemadolobheni, kuze kube lula kutfutfwa kwetimphahla nebantfu ngendlela lesebentako nalenelisako.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga kopano ya ditokololo tsa UN-HABITAT kwa Johannesburg ka la bo 16 le la bo 17 Diphalane..  Lefapha la Manno Batho le tla gokaganya kopano eno ya matsatsi le mabedi e tla tsenelwang ke baeteledipele ba sepolotiki, badiri le babatlisisi, go akarediwa ditokololo tsa botlhokwa tsa Komiti ya Baemedi ba Leruri ba UN-HABITAT ba ba kwa Nairobi, Kenya.

src_text: Umhlangano Wenhlangano Yetive Letihlangene (UN) WeluHlelo Lekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu (UN-HABITAT).
tgt_text: Dintlha tsa botlhokwa tse di tla buisanelwang di tla akaretsa go batla ditsereganyo tse di lereng diphetogo mo mafelong baipei le ditakana.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kusingatfwa kwemhlangano wemalunga e-UN-HABITAT eJozi mhla ti-16 namhla ti-17 Imphala.
tgt_text: Ditlamorago tsa dipuisano tseno di tla konosediwa ka go tlhomiwa ga Letlhomeso la Thulaganyo ya Ditiragatso e Akaretsang e tla tlhagisiwang kwa Kokoanonopeomolaong ya UN-HABITAT go tlhomamisiwa ka  Melao e Kwalolotsweng Sešwa.
Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Lekgotla la Naga la go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Pogiso le Polao ya Basadi le Basetsana (GBVF) wa.

src_text: Litiko Letekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu litocondzanisa lomhlangano wemalanga lamabili lotohanjelwa tingcweti tetembusave, bongoti kanye nebacwaningi, lokufaka emalunga labalulekile eliKomidi Lebameleli Ngalokugcwele Be-UN-HABITAT lelitinte eNairobi, eKenya.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Lekgotla la Naga la go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa Pogiso le Polao ya Basadi le Basetsana (GBVF) wa 2021 ka isiwa kwa Palamenteng go sekasekiwa.

src_text: Tindzaba letibalulekile lokutocociswana ngato tifaka kufuna kungenelela kwetingucuko emikhukhwini kanye nasemijondolo.
tgt_text: Molao yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono tlhagisa leano la go tsamaisa tiro le le leng mo molaong le le laelang gore go tlhamiwe setheo sa molao se se tla samaganang ka tolamo le GBVF.

src_text: Imiphumela yalokucocisana itoholela ekwetfulweni kweluHlaka Lwekusebenta Lwemhlaba Wonkhe, lolutokwetfulwa eMhlanganweni We-UN-HABITAT kuze kutsi lugunyatwe nga-  IMitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Molao ono gape laela gore go tlhamiwe le Boto ya Lekgotla e tla okamang maemo taolo ya setheo seno mmogo le go okama dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Thulaganyo ya Maano Naga GBVF Kabinete ka kgwedi ya Diphalane 2020 amogetseng gore tsenngwe tirisong.

src_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo weMkhandlu Wavelonkhe Wekuhlukunyetwa Ngekwebulili Nekubulawa Kwalabasikati (i-GBVF) wa-.
tgt_text: Mo kemeding yotlhe ya boto eno 51% tla nna baagi mme 49% tla nna puso.

src_text: IKhabhinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMkhandlu Wavelonkhe WeMtsetfosivivinyo we-GBVF wa-2021 kuze ucutjungulwe.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa go batla maikutlo setšhaba ka molao ono di setse di garetswe.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uniketa luhlaka lwemtsetfo kuze kusungulwe sigungu lesisemtsetfweni lesitoniketa kungenelela lokucondzene ngco nekubukana ne-GBVF.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko le Didirisiwa tsa Eleketeroniki tsa Motsoko le tsa go Goga Motsoko wa.

src_text: Iphindze inikete kusungulwa kweBhodi yeMkhandlu letoniketa buholi lobunetindlelasu futsi wengamele kucaliswa kweluHlelo Lwendlelasu Yavelonkhe nge-GBVF, lolwavunywa yiKhabhinethi ngeMphala 2020 kutsi lucalwe.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko le Didirisiwa tsa Eleketeroniki tsa Motsoko le tsa go Goga Motsoko wa 2018 o batlang go phimola Molao wa ga jaana wa Taolo ya Ditlhagiswa tsa Motsoko wa ngwaga wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) go ya ka fao kwalolotsweng sešwa ka gone.

src_text: Lebhodi itoba nemalunga lama-51% etinhlanganweni temphakatsi kanye nema-49% lavela kuhulumende.
tgt_text: Gape Molao yo Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono batla go maatlafatsa dikgato tsa naga tsa boitekanelo jwa setšhaba le go di lepalepanya le Tumelano ya Letlhomeso la Setheo sa Lefatshe sa Boitekanelo malebana le Taolo ya Motsoko.

src_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo sewundlulile ekubonisaneni nemphakatsi.
tgt_text: Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa yono tshitshinya, gareng ga tse dingwe, gore motsoko se tlhole gogelwa fa gare ga batho mo mafelong ka fa gare ga meago le mo mafelong mangwe kwa ntle ga meago; go ilediwa go rekisiwa ga metsoko mo metšhining e rekisang, mme ema nokeng ntlha e buang ka diphuthelwana tsa metsoko le ya matshwao tsiboso.

src_text: UMtsetfosivivinyo wa-2018 wekuLawulwa kweMikhicito yeLigwayi kanye naSikilidi we-elekthronikhi.
tgt_text: Go dirilwe dikgato tse di tseneletseng tsa go batla maikutlo setšhaba le bao ba amegang ba ba farologaneng, go akarediwa intaseteri ya motsoko, mekgatlho ya baagi le mafapha a maleba puso  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: IKhabinethi igunyate kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo wa-2018 wekuLawulwa kweMikhicito yeLigwayi kanye neSikilidi we-Elekthronikhi, lokuhloswe ngawo kucedza uMtsetfo lokhona manje Wekulawula Imikhicito yeLigwayi, wa-1993 (uMtsetfo 83 wa-1993), njengoba uchitjiyelwe.
tgt_text: Kopano ya bo77 ya Kokoanokakaretso ya Ditšhabakopano (UNGA77).

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose nekucinisa tinyatselo telive tetemphilo yemphakatsi futsi ticondzaniswe neSivumelwane Seluhlaka Lwekulawula Ligwayi Senhlangano Yetemphilo Yemhlaba.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla nna le seabe mo UNGA77 e diragalang kwa ntlokgolo ya UN kwa New York City kwa USA go tloga ka la bo 20 go fitlha ka la bo 27 Lwetse 2022 ka fa tlase ga moono: “Motlha wa diphetogo: Re bulela ditharabololo tsa diphetogo tsa dikgwetlho tse di golaganeng”.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlongota, kulokunye, ema-100% ekungabhemeli endlini nakuletinye tindzawo letingaphandle; kuvinjelwa kwekutsengiswa kweligwayi ngemishini yekutsengisa, kanye nekucinisa kupakishwa kweligwayi kanye netimphawu letisicwayiso.
tgt_text: Mo dikarolong tse di mo Borwa mo lefatsheng, ditlamorago tsa ikonomi le tsa go itirela letseno ga baagi tse di bakilweng ke Bolwetse jwa Mogare wa Corona (COVID-19) ga di lekalekane le tsa dinaga tse di ikgonang kwa Bokone fa go lebeletswe go itharabologelwa ga dinaga tseno mme seno se tlhoka gore go nne le maiteko a tlhakanetsweng ditšhaba tsotlhe go netefatsa gore ga go ope yo salelang kwa morago.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo sewundlule ekubonisaneni lokubanti nalabatsintsekako labehlukene, lokufaka imboni yeligwayi, tinhlangano temiphakatsi kanye nematiko ahulumende lafanele  Imicimbi Letako.
tgt_text: Pele ga Kopano ya UN ka Dingangisano tsa Merero ka go Farologana, Rre António Guterres tla bitsa samiti ya “Go fetola Thuto” mme go tla tshwarwa kopano e tsenelwang ke batho ba maemo a kwa godimo mme mogopolo mo kopanong eno tla tsepamisiwa mo Dipeelong tsa Tlhabololo tse di Nnelang Ruri (di-SDG).

src_text: ISeshini yema-77th yeMbutsano Lotayelekile we-UN.
tgt_text: Go solofetswe gore kopano ya di-SDG tlhotlhomise ditsela tsa go busetsa motsamao le go akofisa tsenyotirisong ya tsona.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itibandzakanye ku-UNGA77 letoba endlunkhulu ye-UN eDolobheni laseNew York e-USA kusukela mhla ka-20 kuya kumhla ka-27 INyoni 2022 ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Sikhatsi sekuhlukanisa: Kuvula ticatululo tengucuko tetinsayeya letitfungene”.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Ngwaoboswa.

src_text: Emaveni laseNingizimu, umtselela kutemnotfo nakutenhlalomnotfo wabhubhane we-Coronavirus (COVID-19) awukalingani nawucatsaniswa nekululama eNyakatfo letfutfukile futsi loku kudzinga umtamo lobumbene kuto tonkhe tive kuze kucinisekiswe kutsi akekho losalela emuva.
tgt_text: Moporesidente Ramaphosa tla neela puo ya letsatsi kwa meletlong ya Letsatsi la Bosetšhaba la Ngwaoboswa la 2022 kwa Union Buildings ka Lamatlhatso, 24 Lwetse.

src_text: Andvulela Inkhulumomphikiswano Jikelele ye-UN, Nobhala-Jikelele we-UN, Mnu António Guterres, utobita ingcungcutsela lemayelana "Nengucuko Kutemfundvo" futsi abambe umhlangano losezingeni lelisetulu lobuke etiNhlosweni tekuTfutfukiswa Lokusimeme (ema-SDG).
tgt_text: Tiragalo eno tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga moono: “Re keteka Boswa jwa ga Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso wa Aforika Borwa”.

src_text: Umhlangano wema-SDGs kulindzeleke kutsi uhlole tindlela tekutfola umfutfo futsi usheshise kucaliswa kwato.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Ngwaoboswa monongwaga bua ka mmino wa setso wa Aforika Borwa, go totilwe mmino wa Isicathamiya gammogo le seabe se segolo se nnileng le sona mo metshamekong, botsweretshing, setsong le mo ngwaobosweng.

src_text: Lilanga Lemagugu.
tgt_text: Moono wa teng tlotlomatsa segopotso sa bo 60 sa go tlhokafala ga rammino le motlhami yono wa mmino, Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), yo gape itsegeng jaaka Solomon Ntsele, yo itsegeng thata jaaka motlhami wa pina ya “Mbube”.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utokwetfula inkhulumo yelusuku emgubhweni weLilanga Lemagugu Lavelonkhe la-2022 e-Union Buildings ngeMgcibelo, mhlaka-24 INyoni.
tgt_text: Tiragalo e Diragalang mmogo ya Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Dikepe ya.

src_text: Lomcimbi utobanjwa ngaphansi kwendzikimba letsi: “Kubungata Lifa LaSolomon Linda Nemculo Wemdzabu waseNingizimu Afrika”.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla bo tshwere Mokete wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Mawatle o Diragalang mmogo le wa Kgwedi ya Diphalane ya Dipalangwa (OTP) ya 2022 kwa Durban go tloga ka la bo 12 go fitlha ka la bo 14 Diphalane.

src_text: INyanga Yemagugu yalomnyaka icondzene ngco nemculo wesintfu waseNingizimu Afrika ikakhulukati emculweni wesicathamiya kanye neligalelo lawo lelikhulu kutemidlalo, tebuciko, emasiko nemagugu.
tgt_text: Mokete ono tla tshwarwa ka nako le nngwe le ya go keteka OTM le yona tla bong le karolo ya go tsweletsa temoso ya lephata la rona la dikepe.

src_text: Indzikimba ihlonipha iminyaka lema-60 kwandlula emhlabeni umculi, Longumhlabeleli nemcambi wetingoma Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962), lowatiwa ngaSolomon Ntsele, nalowadvuma kakhulu njengemcambi wengoma letsi, “Mbube”.
tgt_text: Mokete ono tla tsenelwa ke bannaleseabe go tswa kwa dinageng tse di farologaneng ba ba tla itemogelang intaseteri ya dikepe ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Umcimbi Wekulinganisa Welilanga Letaselwandle La-.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa sale le tokololo ya Mokgatlho wa Boditšhabatšhaba wa Mawatle go tloga ka 1995 leng setheo se se itlhophileng sa UN se maikarabelo sona leng go laola dithulaganyo tsa go rwala dithoto tse di romelwang ka dikepe.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itobe isingatse Umcimbi Wekulinganisa WeliLanga Letaselwandle Lemnyaka wa-2022 eThekwini kusukela mhla ka-12 kuya mhla ka-14 Imphala.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bojanala.

src_text: Lomcimbi utosingatfwa ngesikhatsi se-OTM, nayo letoba yincenye yekucaphelisa ngemkhakha wetfu wetaselwandle.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Bojanala monongwaga ketekwa ka fa tlase ga moono wa Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Bojanala (27 Lwetse) wa “Re akanya sešwa ka ga Bojanala”.

src_text: Lomcimbi utoletsa titfunywa letivela emaveni lahlukene letitotibonela imboni yetaselwandle yaseNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Bojanala jwa ka fa nageng bo botlhokwa mo go itharabologelweng ga lephata la Bojanala, le le nang le seabe se segolo mo Letsenong la Ditlhagisiwa tsa Dikuno (GDP) la ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa le go tlhamiwa ga ditiro.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika ibe lilunga leNhlangano Yetaselwandle Yemave Ngemave kusukela nga-1995, lokusikhungo lesikhetsekile se-UN lesibukene nekulawula imikhumbi.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumeletse gore lephata la Bojanala le nnile le koketsego ya baeti morago ga paka ya COVID-.

src_text: Inyanga Yetekuvakasha.
tgt_text: Maeto a tserweng ka fa nageng ke le.

src_text: INyanga Yetekuvakasha kulomnyaka igujwa ngaphansi kwendzikimba yeLilanga Lemhlaba Letekuvakasha (27 INyoni) lelitsi “Kucabanga Kuvakasha Futsi”.
tgt_text: 2 milione a tserweng mo karolong ya ntlha ya 2022 mme bontshitse koketsego ya 114% fa go bapisiwa le paka eo ka.

src_text: Tekuvakasha tasekhaya tibalulekile ekuvuseleleni umkhakha wetekuvakasha, loneligalelo lelikhulu kuGDP yaseNingizimu Afrika nasekudaleni imisebenti.
tgt_text: Seno se bontshitse tokafalo e bonalang mo pakeng eo ka 2019, mo go nnileng le maeto a ka fa nageng le.

src_text: IKhabhinethi ikujabulele kutsi umkhakha wetekunakekela kutekuvakasha urekhode kwenyuka kwetivakashi ngemuva kwesikhatsi seCovid-.
tgt_text: 6 milione.

src_text: Bantfu labatigidzile-.
tgt_text: Jaaka karolo ya go keteka Kgwedi ya Bojanala, Kabinete rotloetsa MaAforika Borwa go tsaya maeto ‘Shotleft’ go ya kwa diporofenseng tse di farologaneng.

src_text: 2  batsatfwe luhambo ngesigamu sekucala sa-2022, loku kusho kutsi sibalo setivakashisikhuphuke ngema-114% nakucatsaniswa nesikhatsi lesifanako sa-.
tgt_text: Gape Kabinete neseditse pula tshwetso ya setlamo sa Air Belgium go bulela difofane tse di tswang kwa nageng eo go leba ka fa Aforika Borwa, go simolola ka kgwedi yona eno (ya Lwetse) leng se se tla godisang bojanala le go dira gore re tsetsepele mo maemong rona go nna mmamoratwa fa go tla mo go tsa bojanala.

src_text: Loku kukhombisa kukhuphuka lokubonakalako kwesikhatsi lesifanako sa-2019, lapho bantfu labatigidzi letingema-.
tgt_text: Tsona di tla akaretsa difofane tsa beke le beke go ya Cape Town le Johannesburg  Melaetsa.

src_text: 6 batsatfwe mahambo asekhaya.
tgt_text: Go AkgolaKabinete akgotse le go eleletsa masego:Moporesidente William Samoei Ruto wa Rephaboliki ya Kenya, yo tlhomilweng ka Labobedi, 13 Lwetse 2022, go latela ditlhopho tsa bosetšhaba tse di neng di rena kagiso tse di neng di tshwerwe ka 9 Phatwe.

src_text: Njengencenye yekugubha iNyanga Yetekuvakasha, iKhabhinethi ikhutsata bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi batsatse emahambo nge’Shotleft’ baye etifundzeni tetfu letehlukene.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesidente David Mabuza mo boemong jwa ga Moporesidente Ramaphosa, le puso le batho ba Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa ne tsenetse mokete ono wa go tlhomiwa mo setulong.Mokgatlho wa Rakabii wa Aforika Borwa le Motsemogolo wa Cape Town ka go tshwara ka katlego legato la borobedi la thonamente ya Rugby World Cup Sevens magareng ga la bo 9 le la bo 11 Lwetse ne le la ntlha tiragalo eno ya mabono tshwarelwa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa mme diketekete tsa balatedi ba ba neng ba tsenetse ba itemogetse lebebe la rakabii le kamogelo e tumileng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: IKhabhinethi iphindze yemukela sincumo se-Air Belgium sekundiza kwetindiza tesizini letita eNingizimu Afrika, kusukela kulenyanga (iNyoni), lokutocinisa tekuvakasha kubuye kusimise simo setfu njengendzawo lesingakhetsa kuyivakashela.
tgt_text: MatshedisoKabinete rometse matshediso go bamalapa le ditsala tsa:Bana ba sekolo ba le 18 le bagolo ba babedi ba ba tlhokafetseng mo kotsing e setlhogo kwa Pongola, kwa KwaZulu-Natala ka Labotlhano, 16 Lwetse 2022 morago ga gore lori e nang le letoroko thulane ka dinko le bene e neng pegile barutwana  Ba ba Thapilweng.

src_text: Sitofaka ekhatsi tindiza emavikini onkhe letiya eKapa naseJozi  Imilayeto.
tgt_text: Pele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang  Rre Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale thapilwe go okama maemo Mokaedikakaretso (DG): mo lephateng la Mokomišinara wa Bosetšhaba wa Lefapha la Ditirelo tsa Kgopololo  Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati thapilwe go okama maemo Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo lephateng la merero ya Dikolo tsa Kalafo tsa Thuto e kwa Godimo le ya go Tlhatlhelela Badiri mo Lefapheng la Boitekanelo  Rre Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki thapilwe go okama maemo Mosekasekikakaretso-Mogolo kwa Lefapheng la Temothuo, Ntšhwafatso ya Mafatshe le Tlhabololo ya Magae  Rre Phaswa Phineas Mamogale thapilwe go okama maemo Motlhankedimogolo wa Ditšhelete kwa Lefapheng la Boitekanelo.

src_text: Kutfolakala kwemanti.
tgt_text: Tshomarelo ya Metsi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ibonge bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika ngekutfobela imibandzela yemanti lesetjentiswe etindzaweni letitsite taseJozi, taseTshwane netase-Ekurhuleni kute kusimamiswe linani lemanti lasemadamini.
tgt_text: Kabibete lebogile Maaforika Borwa jaaka ba ikobetse dikgato tsa go somarela metsi tse di tsentsweng tirisong mo dikarolong tse di rileng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni go dira bonnete jwa gore matamo metsi ga kgale.

src_text: Emadamu netilulu temanti tisaloku ticindzetelekile ngenca yemazinga ekushisa lasetulu eGauteng, futsi kukhula kwesidzingo semanti kuphocelele i-Rand Water kutsi inciphise kakhulu kuphakelwa kwemanti kubomasipala.
tgt_text: Metsi mo matamong le mo madutelong metsi tswelela go dirisiwa ka bontsi ka ntlha ya dithemphereitšha tse di kwa godimo go ralala Gauteng, mme tiriso eno ya metsi e kwa godimo bakile gore Rand Water fokotse thata metsi e tlamelang bommasepaleng.

src_text: Lesikhungo lesilusito sekuphakela emanti siphakela emanti ekunatsa ngebunyenti ebantfwini labangetulu kwetigidzi leti-11 eGauteng, etincenyeni letitsite teMpumalanga, eFreyistata naseNyakatfo Nshonalanga.
tgt_text: Setheo se sa tlamelo ya metsi se tlamela ka metsi mantsi go batho ba feta dimilione tse 11 mo Gauteng le mo dikarolong tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisetata le Bokone Bophirima..   Maikaelelo dikgato tseno tsa go somarela metsi, tse go seng tsela epe re ka di tilang ka yona, ke go dira bonnete jwa gore re nne le metsi a sa kgaleng mme re tla tswelela go ikobela tsona go fitlha maemo tokafala.

src_text: Lemibandzela lengavimbeleki ihlose kuvikela kutfolakala kwemanti futsi itawuhlala ikhona site simo sibe ncono.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse go baagi go tswelela go ikobela dikgato tsa go somarela metsi le go nna le seabe mo go diriseng metsi ka tshomarelo..   Go Ngala Ditiro kwa Transnet.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela ummango kutsi uchubeke nekutfobela lemibandzela yemanti nekutsi udlale indzima yekutsi usebentise lensita leyimvela kancane ngendlela leyongako.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse tumelano ya meputso go dumelanweng ka yona ya dingwaga tse tharo magareng ga Transnet le United National Transport Union (UNTU) e tsenang tirisong go tloga ka la bo 1 Moranang 2022 go fitlha ka la bo 31 Mopitlwe.

src_text: Siteleka sase-Transnet.
tgt_text: Khomišene ya Thuanyo, Tsereganyo le Katlholelo tseregantse mo tumelanong e e tlisitseng boipelaetso ba ditokololo tsa UNTU kwa bokhutlong ka gangwe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyasamukela lesivumelwano semiholo seminyaka lemitsatfu lesisemkhatsini kwe-Transnet nenyonyane yebasebenti i-United National Transport Union (i-UNTU), lesitawusebenta kusuka mhla lu-1 Mabasa 2022 kuya kumhla tinge-31 Indlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gape tshwetso ya South African Transport and Allied Workers Union ya go fedisa go ngala ditiro.

src_text: Ikhomishini Yekubuyisana, Yekungenelela Neyekulamula beyengamele lomhlangano lote nalesivumelwano, locedze lesiteleka samanje semalunga e-UNTU ngaleso sikhatsi.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboga boineelo jo bo dirilweng ke Transnet mabapi le go tsepamisa mogopolo mo tirong e saletseng kwa morago mo ditirelong tsa go rwala dithoto ka dikepe le diterene e bakilweng ke go ngala ditiro leng se se amileng ikonomi le makala a ikaegileng ka ditirelo tse ka tsela e sa itumediseng..   Kabinete lebogile tshegetso le tirisanommogo e neetsweng ke lekala la kgwebo mo pakeng ya go ngala ditiro.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yasemukela sincumo se-South African Transport and Allied Workers (i-SATAWU) sekucedza lesiteleka.
tgt_text: Tshegetso eno rotloetsa kamano e tswelelang magareng ga boeteledipele ba Transnet le badiri leng se se tla tswelang mosola setlamo se le ikonomi ya naga..   Dikamano tsa Aforika Borwa – Saudi Arabia.
Kabinete amogetse Leeto la Tiro le le atlegileng kwa Pusong ya Saudi Arabia ka Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa ka la bo 15 le la bo 16 Diphalane.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokutibophelela kwe-Transnet ekutseni itawugcila kakhulu ekususeni kusilela emuva lokwenteke kuto tonkhe tikhumulo temikhumbi nasemizileni yetitimela ngalesikhatsi salesiteleka, lokube nemtselela lomubi kutemnotfo nakumikhakha lencike kulemisebenti.
tgt_text: Mo leetong le, dinaga tse pedi tse di saenile Dimemorantamo tsa Tirisanommogo (di-MoU) mo makaleng a farologaneng a jaaka la temothuo, la bodirelatlhapi, la meepo, la metlakase e fetlhiwang ka ditsela tse dintšhwa, la tshireletso, la dipalangwa le la temothuo ya ditlhagisiwa tsa mo metsing.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ibonge kakhulu lokwesekelwa nekubambisana lokuniketwe betemabhizinisi ngalesikhatsi salesiteleka.
tgt_text: Di-MoU tse dingwe tse di saenilweng di ka ga go tlhongwa ga Lekgotla la Kgwebo ya Motlhakanelwa, tirisano mo diintasetering tsa sesole le theko, gammogo le tirisano mo makaleng dipatlisiso tsa thutamaje.

src_text: Igcugcutela kutsi buchubeke lobudlelwane lobusemkhatsini kwebaphatsi nebasebenti base-Transnet kute lenkampani netemnotfo tikhone kuzuza.
tgt_text: Moporesitente dirisitse leeto le go laletsa dikgwebo tsa Saudi Arabia go tsenela khonferense ya botlhano ya peeletso ya Aforika Borwa e tla tshwarwang ka.

src_text: Budlelwane emkhatsini kweNingizimu Afrika neSaudi Arabia.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke mogwebisani le Aforika Borwa wa maemo bobedi ka bogolo mo Dinageng tsa Botlhabagare bile ke lefelo le legolo le dinaga tsa kgaolo eno di rekang mo go lona ditlhagisiwa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwemukela kuhamba kwaMengameli Cyril Ramaphosa lokube yimphumelelo Ayovakashela Ngekwemsebenti Bukhosi baseSaudi Arabia mhla ti-15 namhla ti-16 Imphala.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa boditšhaba magareng ga dinaga tsoopedi di nnile le seabe se sentle mo mererong ya kgwebisano le bobeeletsi..   Peeletso mo Mafaratlhatlheng.

src_text: Kulokuvakasha, lamave lamabili asayine tivumelwano tekusebentisana (ema-MoU) leti-17 kumikhakha lehlukahlukene lefana netekulima, tekudvweba, tetimbiwa, temandla lavikela simondzawo, tekuvikela, tekutfutsa netekulima ngetitjalo nangetilwane tasemantini.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go thankgololwa ga polante ya tlhagiso ya maemo a kwa godimo ka motlhagisi yo gaisang wa boditšhaba, ALPLA Group, kwa Lanseria mo Gauteng.

src_text: Letinye tivumelwano letisayiniwe timayelana nekusungula Umkhandlu Wetemabhizinisi Lohlangene, kusebentisana kumkhakha wetetimboni tetetimphi netekutsengiselana, kanye nekusebentisana kutesayensi lemayelana nekuhlola ematje nemhlaba.
Mengameli usebentise lokuvakasha kumema bosomabhizinisi baseSaudi Arabia kutsi bete eNingizimu Afrika kulenkhomfa yesihlanu Yekutjala timali letawubanjwa ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Se se netefatsa boineelo ba ga Moporesitente Ramaphosa ba go tlhoma tlhabololo ya mafaratlhatlha jaaka tsela e ka tsosang ikonomi le go oketsa ditiro..   Peeletso ya bokana ka didolara tse dimilione tse 50 ke seabe sa botlhokwa mo leaning le legolong la Toropokgolo ya Ditirodintsi ya Lanseria e tla kgweetsang tswelelo le tirisogape gammogo le go tlhola le go boloka ditiro tse.

src_text: I-Saudi Arabia ingumlingani weNingizimu Afrika wesibili ngebukhulu kutekuhwebelana kulesigodzi saseMphumalanga Lemaphakatsi futsi ihamba embili ekutsengeni tintfo letibuya kulesigodzi.
tgt_text: Mo go yona go akarediwa lenaneo la go ithutela tiro la baithutela mekhateroniki ba le 36 le borathekeniki ba tirisogape ba ditirelo tsa ALPLA go ralala borwa jwa Aforika.

src_text: Budlelwane betemave emhlaba emkhatsini walamave lamabili bente kutsi kube nemtselela lomuhle kutekuhwebelana netelutjalomali..   Kutjala Timali Kusakhiwonchanti.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la go ithutela tiro le tla simolola ka 2023, mme baithutela tiro ba ntlha ba le 12 ba Aforika Borwa ba tla bo ba tswa mo mafelong selegae..   Ditiragalo tsa Meepo tse di seng mo Molaong.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi kusungulwe imboni lesezingeni lemhlaba lekhicita iplasitiki lekutawentiwa yimboni lehamba embili emhlabeni, i-ALPLA Group, eLanseria eGauteng.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong di phuaganya metse mo setšhabeng sa borona mmogo le ikonomi ya rona, le go baka tatlhegelo ya lotseno go bobedi puso le lekala la meepo..   Kabinete itumedisitswe ke go amogiwa moselesele wa ditlhobolo le go tshwarwa ga babelaelwa ba le 20 ba ba golaganngwang le ditiragalo tsa meepo tse di seng mo molaong ka nako ya letsholo le le neng la dirwa kwa šafoteng ya moepo wa Stilfontein kwa Bokone Bophirima..   Kabinete ikuela go Maaforika Borwa go tswelela go dirisana le ditheo tsa molao go dira bonnete jwa gore matsholo thibelo ya bosenyi isago le ona atlega.

src_text: Loku kucinisa kutibophelela kwaMengameli Ramaphosa ekubekeni kutfutfukisa sakhiwonchanti njengendlela yekuvuselela kukhulisa umnotfo neyekukhulisa ematfuba emisebenti..   Lolutjalomali lolubita imali letigidzi leti-50 temadola aseMelika lufaka ligalelo lelimcoka kuloluhlelo lolukhulu lwekwakhiwa kwelidolobha i-Lanseria Smart City lolutawuhambisa embili kusimama kwenta imikhicito lemisha ngetintfo lesetilahliwe kanye nekwakha kuphindze futsi kusekelwe ematfuba emisebenti lenge-.
tgt_text: Se se tla romela molaetsa o bogale wa gore bosenyi ga bo duele, le gore disenyi di tla tshwarwa le go sekisiswa ntle le poifo kgotsa kgethololo..   Motlakase.

src_text: Lokunye lokutawuba khona luhlelo lwekucecesha bafundzi labange-36 babe bonjiniyela bemishini yebucwepheshe nekuba bocwepheshe bekwenta imikhicito lemisha ngetintfo lesetilahliwe be-ALPLA Group leyenta umsebenti kuso sonkhe sigodzi lesingaseningizimu kwe-Afrika.
tgt_text: Go sale gale Eskom saenile ditumelano tsa kadimo tsa dingwaga tse 30 le babeeletsi ba bafetlhi ba ba ba ikemetseng ba motlakase ba le bane go aga mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhiwa ga motlakase o phepa kwa diteišeneng tsa motlakase tsa Majuba le Tutuka kwa Mpumalanga.

src_text: Loluhlelo lwekuceceshwa ufundza lutawucala ngemnyaka we-2023, lapho khona bafundzi labatawucala kuceceshwa laba-12 baseNingizimu Afrika batawutsatfwa emimangweni yakuleyondzawo.
tgt_text: Dikadimo tse tsa lefatshe di tla ngoka peeletso e lekanyediwang go diranta di le dibilione tse.

src_text: Kumbiwa kwetimbiwa lokungekho emtsetfweni.
Kumbiwa kwetimbiwa lokungekho emtsetfweni kulimata imimango netemnotfo, futsi kubanga kutsi kulahleke imalingena kuhulumende nakumkhakha wetetimayini.
tgt_text: Babeeletsi ba bane ba - HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le  Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – ba tla tsenya bonnye dimekawate di le 2 000 mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase bosetšhaba..   Mothamo mošwa wa go fetlhwa ga motlakase solofelwa go golaganngwa mo mafaratlhatlheng motlakase mo dikgweding tse 24 go ya go 36 go tloga ka konosetso ya tsa matlole, go ikaegilwe ka ditetlelelo tsa tikologo, tlhaolo ya lefatshe le tse dingwe tsa taolo..   Dikgato tsa go Dira Bonnete jwa gore Naga ga Tlhaele Dijo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela lokutfolakala kwetibhamu letinengi letingekho emtsetfweni nekuboshwa kwebasolwa labange-20 labatsintsekako kulokumbiwa kwetimbiwa letingekho emtsetfweni ngalesikhatsi kwentiwa luphenyo eStilfontein eNyakatfo Nshonalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse gore Kopano ya Agri SA ya 2022 tshwarelwe kwa Pretoria ka la bo 13 le la bo 14 Diphalane 2022 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Re Kotula seo re se Jetseng ka fa Nageng”.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icela bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi bachubeke basebentisane nema-ejensi etemtsetfo kucinisekisa kutsi kuba nemphumelelo emisebentini yekulwa nebugebengu esikhatsini lesitako.
tgt_text: Kopano e ne buisanela merero e jaaka go dira gore maanomagolo temothuo direle balemi ba naga; mafaratlhatlha a boikanyego tlhagiso ya dijo ya selegae go isa isagong, le go matlafatsa bokgoni ba batlhagisi ba dijo go dira ka ditlhagiswa tse di jetsweng mono..   Mo dikgatong tse dingwe gape tsa go dira bonnete jwa gore naga ga tlhaele dijo, Kabinete amogetse gape go thankgololwa ga Sefala sa Bosetšhaba sa Tshireletso ya Dimela le Diphologolo, ke Lenaneo la Semphato sa Itlhamelo mo go tsa Temothuo le Ikonomi ya Dimela le Diphologolo sa Lefapha la Saense le Boitlhamelo, ka tirisano le Yunibesithi ya Pretoria.

src_text: Loku kutawutfumela umlayeto lonemandla wekutsi bugebengu abukhokheli, nekutsi tigebengu titawubanjwa bese tiyashushiswa ngaphandle kwekusaba noma kwekuvuna luhlangotsi.
tgt_text: Sefala se se tla tshegetsa thibelo, phokotso le taolo ya malwetse dimela le diphologolo leng se se tla oketsang tlhagiso, tshireletso ya dijo le tlhabololo e tsepameng ya metsemagae   Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Temandla.
tgt_text: Mametlelelo ya Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng ya Mokgatlo wa Tirisano ya Aforika (AU).

src_text: I-Eskom isandza kusayina tivumelwano tekucashisa teminyaka lenge-30 nebatjali timali labakhicita gezi labatimele labane kute bakhe umkhicito wemtsamo lomusha wetemandla langabulali simondzawo etiteshini iMajuba neTutuka eMpumalanga.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tšhata ya AU ka ga Meono le Melawana ya Tsamaiso e Seng ya Bogareng, Bobusi ba Selegae le Tlhabololo ya Selegae gore mametlelelwe.

src_text: Lokucashiswa kwalomhlaba kutawuheha lutjalomali lolulinganiselwa kutigidzigidzi letinge-R..   Labatjalimali labane –i-HDF Energy South Africa, i-Red Rocket SA, i-Sola Group ne-Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – batawungeta lokungenani ema-megawatts la-2000 kulegridi yagezi wavelonkhe..   Lomkhicito wemtsamo lomusha kulindzeleke kutsi uchunywe kugridi yavelonkhe esikhatsini lesisemkhatsini kwetinyanga letinge-24 kuya kuletinge-36 kusuka ngembi kwekuvalwa kwetetimali, lokutawuya ngekugunyatwa ngumtsetfo wetesimondzawo, wekuhlelwa kwemhlaba kanye nangalokunye kuvumeleka kwemitsetfo..   Kutfolakala kwekudla.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa saenile Tšhata ka Phatwe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyakwamukela kungenisa Ingcungcutsela ye-Agri SA yemnyaka we-2022 ePitoli mhla ti-14 Imphala 2022 ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Kulima Eveni Lakitsi”.

LeNgcungcutsela yacocisana mayelana netintfo letifana nekwenta kutsi luhlelo lolukhulu lwetekulima lusebentele balimi bakuleli; sakhiwonchanti lesisimeme nekudla lokulinywa kulendzawo; kwenta simondzawo sakuleli sikhone kumelana nekukhicita kudla kwalapha kuleli esikhatsini lesitako; nekukhulisa emandla ebalimi bakuleli kute bakhone kwenta imikhicito yetintfo letilinywa lapha kuleli lakitsi.
tgt_text: Tšhata ya Tsamaiso e seng ya Bogareng tlamela letlhomeso go dinaga tsotlhe tse leng ditokololo setlankana sa kaedi ka ga tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya dithata le ditiro go tswa go puso ya bosešhaba go ya go makala mangwe puso.

src_text: Kuchubeka nekubeka embili kutfolakala kwekudla, Ikhabhinethi futsi iyakwemukela kwetfulwa kwesikhungo savelonkhe lesivimbela magciwane labanga tifo letitsatselanako i-National Biosecurity Hub, ngaphasi kweluhlelo lwe-Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, lokwentiwe Litiko Letesayensi Nekucamba kanye Neluhlelo Lwekusebentisana, libambisene neYunivesithi yasePitoli.
tgt_text: Tšhata samagana bogolo le tsamaiso e seng ya bogareng ya thata le ditiro, letlhomeso la bobusi ba selegae le tlhabololo ya selegae..   Lekgotla la Boditšhaba la Ngwaga le Ngwaga la bo 32 la Pabalesego mo Diporong (IRSC).

src_text: Lesikhungo sitawusekela kuvikela, kunciphisa nekulawula tifo tetitjalo netetilwane, letitawuba neligalelo ekukhuliseni kukhicitwa kwekudla, ekutfolakaleni kwekudla kanye nentfutfuko lesimeme yetindzawo tasemaphandleni   Tincumo TeKhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go tshwarwa ga Kopano ya Ngwaga le Ngwaga ya bo 32 ya IRSC kwa Johannesburg go tloga ka 1 go fitlha ka 6 Diphalane 2023 ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Poposešwa ya diporo mo Lefatsheng le le sa tlhomamisegeng”.

src_text: Kusayinwa Kwemculu Wekusabalalisa Lubumbano Lwemave Ase-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt_text: RSC ke kopano sa boditšhaba e kopanyang dirutegi mo mererong ya pabalesego ya diporo go ralala lefatshe go abelana maitemogelo bona ka maikaelelo go tokafatsa pabalesego ya diporo..   Jaaka tokololo ya IRSC, Molaodi wa Taolo ya Diporo wa Aforika Borwa nnile moamogelabaeng wa kopano la bofelo ka.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamnde kweMculu we-AU lomayelana Nekutiphatsa Netimiso Tekusabalalisa, Kuphatfwa Kwendzawo Yasekhaya Nekutfutfukiswa Kwayo Kute Ucinisekiswe.
INingizimu Afrika isayine lomculu ngenyanga yeNgci.
tgt_text: Seralwa sa Leano la Mafaratlhatlha Bosetšhaba la 2050 (NIP 2050) Kgato ya bo.
Kabinete amogetse go phasaladiwa ga seralwa sa NIP 2050 Kgato ya bo 2 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi.

src_text: Umculu Wekusabalalisa unika onkhe emave langemalunga inchubomgomo leyinkhombandlela lemayelana nekusabalalisa emandla nemisebenti kusukela kuhulumende wavelonkhe kuya kuletinye tinhlaka tahulumende.
tgt_text: Leano le le neelana ka tsela ya go matlafatsa le go tlaleletsa diporojeke tsa puso tse di golaganeng..

src_text: Lomculu ukhuluma kakhulu ngekusabalalisa emandla ekuphatsa nemisebenti, ngenchubomgomo lemayelana nekuphatsa bohulumende basekhaya kanye nangekutfutfukisa indzawo yasekhaya..   Umkhandlu Wemave Emhlaba Wetekuphepha Kutetitimela Wemnyaka we-32 (i-IRSC).
tgt_text: Le tlhagisa diporojeke tsa botlhokwa tsa mafelobonno batho; motlakase wa bommasepala; metsi; matlakala a popota; dipalangwa; mafaratlhatlha thuto le boitekanelo; mafaratlhatlha dijithale, le bosenyi le bobodu..   Popego ya leano le tlamela ka ponelopele ya karolo e tshwanetseng go lejwa tlamela ka tshekatsheko ya maemo ga jaana tlhalosa dipeelo tse di botlhokwa go netefatsa katlego le go tlhalosa tse di tshwanetseng go dirwa go fitlhelela ponelopele eo tshitshinya tsela ya tsenyotirisong e tshwanetseng go dirwa mo pakeng ya dingwaga tse tharo tsa leanotiro..   Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi ubanjelwe kuleli umhlangano Wemnyaka We-IRSC eJozi kusuka mhla lu-1 kuya kumhla ti-6 Imphala 2023 ngaphasi kwalesihloko lesitsi: “Kubumba kabusha tetitimela kuloMhlaba lote siciniseko.”.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale.

src_text: I-IRSC iyinkhundla yemave emhlaba lehlanganisa bocwepheshe betekuphepha kutetitimela labavela kuwo onkhe emave emhlaba kute babelane ngelwati kute kutfutfukiswe tekuphepha kutetitimela..   Njengelilunga le-IRSC, Umlawuli WaseNingizimu Afrika Wetekuphepha Kutetitimela lomcimbi wagcina kusingatsa lenkhundla kuleli ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Letlhomeso le le phasaladitswe ka 2021 go ngoka ditshwaelo tsa baagi..   Letlhomeso le le tlamela ka dipilara tse tlhano tsa ditsereganyo mo go direng Bodiredipuso ba porofešenale.

Dipilara tse di akaretsa go ngoka le tlhaolo ya pele ga go tsena mo Bodiredipusong; peodinakong le tshimololo; thulaganyo le taolo ya tiragatso; thuto e tswelelang le tlhabololo ya porofešenale; le tlhatlogo ka maemo mo tirong le ditiragalo mo tirong..   Diphetogo mo Dipeelong tsa Tiro tsa Bakaedikakaretso (bo DG).

src_text: Luhlaka Lweluhlelo Lwesakhiwonchanti Savelonkhe leti-2050 (i-NIP 2050) Sigaba se-.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse pegelo e tshitshinyang mekgwa ya go matlafatsa nonofo le bokgoni ba bo DG mo Bodiredipusong.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi yavuma kutsi kushicilelwe kumiculu yahulumende luhlaka lwe-NIP 2050 yeSigaba-2 kute kucociswane ngalo nemmango.
tgt_text: Pegelo e dirile ditshitshinyo di le mmalwa, go akaretsa paka ya tiro ya bo DG le taolo ya maatlatiro ka Bothati ba Khuduthamaga go bantlhankedi ba ba rweleng maikarabelo..   Pegelo e tshitshintse gape gore DG mo Kantorong ya Moporesitente tla tsewa gape le Tlhogo ya Botsamaisi ba Puso.

src_text: Loluhlelo lunika sicondziso sekukhulisa nesekungeta imiklamo lehlanganisiwe yendlelalisu lahulumende..   Loluhlaka libuka lemiklamo yendlelalisu nemigomo kutekuhlaliswa kwebantfu; kugezi wamasipala; kutemanti; kunkhukhuma; kutigitjelwa temmango; kutemfundvo; nakusakhiwonchanti setemphilo, kusakhiwonchanti lesidijithali, nakubugebengu nenkhohlakalo..     Indlela loluhlelo lwakheke ngayo inika umbono lomayelana nendzawo lekufuneka isetjentwe, iniketa luhlolo lwesimo samanje, ichaza timo letimcoka lekufuneka tiphumelele futsi iyasho kutsi yini lekufuneka yenteke kute kupheleliswe lombono.
tgt_text: Mo diporofenseng, tiro e tla newa oDG ba ba mo dikantorong tsa Ditonakgolo.

src_text: Ihlongota inchubo yekuphumelelisa lekufuneka itsatfwe kulomjikeleto weluhlelo lwekusebenta lweminyaka lemitsatfu..   Luhlaka Lwavelonkhe Lwekufezekisa Kwenta Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yebucwephesha .
tgt_text: Pegelo e tshitshintse gape mekgwa ya go kaela mafapha ka ga taolo ya dikonteraka tsa bo DG..   Tsamaiso ya Taolo ya Tiragatso ntšhwa ya bo DG a tlhabololwa go nyalanya le diphetogo tse di dumeletsweng..   Tona ya Nama-o-Tshwere ya Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi, Rre Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa kopano ya bobegakgang mo bekeng e tlang go tlhalosa Letlhomeso la Bosetšhaba la Tsenyotirisong la go Dira Bodiredipuso ba Porofešenale le go tlhagisa gape le diphetogo tse di letleletsweng mo dipeelong tsa tiro ya bo DG..   Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya Lekwalopuso la Mabudusatsela ka ga Ditshwanelo tsa Batho ba ba nang le Bogole (WPRPD) ya 2020-.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ilivumile loLuhlaka Lwavelonkhe Lwekufezekisa Kwenta Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yetebuchwephesha.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse Pegelo ya Botlhano ya Tswelopele mo Tsenyotirisong ya WPRPD e tlhagisang peodinakong ka go tsenngwa tirisong ga WPRPD.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti lwashicilelwa kute kucociswane ngalo nemmango ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Pegelo e akaretsa ditshitshinyo go tswa go mafapha puso bosetšhaba le diporofense tlamela ka peodinakong ka ga tsenyotiriosong ya pholisi e akaretsang kabo ya matlole..   Pegelongwaga ya ntlha ya tswelopele phasaladitswe ka.
Pegelo ya Tswelopele ya botlhano letleletswe go phasaladiwa ka kuranta ya puso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba nang le Bogole.

src_text: Loluhlakamsebenti luniketa imigomo lenetinsika letisihlanu letimayelana nekungenelela kute kwentiwe Temisebenti Yahulumende Ibe Yetebucwephesha.

Letinsika tifaka ekhatsi loko lekufuneka kwentiwe ngembi kwekucashwa nekukhetfwa kuTemisebenti Yahulumende; kuchazelwa ngemsebenti nekungeniswa kahle kancane kancane kute ube yincenye yebasebenti ngalokuphelele; kuhlela nendlela yekulawula kwenta umsebenti kwaloyo naloyo muntfu; kuchubeka nekufundza nekutfutfukiswa lokusezingeni lebucwepheshe, kanye nekukhula kulomsebenti lowentako kanye netigameko temsebenti..   Tingucuko Kutimo Tekucashwa Kwebacondzisi Jikelele (ba-DG).
tgt_text: Tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya Tumelano ka ga go Fedisiwa ga Mefuta yotlhe ya Kgethololo Kgatlhanong le Basadi (CEDAW).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile umbiko lohlongota kutsi kube netindlela tekukhulisa emandla nemakhono abo-DG kuTemisebenti Yahulumende.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumeletse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya CEDAW gore mametlelelwe.

src_text: Lombiko ute netiphakamiso letimbalwa, letifaka ekhatsi sikhatsi sabo-DG sekuhlala kulowo msebenti kanye nekulawula ligunya lebalinikwe Sigungu Lesiphetse liye kulabo lababukene wekuphendvula..   Lombiko futsi uhlongote kutsi DG weLihhovisi laMengameli anikwe emandla ekuba Yinhloko Yetemisebenti Yahulumende.
tgt_text: Diphetogo tse di tlamela ka paka e okeditsweng ya dikopano tsa komiti e sekasekang dipegelo tsa dinaga tse leng ditokololo..   Aforika Borwa saenile tumelano ka 1993 le go mametlelela ka Sedimonthole.

src_text: Etifundzeni, lomsebenti utawentiwa bo-DG labasemahhovisini aboNdvunankhulu.
tgt_text: Go romelwa kwa Palamenteng go senka go golaganya tumelano e mametleletsweng mo malobeng le tokafatso ya Athikele 20(1) ya tumelano .

src_text: Lombiko futsi uhlongote tindlela letitawulandzelwa matiko ekulawuleni emakhontileka abo-DG.
tgt_text: Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto Tebang le Thuto Kgolwane.
Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Tumelano ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe ka ga Kamogelo ya Makwalothuto tebang le Thuto Kgolwane gore tsenngwe molaong semmuso.

src_text: Luhlelo Lolubuyeketiwe Lwekulawula Kusebenta Kwabo-DG lusabuyeketwa kute lucondzaniswe naletingucuko lekuvunyelwene ngato..   Indvuna Lebambile Yetemisebenti Yahulumende Netekuphatsa, Umnu.
tgt_text: Fa sena go tsenngwa molaong semmuso tla romelwa go Mokgatlo wa Thuto, Saenthifiki le Setso wa Ditšhabakopano (UN) le mono gae tla nna karolo ya Molao wa Leano la go Tsamaisa Tiro la Naga la Makwalothuto wa ngwaga wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008)..   Tumelano eno ya Dinaga tsa Lefatshe tlhoma melawana ya lefatshe ka bophara ya Kamogelo ya makwalothuto ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane le makwalothuto mangwe ka go dira gore lefatshe ka bophara go se nne le makwalothotu a sa tseeweng tsiya a nang le lehunelo, le a sa tlhaolweng.

src_text: Thulas Nxesi, utawubamba umhlangano webetindzaba kuleliviki lelitako kute achaze ngaLenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwenta Umsebenti letawenta kube neBucwephesha Kutemisebenti Yahulumende iphindze futsi ichaze ngaletingucuko lekuvunyelwene ngato kuletimo tekusebenta kwebo-DG.
tgt_text: Tumelano eno neela tetla ya gore makwalothuto dinaga disele mo dinageng tse 193 tse leng ditokololo tsa UN amogelwe ke dinaga tseno..   Kgogelomorago ya Ditokafatso mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.

Kabinete tlhomamisitse pegelo e dirilweng ke Kantoro ya ga Moporesitente ka Mosupologo, 17 Diphalane 2022 go gogela morago diphetogo tse di dirilweng tsa 2022 mo Kaeding ya Maloko Khuduthamaga e bidiwang gape Bukana ya Ditona..   Ditokafatso tse di dirilweng ka Moranang 2022 di tlamela ka mothamo o okeditsweng mo dikantorong tse dingwe tsa Ditona tse di nang le maikarabelo makala feta bongwe.

src_text: Umbiko Wesihlanu Walosekwentiwe Ngekufezekiswa Kwemtsetfo Lohlongotwako Mayelana Nemalungelo Ebantfu Labanekukhubateka (i-WPRPD) Wemnyaka We-2020-.
tgt_text: Di ne di tlhagisa gape gore Puso tshwanetse go rwala maikarabelo ka botlalo ditshenyegelo tse di jaaka tlamelo ya motlakase le metsi kwa mafelobonnong semmuso maloko khuduthamaga..   Kabinete etse tlhoko dingongorego tsa baagi mme sweditse go leba sešwa Kaedi ya Maloko Khuduthamaga.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iwuvumile Umbiko Wesihlanu Lomayena Nalosekwentekiwe Ekufezekisweni kwe-WPRPD, leniketa timemetelo ngekusetjentiswa kwe-WPRPD.
tgt_text: Tiragalo e tla dirwa ke setheo se se ikemetseng mme fa sena go konosediwa, kaedi e tla phasaladiwa mo webosaeteng ya Lefapha la Bodiredipuso le Botsamaisi: www.dpsa.gov.za..  Semphato sa Phetogo e Lolameng sa Maatla (JETP) le Leano la JETP (JEPT-IP).

src_text: Lombiko ufaka ekhatsi tetfulo letiniketwe ngematiko ahulumende wavelonkhe newesifundza.
tgt_text: Morago ga go amogela tlhagisetso ya JEPT le JETP-IP, Kabinete ne ya mametlelela JETP-IP le go supa ditebogo ka tiro e botlalo e dirilweng go tlhagisa..   JETP-IP tlhalosa dipeeletso tse di tlhokegang go fitlhelela boineelo ba Puso ya Aforika Borwa ba go fedisa khabone le go tsweletsa kgolo e tswelelang, le go netefatsa phetogo e lolameng go badiri le mafelo a amegang..   Komiti ya Ditona ya Phetogo ya Tlelaemete tla tshwara kopano ya bobegakgang mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo go neela ka dintlha ka botlalo   Melaotlhomo.

src_text: Uniketa timemetelo letimayelana nekusetjentiswa kwetinchubomgomo letifaka ekhatsi kwesabelomali.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa.
Kabinete amogetse go romelwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe wa 2022 kwa Palamenteng go diragadiwa.

src_text: Umbiko wekucala walosekwentiwe wemnyaka washicilelwa ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o tlhabolola Molao wa Thomelo ya Dithoto ka Dikepe, 1957 (Molao 57 wa 1951) o setseng le dingwaga di le.

src_text: Lombiko lona wesihlanu uvunyiwe kutsi ufakwe kugazethi nekutsi ushicilelwe Litiko Labomake, Lelusha Nelebantfu Labanekukhubateka kutsi ushicilelwe kumiculu yahulumende.

tgt_text: Fa sena go amogelwa jaaka molao, Molaotlhomo o tla tlamela ka letlhomeso la semolao go laola tsamaiso ya boleng ya dikepe.

src_text: Kuchitjelwa kweMbhalo 20(1) Wenhlangano Yekucedza Tonkhe tinhlobo Telubandlululo Lolubhekiswe Kubomake (i-CEDAW).
tgt_text: Gareng ga tse dingwe tla laola popego, kwadiso, maina le go fedisiwa ga dikepe..   Diphetogo tse di tla nna le seabe mo go tsosoloseng lekala la tsamaiso ya dithoto ka dikepe gammogo le go nyalanya naga le Tumelano ya Mokgatlo wa Boditšhaba wa Pharakano ya Dikepe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kutsi kutfunyelwe ePhalamnede sichibelo seMbhalo 20(1) se-CEDAW kute kutsi isayinwe.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa mametleletse tumelano     .

src_text: Lesichibelo sibonelela kutsi kungetwe sikhatsi semihlangano yelikomidi lelisebenta ngemibiko yemave langemalunga..   INingizimu Afrika isayine lesivumelwano ngemnyaka we-1993 yabese iyasicinisekisa ngeNgongoni ngemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa.

src_text: Lokutfunyelwa kwaso ePhalamende kuhlose kutsi kulungiswe lesivumelwano sakudzala lesacinisekiswa kute sibe nesichibelo kuMbhalo 20(1) walesivumelwano..  Sivumelwane Semhlaba Sekutsi Kuvunyelwe Ticu Temfundvo Letimayelana Netemfundvo Lephakeme.
tgt_text: Kabinete amogetse go romelwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo wa Tokafatso ya Dipalopalo wa 2022 gore tswelediwe.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivume kutsi kutfunyelwe ePhalamende Sivumelwane kutsi Kuvunyelwe Ticu Temfundvo Letimayelana Netemfundvo Lephakeme kute ticinisekiswe.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o tshitshinya tokafatso ya Molao wa Ditlhopho, 1999 (Molao 6 wa 1999).

src_text: Uma seticinisekisiwe titawutfunyelwa Kunhlangano Yelubumbano Lwemave Emhlaba (i-UN) Yetemfundvo, Tesayensi Neyetemasiko bese iyasetjentiswa lapha ekhaya ngekulandzela Umtsetfo Wenchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yeticu, yemnyaka we-2008 (Umtsetfo 67 wemnyaka we-2008)..   Lomhlangano Wemhlaba usungula timiso temhlaba kute kungabi nekuvuna luhlangotsi, kube sobala nekutsi kube nekuvumeleka lokungabandlululi kweticu Temfundvo Lephakeme.
tgt_text: Diphetogo di tlamela ka tlhabololo le tsenyotirisong ya Tsamaiso ya Bosetšhaba ya Dipalopalo e tshegetsang ditshwetso tse di tshegediwang ke bopaki..   Di matlafatsa kgolagano magareng ga Setheo sa Dipalopalo sa Aforika Borwa le ditheo tse dingwe tsa puso, le go atolosa letlhomeso la taolo la Molao D.  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Uvumela kutsi ticu temave angaphandle tivumeleke kumave lamalunga e-UN la-.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Moporesitente ya Dikgwebopotlana, tse Dinnye le tse di Magareng (SMME) le Dikoporasi.

Lefapha la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, ka tirisano le bannaleseabe ba lekala la poraefete, le tla tshwara Samiti ya SMME le Dikoporasi ya Moporesitente ya Bosetšhaba kwa Bryanston, Gauteng ka 13 go fitlha ka 15 Ngwanatsele..   Samiti e tla kopanya bannaleseabe ba botlhokwa ba lekala la poraefete le la puso mo tikologong ya dikgwebopotlana go rerisana ka go senka ditsela tsa go dirisana mmogo go matlafatsa lekala le.

src_text: Kukhishwa Kwetichibelo Kulomculu Loyinkhombandlela Yemalunga Esigungu Lesiphetse.
tgt_text: Bannaleseabe ba ba solofelwang ba akaretsa mekgatlo ya kgwebo, badiri ba diSMME, dirutegi, badiri ba dipholisi le ditheo tsa tlhabololo ya matlole..     Samiti tla rerisana gape le ka ga Leanolegolo le le Momaganeng la Bosetšhaba la Tlhabololo ya Dikgwebopotlana, le le tlamelang ka letlhomeso le le botlhokwa go matlafatsa lekala la SMME.

src_text: 1  Ikhabhinethi isivumile simemetelo lesentiwe nguMengameli ngeMsombuluko, ti-17 Imphala 2022 sekutsi kususwe letichibiyelo letentiwe kulomculu loyinkhombandlela Yemalunga Esigungu Lesiphetse, lophindze watiwe ngekutsi Libhukwana Letindvuna, lemnyaka we-.
tgt_text: Samiti e solofelwa gape go thankgolola Dikabo tsa Bosetšhaba tsa SMME tsa Moporesitente tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga..     Go Tshwarwa ga Samiti ya Moporesitente ya 2022 ya Tirisodikgoka e Ikaegileng ka Bong le Polao ya Basadi (GBVF).

src_text: 2  Letichibelo letentiwe ngenyanga yaMabasa 2022 tibonelela kutsi kube nemandla langetiwe kulamanye emahhovisi eTindvuna letisebenta umsebenti wetikhundla letingetulu kwasinye.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Samiti ya bobedi ya Moporesitente ya GBVF kwa Gallagher Convention Centre mo Gauteng ka 1 le 2 Ngwanatsele.

src_text: Letichibelo betifuna kutsi Hulumende atsetse ngalokugcwele tindleko letimayelana nekuphakelwa kwagezi nemanti etindlini tembuso lekuhlala kuto emalunga esigungu lesiphetse.. 3  Ikhabhinethi ikunakile yakutsatsela etulu lokukhala kwemmango yabese ivumelana ngekutsi kubuyeketwe Lomculu Loyinkhombandlela Yemalunga Esigungu Lesiphetse.
tgt_text: Samiti ya ntlha e neng tshwerwe ka 2018 ne ya dirisiwa go supa boineelo gape ba puso le balekane ba loago mo go fediseng ditiragalo tse di kwa godimo tsa tirisodikgoka kgatlhanong le basadi mo nageng..   Samiti ya bobedi tla dirisiwa go lekola Tswelopele e dirilweng mo go tsenngweng tirisong ga Togamaano ya Bosetšhaba ka ga GBVF tla tshwarwa ka fa tlase ga setlhogo: “Boikarabelo; Itlhaganediso le Kgodiso JAANONG”..   Samiti e tla sekaseka gareng ga tse dingwe, go batla ditsela tsa go itlhaganedisa dikgato le maikarabelo go tswa go mafapha botlhokwa le bannaleseabe ba ba akaretsang baagi, lekala la poraefete le mekgatlo ya badiri..   Pitso ya Botlhano ya ga Moporesitente kwa Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: Lomsebenti lona utawentiwa inhlangano letimele bese uma sewuphotfuliwe, Litiko Letemisebenti Yahulumende Nekuphatfwa Kwayo litawusabalalisa watiwe ngummango ngekuwufaka kuwebhusayithi yalo letsi: www.dpsa.gov.za..   Budlelwane Lobufanelekile Betingucuko Kutemandla (i-JETP) NeLuhlelo Lwelutjalomali Lwe-JETP (i-JETP-IP) .
tgt_text: Pitso ya Botlhano ya Mokgwa wa Tlhabololo ya Sedika (DDM) ya ga Moporesitente kwa Upington, Kapa Botlhaba tla diragala ka Labotlhano, 21 Diphalane 2022 kwa Setediamong sa selegae sa Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Pitso ya Moporesitente ya DDM tla lekola tswelelo ya thebolelo ya ditirelo le dikgwetlho kwa Kapa Botlhaba le go tsereganya go di rarabolola.
