tgt_text: Mo go direng gore naga ya rona nne le matshwanedi go nna le lekala le le dirang bontle la leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo, puso kwadile Leano la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Merero ya Leokwane la Gase leng le le buang ka maikemisetso naga mo motlakaseng wa go fetlhiwa ka ditsela tse dintšhwa mmogo le mo polatinamong leng yona e botlhokwa mo thulaganyong ya motlakase wa leokwane la gase leng seo se tla bayang naga ya Aforika Borwa mo maemong a kwa godimo mo go gogeng kwa pele maraka montšhwa ono..  Ikonomi ya tshomarelo ya tlhago ke enngwe ya ditiro tse re samaganeng le tsona mo Leanong la Itharabologelo le Kagosešwa ya Ikonomi (ERRP) mo re samaganang le go ribolola ditsela tse dintšhwa tsa go godisa ikonomi ya naga rona tse go nang le kgonagalo ya gore di ka fetola ikonomi ya naga ya rona le go tlhola ditiro tse dintšhwa.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed government’s commitment to taking corrective measures to address the root causes that lead to poor audit outcomes and remove weaknesses to achieve clean audits.
tgt_text: Go Thankgololwa ga Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa Dithekenoloji tsa Maemo a kwa Godimo tse di Dirang Ditiro tse di Diriwang ke Batho.

src_text: Safer Festive Season campaign.
tgt_text: Kabinete itumedisitswe ke tirisanommogo e nnileng teng magareng ga DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology mmogo le University of Johannesburg leng se se dirileng gore go thankgololwe Setheo sa Naga ya Aforika Borwa sa AI kwa Johannesburg Business Schoo ka Laboraro, 30 Ngwanaitseele.

src_text: Government recently launched the 2022 Safer Festive Season campaign under the theme: “More boots on the ground towards enhanced police visibility.”.

To ensure the well-being and safety of all residents and tourists in our country during the festive season and beyond, heightened police visibility will include intensified and integrated crime-prevention and crime-combating operations by the South African Police Service and other law-enforcement agencies.
tgt_text: Sekolo seno se se tshwanang se le esi se tlisa diphetogo tse dintšhwa ka fa nageng ya Aforika Borwa ka maitlhomo go tlhabolola thekenoloji.

src_text: Cabinet calls on all people to work with law-enforcement authorities to keep our communities safe.
tgt_text: Se tla dira gore ikonomi gole, sa samagana le matsapa botlhokatiro mmogo le go tlisa dilo tse dintle mo baaging.

src_text: As traffic volumes on our national roads increase, all road users are urged to be vigilant, and to obey traffic rules and regulations such as speed limits.
tgt_text: Setheo seno sa AI se tla godisa dithuto tsa go betla diroboto le tsa dipuo tsa go naya didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji ditaelo tse ga jaana leng dithuto tse di rebolelwang baithuti mo dikolong tsa ka fa nageng.

src_text: Do not drive while under the influence of alcohol, always wear your seatbelt, keep safe following distance and stop at safe place to rest after at least every three hours of driving.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo setheo seno ke go dira bonnete jwa gore puso le ditheo tsa thuto kgolwane mmogo le diintaseteri botlhe ba tshwaraganela tiro le seoposengwe gore botlhe ba dirise kitso ba nang le yona, bokgoni le maitemogelo gore go tliwe ka ditharabololo tse di tsamaisanang tsa matsapa magolo le e leng kgale le teng naga ya Aforika Borwa le kontinente ya Aforika di tobaneng le ona mmogo le go dira gore kontinente eno gatele pele.

src_text: Be courteous to other road users so that we can all reach our destinations safely.
tgt_text: Dikgato tsa puso tsa go tsepamisa mogopolo mo bokgoning jwa go dirisa didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji di tsenyeletsa gape le maitlhomo go tshegetsa bašwa le go tlotlomatsa bokgoni jwa bona, mmogo le dikgwebopotlana le tse dikgolwane, segolobogolo tse leng gona di simolola, go di rotloetsa gore ba dirise didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji go tlhagisa seo ba se dirang  Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet urges everyone to take extra care this festive season to ensure their own safety and that of others, especially children, who must be supervised at all times.
tgt_text: Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso mabapi le Madi a Dirisiwang mo Mererong ya Bana le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi ka fa Nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: By exercising extreme care and responsible behaviour, we can guarantee an enjoyable time of celebration with family and friends.
tgt_text: Kabinete atlhaatlhile mmogo le go nesetsa pula Pegelo ya Dipatlisiso e Tlhagisitsweng ke Lefapha la Merero ya Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Tshelang ka Bogolofadi (DWYPD), mo le neng le dirisana mmogo le Letsholo la Dinagakopano la Merero ya Ditlhabologo (UNDP).

src_text: South Africa Green Hydrogen Summit (SAGHS).
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tseno di neelana ka tshedimosetso e buang gore lelapa le dirisa madi le kanakang go tlhokomela bana ba ba nang le bogolofadi mmogo le batho ba bagolo ba ba nang le bogolofadi..  Tshedimosetso e tswang mo dipatlisisong tseno neelana ka bopaki jwa madi a dirisiwang, jo gareng ga tse dingwe tse dintsi bo tla dirisiwang go thusa go tla ka palo e tlhokagalang ya megolo ya go thusa batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful conclusion of the country’s inaugural SAGHS 2022 held in Cape Town from 28 to 30 November 2022, which showcased our nation’s offerings as world-class green hydrogen production hub.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno akgola gape le dipatlisiso tse di dirilweng ke UNDP mo ngwageng wa 2013 le wa 2015 tse di neng di sekaseka ka fao malapa a nang le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi kakatletseng ka gona mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa fa go tla mo mererong ya matlole.

src_text: In creating the environment for the green hydrogen sector to flourish, government has developed Hydrogen SA Strategy that taps into our nation’s endowment of renewable energy and platinum catalyst in the hydrogen electrolysis process, to position South Africa as global leader in this new market.
tgt_text: Pegelo eno tla phasaladiwa morago ga gore gatisiwe mo lekwalong la melao ya puso.

src_text: The green hydrogen economy is part of our work under the ERRP to explore new sources of economic growth that have the potential to revolutionise our economy and create new jobs.
tgt_text: Tshekatsheko e Potlakileng ye ka ga go Tsenya Tirisong Pholisi ya Puso e Buang ka go Tsaya Letlhakore fa go Rebolelwa Basadi, Bašwa le Batho ba ba Nang le Bogolofadi Dithendara tsa Puso.

src_text: Launch of the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Institute of South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete reboletswe pegelo e sekasekang fa le gore mafapha puso ya naga le ya porofense ikobela ditaolelo tsa pholisi ya puso e buang ka go tsaya letlhakore fa go rebolelwa dikgwebo tse di laolwang ke basadi, bašwa le batho ba ba nang le bogolofadi dithendara tsa puso.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the collaboration between the DCDT, Tshwane University of Technology and the University of Johannesburg that resulted in the launch of the AI Institute of South at the Johannesburg Business School on Wednesday, 30 November..
tgt_text: Tiro eno ya go sekaseka mafapha ano simolotse mo ngwageng wa 2018 mme ya garela mo ngwageng wa..  Tshedimosetso eno tserwe mo Sefalaneng sa Tshedimosetso ya Baabi ba Ditirelo mo Ditheong tsa Puso (CSD) seo se laolwang ke Lefapha la Matlotlo Naga mmogo le mo mafapheng ao arabileng dipotso tseo di neng di rometswe mo go ona mabapi le ntlha eo.

src_text: The first-of-its-kind institute ushers new era in South Africa’s digital transformation efforts.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsotlhe tse di tshitshintsweng tse di tla dirang gore puso obamele taolelo e reng tshwanetse go neela bontsi jo bo ka dirang diphesente di le 40 tsa dithendara go dikgwebo bogolosegolo tsa basadi.

src_text: It will stimulate economic growth, address unemployment and create positive social impact.
tgt_text: Tse dingwe tsa dikgato tse di tshitshintsweng ke tsa go tlhabolola CSD, go katisa batlhankedi ba ba rwalang maikarabelo mmogo le Batlhankedi ba ba Rweleng Maikarabelo Tiriso ya Matlole Puso le Theko ya Dithoto le Ditirelo mo Pusong mo mafapheng puso mmogo le go ba tlhaba botlhale.

src_text: The AI Institute will expand the teaching of robotics and coding currently being offered in public schools.
tgt_text: Pegelo e feletseng tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya lefapha ya: www.dwypd.gov.za.

src_text: The institute is designed to ensure that government academia and industry work together in unique partnership to apply their collective knowledge, expertise and experience to implement coordinated solutions to some of South Africa and Africa’s most critical and long-standing challenges, and to take the continent forward.
tgt_text: Leano la go Diragatsa Matsholo Ngwagasome Saense le Thekenoloji (Leano la Ngwagasome la STI).

src_text: Government’s focus on digital skills includes creating platforms to support and promote the ability of youth, and small and medium enterprises, in particular start-ups, to develop digital content  Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Ngwagasome la STI, le le dirisiwang jaaka tokomane e thusitseng go kwala Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa 2019 sa STI.

src_text: Research Report on the economic costs of disability for children with disabilities and persons with physical disabilities in South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka Mopitlwe 2021 ne ya nesetsa pula sekwalwa sa ntlha se se santseng se tlhoka gore se sekasekwe sa leano leno mme go tloga mo motsing oo le ne la fetisiwa le mo matlhong bannaleseabe ba ba matshwanedi gore ba konopele tlhware logong.

src_text: Cabinet considered and approved the Research Report that was commissioned by the Department for Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities (DWYPD), in partnership with the United Nations (UN) Development Programme (UNDP).
tgt_text: Leano leno le na le dikarolo di le tlhano tse go tshwanetsweng go tsepamisiwa mogopolo mo go tsona: (1) go dira gore lephata la temothuo, la tlhagisodikuno le la moepo le tsamaisane le dinako tsa segompieno; (2) go sola mosola metswedi mentšhwa ya kgodiso ya ikonomi, segolobogolo ya didirisiwa tsa thekenoloji le ya go dirisa didirisiwa tse di neng di latlhilwe; (3) matsholo magolo dipatlisiso le boitlhamedi mo maphateng maokelo le metlakase; (4) Go sola mosola STI gore kgone go dira gore re nne le puso e dirang ka botswapelo mme ya bo (5) ka ga go samagana le dikgwetlho di le tharo tse dikgolo mo setšhabeng leng, ya go fetoga ga maemo loapi le go somarela tikologo, bokamoso jwa thuto, tlhatlhelelo ka bokgoni le ka kitso ya tiro, mmogo le isago ya setšhaba.

src_text: The research provides information on disability-related costs on households with children with disabilities and adults with physical disabilities.
tgt_text: Leano la ntlhantlha la go Diragatsa Matsholo Ngwagasome Saense le Thekenoloji go tloga ka ngwaga wa 2008 go fitlha ka wa 2018, mmogo le Leano la Naga la Dipatlisiso le la Tlhabololo la ngwaga wa 2002, ke ona a dirisitsweng gore go tsweng mo go ona go tlhodiwe Leano le re nang le lona ga jaana la go Diragatsa Matsholo Ngwagasome Saense le Thekenoloji.

src_text: The research insights provide evidence of cost estimates for, among others, the determination of social-security benefits subsidisation of services for persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Maano ano godisa dikgato tsa puso tsa go tlisa boitlhamedi mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: This report complements the study also done by the UNDP between 2013 and 2015 on elements of the financial and economic costs of disability households in South Africa.
tgt_text: Tokomane eno tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi ya: www.dst.gov.za.

src_text: The report will be published after it has been gazetted.
tgt_text: Leano la Naga la go Sekaseka Matshosetsi a Leng Teng Mabapi le Dikgato tsa go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa go Tlhatswa Tšhelete ya Bogodu, go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa go Tlamela Digongwana tsa Menolopuso ka Madi mmogo le go Lwantshana le Ditiragalo tsa go Tlamela Digongwana tsa go Reka Dilwana le Didiriswa tsa Maaka tse di Rekisiwang (AML/CFT/CPF).

src_text: Rapid Evaluation of the implementation of government policy on preferential public procurement towards women, youth and persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Naga la AML/CFT/CPF mmogo le Dikgato tsa go Sekaseka Matshosetsi a Leng Teng ka fa nageng.

src_text: Cabinet received an evaluation report that assessed the compliance rate by national and provincial departments on the preferential procurement application on businesses owned by women, youth and persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Leano leno le kwadilwe go latela gore go kwadiwe dikgato tsa tshekatsheko ya matshosetsi tse di kwadilweng ke ditheo tsotlhe tse di amegang tsa pabalesego le tsa matlole.

src_text: The evaluation covered the period from 2018 to..  Data was collected from National Treasury’s Central Supplier Database (CSD) and respondents from departments to the questionnaires sent to them.
tgt_text: Go tsenya tirisong leano leno – le le nang le dipeelo di le tharo tsa maemo a kwa godimo a tla samaganang le maano le 13 ditharabololo – gareng ga ba bangwe ba bantsi go tla tlhokagala thuso ya ditheo tsa molao, tsa go lwantshana le bosenyi, ditheo tsa matlole le tseo seng tsa matlole mmogo le batlhankedi ba ba direlang makala poraefete.

src_text: The data did not, however, capture information from all the departments, but was sufficient enough to guide Cabinet on areas that need strengthening to ensure full compliance.
tgt_text: Go tsenngwatirisong ga leano leno go tla thusa naga gore kgone go gagamatsa dithulaganyo tsa yona tsa matlole gore kgone go ema nokeng dikgato tsa yona tsa go thusa go godisa ikonomi ka go fokotsa bontsi jwa ditiragalo tsa bosenyi tse di amanang le tiriso ya madi.

src_text: Cabinet approved all the intervention recommendations that will ensure government complies with the 40% procurement to women in particular.
tgt_text: Leano leno gape le samagana le tse dingwe tsa ditshitshinyo di le 40 tse di tshitshintsweng morago ga gore naga ya Aforika Borwa sekasekiwe ke Sepodisi sa Ditirelo tsa Matlole leng mokgatlho o dirilweng ke ditheo tse di farologaneng tsa puso tse di kwalang dipholisi tse maitlhomo tsona leng go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa tlamelo ya digongwana tsa menolopuso ka ditšhelete mmogo le go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa go tlhatswa tšhelete ya bogodu.

src_text: Some of the recommendations include the enhancement of the CSD software, and the training and awareness raising of accounting officers and Supply Chain Management practitioners in departments.
tgt_text: Dipegelo tse di sosobanngweng ka bobedi jwa tsona tseno di tla phalsaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha Lefapha la Matlotlo Naga ya: www.treasury.gov.za.

src_text: The full report will be posted on the DWYPD’s website: www.dwypd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Leano la go Rekisa Leokwane la Gase le le sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo (GHCS).

src_text: Science, Technology and Innovation (STI) Decadal Plan.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa GHCS gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga lona.

src_text: Cabinet approved the 2022 STI Decadal Plan, which serves as an implementation guide of the 2019 White Paper on STI.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo leano leno ke go dira bonnete jwa gore naga sola mosola ditšhono tse di tlisiwang ke diintaseteri tse di dirisang motlakase o sa kgotlheleng tikologo..  GHCS tla dira bonnete jwa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa nna yona e gogang kwa pele tlhagiso le thekiso ya leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo tla thusa go godisa ikonomi ya naga ya rona mmogo le go ema nokeng dikgato tsa naga tsa go fetola metlakase eo e dirisang gore kgone go gokotsa mesi e kuelelang e kgotlhelang tikologo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the draft plan in March 2021 and has since been enriched through further consultation with relevant stakeholders.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa ga a bolo go tlhoma Leano le le Buang ka Leokwane la Gase le le sa Kgotlheleng Tikologo le Kabinete le neseditseng pula mo ngwageng wa.

src_text: The plan has five thematic focus areas: (1) modernisation of agricultural, manufacturing and mining sectors; (2) exploitation of new sources of growth, particularly the digital and circular economy; (3) large research and innovation programmes in the areas of health and energy; (4) utilising STI to support capable state and (5) addressing three societal grand challenges, namely climate change and environmental sustainability, the future of education, skills development and work, and the future of society.
tgt_text: Maraka o leng teng ga jaana o goletseng ruri wa leokwane la gase le le sa kgotlheleng tikologo tla neela naga ya Aforika Borwa ditšhono tse di seng kana ka sepe..  Leano la Puso la go Samagana le Ditiragalo tsa go Isana kwa Kgotlatshekelo la go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2021 go Fitlha ka wa.

src_text: The first Decadal Plan for 2008-2018, together with the 2002 National Research and Development Strategy, served as the basis of the current Decadal Plan.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Leano la Puso la go Samagana le Ditiragalo tsa go Isana kwa Kgotlatshekelo la go Tloga ka Ngwaga wa 2021 go Fitlha ka wa.

src_text: These plans advance the government’s approach to innovation in South Africa.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo leano leno ke go fetola lephata la tsa melao ka mokgwa o rulaganngweng.

src_text: The document will be made public through the Department of Science and Innovation’s (DSI) website: www.dst.gov.za.
tgt_text: Leano leno le laela maphata puso gore tshwanetse go rebola jang dithendara tse di mabapi le ditirelo tsa molao go di neela ditlamo tsa babueledi; ka fao puso tla laolang madi a dirisiwang fa ya kgotlatshekelo; ka fao go ka tlhokomelwang bannaleseabe; go letlelela gore dithulaganyo le thekenoloji di dirisiwe ka bontsi jo bo kgonagalang..  Leano leno le samagana gape le go tlhatlhelela batho ka bokgoni jwa go diragatsa tiro ya go tlhatlhelela batho ba bangwe.

src_text: National Strategy and Risk Assessment on Anti-Money Laundering, Counter Financing of Terrorism and Counter Financing of Proliferation (AML/CFT/CPF).
tgt_text: Le tla thusa ditheo tsotlhe tsa puso mo ditirelong tsa puso tsa go isana kwa kgotlatshekelo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the country’s National Strategy on AML/CFT/CPF, together with the National Risk Assessment.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula pula gape le dipholisi tse dingwe gape di le pedi tse di tshegetsang tiro ya go tsenya tirisong leano leno.

src_text: The strategy was developed as response to the risk assessment prepared by all the relevant security and finance agencies.
tgt_text: Pholisi e Buang ka go Loma Tsebe le go Rebolela Thendara ya Tiro ya go Isana kwa Kgotlatshekelo Dikgetse tsa Puso tla dira gore tiro ntshiwe ntle le go tsaya letlhakore mmogo le go dira gore go nne le diphetogo mo tirong e neelwang ditlamo tsa molao go sa kgonagaleng gore ka diriwa ke kantoro ya molao ya setheo seo sa puso.

src_text: The operationalisation of this strategy – which provides three high-level goals with 13 strategic objectives – will involve law-enforcement agencies, intelligence agencies, financial and non-financial institutions, and private-sector representatives, among others.
tgt_text: Pholisi e buang ka go Tshwarisa, go Lwantshana le Ditatofatso le go Ganetsana le Ditatofatso kwa Kgotlatshekelo tla tlhalosa ka botlalo dikgato tse lefapha le le ntshitseng thendara le tshwanetseng go di tsaya mmogo le Kantoro ya Motlhankedimogolo wa Molao mo Pusong.

src_text: The implementation of the strategy will ensure the country strengthens its financial systems to support economic growth interventions by reducing levels of finance-related crimes.
tgt_text: Dipholisi ka bobedi jwa tsona – mmogo le dipholisi tse dingwe tse di neseditsweng pula ke Kabinete ka Ngwanaitseele 2021 mmogo le Molao wa Lekala la Ditirelo tsa Molao – di tla ema nokeng tiro ya go tsenya tirisong leano leno.

src_text: The strategy also responds to some of the 40 recommendations made after South Africa was assessed by the Financial Action Task Force, an intergovernmental policymaking body that strives to combat terrorist financing and money laundering globally.
tgt_text: Ditokomane tseno di tla dira bonnete jwa gore go nna le phetogo e utlwagalang mo go rarabololeng matsapa lekala la ditirelo tsa molao go dira gore go nne le kgolo e utlwagalang mo ikonoming ka ntlha ya dikgetse tsa Puso tsa go isana kwa kgotlatshekelo.

src_text: The summarised two reports will be published on National Treasury’s website: www.treasury.gov.za.
tgt_text: Pholisi ya go Tlhokomela Maikarabelo Dikgetse tsa go Isana le Puso kwa Kgotlatshekelo.

src_text: Green Hydrogen Commercialisation Strategy (GHCS).
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Pholisi ya go Tlhokomela Maikarabelo Dikgetse tsa go Isana le Puso kwa Kgotlatshekelo leng yona e tlhagisang ditharabololo tse di ka dirisiwang mo go tlhokomeleng maikarabelo dikgetse tsa go isana le puso kwa kgotlatshekelo tlhagisa gore go tshwanetswe go tlhomiwe sefalanatshedimoso se segolo se le sengwe se se tla dirisiwang ke botlhe mmogo le ditsela tsa go abelana ka tshedimosetso mo go sona sefalana seno ya gore ke eng se se setseng se dirilwe mabapi le kgetse nngwe le nngwe e sekiwang.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the GHCS for public comments.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno letlelela gore go nne le dikgato tse di ka latelwang gore go tswalelwe kgetse e santseng butswe mme go se ko yang teng ka ntlha ya dikgato tse di senang bokao jo bo utlwagalang jwa tlhokomelo ya maikarabelo  Melaotlhomo.

src_text: The strategy is aimed at ensuring that the country takes full advantage of the opportunities provided by green industrialisation.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Naga wa Merero ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: The GHCS will ensure South Africa becomes major producer and exporter of green hydrogen.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Naga wa Merero ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: It contributes towards economic growth and supports the country’s just transition interventions towards the reduction of carbon emissions.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Molao wa Naga wa Merero ya Metshameko le Boitapoloso wa Ngwaga wa 1998 (Molao wa bo 110 wa 1998)..  Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa dikarolo tse dingwe tsa ditlhaloso tsa molao ono mme gareng ga tse dingwe tsa ditsereganyo tse di tlhagisang tshitshinya gore go tlhomiwe Lekgotla la go Sekela Dikgetse tse di Amanang le Merero ya Metshameko tse di leng teng magareng ga ditheo tsa metshameko le tsa boitapoloso tlhagisa thulaganyo e tshwanetsweng go latelwa fa go tshwanetswe go tsewe karolo mo metshamekong e tla tshamekiwang mo maemong boditšhabatšhaba.

src_text: South Africa already has the Hydrogen Strategy and the Hydrogen Society Roadmap adopted by Cabinet in.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di neala gape Tona ya Metshameko, Botsweretshi le Setso maatla go ka kwala melawanataolo e tla emelelang batho ba ba palelwang ke go ikemelela gore le bona ba kgone go nna le seabe mo metshamekong le go sirelediwa gore ba se batliwe dikobo kgotsa go jewa ntshu.

src_text: The rapidly growing green hydrogen market presents huge opportunities for South Africa.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Lekgotlakgaso la Aforika Borwa (SABC) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo wa SABC wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore ye go sekasekiwa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Strategy for 2021 –.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono ne wa phasaladiwa ka kgwedi ya Seetebosigo mo ngwageng wa 2021 gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona.

src_text: The strategy seeks to drive the transformation of the legal profession in systematic manner.
tgt_text: Fa molaotlhomo yono sena go amogelwa ke Palamente gore jaanong ka nne ya nna molao, molaotlhomo yono tla tsena mo legatong la Molao wa Kgaso wa Ngwaga wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 4 wa 1999) yo dirisiwang ga jaanong go nna ona molao wa komang ka nna..  Gareng ga tse dingwe Molaotlhomo yono tshitshinya gore palo ya batlhankedi ba Maloko ao Seng Khuduthamaga mo Botong fokodiwe go tloga mo go ba le 12 gore nne ba le 11 mmogo le go fokotsa palo ya batlhankedi ba Maloko Khuduthamaga mo Botong go tloga mo go ba le bararo gore nne ba le babedi.

src_text: It guides on how the State will distribute legal work to legal practitioners; manage the costs of the litigation; guides the management of stakeholders; provides for the maximisation of the use of technology and systems..
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalolotse le dikarolo tse di mabapi le ka fao sebopego se se busang SABC se tshwanetsweng go rulaganngwa ka teng mmogo le ka fao se tshwanetsweng go tlamelwa matlole ka gone.

src_text: The strategy also addresses the development of human capacity management and development.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Phimola Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo.

src_text: It will be applicable to litigation services of the State from all spheres of government.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Phimola Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: Cabinet also approved the two additional policies to support the implementation of this strategy.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono phimola Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo wa Ngwaga wa 1983 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 1983) yo neng wa dira gore molao wa botlhokotsebe nne selo se se tshelang mo pusong ya mo malobeng ya Transkei ga jaanong itseweng ka gore ke porofense ya Kapa Botlhaba)..  Molaotlhomoyo tshitshinngwang ono letla gore molao yo dirisiwang ke dikgotlatshekolo ga jaana nne ona tsenang mo legatong la melao e neng dirisiwa ke puso ya mo malobeng ya Transkei gore tsamaisane le dikgotlatshekelo tsa naga go dira gore re nne seoposengwe..  Molao wa Puso ya Transkei wa go Tlhaolwa Kgomo thulana le molao yo dirisiwang ga jaaka ka fa nageng go samagana le botlhokotsebe mo dikarolong tse di farologaneng ka fa nageng jaaka laola selo se le sengwe se se tshwanang le seo molao yono se laolang.

src_text: The Briefing and Outsourcing of State Legal work Policy will introduce an element of fairness and drive the transformational allocation of litigation services that cannot be performed internally.
tgt_text: Go fedisiwa ga molao yono go tla dira gore melao ya puso ya tlhaolele e santseng le teng le gompieno mo mafelo mo malobeng neng bediwa Puso ya Transkei fedisiwe mme go fetolwe ditsela tsa go samagana le melato go neng go samaganwa le yona ka molao yono.

src_text: The Initiating, Defending and Opposing of Matters Policy will provide clarity on processes to be followed by client departments and the Office of Solicitor-General.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo.

src_text: The two policies – together with the other policies that were approved by Cabinet in November 2021 and the Legal Sector Code – will support the implementation of this strategy.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Bosomeleborobedi wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Kwalola Sešwa Molaotheo gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: These documents will ensure meaningful transformational intervention in the legal sector and also ensure the economies of scale in litigation matters that involve the State.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa Karolo ya bo 6 ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 go dira gore Puo ya Diatla ya Naga ya Aforika Borwa gore go nne mo molaong semmuso gore le yona ke nngwe ya dipuo tsa naga.

src_text: Management of State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy.
tgt_text: Mo kgweding ya Motsheganong monongwaga wa 2022 Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa le tsa go tsibosa setšhaba ka Molaotlhomo yono, mme bobedi ditiragalo tseno di ne tsa gatisiwa mo lekwalong la go gatisa Melao ya puso mo kgweding ya Phukwi gona monongwagwa wa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the State Litigation Contingent Liability Policy, which provides mechanisms to manage state litigation contingent liability.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Botlhokotsebe (wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Petelelo le Melato ya Mothale oo) wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: It provides for the creation of central database and the reporting mechanism on the following-up of the cases in this database.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasalatsa Molaotlhomo yono gore setšhaba se ntshe se se mo mafatlheng sona ka ga ona.

src_text: The policy provides for the mechanism to close dormant case files that were resulting in unreliable contingent liability figures in respect of accountability  Bills.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono phimola Molao wa Ditlolo tsa Molao wa Thobalano mo pusong ya tlhaolele neng bediwa gore ke Molao wa Maitshwaro a Tswileng mo Tseleng) wa Ngwaga wa 1957 (Molao wa bo 23 wa 1957).

src_text: National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono kwalola sešwa gape le Molao o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Ditiro tsa Botlhokotsebe (wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Petelelo le Melato ya Mothale oo) wa Ngwaga wa 2007 (Molao wa bo 32 wa 2007) ka go dira gore fa batho ba bagolo ba rekisetsana ditiro tsa thobalano tiro eo se nne tlolo ya molao.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the National Sport and Recreation Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Ditshitshinyo tse di leng mo Molaotlhomong yono di samagana le lenaane la dintlha tse di tshitshintsweng mo Kgaolong ya boraro ya Leano la Naga la go Loga Maano mo Mererong ya go Lwantshana le go Bogisiwa le go Bolawa ga Basadi (GBVF) (kgaolo eno bua ka go Sireletsa Setšhaba, go se Babalela le go se Phimolakeledi),mme di tla dira gore lephata lotlhe la go samagana le botlhokotsebe le phimolakeledi le dirisane mmogo gore le kgone go sireletsa, go babalela le go phimola keledi batho ba ba fetileng mo mathateng GBVF, mmogo le go dira gore ditlhokotsebe tse di amegang di digame di sa di tlhapela.

src_text: The Bill amends the National Sport and Recreation Act, of 1998 (Act 110 of 1998).
tgt_text: Ka gang fa molaotlhomo ono amogelwa go nna molao tla emelela batho ba ba rekisang mebele mo ditirelong tsa thobalano gore ba se tlhole ba bogisiwa le go jewa ntshu.

src_text: The Bill has already been published for public consultation.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Poso ya Aforika Borwa (SAPO).

src_text: The Bill also amends certain definitions and amongst other interventions, it proposes the establishment of the Sports Arbitration Tribunal to resolve disputes between sport or recreation bodies.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go isa kwa Palamenteng Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa SAPO gore ye go sekasekiwa ka tsenelelo.

src_text: It outlines procedures to be followed for bidding for international events.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo yono, yo neseditsweng pula gore ka phasaladiwa gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga ona mo ngwageng ono kwa tshimologong kwalola sešwa Molao wa SAPO wa Ngwaga wa 2011 (Molao wa bo 22 wa 2011).

src_text: The proposed amendments also empower the Minister of Sport, Arts and Culture to make regulations for vulnerable groups to participate in sport and be protected from any form of sexual abuse or exploitation.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di batla go dira gore SAPO mo ditirelong tsa yona tsa go tsamaisa merwalo simolole go dirisa dithekenoloji tse di dirisiwang mo lephateng la go tsamaisa merwalo tse di leng teng mmogo le go godisa tiro ya yona.

src_text: South African Broadcasting Corporation (SABC) Bill of.
tgt_text: Dikarolo tse di kwalolotsweng sešwa tseno di tsamaisana le Sekwalwa sa Masupatsela sa Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga Kgolaganngo ya Thekenoloji ya Didirisiwa tsa Tshedimosetso le Ditlhaeletsano ya Ngwaga wa  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the SABC Bill of 2022 for processing.
tgt_text: Foramo ya Lefatshe ya Merero ya Saense (WSF) ya Ngwaga wa.

src_text: The Bill was published for public comment in June.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa Lefapha la Saense le Boitshimololedi go tshwarela WSF kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go simolola ka la bo 06 go fitlha ka la bo 09 Sedimonthole 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Re Dirisa Saense go Phimola Baagi Keledi”..  Foramo eno ke nngwe ya dirala tseo di di gogang kwa pele mo lefatsheng tseo di rotloetsang gore go nne le dipuisano mabapi le gore saense tshwanetse go nna le seabe se se botlhokwa mo setšhabeng sa rona.

src_text: Once the Bill is passed into law by Parliament, the current Broadcasting Act, 1999 (Act 4 of 1999) will be repealed.
tgt_text: Leno ke letsholo le le simolotsweng ke mekgatlho ya lefatshe ya saense mme bile gape le tsenyeletsa le Mokgatlho wa Dinagakopano (UN) wa Merero ya Thuto, Saense le Setso..  Baeteledipele ba ba itsegeng mo lefatsheng ba tla atlhaatlha ditlhogo tse di farologaneng tse di tsenyeletsang le tse di buang ka go dirisa saense go busetsa batho seriti; go dirisa saense go baakanya maemo loapi, go dirisa saense mo mererong ya botipolomate go dira gore naga nne le botsalano jo bo edileng le dinaga tse dingwe tsa boditšhaba, mmogo le go dirisa saense mo mererong ya Aforika le ya lefatshe ka bophara..  Dikopano di le dintsinyana tsa ka fa thoko le tse di tla tshwariwang ka mafaratlhatlha dikgokagano di tla tshwariwa ka go latelana, mme tse dingwe tsa tsona di tla tshwariwa ke mokgatlho wa Kopano ya Kgothakgothe ya Batho ba Aforika ya Barutegi ba Aforika mo Mererong ya Saense mme ponelopele ya mokgatlho ono ke go fetola matshelo batho mo kontinenteng ya Aforika ka go dirisa saense.

src_text: The Bill amongst others proposes reducing the size of non-executive Board members from 12 to 11 and the executive members from three to two.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya AIDS.

src_text: It revised the governance structure and funding model of the SABC.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa tla keteka le lefatshe mmogo le go nna le seabe mo ditiragalong tsa go bontsha tlotlo Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya AIDS ka la bo 01 Sedimonthole 2022 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Dira Gore Maemo Batho Lekalekane le go Golagana mo Mererong ya go Fedisa AIDS”.

src_text: Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of.
tgt_text: Mokete wa tlotlo o tla tshwarelwang kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la Dr Petrus Molemela kwa Bloemfontein mo porofenseng ya Foreistata mo go ona batho botlhe ba tla gakololwa gore ba tshwanetse go nna le maikarabelo ka go dira bonnete jwa gore ba itlhatlhoba gore ba itse gore ba phetse sentle kgotsa jang leng seo se tla ba thusang gore ba tsaye ditshweetso ka maikarabelo..  Mokete ono tshwariwa mo nakong eo Aforika Borwa ipaakanyetsang go thankgolola letsholo la go lekelela moento wa melemo ya thibelotshwaetso (PrEP) mo tshimologong ya ngwaga yo tlang, jaaka Mokgatlho wa Lefatshe wa Merero ya Boitekanelo (WHO) eleditse tiriso ya molemo ono.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Repeal of the Transkeian Penal Code Bill of 2022 for further processing.
tgt_text: Moento ono wa PrEP o tla tshwanelwang ke go tlhabiwa kgwedi nngwe le nngwe ka kgona go thibela bontsi jo bo kanaka batho ba le 52 000 go ka tshwaediwa ke HIV..  Letsatsi la Poelano.

src_text: The Bill repeals the Transkeian Penal Code, 1983 (Act 9 of 1983) which codified criminal law in the former Transkei (now Eastern Cape).
tgt_text: Ka Labotlhano, 16 Sedimonthole 2022 naga tla keteka Letsatsi la Poelano go gagamatsa maikano rona mabapi le go nna seoposenngwe le go aga setšhaba.

src_text: The proposed Bill extends the current application of common laws to the former Republic of Transkei in line with our unitary system of the country’s judicial system..
tgt_text: Ngwaga yo mongwe le yo mongwe re bona tšhono ya go kopana le go boelana le go itshwarelana mo diphosong tseo di dirilweng mo nakong e fetileng le go aga setšhaba se se ntšhwa..  Leeto la rona le re sa bolong go le thankgolola fa re ne re iponela kgololesego le temokerasi mo ngwageng wa 1994 le re bontshitse gore ga go na pelaelo epe gore fa re le ngatananngwe jaaka setšhaba re na le maatla le go feta.

src_text: The Transkeian Penal Code is in conflict with the current common criminal law that regulates the same subject matter in different parts of the country.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo rona re le maAforika Borwa tshwanetse go nna mabapi le go tsholetsa dikgato tsa go aga setšhaba le go nna ngatana le nngwe..  Rotlhe re ka kgona go dira gore isago ya rona le batho ba bangwe botlhe nne e botoka go gaisa gompieno ka go dira ka natla gore re nne le setšhaba se se itumelelang go buisana fa go na le se ba sa utlwaneng ka sona, se se ipopang ngatana le nngwe, se se tlotlomatsang dikgato tsa go aga setšhaba le go keteka go farologana ga sona.

src_text: This repeal will remove the continued existence of apartheid-era legislation in the areas that were formerly known as the Republic of Transkei and provide the transitional arrangements on matters dealt with by this code.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo bathong botlhe go dirisana sentle mmogo re le setšhaba, mme re kopanye maatla rona gore re kgone go aga setšhaba sa Aforika Borwa se se tshwaraganeng bile se dira bontle.

src_text: Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Thuso ya Baagi le tla tshwara Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe kwa Germiston, Gauteng go tloga ka la bo 5 go fitlha ka la bo 7 Sedimonthole.

src_text: The Bill amends Section 6 of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 to recognise South African Sign Language as one of the official languages.
tgt_text: Letsholo leno le kopanya batsofe go tswa mo diporofenseng tsotlhe di le robongwe mme maitlhomo lona ke go dira gore batsofe ba tshele botshelo jo ba ikatisang gore ba kgone go nna le seabe mo metseng ba tswang mo go yona..  Letsholo la Naga la go Thibela Botsofe le tla bula ka dipuisano ka go letlelela batsofe gore ba thube seo se leng mo dipelong tsa bona ka go bua ka matsapa ao ba kopanang le ona mo matshelong bona.

src_text: In May 2022, Cabinet approved the publication and giving of notice to this Bill, which together with the notice were subsequently gazetted in July.
tgt_text: Seno se tla latelwa ke Metshameko e Monate mo batsofe ba tla ntshang bokgoni jwa bona mo metshamekong ya diatleletiki..  Molao wa Batsofe wa Ngwaga wa 2006 (Molao wa bo 13 wa 2006) gatelela botlhokwa jwa go tlhokomela le go tsholetsa ditshwanelo tsa batsofe, tlotlo ya bona, maemo bona, seriti sa bona, pabalesego ya bona, tlhokomelo ya bona le boitekanelo jwa bona.

src_text: Criminal Law (Sexual Offences and Related Matters) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Ka mafoko ano, Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe mo setšhabeng go tlhokomela batsofe, go ba tlotla le go ba ema nokeng, segolo jang fa le gore ba boga, ba tshwarwa makgwakgwa, ga ba tlhokomelwe bile ba itemogela ditiragalo tsa GBV  MelaetsaMelaetsa ya go Akgola.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of this Bill for public comments.
tgt_text: Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: • Bafenyi ba Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC.

src_text: It repeals the Sexual Offences Act (previously Immorality Act), 1957 (Act 23 of 1957).
tgt_text: Rre Sandile Stevenson Ndlovu wa Lekwalodikgang la Sunday Times jaaka fentse maemo ntlha jaaka motsei wa ditshwantsho wa maemo a kwa godimo, Mme Zinhle Makhosazane Mugabe wa lekgotlakaso la SABC jaaka fentse maemo bobedi mo kgasong ya dithelebišene mmogo le Mme Melinda Shaw wa Makasine wa Dikgang tsa Dikgogo jaaka fentse maemo boraro mo makwalong a gatisiwang.Melaetsa ya Matshediso.

src_text: It also repeals Section 11 of the Criminal Law (Sexual Offenses and Related Matters) Amendment Act, 2007 (Act 32 of 2007) to decriminalise the sale and purchase of adult sexual services.
tgt_text: Kabinete romela matshediso yona kwa ba lelapa le ditsala tsa:• Rre John Henry Ernstzen, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 82, yo neng le segatlhamelamasisi mo mererong ya mekgatlho ya badiri le ya dipolotiki yo gape dirileng le mo pusong jaaka moeletsi wa Tona ya Tirelo le Tsamaiso ya Puso, Ngaka Zola Skweyiya ne gape direla Khomišene ya Tirelo ya Puso le Motlatsamonnasetulo mmogo le go direla Khomišene ya Ditirelo tsa Baatlhodi ba Dikgotlatshekelo.• Vho-Rashaka Frank Ratshitanga, yo neng na le dingwaga di le 89, yo neng le segatlhamelamasisi mo mererong ya go lwantshana le puso ya tlhaolele yo neng bogisiwa thata ke Mapodisi Puso ya Tlhaolele.

src_text: The proposals of this Bill respond to the list of interventions proposed in Pillar 3 (Protection, Safety and Justice) of the National Strategic Plan on GBVF, which enjoins the criminal justice system to provide protection, safety and justice for survivors of GBVF, and to effectively hold perpetrators accountable for their actions.
tgt_text: Jaaka le mokwadi yo dibuka tsa gagwe di phasaladitsweng, tse dingwe tsa dibuka tse dintsi tsa dipoko tse di phasaladitseng di ne tsa tseewa gore di dirisiwe kwa dikolong go ruta baithuti ba dikolo tse di godimo.

src_text: Once passed into law, it will amongst others protect sex workers against abuse and exploitation.
tgt_text: Morago ga ngwaga wa 1994 ne direla Ntlo ya Limpopo ya Theomolao ne neelwa Kabo ya Tlotla ya Baobab e betlilweng ka boronse mo leboga “go ikentsha setlhabelo ga gagwe ka go dira ka boineelo mo go emeng kgatlhanong le ditiro tse di busula tsa tsa tlhaolele mmogo le go nneng le seabe ga gagwe mo go ageng Aforika Borwa”  Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: South African Post Office (SAPO) Amendment Bill.
tgt_text: Mme Funani Josephine Malatsi yo thapilweng go nna Motlhankedimogolo wa Matlole kwa Lefapheng la Pusotshwaraganelo..  Ngaka Marcia Mabel Socikwa thapilwe go nna Motlatsamokaedikakaretso (DDG): mo lekaleng la Thuto le Katiso kwa Diyunibesiti mo Lefapheng la Ditheo tse Dikgolwane tsa Thuto le Katiso..  Ngaka Lisolomzi Assaph Fikizolo thapilwe go nna DDG: mo lekaleng la Mawatle le Mabopo Mawatle mo Lefapheng la Merero ya Dikgwa, ya Botshwaro jwa Ditlhapi le ya Tikologo..  Mme Boipuso Mmasediba Modise thapilwe go nna DDG: mo lekaleng la Dipholisi tsa Ikonomi mo Lefapheng la Matlotlo Naga..  Ngaka Kefiloe Doris Masiteng thapilwe go nna Mokwaledi mo lekaleng la Togo ya Maano mo Lefapheng la Tiromaano, Tekolo le Tshekatsheko ya Tiro..  Mme Jodi-Lynne Scholtz thapilwe go nna Mokhomišenara wa Khomišene ya Naga ya Dilotho..  Ngaka Phakamani Buthelezi thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo (CEO) mo Botong ya Metsi ya Overberg (Konteraka ya gagwe ntšhwafaditswe)..  Ngaka Bongani Andy Mabaso thapilwe go nna CEO mo Setheong sa Puso sa Thekenoloji ya Tshedimosetso.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the SAPO Amendment Bill to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Ngaka Gibson Mashilo Simon Boloka thapilwe go nna CEO mo Botong ya Ditshwantsho tsa Difilimi le tsa Makwalokgatiso (FPB).

src_text: The Bill, which was approved for public consultation early this year, amends the SAPO Act, 2011 (Act 22 of 2011).
tgt_text: Rre Mandisi Nkuhlu thapilwe go nna CEO mo Koporasing ya Inšorense ya Dikoloto tsa Diromelwantle.

src_text: The proposed amendments seek to enable the SAPO to adapt to the technological developments in the courier-service space and expand its mandate.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane le ditshwetso tsa go thapa batho ba ba latelang:.

src_text: The changes are in line with the National Integrated Information and Communications Technology Policy White Paper of  Upcoming events.
tgt_text: Setheo sa Melao ya go Laola Dithulaganyo tsa go Agela Setšhaba Dintlo  Rre Sandile Luthuli thapilwe go nna Mokaedikhuduthamagamogolo).

src_text: 2022 World Science Forum (WSF).
tgt_text: Boto ya Setlamo sa Setheo sa Ditsela tsa Naga ya Aforika Borwa  Rre Themba Barrange Mhambi thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Robert Alderman Haswell thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Thamsanqa Piet Matosa thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Refilwe Buthelezi; mmogo lee.

src_text: South Africa will, through the DSI, host the WSF at the Cape Town International Convention Centre Cape from 6 to 9 December 2022 under the theme: “Science for Social Justice”.
tgt_text: Mme Noluphumzo Leonora Noxaka.

src_text: The forum is one of the leading global platforms that encourage dialogue on the role science should play in society.
tgt_text: Bakaedi bao seng ba khuduthamaga kwa Setheong sa Ditirelo tsa Taolo le Phofiso ya Difofane  Rre Zola Majavu thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Khulile Sympathy Boqwana  Mme Nomathemba Kubheka thapilwe sešwa)  Mogeneralemogolo Nhlanhla Lucky Ngema thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Christiaan Rudolph Burger thapilwe sešwa)  Ngaka Malindi Joy Neluheni  Rre Muhammed Ameen Ebrahim Amod  Rre Siyabonga Gcina Kudumela  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya; mmogo lej.

src_text: It is an initiative of global science organisations that also include the UN Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organisation.
tgt_text: Mme Princess Mngoma.

src_text: Renowned thought leaders will be debating various topics that include science for human dignity; science for climate justice, science diplomacy for multilateralism, and science for Africa and the world number of side and satellite events will take place concurrently, and some of them will be hosted by the General Assembly of the African Academy of Sciences Pan-African organisation whose vision is to transform lives on the African continent through science.
tgt_text: Boto ya Koporasi ya Motlakase wa Nyutlelia ya Aforika Borwa  Rre David Nicholls thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Leshoene Joseph Shayi thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Senamile Masango thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Elsie Monale thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Charles Leornad Mavuso  Rre Hilton Darryl Lazarus  Rre Ashley Latchu  Ngaka Mosidi Makgae  Rre Suren Maharaj; mmogo lej.

src_text: World AIDS Day.
tgt_text: Mme Bessie Makgopa thapilwe sešwa go nna tokololo e tsenang mo legatong la yo mongwe fa se teng).

src_text: South Africa will join the world in observing and participating in activities to mark the annual World AIDS Day on 1 December 2022 under the theme: “Equalise and Integrate to End AIDS”.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Matlole go Tshegetsa Maano Merero ya Leokwane  Rre Sipho Mkhize thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Mmete Petrus Fusi  Mme Nosizwe Nokwe-Macamo  Mme Mary-Jane Morifi  Mme Samela Titus-Nabe thapilwe sešwa); mmogo lef.

src_text: The national commemoration event that will be held at the Dr Petrus Molemela Stadium in Bloemfontein in the Free State will be used to remind everyone to be responsible by getting to know their health status so as to make informed life decisions.
tgt_text: Rre Sechaba Thole thapilwe sešwa).

src_text: The commemoration comes as South Africa prepares to begin piloting the injectable pre-exposure prophylaxis (PrEP) early next year, which is recommended by the World Health Organisation.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Isimangaliso Wetland Park  Rre Israel Mabhudu Tembe thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Thulile Memory Sosibo thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Peter Christopher Small thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Gonesagren Ganesh Nair thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Maureen Sibusisiwe Ngcobo  Mme Nombuso Mlambo  Rre Boy Daniel Ngobeni; mmogo leh.

src_text: The PrEP injection, to be taken every other month, could prevent as many as 52 000 new HIV infections.
tgt_text: Rre Bongani Mzwakhe Mhlongo.

src_text: Reconciliation Day.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la Madirelo Dikago  Mme Holovisa Amelia Mtshali thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)b. Mme Vangile Petronella Nene  Rre Anele Mahlawe  Mme Elizabeth Faith Nyaka  Mme Tinyiko Laurel Palesa Shipalana  Mme Mandisa Princess Pepeta-Daki  Ngaka Sitsabo Dlamini thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Thembinkosi Cedric Madikane  Mme Molefi Kubuzie  Rre Christopher Kobla Gavor  Rre Ngwako Edward Hutamo thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Chris Steynberg  Rre Ashley Latchu thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Ditaba Maraka thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Sinehlanhla Mthembu thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Salome Mabilane  Mme Snowy Makhudu  Ngaka Khangwelo Desmond Musetsho  Mme Modiehi Elisa Molebatsi  Rre Craig Silva  Rre Tshepo Albia Monakedi; mmogo lev.

src_text: On Friday, 16 December 2022, the nation will celebrate Reconciliation Day to reaffirm our commitment to unity and nation-building.
tgt_text: Mme Seemole Angela Mohopo.

src_text: Each year we have an opportunity to reach out to one another to deal with our past, reconcile and build new nation going forward.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Magalies  Ngaka Keneilwe Sebego thapilwe sešwa go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Yvonne Malebo Motolong thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Stanley Ngobeni  Mme Yongama Pamla  Mme Priscilla Nomsa Mashaba  Ngaka Mosidi Makgae  Rre Muzuvukile Wiseman Mkhize  Mme Tebogo Magogodi Elizabeth Malaka thapilwe sešwa)  Rre Rudolph Martin Le Roux; mmogo lej.

src_text: Our journey since the advent of freedom and democracy in 1994 has decisively shown that we are stronger as nation when we are united.
tgt_text: Rre Itumeleng Mosala.

src_text: Our goal as South Africans should be to promote inclusive nation-building and social cohesion.
tgt_text: Bakomišenara ba Khomišene ya Taolo ya Melao ya Metsia.

src_text: Together we can build better tomorrow for all by striving to ensure nation that encourages dialogue, fosters social cohesion, embraces nation-building and celebrates its diverse culture.
tgt_text: Mme Davishinee Padayachee  Mme Mampiti Matsabu  Mme Nolubabalo Sondlo  Mme Karen van der Merwe  Rre Rolfe Eberhard  Ngaka Binganidzo Muchara  Rre John Alexander Conolly  Mme Karen Breytenbach  Rre Junior Potloane  Rre Itumeleng Brian Modiba; mmogo lek.

src_text: Cabinet calls on everyone to work together as nation, and harness our collective strengths to build united and prosperous South Africa.
tgt_text: Mme Ntombokuqala Nokulunga Mnqeta.

src_text: National Active Ageing Programme.
tgt_text: Bakaedi bao Seng ba Khuduthamaga mo Botong ya Bankatlhabololo ya Dinaga tsa Borwa jwa Aforika  Mme Martie Jansen van Rensburg thapilwe sešwa)  Mme Dinao Lerutla  Mme Tasneem Essop  Rre Kenneth Brown; mmogo lee.

src_text: The Department of Social Development will host the National Active Ageing Programme in Germiston, Gauteng from 5 to 7 December.
tgt_text: Rre Ebrahim Rasool.

src_text: The programme brings all nine provinces together and is aimed at promoting the independent and healthy lifestyle of older persons to ensure that they actively participate in their communities.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Pabalesego ya kwa Mawatleng (SAMSA)  Rre Tau Morwe thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo).

src_text: The National Active Ageing Programme will open with national dialogue to allow older persons to engage on pertinent matters affecting them.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tsa Setheo sa Banamedi ba Diterene sa Aforika Borwa (Prasa)  Mme Sibongile Luthuli; mmogo leb.

src_text: This will be followed by the Golden Games where older persons will showcase their athletic abilities.
tgt_text: Moatefokate Johnny Motlogelwa.

src_text: The Older Persons Act, 2006 (Act 13 of 2006) emphasises the importance of the protection and promotion of the rights, dignity, status, integrity, safety, security and well-being of older persons.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Aforika Borwa sa Merero ya Leokwane  Rre Satish Roopa thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Mme Carmen Mpelwane  Ngaka Salome Chiloane-Nwabueze; mmogo led.

src_text: In this regard, Cabinet calls upon all communities to care, respect and support older persons, especially against abuse, ill-treatment, neglect and GBV  MessagesCongratulations.
tgt_text: Rre Xolile Sizani.

src_text: Cabinet extended its congratulations and well-wishes to:Prize winners of the 2022 SADC Media Awards.
tgt_text: Boto ya Setheo sa Metsi sa Trans-Caledon Tunnel  Mme Precious Nompumelelo Sibiya thapilwe go nna Monnasetulo)  Rre Gerald Dumas thapilwe go nna Motlatsamonnasetulo)  Rre Gregory Nigel Joseph White  Mme Zelda Ncedekile-Tshabalala  Mme Vidhu Nardev Vedalankar  Rre Neo Mooketsi Tladinyane  Mme Mmanare Evelyn Mamabolo  Rre Patrick Roy Mnisi; mmogo lei.

src_text: Inkhulumo yaMengameli Yebunjalo BaleLive (i-SoNA).
tgt_text: Puo ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekise simemo lesikhulu Mengameli President Cyril Ramaphosa lasente eNkhulumeni yakhe yeBunjalo Belive yanga-2023 kutsi bonkhe bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika basebente ngekubambisana bangashiyi muntfu ngemuva lapho sibukana netinsayeya tentfu letisicindzetelako.
tgt_text: Kabinete boeletsa mafoko ga Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa mo boikuelong jwa gagwe jo bo dirileng mo Puong ya Maemo Setšhaba (SoNA) ya ngwaga wa 2023 mo ikuetseng mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go tshwarisana tiro mmogo le go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le ope yo ba mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go samaganwe le dikgwetlho tse di boima tse naga ya rona tobaneng natso.

src_text: Tinyatselo taMengameli letibalulekile tekubeka ludzaba lwagezi embili eluhlelweni lwahulumende lwekusebenta lwemnyaka kutsi kubukwane futsi kuncotjwe cimicimi bese kucinisekiswa kuba khona kwagezi losimeme..   Ikhabhinethi icele yonkhe imikhakha yemmango kutsi yesekele lemitamo levetwe ku-SoNA nguMengameli, indlala kanye nekukhuphuka kwetindleko tekuphila kanye nekulwa nebugebengu nenkhohlakalo.
tgt_text: Dikgato tse di sa tseweng ke phefo tsa ga moporesitente di beile kwa pele maano puso monongwaga go samagana le motlakase o tshabetseng ruri le go dira gore re se tlhole re sokodisiwa ke tlhaelo ya motlakase..  Kabinete ikuela mo maphateng otlhe setšhaba sa rona go ema nokeng matsholo otlhe go boletsweng ka ona mo puong ya SoNA ya Moporesitente, go nne botlhokwa mo go maswe mo go fokotseng botlhokatiro, tshokolo le ditlhwatlhwa tse di goletseng ruri tsa go reka dilo tse batho ba iphedisang ka tsona mmogo le go lwantshana le botlhokotsebe le bonweenwee.

src_text: Hulumende utimisele kuphutfumisa umsebenti lesewuvele wentiwa wekukhulisa umtsamo wagezi kugridi yavelonkhe futsi umsebenti kususa nanoma ngusiphi sihibe senchubelembili.
tgt_text: Puso tloga ikemiseditse go potlakisa tiro go setseng go samaganwe le yona ya go oketsa motlakase ka fa nageng mme tiro re tobaneng le yona ke go sutisa sengwe le sengwe se se kgoreletsang gore seno se diragale.

src_text: Kulamaviki letako, tingcoco teticheme titawuniketa lwatiso lolubanti mayelana neLuhlelo Lwekusebenta lwahulumende (i-PoA) yalomnyaka lotako, njengobe Mengameli Ramaphosa akugcamisile ku-SoNA.
tgt_text: Fela jaaka Moporesitente Ramaphosa setse tlhalositse mo go SoNA ya gagwe, mo dibekeng di le mmalwa tse di tlang, ditlhotshwana tsa ditirelo tsa puso di tla abelana ka tshedimosetso ka botlalo ka ga Leano la Dikgato tse Puso tla di Tsayang (PoA) mo ngwageng yo re lebileng.

src_text: Sabelomali Savelonkhe lesitawetfulwa ngaLesitsatfu, mhla tinge-22 Indlovana 2023 sitawuniketa lolunye lwatiso mayelana ne-PoA.
tgt_text: Puo ya Tekanyetsokabo ya Naga le yona ka Laboraro, 22 Tlhakole 2023 tla abelana ka tshedimosetso e tseneletseng ka ga merero ya PoA.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika yanga-.
tgt_text: Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika ya Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyinakile imiphumela yeNgcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika lebeyibanjelwe e-International Convention Centre eKapa kusukela mhla ti-6 kuya kumhla ti-9 Indlovana 2023 ngaphasi kwendzikimba letsi:“Kuvula Lutjalomali Lwetimayini Lwase-Afrika: Lutinto, Kuvikeleka kanye Nekuphakela”.
tgt_text: Kabinete sekegetse tsebe dintlha tse di tšhotlhilweng kwa Kopanong Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika e neng tshwaretswe kwa Cape Town International Convention Centre go tloga ka la bo 6 go fitlha ka la bo 9 Tlhakole 2023 mo molaetsamogolo neng re: “Go Bulela Dipeeletso mo Meepong ya Aforika: Go Tlisa Tsetsepelo, Polokesego le Tlamelo e sa Kgaotseng”.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela Yetimayini Evenikati i-Afrika ihlanganise badlali betimboni labavela kulo lonkhe lelivekati kanye nakumhlaba wonkhe, yaphindze futsi yacinisa indzawo yayo njengengcungcutsela lehamba embili yekutjalwa kwetimali kutetimayini kulelivekati.
tgt_text: Kopano Kgolo ya Beng ba Meepo mo Nageng ya Aforika tsenetswe ke beng ba meepo go tswa mo kontinenteng le mo lefatsheng ka bophara bile itiretse leina ka go itsege jaaka khonferense e di gogang kwa pele mo dipeeletsong tsa meepo mo kontinenteng.

src_text: Tetimayini tiyachubeka nekudlala indzima lebaluleke kakhulu ekutfutfukisweni nasekutfutfukisweni kwetimboni kulo lonkhe lelivekati.
tgt_text: Moepo tswelela go nna le seabe se segolo mo go tliseng tlhabologo le mo go ageng diintaseteri mo kontinenteng ka bophara botlhokwa thata fa go tla mo go tlholeng ditiro le mo go direng gore batho ba se latlhegelwe ke ditiro bile ke ona o dirileng gore go nne le ditiro di ka nna halofo ya milione mo meepong le ditiro tse dingwe di ka nna milione tse di ikokotletseng ka ditiro tsa meepo mo nageng ya Aforika Borwa.

src_text: Tingumfakigalelo lobalulekile ekwakheni ematfuba emsebenti, takha ematfuba emisebenti-ngco lecishe ibe yihhafu yesigidzi nemisebenti lengakacondzi-ngco lecishe ibe sigidzi lapha eNingizimu Afrika.
tgt_text: Dilo tse di tlhagisitsweng mo meepong ya Aforika Borwa mo ngwageng yo fetileng di fitlhile kwa mankalankaleng mo di dirileng bokanaka  18 trilione, tsa godisa dilo tse di tlhagisiwang ka fa nageng, ditlhagisiwa tsa naga ya rona tse di rekisediwang dinaga tsa boditšhaba mmogo le letseno la rona.

src_text: Umkhicito wetetimayini lapha eNingizimu Afrika kulomnyaka lophelile kulinani lelisetulu lemathriliyoni la-R. 18, lokukhulise samba semkhicito wasekhaya (i-GDP), imikhicito letsengiselwa lamanye emave kanye nemalingena.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba nang le seabe mo intasetering eno go tswelela go tshwarisana tiro le puso gore re kgone go nna le intaseteri e itsegeng mo lefatsheng e kgonang go ema nokeng kgolo ya ikonomi, go tlhola ditiro le go tlisa tlhabololo e tsepameng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi imema bonkhe badlalindzima kulemboni kutsi bachubeke nekusebentisana nahulumende kute kutsi kwakheke imboni yetetimayini lecudzelanako lefukula kukhula kwemnoto, yakhe ematfuba emisebenti kanye nekuchuba  intfutfuko lesimeme.
tgt_text: Merwalela.

src_text: Tikhukhula.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa malapeng bao ba latlhegetsweng ke ba malapa bona mo merwaleleng ya mo malobanyaneng e gogotseng mafelo le mantsinyana ka fa nageng..  Re leboga go menagane go ba ditirelo tsa tshoganyetso go ralala le naga ya rona ba ba neng ba tshwere phage ka dingana go pholosa matshelo batho.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo ekulilela imindeni leshonelwe tihlobo tayo kuletikhukhula letimbi letisandza kuba khona etincenyeni letinyenti talelive..   Sibonga betinsita tetfu tekuphalala bakulo lonkhe lelive labasebente ngekutikhandla kute basindzise bantfu.
tgt_text: Re le naga tla re ipopeng seoposengwe mme re tswe thuso bao ba tlhokang tlhokomelo le kemonokeng.

src_text: Asibambisaneni sisive sisite laba labadzinga kakhulu kunakekelwa nekwesekelwa.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging gore ba nne ka fa dintlong fa pula tshologa le fa go na le merwalela, mmogo le go gakolola bao ba nnang mo mafelong ao metsi tamang mo go ona fa pula nele thata gore ba itlhokomele..  Baagi ba elediwa gore ba se tsamaele gaufi le mo metsi mantsi sianang ka lobelo, ba se thumele mo go ona kgotsa ba se kgabaganye mo metsing ano ka dijanaga tsa bona kgotsa gona go leka go kgabaganya ditsela, maborogo le dinoka mo metsi tletseng.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse bantfu kutsi bahlale ekhaya uma kuna timvula letinamandla nakanye uma kunesiphepho, iphindze yakhumbuta labo labahlala etindzaweni letiphasi kutsi bacaphelisise..   Bantfu bacasheliswa kutsi bangahambi ngetinyawo, bangabhukushi noma-ke bangahambi ngetimoto emantini etikhukhula lageleta ngemandla futsi bangayeweli imigwaco, emabhuloho kanye nemifula legcwele.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuetse mo baaging go dira bonnete jwa gore ka gale bana ba bona ba bolokesegile bile ga go na kgonagalo ya gore ba ka gogolwa ke metsi fa go na le merwalela..  Tirisodikgoka ka Ditlhobolo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incuse ummango kutsi ucinisekise kutsi bantfwana bahlala ngaso sonkhe sikhatsi baphephile ekuncwileni ngetikhatsi tetikhukhula..   Budlova betibhamu.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga seopedi sa mmino wa hip-hop Rre Kiernan Forbes, yo tumileng thata ka leina la AKA, mmogo le ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga tsala ya gagwe yo neng le seapei se se tumileng bong Rre Tebello Motsoane, bao bobedi bo jelweng ka tlhobolo kwa Durban..  Kabinete batla gape le go romela matshediso yona kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa ga molwelakgaratlho ya go lwantshana le bosenyi bong Rre Ayob Mungalee, yo mo malobanyaneng jelweng ke tlhobolo kwa Eldorado Park kwa Johannesburg ne le Mokaedi wa mokgatlho o rotloetsang baagi go ema ka dinao kgatlhanong le digongwana tsa bosenyi le thekiso ya diritibatsi wa People Seeking Justice Action Group..  Kabinete rometse matshediso kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa batho bao ba jelweng ka ditlhobolo kwa porofenseng ya Kapa Bophirima, KwaZulu-Natal le ya Kapa Botlhaba.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ayo ekulilela umndeni nebangani beliciko le-hip-hop uMnu.
tgt_text: Ditiragalo tse di setlhogo tseno tsa go tlhasela batho ba bangwe, tseo ba sepodisi ba setseng ba weditse diphuruphutso tsa tsona, di re bontsha ka fao tirisodikgoka ka ditlhobolo setseng aname ka gona mmogo le dikotsi tse nang le tsona mo baaging..  Kabinete netefaletsa maAforika Borwa gore go samaganwe le dikgato tse di tla matlafatsang Tirelo ya Sepodisi sa Aforika Borwa (SAPS) gore kgone go lwantshana le bosenyi.

src_text: Kiernan Forbes, lobekadvume ngelekutsi ngu-AKA, kanye nasowatiwako ongumpheki uMnu.
tgt_text: Tsona di tsenyeletsa go oketsa palo ya mapodisi mo mebileng mmogo le go tlhoma ditlhopha tse di tla lwantshanang le bosenyi jo bo rileng.

src_text: Tebello Motsoane, labasandza kudutjulwa bashona eThekwini..   Ikhabhinethi iphindze futsi yavakalisa kuvelana nemindeni nebangani besishikashiki lesilwa nebugebengu uMnu.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla dirisa gape le dikgato tsa go dirisa tshedimosetso ka mokgwa o tlhalefileng go itse gore ke mafelo fe a tumileng ka bosenyi le bosenyi bo itaolang mo go ona..  SAPS samagane le go gagamatsa matsholo go utolola ditlhobolo le dikolo le go thopa tsotlhe tse di seng mo molaong tse di leng mo diatleng tsa ditlhokotsebe.

src_text: Ayob Mungalee, losandza kudutjulwa washona e-Eldorado Park eJozi.
tgt_text: Mo dikgweding di le 12 tse di fetileng mapodisi ne thopa ditlhobolo di le 65 519 tse di neng di le mo diatleng tsa batho..  Puso ikuela mo baaging botlhe mmogo le mo mekgatlhong ya baagi go sikara mmogo tiro eno le ba sepodisi go fedisa botlhokotsebe mo metseng ya rona.

src_text: Bekangumcondzisi wavelonkhe we-People Seeking Justice Action Group, umbutfo lobuhlanganisa emalunga emmango kutsi alwe nebugebengu lobuchutjwa ngemacembu ebugebengu kanye nekusetjentiswa kwetidzakamiva..   Ikhabhinethi ivakalise emavi ekulilela nekudvudvuta imindeni nebangani balabo labasandza kubulawa etigamekweni tekudubulana kwebantfu labanyenti eNyakatfo Kapa, eKwaZulu-Natal naseMphumalanga Kapa.
tgt_text: Fa go na le sengwe se se itseng se se ka romelang kwa kgolegelong batho ba mo motseng ba ba dirang dilo tse di seng mo molaong, loma mapodisi tsebe ka go letsetsa Mogala wa go Lwantshana le Ditiro tsa Bosenyi mo go 0800. .

src_text: Lokuhlasela lokunelunya kangaka nalokungenaluvelo, lokuphenywa baphenyi betemtsetfo, kugcamisa kubhebhetseka kwebudlova betibhamu kanye nemtselela wako lomubi emimangweni yetfu.
tgt_text: Masepala wa Selegae wa Enoch Mgijima (EMLM).

Tona ya Pusoselegae le Merero ya Setso Mme Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma mmogo le Tona ya Matlole Rre Enoch Godongwana ba ne ba sedimosetsa ditokololo tsa Kabinete ka maeto bona go buisana le bannaleseabe ba ba nang le dikarolo le seabe se se botlhokwa mo masepaleng ono wa Enoch Mgijima.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icinisekisa bantfu baseNingizimu Afrika kutsi Luphiko Lwetemisebenti Yemaphoyisa LwaseNingizimu Afrika (i-SAPS) kungunyalo luyaciniswa kute luvikele bugebengu.
tgt_text: Ka kgwedi ya Moranang, Kabinete ne ya nesetsa pula dikgato tse di ka tsewang go rarabolola matsapa mo masepaleng ono go ya ka Karolo ya bo 139(7) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996, fa buisiwa mmogo le Karolo ya bo 150 ya Molao wa Taolo ya Matlole Dimasepala wa ngwaga wa 2003 (Molao wa bo 56 wa 2003).

src_text: Loku kufaka ekhatsi kubekwa kwemaphoyisa lamanengi emigwacweni nekusungula ematsimba lakhetsekile latawugcila etihlotjeni letitsite tebugebengu.
tgt_text: Masepala ono wa Enoch Mgijima ga a bolo go nna mo tobetobeng ya matlole le ya go retelelwa ke go tlamela setšhaba ka ditirelo pele ga ka tseelwa dikgato..  Kabinete dumelana le matsapa a utolotsweng ke bannaleseabe mme solofeditse baagi ba masepala yono gore go tla tsewa ditshwetso mabapi le gore ke dikgato dife tse di tshwanetsweng go tsewa go samagana le dikgwetlho tse masepala yono tobaneng le tsona mme tsona tla re mo nakong e sa fediseng pelo tsa bolelelwa baagi..  Pabalesego mo Dikolong.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika futsi itawusebentisa tindlela letisuselwe kulwati loluvela kulucwaningo kutfola nekucondza-ngco tindzawo letihamba embili ngekuba nebugebengu..   I-SAPS icinisa kusebenta kwayo kutfola nekwemuka tigebengu tibhamu netinhlavu tato letingekho emtsetfweni.
tgt_text: Pabalesego mo dikolong tsa naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le ntlha e botlhokwa thata mo pusong ya rona mme bile gape ditiragalo tsa tirisodikgoka tse di begiwang kwa dikolong magareng ga barutwana le barutabana ke selo se se re tlhobang boroko.

src_text: Kuletinyanga leti-12 letendlulile emaphoyisa atsatse ulomphela tibhamu letingekho emtsetfweni leti-65.
tgt_text: Le fa Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le tsentse tirisong dikgato tsa go samagana le bothata jono santse le maikarabelo batsadi le bagodisi ba bana go tshwarisana tiro le ditlhogo tsa dikolo mmogo le barutwana go netefatsa gore kwa dikolong go rena polokesego gore barutwana ba rona ba kgone go rutiwa mme tle nne batho mo setšhabeng.
Se sengwe se se botlhokwa thata mo go rona ke pabalesego ya barutabana ba rona kwa dikolong.

src_text: Hulumende umema tonkhe takhamuti netinhlangano temmango kutsi basebentisane ne-SAPS yabo yendzawo kucedza bugebengu emimangweni yabo.
tgt_text: Pabalesego mo Mebileng.

src_text: Uma ngabe unelwatiso lolungasita ludzalule bantfu lababandzakanyeka etentweni tebugebengu, shayela inombolo ye-Crime Stop ku-0800.
tgt_text: Kabinete santse tshwenngwa ke dikotsi tse di diragalang go ralala le naga mo mebileng ya rona.

Puso tla tlhotlhomisa melao mentšhwa e tla fokotsang dikotsi tsa diteroko mongwe wa melao eno ke go dira gore dithoto di se tlhole di tsamaisiwa mo mebileng mme di tsamaisiwe ka diterene mo diporong, mme go solofelwa gore ka go dira jalo seno se tla fokotsa dirori tse di rwalang dithoto mo mebileng.

src_text: Masipala Wendzawo I-Enoch Mgijima (i-EMLM).
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go botlhe ba ba dirisang ditsela go obamela melao ya mo mebileng ka go ntsha matlho dinameng, ka go naganela batho ba bangwe ba le bona ba dirisang mmila oo le go se ba felele pele.

src_text: Indvuna yeTekubusa Ngekubambisana Netendzabuko Nkosazana Dlamini Zuma akanye neNdvuna yeTetimali Enoch Godongwana batise Ikhabhinethi ngetingcoco letisandza kubanjwa nebadlalindzima nalabatsintsekako abakhulu e-EMLM.
tgt_text: Botlhe ba ba kgannang ba itshietse kgotsa ba gabotse diritibatsi mmogo le ba ba kgannang boatla, mmogo le ba ba kgannang ka lebelo le le kwa godimo, ke bona ba ba tlholang bontsi jwa dikotsi tseno mo mebileng  Melaotlhomo.

src_text: NgaMabasa 2022, Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kungenelela e-EMLM ngekwembandzela weSigaba se-139(7) weMtsetfosisekelo waseRiphabhulikhi yeNingizimu Afrika yanga-1996, lofundvwa kanye neSigaba se-150 seMtsetfo Wetekulawulwa Kwetimali Tamasipala, wanga-2003 (Umtsetfo we-56 wanga-2003).
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo wa Ngwaga wa 2022 wa go Tlhoma Lefelo le le Lengwe la go Abelana ka Ditirelo Tsotlhe tsa go Kgabaganya Melelwane (OSBP).

src_text: Le-EMLM beyiloku ihlangabetana nekufadabala lokukhulu kwetetimali nekwetfulwa kwetinsita sikhatsi lesidze ngembi kwelungenelelo..   Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kubonga kwayo mayelana naletinkinga letinkhulu letikhonjwe badlalindzima futsi seyicinisekise bahlali base-EMLM masinyane-nje batawatiswa ngesincumo lesitsetfwe mayelana nekulungiswa kwaletinsayeya tamasipala letikhona kwanyalo..   Tekuphepha etikolweni.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula Molaotlhomo wa OSBP gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

src_text: Tekuphepha etikolweni taseNingizimu Afrika kusachubeka nekubekwa embili kuhulumende futsi nemibiko yebudlova emkhatsini webafundzi nebafundzisi kuyintfo lebanga kukhatsateka lokukhulu.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono latela gore go nesediwe pula pholisi ya OSBP mmogo le maano go tsenya tirisong ka Mopitlwe.

src_text: Nanoma-nje Litiko Letemfundvo Lesisekelo limise ngemumo tindlela tekulwa nalesihlava, kusibopho sebatali nababheki bebantfwana kutsi basebentisane netiphatsimandla tetikolwa kanye nebafundzi kucinisekisa kutsi tikolwa tihlala titindzawo letiphephile lapho bafundzi betfu batitfutfukisa khona baphindze futsi babe takhamuti leticotfo.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo ona ke go dira gore go nne bonolo go tsenya batho le dithoto mo mafelong botseno jwa naga ya Aforika Borwa le kwa mafelong dinaga tsa baagisani..  Seno se tla fokotsa tshubetlhelano e tleng nne gone kwa mafelong go tsena le go tswa ka fa nageng e diriwang ke batho ba ba kgabaganyang melelwane le ba ba gwebisanang.

src_text: Kuphepha kwabothishela betfu etikolweni nako kubaluleke kakhulu.
tgt_text: Dikgato tseno di botlhokwa gape le mo dikgatong tsa naga ya rona mo go diragatseng Tumelano ya Kgwebisano e Senang Dikgoreletsi mo Dinageng tsa Kontinente ya Aforika (AfCFTA)..  Ditumelano tse di tlhalosiwang mo Molaotlhomong ono di tla thusa gore ditiro tsa go tlhatlhoba dithoto, dijanaga le batho kwa melelwaneng di se opise tlhogo mme di diriwe ka bonako.

src_text: Kuphepha emigwacweni.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono samagana gape le didirisiwa tse di matshwanedi tsa maemo boditšhabatšhaba fa go tla mo go laoleng metsamaong ya go gwebisana, mmogo le ya batho le ya dithoto..  Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iyachubeka nekukhatsateka ngekukhuphuka kwelizinga lekufa kwebantfu emigwacweni yakulo lonkhe lelive.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go phasaladiwa ga Molaotlhomo wa Naga wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa wa Ngwaga wa 2022 gore baagi ba ntshe maikutlo bona ka ga ona.

src_text: Hulumende utawehlwaya imitsetfo lemisha yekucedza tingoti temaloli, munye wayo ufaka ekhatsi kususa kutsi imphahla itfutswe ngemaloli kodvwa itfutswe ngesitimela, ngelitsemba lekutsi loku kutawuhhamula incindzetelo yekuhambisa imphahla ngemgwaco.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo ono neela maatla Pholisi ya Taolo ya Makwalo Boitshupo Semmuso mmogo le go tla ka leano la go tlhoma thulaganyo ya dikhomphiutha le nngwe fela ya naga ya makwalo boitshupo mo go yona batho botlhe ba ba nnang ka fa nageng kgotsa ba ba kileng ba nna ka fa nageng maina bona tla bolokwang mo go yona..  Sekwalwa se iseng se butswe sa Molaotlhomo ono se tla thusa gore go tlhomiwe sefalanatshedimoso sa go kwadisa baagi le bao seng baagi ba naga eno mme ba neilwe tetla ya go nnela ruri ka fa nageng mmogo le go se tlhokomela.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi incusa bonkhe basebentisi bemigwaco kutsi batfobele imitsetfo yemgwaco ngekutsi bacilike, bacabangele baphindze futsi babeketelelane.
tgt_text: Se tla thusa gape le gore go tlhomiwe le sefalanatshedimoso se sengwe gape sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.

src_text: Bashayeli labashayela sebanatse tjwala noma tidzakamiva kanye nekushayela lokungakhatsali nalokunganakekeli, kufaka ekhatsi kushayela ngelitubane lelikhulu, ngiko lokubangela tingoti temgwaco letinyenti   Imitsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa seno se tla thusa gape le ka go tlhoma Thulaganyo ya Naga ya go Dirisa Dikarolo tsa Mmele go Tlhagisa Boitshupo jwa Motho (NIS) mme thulaganyo eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go bona dintlha tsa motho tsa boitshupo ka tswa di le mo sefalanatshedimosong sa go kwadisa baagi kgotsa mo go sa go boloka ditokomane tsa boitshupo tsa baagi ba ba tlang go nna sebakanyana ka fa nageng.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekusetjentiswa Kwemnyele Lowodvwa(i-OSBP) wanga-.
tgt_text: NIS tla kgona gape le go dirisana le dithulaganyo tse dingwe tsa boitshupo tsa maphata mangwe puso le poraefete..  Melaotlhomo ya naga ka bobedi leng wa OSBP le wa Ditokomane tsa Boitshupo le tsa go Kwadisiwa ya ngwaga wa 2022 tla phasaladiwa mo webesaeteng ya Lefapha la Merero ya Selegae mo go: www.dha.gov.za.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kutsi ummango uphawule ngeMtsetfosivivinyo we-OSBP.
tgt_text: Baagi ba rotloediwa go romela ditshwaelo tsa bona tse ba di kwadileng mo atereseng e latelang: The Director-General of Home Affairs, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.

src_text: Lomtsetfosivivinyo ulandzela kuvunywa kweNchubomgomo ye-OSBP kanye nekucala kwayo kusetjentiswa ngeNdlovulenkhulu.
tgt_text: Mogala: 012 406  Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.

src_text: Uhlose kutsi kube nekuhleleka kahle kuhamba kwebantfu nekuhanjiswa kwemphahla emkhatsini wematubuko ekungena eNingizimu Afrika kanye nasemaveni labomakhelwane bayo..   Loku kutawuhhamula lesiminyeminye lesikhona kwanyalo ematubukweni etfu ekungena nekuphuma bahambi nebahwebi.
tgt_text: Samiti ya Mokgatlhotshwaraganelo wa Aforika (AU).

src_text: Letingenelelo tiphindze futsi tibe nguletibalulekile emitameni yalelive ekuchubekiseleni embili Sivumelwane Sendzawo Yeluhwebelana Ngalokukhulekile Kulelivekati Lase-Afrika (i-AfCFTA)..   Letivumelwane letilindzelwe kuloMtsetfosivivinyo titawucinisekisa kutsi kucutjungulwa kwemphahla, timoto kanye nebantfu kute tihibe kantsi futsi kuyashesha.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa tla tsenela Kopano ya bo 36 ya Pulo ya Palamente ya Dinaga tsa Aforika e tla tsenelwang ke Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso eno e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 18 go fitlha ka la bo 19 Tlhakole kwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uphendvula tindlela temtsetfo temave emhlaba letifanele letiphatselene tekuchutjwa kweluhwebo kanye nekuhamba kwebantfu nekuhanjiswa kwemphahla.
tgt_text: Pulo ya Palamente ya AU e tla bulwang ka molaetsamogolo yo reng, “Go Potlakisiwa go Tsenngwa Tirisong AfCFTA” tla bulelwa ke Kopano e Edileng ya bo 42 ya Lekgotlakhuduthamaga e tla tshwarwang go tloga ka la bo 15 go fitlha ka la bo 16 Tlhakole.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-.
tgt_text: Ditlhogo tsa Dinaga le tsa Mebuso ya AU di tla dirisa molaetsamogolo yono go totobatsa maikano bona go tsenya tirisong ka botlalo AfCFTA..  Leeto la Semmuso la ga Moporesitente wa Naga ya Uganda.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivumile kushicilelwa kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-2022 kute kutsi ummango uphawule ngawo.
tgt_text: Motlotlegi Moporesitente Yoweri Kaguta Museveni wa kwa Uganda tla etela naga ya Aforika Borwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole 2023, go latela gore Moporesitente ka ene Rre Ramaphosa mo laletse.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo unika Inchubomgomo Yekulawula Buwena Ngekwemtsetfo emandla uphindze futsi uhlose kwenta kutsi kube nenchubo yinye, lefaka konkhe ekhatsi futsi lehlanganisiwe ledijithali yekutatisa kwavelonkhe..   LoMtsetfosivivinyo loluhlaka wenta kutsi kube nekuhlanganiswa nekugcinwa kwerejista yetakhamuti nebahlali balomphelo.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo leeto leno ke go gagamatsa botsalano jwa dinaga ka bobedi.

src_text: Uphindze wente kutsi kwakhiwe luhlu lebachamuki labatsite labahleti kulelive kwesikhashana.
tgt_text: Leeto leno le tla garelwa ka go tshwarwa ga dikopano tsa beng ba dikgwebo ba ba batlang go gwebisana le go beeletsa mo dinageng ka bobedi..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa Dinaga tsa Mokgatlho wa Tlhabololo ya Borwa jwa Aforika (SADC).

src_text: Iphindze futsi yente kutsi kube neLuhlelo Lwavelonkhe Lwebunguwe (i-NIS) lolusebenta ngekutsatsa iminwe lolutawenta kutsi kube nekumbona kunye  kwemuntfu  ngekufakae imininingwane kurejista yebantfu yavelonkhe kanye neluhlu lwemininingwane yebantfu.
tgt_text: Kabinete gakolola badiredi botlhe ba bobegakgang gore Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa Ngwaga wa 2023 tsa SADC di butswe gore mmegadikgang mongwe le mongwe go tswa mo nageng nngwe le nngwe ya SADC yo batlang go di tsenela ka dira jalo mme di tla tswalelwa ka Labobedi wa la bo 28 Tlhakole..  Dikabo tsa Bobegakgang tsa SADC di keteka tiro e tswileng diatla mo bobegakganyeng jwa makwalodikgang, jwa ditshwantsho, jwa go gasa tshedimosetso mo thelebišeneng le mo seyalemoweng mo dinageng tsa SADC ka maitlhomo go ema nokeng dikgato tsa go dirisana mmogo ga dinaga tsa kgaolo le go tshwaragana ga tsona  Melaetsa ya go Akgola.

src_text: I-NIS itawuphindze futsi ikwati kucobelelane netinchubo tekutatisa taleminye imikhakha lengaphasi kwahulumende kanye naletimele..   Kokubili i-OSBP yanga 2022 kanye neMtsetfosivivinyo Wekulawula Nekubhalisa Buwena Wavelonkhe wanga-2022 kutawushicilelwa kuwebhusayithi yeLitiko Letasekhaya: www.dha.gov.za.
tgt_text: Kabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Nomcebo Zikode, Zakes Bantwini mmog le Wouter Kellerman jaaka kwa Dikabong tsa bo 65 tsa Ngwaga le Ngwaga tsa Grammy ba kgonne go fenya maemo go diragatsa pina ka botswerere mo lefatsheng ka bophara fa ba ne ba diragatsa pina ya bona e bidiwang Bayethe  Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: batho botlhe ba ba thutseng botala ka tlhogo fa bese ba neng ba nametse ne sugagana le sejanaga se se rwalang tšhelete kwa tselafefong ya N1 kwa porofenseng ya Limpopo.

src_text: Emalunga emmango akhutsatwa kutsi atfumele kuphawula kwawo lokubhaliwe kulelikheli lelilandzelako: The Director-General of Home Affairs,, Private Bag X114, Pretoria,.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletsa botlhe ba ba nnileng le dikgobalo mo kotsing eno pholo ya ka bonako.Rre John Moeti (yo neng na le dingwaga di le 56), yo kileng tshamekela setlhopha sa kgwele ya dinao sa Bafana Bafana le sa Orlando Pirates, yo gape nnileng le seabe se se botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore ka ngwaga wa 1996 re kgone go fenya Sejana sa Baganka ba Kgwele ya Dinao mo Dinageng tsa Aforika.

src_text: Lucingo: 012 406    Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Kabinete rometse gape le matshediso kwa pusong ya Türkiye le ya Syria mmogo le kwa baagi ba dipuso ka bobedi jaaka ba latlhegetswe ke matshelo batho ba bo bona ba bantsi mmogo le go senyegelwa ke mafaratlhatlha bona a leng botlhokwa mo baaging le mo ikonomng ya bona leng seo se tlhodilweng ke thoromo kgolo ya lefatshe ka la bo 6 Tlhakole 2023 bogolo jwa yona bo balelwang go.

src_text: Ingcungcutsela yeBunye be-Afrika (i-AU).
tgt_text: 8 mo Sekaleng sa go Meta Dithoromo tsa Lefatshe.
