src_text: Kuhlanganiswa, lokuwukwakha umkhiciti lomkhulu wema-cider kulelive, kweyeme etimeni letinyenti letijatjulelwa ngummango, letifaka ekhatsi kukhutsatwa kwekutfutfukiswa labasita ngemphahla, kugcinwa kwekutsengwa kwempahla yasekhaya, kugcugcutelwa kwekutjalwa kwetimali elucwaningweni nasekutfutfukisweni kanye nekwandza kwemandla ekukhicita akuleli..     Lebhizinisi lehlanganisiwe itawuphindze ikhutsate bunikati bebasebenti ngekusungula luhlelo lwebunikati bemasheya besisebenti iphindze futsi yente kutsi basebenti bamelelwe ebhodini.
tgt_text: Go Buela Ditona le Batlatsatona Maaka ka Megolo ya Bona.

src_text: Kulandzelelwa Kwenchubelembili Yetekuhhamuleka Yetikhukhula Tanga-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tshwentswe ke dipuo tse di sa kgaotseng tsa go buela Ditona le Batlatsatona maaka ka megolo ya bona e tlhagelelang mo Bukeng ya go Kaela Tiro ya Batlhankedi ba Khuduthamaga, eo buang ka megolo ya bona, didirisiwa tseo ba di tlhokang go dira tiro ya bona mmogo le merokotso eo ba neelwang fa ba ntshitse ga tshwene mo tirong ya bona.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iwemukele umsebenti lowentiwe yiNdvuna yeTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu, Mk.
tgt_text: Malebana le Dintlo tsa Ditona seno ga se bolo go nna teng jaaka se kwadilwe mo Ditumelanong tsa ngwaga wa 1910 leng fa go ne go tlhomiwa puso ya Union of South Africa mme ka one motsi oo go ne ga tlhamiwa gore naga ya Aforika Borwa tla nna le Metsemegolo le meraro go emela maphata le mararo puso leng wa Pretoria mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Tsamaiso ya Naga, Bloemfontein mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Merero ya go Disa Melao ya Naga mmogo le Cape Town mo go tla nnang Puso e Samaganang le Baemedi ba Dipolotiki ba ba Tlhamang Melao ya Naga.

src_text: Mmamoloko Kubayi kanye neMalunga e-MinMEC yeTekuhlaliswa Kwebantfu wekulandzelela inchubekelembili mayelana nekuhlaliswa kwebantfu kwalomphela kanye nekuhlalisa imindeni lekhahlabetwe tikhukhula tanga-2022 KwaZulu-Natal njengoba lelive lisondzela ekuhlanganeni kwemnyaka wekucala lelive lehlelwa tikhukhula nga-.
tgt_text: Dintlo tse go buiwang ka tsona tseno tse go tweng ke megobagoba ya dintlo sele di rekiwa ka ngwaga wa 1994 mme puso e eteletsweng pele ke Mokgatlho wa African National Congress fitlhetse dintlo tseno di le teng mme yona se se dirileng ke go di tlhokomela fela gore se feletse le marope mme dintlo tseno di ba tswela mosola..     Ditona le Batlatsatona ba ba nnang mo dintlong tse puso ba adimang tsona ba duelela ditirelo fela jaaka batlhankedi ba ba direlang palamente tla bo le go tlhoka botho go batla gore Ditona le Batlatsatona ba tiro ya bona sa nneleng ruri go ithekela dintlo mo metsemegolong yothe go boletsweng ka yona le go dira gore go nne botlhofo gore ba kgone go dira tiro ya bona ya go direla naga..     Dijanaga tse di dirisiwang ke Ditona le Batlatsatona di tsamaisana le Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona mme bile boleng jwa tsona bo mo diatleng tsa Tona ya Matlole mme ene elediwa ke Tona ya Mapodisi go mo eletsa ka didirisiwa tsa pabalesego tse di tlhokagalang mo dijanageng tseno.

src_text: Lokungasiwo emaciniso mayelana neTinzuzo teTindvuna neMasekelatindvuna.
tgt_text: Didirisiwa tsa pabalesego ke tsona tse di bitsang thata tse di nang le seabe se segolo mo ditlhwatlhweng tsa dijanaga tseno, mme ditiragalo tsa go tshwana le tsa mo malobanyaneng tsa Mokhuduthamaga yo thutseng botala ka tlhogo go latela gore sejanaga sa gagwe se amege mo kotsing ke dilo tsa mothale ono tse di dirang gore go nne botlhokwa thata gore re se lebelele seno ka leitlho la sepolotiki.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ivakalise kukhatsateka ngalokuchubekako nalokuhlaneketelwa kabi mayelana neTinzuzo teTindvuna neMasekelatindvuna njengaloku kubekiwe kuNkhombandlela Yetindvuna letiseSigungwini lesiphetse, lobeka tinzuzo, emathulusi ekusebenta kanye netimbasha teMalunga eSigungu kwekwenta imisebenti yawo.
tgt_text: Batlhankedi botlhe ba ba direlang Palamente ba na le tshwanelo ya go neelwa badiredi ba ba ka ba thusang ka tiro ya bona.

src_text: Kuhlelwa kweTindlu teTindvuna kungumphumela wekuVumelana kwanga-1910 ngesikhatsi kwakhiwa Inhlangano YaseNingizimu Afrika leyancuma lamadolobhanhloko lamatsatfu aseNingizimu Afrika lapho khona iPitoli yaba Sihlalo Sahulumende, iBloemfontein yaba Sihlalo Setebulungiswa, kwabe sekutsi iKapa yona yaba Sihlalo SePhalamende.
tgt_text: Phapang fela ya palo ya badiri ba ba Thusang Ditona ke nako go ya ka gore Tona e rileng tla nna mo tirong sebaka se se kanakang gonne badiredi botlhe ba ba thusang Ditona ba dira go ya ka sebaka sa gore ene dira sebaka se le kanakang.

src_text: Tonkhe letindlu lekutsiwa titsabatsaba tatfolwa ngembi kwa-1994 futsi hulumende lowalandzela loholwa nguKhongolose usandza kucinisekisa kunakekelwa kwaleto tindzawo tekuhlala kute kutsi kulondvolotwe linani lato futsi ngaleyo ndlela-ke tiyazuza ekukhuphukeni kwelinani letindlu..     Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna lasebentisa totimbili tindlu letiniketwa nguHulumende bakhokha irenti ngendlela lefanako nemalunga ephalamende.
tgt_text: Seno ke ka ntlha ya gore Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona tsamaya kwalolwa sešwa le go fetolwa..     Moporesitente rometse Melawana ya Bukana ya Tiro ya Ditona e dirisiwang ga jaanong kwa Khomišeneng e Ikemetseng e Dirang ka Megolo ya Batlhankedi ba Puso ba Bagolo, go kwalola le go sekaseka karolo ya megolo e dirisiwang ga jaana mo bukaneng eno     Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Kungaba yintfo lengakalungi kutsi Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna labasebenta imisebenti lengacinisekisiwe etikhundleni tabo labakuto kwanyalo kute batitfolele tabo tindzawo tekuhlala  babe kodvwa benta umsebenti wesive..     Timoto letisetjentiswa Tindvuna neMasekelatindvuna tihambisana kahle kakhulu neLibhukwana  Letindvuna kanye nemkhawulo welinani uncunywa yiNdvuna yeTetimali ngekubonisana neNdvuna Yetemaphoyisa mayelana netekuphepha.
tgt_text: Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Basadi mo Metshamekong.

src_text: Tici tetekuphepha titinhlangotsi letibalulekile ekuncunyweni kwemkhawulo wemanani futsi tehlakalo letingasitinhle takamuva teBaphatsimadolobha labafile noma labehlelwe tingoti tetemgwaco letimbi kabi kugcizelela kubaluleka kwaloludzaba futsi kufanele kususe loludzaba etinchakeleni tetepolitiki.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go gatisa mo kaseteng Sekwalwa se Iseng se Butswe sa Pholisi ya Basadi mo Metshamekong gore baagi ba ntshe se se mo mafatlheng bona ka ga yona.

src_text: Onkhe Emalunga ePhalamende afanelwe kutfola lusito kubasebenti betinsita lababasitako ekwenteni imisebenti yabo.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tlhagisa dikgato tse di tla tsewang go tsholetsa le go ema nokeng basadi mo metshamekong mmogo le go tsenya tirosng matsholo a tla samaganang le go fedisa go se lekalekane ga batho ba bong jo bo farologaneng mo metshamekong le mo mekgatlhong ya metshameko..

src_text: Imehluko yemanani ebasebenti betinsita emahhovisi eTindvuna angumphumela wesikhatsi lesitsite leNdvuna leyacashwa ngaso, ngoba bonkhe basebenti bachumene nesikhatsi sekuba sehhovisi leNdvuna letsite.
tgt_text: Se samagana gape le matsapa basadi ba itemogelang ona fa ba tshwanetse go tsenela metshameko go tshwana le go se enngwe nokeng ka matlole, ka dithuso le ka megolo e tshwanelang batho botlhe ba leng batshameki ba metshameko.

src_text: Loku kubangelwa kutsi Libhukwana Letindvuna liyidokhumenti lephilako lehlala njalo ibuyeketwa..     Mengameli wendlulisele leLibhukwana Letindvuna lanyalo kuKhomishini Letimele yeTekuholelwa Kwalabasemahhovisi Emisebenti Yahulumende, leselivele libukana netemiholo yalabasemahhovisi ahulumende kutsi ibuyeketwe     Tincumo Tekhabhinethi.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo pholisi eno ke go dira gore basadi ba bantsi ba nne le seabe mo metshamekong le mo ditirong tsa go etelela kwa pele mo metshamekong go tshwana le go nna bakatisi le balaodi ba metshameko..     Pholisi eno tlhaloganya sentle gore go okediwa ga seabe sa basadi mo metshamekong le mo ditirong tsa boeteledipele mo metshamekong go tla fokotsa thata kgang ya go se lekalekane ga batho ba bong jo bo farologaneng mo dikarolong di le dintsi tsa metshameko tse di tlhaolang basadi.

src_text: Inchubomgomo Leluhlaka yeTabomake Kutemidlalo.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno batla gore go nne le tekatekano mmogo le go dira gore basadi ba neelwe tlotlo e ba tshwanetseng le go se tlhaelediwe matlho mo ditirong tsa seporofešenale, go akaretsa le gore ba neelwe megolo e lekanang fela le ya banna ba le bona leng batshameki ba metshameko.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kushicilelwa kugazethi luhlaka lweNchubomgomo yeTabomake Kutemidlalo kute ummango uphawule ngalo.
tgt_text: Go Tshwara Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Merero ya Kalafo ya Batsetse le Masea e Leng Gona Belegwa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo ibeka isethi yetinyatselo letifanele kutsi titsatfwe letitawukhutsata futsi tisekele besifazane kutemidlalo iphindze futsi icinisekise kutsi kunetinhlelo tekubukana nekungafani kwebulili emitsetfweni nasetinhlakeni tetemidlalo..     Iphindze ibukane netihibe tekungena kwebesifazane kutemidlalo njengekushoda kwetimali, lusito kanye nekungaholi ngalokwenele.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumetse gore naga ya Aforika Borwa ka tswelela pele ya tshwara Khonferense ya Lefatshe ya Ngwaga wa 2023 ya Merero ya Kalafo ya Batsetse le Masea e Leng Gona Belegwa kwa Motse Kapa go tloga ka la bo 8 go fitlha ka la bo 11 Motsheganong 2023 mo bannaleseabe ba feta ba le 1 000 go tswa mo lefatsheng ka bophara ba tla kopanang gona go tla ka ditharabololo tsa go thusa gore batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa se latswe kika, mmogo le go thibela gore basadi ba se tlhole ba belega masea a tlhokafalang ise belegwe.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo lehlongotwako ihlose kukhutsata kwandza kwekutibandzakanya kwebesifazane kutemidlalo netebuholi njengekucecesha nekuphatsa..     Lenchubomgomo yemukela kutsi kwandza kwekutibandzakanya kwebesifazane kutemidlalo nasetikhundleni tebuholi kutawuncipha kakhulu bese kutsi ekugcineni kucedze kungalingani ngekwebulili kanye netinhlobo letehlukene tekubandlululwa kwebesifazane.
tgt_text: Naga ya Aforika Borwa gatetse pele tota fa go tla mo Dipeelo tsa Tlhabololo e Nnelang Ruri (SDG) tsa Dinagakopano (UN) fa go tla mo kalafong ya batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa.

src_text: Iphindze futsi ikhutsate kulingana kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi besifazane batfola kuhlonishwa noma kunakwa ngekwebungcweti betemsebenti, lokufaka ekhatsi nemiholo lelinganako njengebalingani babo labadvuna.
tgt_text: Naga le yona tla unngwelwa go tlala seatla go tswa mo khonferenseng eno gonne batho ba ba romilweng go tsenela ba tla tlhabana botlhale le go fatlhosana ka maano bona ba dirisang a ba tswelang mosola mo mererong ya kalafo ya batsetse le masea e leng gona belegwa.

src_text: Kungeniswa Kwengcungcutsela Yemave Emhlaba Yetemphilo Yabomake Netinswane Letisandza Kutalwa Yanga-.
tgt_text: Porojeke ya Leeto la Ngwaoboswa, Tokologo le Kgaratlho (RLHR).

src_text: Ikhabhinethi igunyate kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ingenise Ingcungcutsela Yemave Emhlaba Yetemphilo Yabomake Netisandzakutalwa (tinswane Letisandza Kutalwa) letawubanjelwa eKapa kucala mhla ti-8 kuya kumhla ti-11 Inkhwekhweti 2023, lapho khona badlalindzima labavela emhlabeni jikelele labangetulu kwalaba-1 000 batawube babutsene kute kutsi baphutfumise ludzaba lwetisombululo tekwenta kancono kuphila kwabomake netinswane tabo letisandza kutalwa kanye nekuvikela kutalwa kwebantfwana sebashonile..     INingizimu Afrika yente inchubekelembili lenkhulu ekufezekiseni tinjongo teNtfutfuko Lesimeme yaMhlabuhlangene (i-UN) yetemphilo yamake nesisandzakutalwa sakhe, kanye nekuvikelwa kutala umntfwana asashonile.
tgt_text: Kabinete neetswe pegelo e tseneletseng ya dikgatelopele tsa porojeke ya RLHR.

src_text: Lelive lakitsi litawuzuza kakhulu ngoba titfunywa talengcungcutsela titawukwabelana, emkhatsini walokunye, emasu ato lasebentako kanye netintfo letinsha letitsintsa imphilo yamake nesisandzakutalwa.
tgt_text: Kabinete dumelane gore Tona ya Dikamano le Tirisano le Dinaga tsa Boditšhaba mmogo le ya Ditirelo tsa Bosiamisi le tsa Kgopololo ya Batshwariwa ba ipope Komiti ya Ditona tsa Naga (IMC) e tla mekamekanang le merero ya RLHR..     RLHR ke porojeke ya segopotso sa naga mme maitlhomo yona ke go ikgopotsa le go keteka loeto lwa Aforika Borwa go leba kwa kgololesegong.

src_text: Umklamo Wendlela Yetemafa Emzabalazo Nenkhululeko (i-RLHR).
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhomile IMC gore nne yona e okamang porojeke eno ka go dira gore nne le baeteledipele ba sepolotiki.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi itfole umbiko lonemininingwane yenchubekelembili mayelana nekucala kusetjentwa kwemklamo we-RLHR.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo porojeke eno ke go tlhoma dikgopotso tse di farologaneng tse di re gopotsang ka fao bakgaratlhela kgololesego ba ikentshitseng setlhabelo gore naga ya Aforika Borwa feletse gololesegile le go nna le temokerasi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi iphindze yagunyata kutsi Indvuna yeTebudlelwane Bemave Emhlaba Nekubambisana kanye Netebulungiswa Nekucondziswa Kwesimilo babe yincenye yeLikomidi Letindvuna (i-IMC) le-RLHR..     Lomklamo we-RLHR ungumklamo wesikhumbuto savelonkhe lokuhloswe ngawo kutsi kukhunjulwe futsi kugujwe umkhosi wendlela yeNingizimu Afrika leya enkhululekweni.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tla dira gore go agiwe dimusiamo tse dingwe gape, difikantswe, dilaeborari le mafelo go bolokela dilwana tsa hisetori mme gape tla tlhagisa gape le ditiro tsa go ipopa ngatana le go dirisana le dinaga tse dingwe tsa Aforika.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi isungule i-IMC kutsi yengamele lomklamo futsi isite ngebuholi betepolitiki.
tgt_text: Porojeke eno tshegofaditswe ke UN mme bile na le bokgoni jwa go gagamatsa tirisanommogo magareng ga batho ka go sola mosola setso le ngwaoboswa go ralala le kontinente..     Tse dingwe tsa dikgato tse dintsinyana tse di setseng di dirilwe ke leeto le Ditona le le tsereng mo ngwageng wa 2022 go leba kwa Botswana le kwa Zimbabwe mmogo le go rulaganya le kopano magareng ga naga ya Angola le ya Tanzania go di jela nala..     Ditiro tse di mabapi le porojeke eno maitlhomo tsona ke go golaganya dinaga tse di ka fa Karolong ya Borwa jwa Kontinente ya Aforika mmogo le go ruta bašwa ka ka kgaratlho e kileng ya nna teng ya go lwantshana le ditiragalo tsa bokoloniale le tsa go nyefolana go ya ka lotso.

src_text: Loluhlelo luhlose kufaka tinhlobo letehlukene tesikhumbuto sekutinikela kwebalweli benkhululeko kute kutsi iNingizimu Afrika ikhululeke futsi ibe nentsandvo yelinyenti.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tla dira gore go nne bonolo go baakanya diphoso tsa mo nakong e fetileng ka go nolofatsa dikgato tsa go kopa go busediwa gae ga masaledi balwelakgaratlho ba naga ya rona ba ba tlhokafalatseng kwa dinageng tse dingwe.

src_text: Iphindze ivumele kwakhiwa kwemisamo, ematje esikhumbuto, imitapolwati netilulu temilandvo, futsi ihlose kucaphela umoya welubumbano nekubambisana emkhatsini kwema-Afrika.
tgt_text: Go na le mabitla ka nna le 11 a itsiweng gore hupile ditopo tsa maAforika Borwa kwa nageng ya Zambia, mme le lengwe la mabitla ao ke la Rre Duma Nokwe yo neng le Molwelakgaratlho..     Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Dilo tsa Botsweretshi, Setso le Ngwaoboswa di Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha.

src_text: Igunyatwe yi-UN futsi inemandla ekucinisa kubambisana emkhatsini webantfu kusetjentiswa lisiko nemagugu kulo lonkhe lelivekati..     Imisebenti leminyentana leyentiwe nga-2022 ifaka ekhatsi kuvakasha kweNdvuna eBotswana naseZimbabwe kanye nekuhlela imihlangano ne-Angola kanye neTanzania..     Imisebenti lemayelana nalomsebenti ihlose kuchumanisa onkhe emave aseNingizimu ne-Afrika futsi ifundzise bantfu labasha ngemzabalazo wekulwa nebukoloni kanye nekubandlululwa ngekwelibala.
tgt_text: Kabinete neseditse pula dikgato tsa go tsenya tirisong Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Botsweretshi, Setso le Ngwaoboswa di Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo ngalokufanako ivumela kubuyiselwa ekhaya kwematsambo ebalweli benkhululeko baseNingizimu Afrika labangcwatjwa kulamanye emave.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno dira gore Pholisi ya Naga e ka ga go Dira gore Ngwaoboswa Somarelwe ka Mokgwa wa Dikhomphiutha nne le mosola jaaka sale kwalwa ka ngwaga wa 2011 ke Lefapha la Botsweretshi le Setso.

src_text: Kunemangcwaba lalinganiselwa kula-11 ebantfu baseNingizimu Afrika lakhonjiwe eZambia, lafaka ekhatsi elishanhlitiyo neLichawe lemzabalazo lokunguMnu.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno samagana le tiro ya go dira gore ditsweletswa tsotlhe tsa ngwaoboswa di somarelwe mo dikhomphiutheng gore batho ba kgone go di fitlhelela bonolo le go boloka tshedimosetso ya beng ba ditlhagisiwa tseo.

src_text: Duma Nokwe..     Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.
tgt_text: Le fa tota tlhaloso ya mokgwa wa go boloka ditsweletswa mo khomphiutheng bua bogolosegolo ka go tsaya tshedimosetso e bolokilweng ka mokgwa wa thekenoloji ya bogolotala go fetola gore nne mo thekenolojing ya segompieno, mmogo le go gatisa ditokomane tsotlhe tse di leng mo pampiring gore di tsenngwe mo lhomphiutheng, go kopisa direkoto tse di rekotilweng ka thekenoloji ya bogolotala go di tsenya mo dikhomphiutheng, pholisi eno okeditse bokao jwa lefoko leno go bua gape le ka tsedimosetso e leng mo mokgweng wa thekenoloji ya segompieno go ka se kgonagaleng gore gatisiwe..     Go somarela tshedimosetso mo dikhomphiutheng go tla tswela naga mosola o seng kana ka sepe gonne go tla dira gore tshedimosetso eno go nne bonolo go bona, segolobogolo tshedimosetso e tlhokomelwang ke mafelo go boloka tshedimosetso, dilaeborari le dimosiamo.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kuphunyeleliswa kweNchubomgomo Yavelonkhe yeKufaka Tebuciko, Temasiko Netemafa Kudijithali.
tgt_text: Pholisi eno tla tsenngwa tirisong mo maphateng otlhe puso le setšhaba     Molaotlhomo.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo iphindze futsi iphumelelise Inchubomgomo Yavelonkhe Yekwentiwa Kwetinsita Tetemafa kutsi tibe teDijithali lokwasungulwa Litiko Letebuciko Netemasiko nga-.
tgt_text: Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Merero ya Ditheo tsa Molao wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo igcila ekufakeni tinsita tetemafa kutedijithali ngekwenhloso yekutilondvolota, kufinyeleleka kanye nekulawulwa kwebuniyo.
tgt_text: Kabinete tlhomamisitse go tlisiwa kwa Palamenteng ga Molaotlhomo o Kwalolotsweng Sešwa wa Molao wa Merero ya Ditheo tsa Molao wa Ngwaga wa.

src_text: Nanoma-nje kukwenta kube kwedijithali kuyinchubo yekugucula lokucuketfwe kwe-analogi kube ngulokucuketfwe kwedijithali, lokufaka ekhatsi emarekhodi eliphepha, i-microfiche kanye nekucoshwa kwematheyiphu langasiwe ekwedijithali, lenchubomgomo ikhulise lenchazelo emitfonjeni yetedijithali njengelwati lolukhicitwe ngekwedijithali, lolungeke luguculwe lube simo salokuphatsekako.
tgt_text: Maitlhomo molaotlhomo ono ke go kwalola sešwa Melao le mentsinyana e disiwang ke Lefapha la Bosiamisi le Tlhabololo ya Molaotheo ka go bakanya diphoso tsa setegeniki mmogo le dikarolo tse di kgoreletsang go diragadiwa ga Melao eno..     Molaotlhomo ono na le dikarolo di le 37 tse di tlhokang go kwalolwa sešwa gore go kgonwe go baakanngwa diphoso tse di leng teng mo melaong e farologaneng tse di sa tsamaisaneng le molaotheo     Ditiragalo tse di Tlang.
Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Batho.

src_text: Kwentiwa kube kwedijithali kutawuba tinzuzo letinkhulu kulelive njengoba kutawusita kufinyelela kalula emitfonjeni yelwati, ikakhulukati leyo lephetfwe tilululwati, imitapolwati kanye nemisamo.
tgt_text: Moporesitente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya gagwe ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa kwa Moketeng wa Ngwaga wa 2023 wa go Keteka Letsatsi la Ditshwanelo tsa Botho ka Labobedi wa la bo 21 Mopitlwe 2023 kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la De Aar West la porofense ya Kapa Bokone..     Molaetsamogolo wa monongwaga ke: “Go Bokeletsa le go Tlhokomela Setlwaedi sa Ditshwanelo tsa Batho go Tsena mo Isagong ka Tsona”, mme seno ke go keteka matlhotlhapelo a neng diragala kwa Sharpeville le kwa Langa mmogo le go keteka megwanto mengwe e neng ya runya ka lona letsatsi leno ka la bo 21 Mopitlwe 1960 mo nageng ka bophara..     Jaaka re le puso re rwele maikarabelo go sireletsa ditshwanelo tsa motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa nageng tse molaotheo mo nayang tsona.

src_text: Lenchubomgomo itawusetjentiswa kuhulumende wonkhe kanye nasemmangweni wonkhe     Umtsetfosivivinyo.
tgt_text: Tla re dirisaneng mmogo go dira bonnete jwa gore go se nne le motho yo re mo tlogelang kwa morago fa go tla mo go direng gore dikarolo tsotlhe tse Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa wa 1996 mmogo le Molao wa Ditshwanelo tsa Botho batho ba ikutlwisa tsona.

src_text: Umtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa Wanga-.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Lefatshe la Tshomarelo ya Metsi.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi ikuvumile kwetfulwa ePhalamende kweMtsetfosivivinyo Wekuchibela Tetebulungiswa wanga-.
tgt_text: Aforika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya go Keteka Mosola wa Metsi go tloga ka la bo 20 go fitlha ka la bo 26 Mopitlwe 2023 ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Potlakisa Diphetogo”..     Beke eno ketekiwa ka nako le nngwe le Letsatsi la go Keteka Botlhokwa jwa Metsi ka la bo 22 Mopitlwe 2023, mme lona le nopola ka fao metsi a phepa leng botlhokwa ka teng.

src_text: LoMtsetfosivivinyo uhlose kuchibela Imitsetfo leminyenti lesetjentiswa Litiko Letebulungiswa NeMtsetfosisekelo ngekulungisa tindzaba tetebucwepheshe kanye netindzaba letitsintsa kusetjentiswa mbamba kweMitsetfo..     LoMtsetfosivivinyo ucuketse tindzinyana letinge-37 letihlongota tichibelo kute kutsi kulungiswe kungahambi kahle ngekwemtsetfosisekelo kwaleMitsetfo leyehlukahlukene     Imikhosi Letako.
tgt_text: Le fa re itemogetse dipula tse dintsi mo malobanyaneng, naga ya Aforika Borwa santse le naga e tlhaelang metsi bile mo maemong bo 30 dinaga tse di nang le komelelo mo lefatsheng.

src_text: Lilanga Lemalungelo Eluntfu.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo baaging botlhe go tlhokomela metswedi ya metsi ya naga ya rona go tshwana le mafelo nang le metswedi, go nne botlhokwa thata mo go direng gore re nne le felo gongwe mo re ka iponelang metsi fa go le thata.

src_text: Mengameli Ramaphosa utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga emkhosini wavelonkhe weLilanga Letemalungelo Eluntfu langa-2023 ngaLesibili, mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo  Enshonalanga yeDe Aar, eNyakatfo Kapa..     Ingcikitsisicubulo  itsi: “Kuhlanganisa Nekusimamisa Lisiko Lelilungelo Leluntfu Kuchubekela Embili Kulikusasa”, lapho sikhumbula kubulawa ngesibhuku nangebunyenti kwebantfu baseSharpeville nebakaLanga, kanye naleminye imishuco leyaba khona mhla tinge-21 Indlovulenkhulu 1960 kulo lonkhe lelive lakitsi.
tgt_text: Rotlhe ke maikarabelo rona go tlhokomela metsi le go dira bonnete jwa gore metsi ga fele..     Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya Bolwetse jwa Lehuba (TB).

src_text: Singuhulumende, sichubeka nekutinikela etibopheni tetfu temtsetfosisekelo tekuvikela emalungelo eluntfu abo bonkhe bantfu balelive letfu.
tgt_text: Motlatsamoporesitente Paul Mashatile tla fana ka puo ya gagwe ya dintlha tse di botlhokwa kwa Moketeng wa Semmuso wa go Keteka Letsatsi la Lefatshe la go Tlhotlheletsa Twantsho ya Bolwetse jwa Lehuba (TB) ka la bo 24 Mopitlwe 2023 mo go tla bong go ketekiwa ka molaetsamogolo yo reng: “Go Jalo!

src_text: Asisebente sonkhe ngekubambisana kutsi kungabikhona lesimshiya emuva ekwenteni imigomo yeMtsetfosisekelo weRiphabhulikhi yaseNingizimu Afrika wanga-1996 kanye neMculu Wemalungelo ube yintfo lephilwa mbamba yawonkhewonkhe..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lemanti.
tgt_text: Ke Nna le Wena ba Re ka Fedisang TB”..     Mo moketeng ono o tla tshwarelwang kwa Lebaleng la Metshameko la kwa Tlhabane mo Porofenseng ya Bokone Bophirima Lekgotla la Naga ya Aforika Borwa la Aids mmogo le Lefapha la Boitekanelo ba tla thankgolola Leano la Naga la go Samagana le Tiro ya go Lwantshana le TB, HIV, Malwetse a Fetelanang ka Thobalano magareng ga ngwaga wa 2023 go fitlha ka wa.

src_text: INingizimu Afrika itawugubha Liviki Lemanti kusukela mhla tinge-20 kuya kumhla tinge-26 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Kusheshisa Ingucuko”..     Leliviki lihlangana neLilanga Lemhlaba Letemanti mhla tinge-22 Indlovulenkhulu 2023, legcamisa kubaluleka kwemanti lahlantekile.
tgt_text: Leano leno le agelela mo godimo ga dilo tse di botlhokwa tse di setseng di fitlheletswe ka go tsosolosa matsholo thibelotshwaetso kalafo go nwa melemo go etela mafelo otlhe balwetse ba nnang mo go ona le go dira gore batho ba ikobele ditaelo tsa go tsaya melemo, mmogo le go fedisa ditiragalo le dipuo tsa go nyenya balwetse bano  Melaetsa.

src_text: Nanoma-nje kube netimvula letinkhulu etindzaweni letinyenti talelive, iNingizimu Afrika iyachubeka nekuba live leleswela emanti futsi isezingeni le-30 lemave lome kakhulu emhlabeni wonkhe jikelele.
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya go AkgolaKabinete romela melaetsa ya yona ya go akgola le go eletsa masego kwa go: Setlhopha sa motshameko wa kerikhete sa the Proteas se se tla amogelang sa West Indies fa di tshameka metshameko ya multi-format tour.

src_text: Ikhabhinethi icele tonkhe takhamuti kutsi tivikele imitfombo yetfu yemanti leligugu kakhulu njengetihlambo, njengoba tibaluleke kakhulu ngoba tingumtfombo wesikhatsi lesidze.
tgt_text: Kabinete ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa go ema nokeng setlhopha sa naga ya rona jaaka se tswelela go re dira motlotlo.

src_text: Sonkhe sinendzima lesifanele kutsi siyidlale songe emanti kanye nekucinisekisa kutsi imitfombo yetfu ayipheli..     Lilanga Lemhlaba Lesifo Semaphaphu  (i-TB).
tgt_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso Kabinete romela matshediso yone le kutlwelobotlhoko kwa go ba lelapa le ditsala tsa: Mokhuduthamaga wa Lefapha la Thuto wa Puso ya Porofense ya Foreistata Tate Makgoe yo neng na le dingwaga di le 60,yo nnileng le seabe se segolo mo lephateng la thuto mmogo le go atlega mo go direng gore porofense eno ntshe dipholo tse dintle thata tsa materiki ka tatelano sebaka sa dingwaga di le nne..Mme Maurencia Gillion, yo neng emetse porofense ya Kapa Bophirima kwa Lekgotleng la Bosetšhaba la Diporofense (NCOP) mmogo le go direla Komiti a Tlhophilweng mo go yona ya Ditirelo tsa Kokelo le tsa go Tswa Baagi Thuso ne le molwelakgaratlho yo neng tumile bile diretse baagi ba Kapa Bophirima sebaka se tlhoka palo, segolobogolo baagi ba kwa metseselegae ya porofense eo.Rre John Wills yo neng na le dingwaga di le 66, yo neng le ramolao yo neng tumile bile le .molwelakgaratlho yo neng emela kwa kgotlatshekelo baeteledipele ba le bantsinyana ba dipolotiki, mmogo le Moporesitente wa mo malobeng bong Rre Nelson Mandela.Rre Mark Pilgrim yo neng na le dingwaga di le 54, yo neng le mogasi wa dikgang yo neileng bagasi ba bangwe ba le bantsi mafolofolo mo intasetering ya kgaso ya dikgang.

src_text: Sekelamengameli Paul Mashatile utawetfula inkhulumo yelilanga ngelilanga lekukhunjulwa ngalokusemtsetfweni kweLilanga Lemhlaba Le-TB mhla tinge-24 Indlovulenkhulu 2023 ngaphasi kwengcikitsisicubulo letsi: “Yebo!
tgt_text: Mme Gloria Bosman yo neng na le dingwaga di le 50, yo nang le dikabo di tlhoka palo tse di fentseng yo neng le seopedi le sekwadi sa mmino wa Aforika Borwa wa jazz     Go ThapiwaPele batho botlhe ba thapiwa go tla tlhatlhobiwa makwalo bona dithuto le ditlankana dingwe tse di tlhokagalang.

src_text: Wena ukanye Nami Singayicedza i-TB”..     Lomkhosi losemtsetfweni lotawubanjelwa eNkhundleni Yetemidlalo i-Thlabane eNyakatfonshonalanga utawuphindze futsi ube sikhatsi sekutsi Umkhandlu Wavelonkhe WaseNingizimu Afrika Wete-AIDS kanye neLitiko Letemphilo wetfule Luhlelobuciko Lwavelonkhe Lwekusebenta lwanga-2023 kuya ku-2028 lwe-TB, i-HIV kanye neTifo Letitsatselwana Ecansini.
tgt_text: Ditokololo tsa Lekgotla la go Eletsa Botsamaisi jwa Sekema sa Makwalo Madulo     Moatefokate Boyce Mkhize (Monnasetulo)     Hosi Pheni Cypraim Ngove (Motlatsamonnasetulo)     Mme Kagisho Mmaseleke Choenyana     Rre Pieter Jacobus De Beer     Moatefokate Nomonde Nokuthula January     Rre Iqbal Mohamed Motala; le     Ngaka Vuyisani Moss..     Ditokololo tsa Khomišene ya Baatlhodi     Mme Nomzamo Zondo;(ii)    Rre Hanif Vally;(iii)    Ngaka Cornelia September;(iv)    Rre Makgabhana Mokoena thapilwe sešwa); led     Moporofesara Estelle Hurter thapilwe sešwa).
